game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest
locale.synopsis: Originally released as a bonus disk for those who pre-ordered The Legend of Zelda: Wind Waker, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest contains GCN versions of Ocarina of Time and the never-released 64DD Ura Zelda (a remixed version of Ocarina of Time with harder dungeons ... Only true heroes will make it through this quest alive!). Fans of Nintendo's acclaimed series can play both of these games on their GameCubes, and enjoy a few technical improvements over the N64 versions, namely a higher 640x480 resolution, Dolby Pro-Logic surround sound support, and 480p Progressive Scan support. Veterans and newcomers alike will find something to enjoy with this excellent port of the classic N64 game.

locale.title: 젤다의 전설: 시간의 오카리나 / 마스터 퀘스트

rom.name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest (USA) (EN) (v1.0).iso

game.name: Zelda no Densetsu: Toki no Ocarina GC / Ura Zelda (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Zelda no Densetsu: Toki no Ocarina GC / Ura Zelda
locale.synopsis: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Master Quest is a special version of Ocarina of Time that wasn't released for the N64 in North America. Both games were exclusively available for the Nintendo GameCube to those who preordered The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker at a participating retailer. The Master Quest version of Ocarina of Time contains the same overall storyline as the original Ocarina of Time adventure. However, the dungeons have been upgraded to be truly challenging, even to a Zelda master.

locale.title: ゼルダの伝説 時のオカリナ GC

rom.name: Zelda no Densetsu: Toki no Ocarina GC / Ura Zelda (Japan) (JA) (v1.00).iso

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest (Europe) (EN,FR,DE)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest
locale.synopsis: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Master Quest is a special version of Ocarina of Time that wasn't released for the N64 in North America. Both games were exclusively available for the Nintendo GameCube to those who preordered The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker at a participating retailer. The Master Quest version of Ocarina of Time contains the same overall storyline as the original Ocarina of Time adventure. However, the dungeons have been upgraded to be truly challenging, even to a Zelda master.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time / Master Quest
locale.synopsis:
The Legend of Zelda - Ocarina of Time für GameCube! Der fantastische N64-Klassiker!
Features:
- Fantasy-Action, untermalt von einem orchestralen Soundtrack in CD-Qualität
- Atemberaubende Kamerafahrten & stimmungsvoll inszenierte Filmsequenzen in Echtzeit!
- Finde den Weg zu Schätzen und Geheimnissen.
- Das Master-Quest bietet zahlreiche neue Überraschungen
Mythen, Legenden und Magie... das ist The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. Niemand kann sich dem Bann dieses Fantasy-Epos' entziehen, keiner kann dem Zauber von Prinzessin Zelda widerstehen. Auf der Suche nach dem goldenen Triforce, dem Schlüssel zum Heiligen Reich, bewegst du dich durch eine gigantische Welt voller Geheimnisse und Mysterien. Bei The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time begegnest Du fremden Völkern, unheimlichen Höllenkreaturen und vielen magischen Wesen, die dich mit Waffen, Elixieren und Zaubersprüchen versorgen. Spiele den N64-Klassiker exklusiv auf deiner GameCube!

locale.title: 젤다의 전설: 시간의 오카리나 / 마스터 퀘스트

Resident Evil 4: Bonus Disc
locale.synopsis: This bonus disc was bundled with Resident Evil 4 in Australia as a collector's edition. It features videos of Resident Evil 0, Resident Evil, Resident Evil 2, Resident Evil 3: Nemesis, Resident Evil Code: Veronica and Resident Evil 4, as well as interviews and making-of info in exclusive behind-the-scenes interviews with the creators of Resident Evil 4.

Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc - Version 18
locale.synopsis: Demo and video sampler disc, designed for retail store use (one of a number of versions available during the 2004 holiday season.) . The sampler includes a simple menu and playable demos of Pikmin 2, Paper Mario 2, Mario Pinball (GBA), and Spinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow. The disc also features pre-release movie trailers of the following games: Donkey Konga, Donkey Kong Jungle Beat, WWE Day of Reckoning, Tales of Symphonia, Paper Mario 2, Pikmin 2, Madden 2005, NCAA Football 2005, Tiger Woods 2005, Shark Tale and Megaman X Command Mission The disc is marked "For Display Only - Not for Resale".

locale.synopsis:
This demo disc contains the following playable demos & movies:
Demos Include:
Mario Kart: Double Dash Custom Robo Sonic Heroes
Movies Include:
Pokemon Colosseum Metroid: Zero Mission (GBA) Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles Custom Robo NFL Street Need for Speed: Underground The Sims: Bustin Out I-Ninja Megaman Anniversary Collection 007: Everything or Nothing
This disc also has another unique feature. When a memory card is inserted into the Gamecube system another feature unlocks which allows you to add a special Pokemon, a shiny Zigzagoon, to your Pokemon Ruby or Sapphire version. This also saves a "berry program update" onto your game which fixes a glitch in the game itself.

game.name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (Demo) (Europe) (EN,FR)

locale.title: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (Demo)
locale.synopsis: Action platformer from the makers of Sonic. Players take control of the clucky title character, Billy Hatcher, and try to bring light back to his now darkened home world. To do so, he must free a bunch of elders that are trapped inside golden chicken eggs. The idea is to find these and other eggs and roll them around the sprawling levels, smash enemies and collect fruit until they are ready to hatch, and then crack the suckers open to bring a small, friendly animal into this world. Billy can hatch penguins, seals, and other creatures and command them to help him on his quest. This is a DEMO version of the game.

locale.title: Naruto Clash of Ninja 2 (Demo)
locale.synopsis: NARUTO: Clash of Ninja 2, developed exclusively for Nintendo GameCube, will offer non-stop ninja style combat action for 1-4 players where gamers choose to play as one of 23 total available characters. All-new multi-player modes will engage players in frantic simultaneous four player battles and single-player modes will offer more gameplay choices than before with survival and timed attack modes that allow players to showcase their taijutsu and special jutsu abilities.

locale.title: P.N.03 (Promo)
locale.synopsis: Third-person action shooter from Capcom, featuring robot hunter heroine Vanessa Z. Schneider. This beautiful mercenary for hire with a mysterious past is called in to take care of an off-world colony overrun by a Computer Arms Management System (or CAMS) gone completely haywire. Gameplay exists of run-and-stop shooting action with a rhythm twist, as Vanessa explores 11 linear levels. She can shoot single blasts from her hands or take on multiple enemies at once utilizing a number of combos, which are tied to the nine upgradable suits found in the game. Produced by Shinji Mikami.

locale.title: 스타 워즈: 로그 스쿼드론 II 체험판
Action Replay
locale.synopsis: * Colorful high-resolution graphics * Easy-to-use, intuitive menu system * Preloaded with many exclusive cheat codes for the latest and greatest GameCube games * Totally unauthorized cheat codes and enhancements that you won't find anywhere else

locale.title: Action Replay
locale.synopsis: Das leistungsstärkste Cheatsystem der Welt! Enfessle die Power und gewinne das Spiel! Meistere selbst die schwierigsten Spiele ohne große Probleme! Verschaffe dir mit unendlicher Lebensenergie, Munition und Zeit einen enormen Vorteil, schalte geheime Level, Fahrzeuge und Charaktere frei. Jetzt kannst du allmächtig werden und jedes Spiel gewinnen! Das Action Replay kommt bereits mit jeder Menge Cheats für die aktuellen und besten GameCube Spiele. Das Aktualisieren mit neuen Codes ist ein Kinderspiel. Worauf wartest du noch? Das Action Replay enthält alles, was du brauchst, um das Spiel nach deinen Regeln zu gewinnen. *Ermöglicht das Spielen von Import-Games, ohne deine Konsole zu modifizieren *Vollgepackt mit tausenden von Codes für die aktuellen und besten Spiele *Neue Cheats können einfach hinzugefügt und gespeichert werden *Anwenderfreundliches Menüsystem

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe (Promotional demo)
locale.synopsis: Fighting action game from Capcom Studio 4's Atsushi Inaba. Joe was just your average, well, Joe until he was transported into his favorite action movie. In his new environment, Joe discovers he has all the abilities of Hollywood action-hero. Using new cel-shading techniques, VJ boasts a unique visual style that blends colorful 3D environments with a twisted take on traditional 2D gameplay. Joe's power stems from skillful martial arts attacks, high-flying acrobatics, and time-bending special effects. Players can slow down or speed up time when attacking/ dodging enemies, as well as zoom in on the action to execute different attacks.

Black & Bruised
locale.synopsis: To the fighters in Black & Bruised, boxing is no game; it's a matter of survival. Nineteen outrageous characters fight their way through grueling slugfests to win the pot or settle a score. You'll play through their intertwining stories as they battle each other in 21 different arenas. During each match, you can earn power-ups such as Armor, AutoSlip, Vamp, or Fire Damage to give your fighter a competitive advantage over your opponent.

locale.title: Black & Bruised
locale.synopsis: To the fighters in Black & Bruised, boxing is no game; it's a matter of survival. Nineteen outrageous characters fight their way through grueling slugfests to win the pot or settle a score. You'll play through their intertwining stories as they battle each other in 21 different arenas. During each match, you can earn power-ups such as Armor, AutoSlip, Vamp, or Fire Damage to give your fighter a competitive advantage over your opponent.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis: Be a good cop or a bad cop in the streetwise action game True Crime: New York City. You can explore the authentically modeled streets of New York City as a police officer tracking down criminals and administering justice. The game features a diverse weapon set, as well as a mixed offering of fighting styles that you can use to take out those who stand in your way. In addition to combat on foot, the game features driving sequences and shootouts. Laurence Fishburne, Christopher Walken, and Mickey Rourke contribute their voice talent to the game as well.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis:
In True Crime: New York City schlüpfst du in die Rolle von Marcus Reed, einem ehemaligen Gang-Mitglied, das jetzt für die Polizei arbeitet. Du jagst den Mörder deines Mentors und sorgst in den kriminellen Vierteln Manhattans für Recht und Ordnung. Deine Ermittlungen führen dich zu allen möglichen Betrügern, Gangstern und Rowdies. Um in den Straßen New Yorks zu überleben, musst du schon ein stahlharter Typ sein!
* New York wurde im großen Stil nachgebildet. Du kannst dir jedes Auto schnappen und überall hinfahren oder hingehen * Missionsbasierte Struktur - du musst eine Mission beenden, um fortfahren zu können * Die Umgebung reagiert auf die Entscheidungen deines Charakters. Wenn du Kleinkriminalität ignorierst, um deine großen Ziele zu erreichen, wird es noch mehr Graffitis und Müll geben * Spiele als guter oder böser Polizist! Du kannst Waffen und andere Dinge, die du bei Verhaftungen findest, behalten * Schießereien und Handgemenge - jetzt kannst du auch Karate, Kung Fu und Thai Boxing anwenden * 35 Feuerwaffen und 23 Nahkampfwaffen * Freischaltbare Charaktere wie z. B. der einflussreiche Hip Hop-Künstler Redman * Soundtrack mit Public Enemy, Run DMC, Wu Tang Clan und DMX, sowie neuen Tracks von Redman und Rocksongs von den Ramones, Blondie, Bob Dylan u. v. m.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis: Be a good cop or a bad cop in the streetwise action game True Crime: New York City. You can explore the authentically modeled streets of New York City as a police officer tracking down criminals and administering justice. The game features a diverse weapon set, as well as a mixed offering of fighting styles that you can use to take out those who stand in your way. In addition to combat on foot, the game features driving sequences and shootouts. Laurence Fishburne, Christopher Walken, and Mickey Rourke contribute their voice talent to the game as well.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis: Seja um policial bom ou um policial mau no jogo de ação das ruas, True Crime: New York City. Você pode explorar as ruas modeladas de forma autêntica da cidade de Nova York como um policial rastreando criminosos e administrando justiça. O jogo apresenta um conjunto diversificado de armas, bem como uma oferta mista de estilos de luta que você pode usar para eliminar aqueles que estão em seu caminho. Além do combate a pé, o game traz sequências de direção e tiroteios. Laurence Fishburne, Christopher Walken e Mickey Rourke também contribuem com seu talento vocal para o jogo.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis: Be a good cop or a bad cop in the streetwise action game True Crime: New York City. You can explore the authentically modeled streets of New York City as a police officer tracking down criminals and administering justice. locale.synopsis: Seja um policial bom ou um policial mau no jogo de ação das ruas, True Crime: New York City. locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis: Be a good cop or a bad cop in the streetwise action game True Crime: New York City. You can explore the authentically modeled streets of New York City as a police officer tracking down criminals and administering justice. The game features a diverse weapon set, as well as a mixed offering of fighting styles that you can use to take out those who stand in your way. In addition to combat on foot, the game features driving sequences and shootouts. Laurence Fishburne, Christopher Walken, and Mickey Rourke contribute their voice talent to the game as well.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis:
Le meilleur de New York ? Endossez le rôle de Marcus Reed, un ancien membre de gang reconverti en flic qui se lance sur la trace du meurtrier de son mentor, et essayez de débarrasser les quartiers de Manhattan de ses barons du crime. Vous infiltrerez donc le milieu sous une fausse identité pour mieux mener l'enquête. Vos investigations vous amèneront à côtoyer toutes sortes de truands, de racailles et de voyous en tous genres. Nul besoin d'ajouter que pour survivre dans les rues de New York, il faudra savoir vous montrer brutal !
. La ville de New York a été magnifiquement recréée. Vous êtes libre d'y circuler comme bon vous semble avec n'importe quelle voiture . La structure du jeu repose sur diverses missions que vous devrez mener à terme pour aller plus loin . L'environnement réagit en fonction des choix de votre personnage. Favorisez les objectifs principaux du jeu aux menus larcins . Choisissez de jouer les bons flics ou les ripoux : vous pouvez garder les armes et les divers objets que vous trouvez lors de vos perquisitions . Fusillades et combats à main nue : Karaté, Kung Fu et Boxe Thaï sont désormais disponibles . 35 armes à feu et 23 armes de combat . Les plus grandes stars de Hollywood (Christopher Walken, Laurence Fishburne et Mickey Rourke) ont prêté leur voix aux personnages principaux . Parmi les personnages à débloquer, on trouve Redman, le maître du hip hop . Les artistes les plus célèbres de la scène hip hop ont participé à la bande annonce : Public Enemy, Run DMC, Wu Tang Clan, DMX et Redman. Il y aussi des sons plus rock avec The Ramones, Blondie et Bob Dylan parmi bien d'autres

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis:
Ponte en el papel de Marcus Reed, antiguo miembro de una banda callejera centrado en dar caza al asesino de su mentor mientras limpia las calles de Manhattan de criminales. A medida que progreses en tus investigaciones entrarás en contacto con los bajos fondos de Nueva York, lo peor de lo peor de la gran manzana, así que tendrás que demostrar que eres un tipo duro si quieres sobrevivir en sus calles...
· Excelente recreación de la ciudad de Nueva York, donde podrás caminar o conducir a tus anchas · Estructura basada en misiones que tendrás que ir superando para profundizar en la historia · Entornos que reaccionan a tu comportamiento en el juego: ignora a los pequeños rateros y verás que los escenarios se van llenando de graffitis y basura · Elige entre el papel de poli bueno o poli malo. Incluso podrás conservar los objetos que consigas en las redadas · Tiroteos y peleas en las que podrás usar técnicas como Karate, Kung Fu y Thai Boxing · 35 armas de fuego y 23 para la lucha cuerpo a cuerpo ·Voces prestadas por famosos actores de Hollywood como Christopher Walken, Laurence Fishburne y Mickey Rourke · Otros personajes que desbloquear, incluyendo al cantante de hiphop Redman · Banda sonora arrolladora compuesta por conocidos artistas de la escena hiphop como Public Enemy, Run DMC, Wu Tang Clan, DMX y el mismo Redman. También contarás con clásicos del rock como Los Ramones, Blondie o Bob Dylan, entre otros.

locale.title: True Crime: New York City
locale.synopsis:
Impersona Marcus Reed, un ex gangster diventato poliziotto, dai la caccia al tuo mentore e ripulisci le strade di Manhattan dai criminali. Durante le tue indagini sotto copertura entrerai in contatto con tutti i tipi di imbroglioni e criminali; per sopravvivere in un ambiente del genere, dovrai essere un vero duro!
· Fantastica rappresentazione di New York - potrai guidare qualsiasi mezzo o camminare ovunque in piena libertà! · Struttura basata sulle missioni; dovrai completarle per andare avanti nel gioco · L'ambiente circostante reagisce alle scelte del personaggio - se deciderai di ignorare i crimini "minori" per completare i compiti più importanti, noterai più graffiti e rifiuti · Puoi decidere di giocare come poliziotto buono o cattivo e tenere le armi e gli oggetti raccolti dopo le retate · Scontri con armi da fuoco e combattimenti a mani nude usando Karate, Kung Fu e Thai Boxing · 35 armi da fuoco e 23 armi da mischia · I personaggi hanno le voci di attori di Hollywood del calibro di Christopher Walken, Laurence Fishburne e Mickey Rourke · Personaggi sbloccabili fra cui l'artista hip hop Redman · La colonna sonora contiene canzoni di famosi artisti hip hop come Public Enemy, Run DMC, Wu Tang Clan e DMX, oltre a nuove canzoni di Redman. Ci sono inoltre bellissimi titoli di The Ramones, Blondie e Bob Dylan

locale.title: Digimon Battle Chronicle
locale.synopsis:
The Japanese release of Digimon Rumble Arena 2.
Digimon Battle Chronicle lets you play as and against your favorite Digimon characters. The game features all the popular Digimon from all four seasons of the TV show, plus secret Digimon. Each Digimon has a signature move that can earn Digipoints and, with enough Digipoints, you can Digivolve and destroy your opponents. In locations ranging from icy glaciers to fields of fire, you can conquer the Digimon in single-player mode or compete against three of your friends in multiplayer brawls.

locale.title: デジモンバトルクロニクル
Tak 2: The Staff of Dreams
locale.synopsis: Tak must learn new Juju magic to recover the Staff of Dreams and defeat Tlaloc once and for all. Now dabbling with new abilities, Tak can create a little Juju magic of his own. As Tak, try to master three new Jujus, expanded combat capabilities, and new weapons as you battle Nightmare creatures. Interact with familiar characters from the series, along with Jibolba's brother, JB. Multiplayer "Dinky" games let you face off in head-to-head action with playable characters from Tak's world.

game.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Z Gundam (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Z Gundam
locale.synopsis: The game takes place seven years after the One Year War Gundam storyline. The game features 31 mobile suits which can be played on five different modes. These modes are arcade, versus, universal century mode, survival, and training.

locale.title: 機動戦士ガンダム ガンダムvs.Ｚガンダム
locale.synopsis:
本作は、「機動戦士ガンダム 連邦vs.ジオンＤＸ」「機動戦士Ｚガンダム エゥーゴvs.ティターンズ」に続くチームバトルアクションのシリーズ最新作です。ゲームシステムを伝承しつつ、格闘ゲームライクなスタイルと、戦力ゲージの新システムを用いて、ガンダムのキャラクター性とゲーム性を見事に融合させたシリーズの集大成ともいえる、最高のガンダムチームバトルアクションです。
戦いの基本ルールは、シリーズの真髄である２on２のバトルシステムです。プレイヤーは連邦・エゥーゴもしくは、ジオン・ティターンズの陣営を選択し、モビルスーツを操作して相手チームと戦闘を行います。モビルスーツは、シリーズ初登場の６機を加え、ガンダム、Ｚガンダムの機体が総登場します。武装選択、変形など特徴溢れる機体でのバトルアクションの真髄をお楽しみ下さい。

locale.title: 기동전사 건담: 건담 vs. Z 건담

rom.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Z Gundam (Japan) (JA).iso

locale.title: NHL 2K3
locale.synopsis: NHL 2K3 is an Ice Hockey Sim game, developed by Treyarch and published by Sega, which was released in 2002.

locale.title: NHL 2K3
locale.synopsis: NHL 2K3 is an Ice Hockey Sim game

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
locale.synopsis: In this highly anticipated sequel to Metroid Prime, become the bounty hunter behind the visor once more and travel to a planet torn into light and darkness. Hunted by a mysterious entity and a warring race called the Ing, Samus Aran must explore the light and dark worlds of this doomed planet to discover secrets and augment her suit's weapons and abilities. And now, for the first time in the history of the celebrated Metroid franchise, up to four players can battle each other as they search for weapons, grapple across ceilings, and turn into Morph Balls to make their escapes.

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Dark Echoes
locale.synopsis: A War of Light and Darkness Become the bounty hunter behind the visor once more! Hunted by a mysterious entity and a warring race called the Ing. Samus Aran must explore the light and dark worlds of doomed planet, but time runs shorts...

locale.title: メトロイドプライム2 ダークエコーズ
locale.synopsis:
First Person Adventure（主観視点によるアドベンチャーゲーム）という唯一無比の新ジャンルを切り開き、世界中から賞賛を受けた「メトロイドプライム」から2年・・・待望の最新作がついに日本上陸。
遠い昔、ルミナスという種族が、放浪の果てに惑星エーテルに定住した。しばらくは繁栄の時代が続いたが、惑星のエネルギーが枯渇しつつあることが判明。この危機を乗り切るため、ルミナスは惑星内部のエネルギーを吸い上げ地表全体に供給するエネルギー制御装置を3つの大地に建造してルミナス大聖堂とリンクさせた。かくして危機は去り、ルミナスは再び平和と繁栄を迎えたのである。 しかし平和は長く続かなかった。惑星エーテルに巨大隕石が衝突したのである。爆発と隕石のエネルギーは次元のゆがみを生み、異なる次元にもう1つの惑星を作り出した。それは光のエーテル（ライトエーテル）に対し、闇のエーテル（ダークエーテル）とも言うべき相似形の世界であり、そこから凶暴で無慈悲な闇の種族イングが攻め入ってきたのだ。イングは、ライトエーテルの生き物に憑依することで光の世界で戦うことができた。一方のルミナスは、瘴気渦巻く闇の世界にとどまり戦うことはできない。そして彼らは次第に追いつめられていく。 ライトエーテルとダークエーテルの2つの世界は同じ惑星のエネルギーを分け合う関係にあり、すべてのエネルギーをライトエーテルに集めれば、ダークエーテルは消滅する。そのことに気がづいたルミナスは、すべてのエネルギーをダークエーテルから奪う計画を立てて反撃に出る。しかし計画は失敗に終わり、それどころか開発したエネルギー転送モジュールまでもイングに奪われてしまう。 転送モジュールを手にしたイングにより、大聖堂以外の3つの神殿からは惑星エネルギーが奪い去れ、今やルミナスとライトエーテルの生命は風前の灯火であった。そんな時、スペースパイレーツを追っていた銀河連邦ブラボー中隊が惑星エーテルで消息を絶つという事件が発生。銀河連邦は捜索のため、サムス・アランを惑星エーテルに派遣する・・・。

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
locale.synopsis: A War of Light and Darkness Become the bounty hunter behind the visor once more! Hunted by a mysterious entity and a warring race called the Ing. Samus Aran must explore the light and dark worlds of doomed planet, but time runs shorts...

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
locale.synopsis:
Reprenez du service sous les traits de la chasseuse de primes, Samus Aran, dans cette suite haletante du légendaire Metroid Prime.
Les séquences visuelles somptueuses et l'action incroyable du mode solo du jeu précédent reviennent intacts tandis que vous guidez Samus à travers de nouveaux mondes majestueux et terrifiants à la fois. Et, pour la première fois dans l'histoire de la série, jusqu'à quatre joueurs peuvent s'affronter en cherchant des armes, en utilisant le Rayon Grappin aux bons moments et en se transformant en boule morphing pour se sortir des situations épineuses. Metroid Prime 2 Echoes vous en mettra plein la vue.

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
locale.synopsis:
In der Fortsetzung des legendären Metroid Prime schlüpfen Sie wieder in die Rolle der heißblütigen Kopfgeldjägerin Samus Aran.
Führen Sie Samus durch Furcht einflößende neue Welten, durch Licht und Dunkel. Es gibt eine prächtige Grafik zu bestaunen und, wie im Vorgänger, unglaubliche Einzelspieler-Action zu genießen. Brandneu ist allerdings, dass zum ersten Mal in der Geschichte der Serie vier Spieler gegeneinander kämpfen können, während sie nach Waffen suchen, in der Gegend herumklettern und sich in Morph Balls verwandeln. Metroid Prime 2: Echoes wird Sie begeistern!

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
locale.synopsis:
¿Estás listo para volver a meterte en el traje de la cazarrecompensas espacial Samus Aran en la secuela del legendario Metroid Prime?
Prepárate a disfrutar del asombroso poderío gráfico y la intensa acción que caracterizaron al anterior título, a medida que guías a Samus a través de bellos y terroríficos mundos nuevos de luces y sombras. Y, por primera vez en la historia de esta serie, hasta cuatro jugadores se podrán enfrentar simultáneamente en escenarios llenos de armas con las que achicharrar a tus rivales. Así es Metroid Prime 2. Prepárate a alucinar.

locale.title: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
locale.synopsis:
Torna a vestire i panni della cacciatrice di taglie Samus Aran nel seguito dell'epico Metroid Prime per Nintendo GameCube.
In Metroid Prime 2: Echoes, caratterizzato dalla stessa sontuosa grafica e dalla strabiliante modalità di gioco in singolo che fecero il successo del primo episodio, l'eroina Nintendo dovrà esplorare nuovi e terrificanti mondi fatti di luce e oscurità, nel disperato tentativo di neutralizzare una formidabile minaccia... Per la prima volta nella storia della serie di Metroid, fino a quattro giocatori possono affrontarsi utilizzando le caratteristiche armi ed abilità di Samus (tra cui non possono certo mancare la Morfosfera e il Raggio Gancio). Non c'è dubbio: Metroid Prime 2: Echoes è destinato a rivoluzionare per l'ennesima volta il mondo degli sparatutto in soggettiva!

locale.title: ニード・フォー・スピード アンダーグラウンド2
Prince of Persia: Warrior Within
locale.synopsis: The Old Man said to the Prince, "Your fate has been written. You will die." Enter the dark underworld of Prince of Persia: Warrior Within, the sword-slashing sequel to the critically acclaimed Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. Hunted by Dahaka, an immortal incarnation of Fate seeking divine retribution, the Prince embarks upon a path of both carnage and mystery to defy his preordained death. His journey leads to the infernal core of a cursed island stronghold harboring mankind's greatest fears. Only through grim resolve, bitter defiance and the mastery of deadly new combat arts can the Prince rise to a new level of warriorship — and emerge from this ultimate trial with his life.

locale.title: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within
locale.synopsis: The Old Man said to the Prince, "Your fate has been written. You will die." Enter the dark underworld of Prince of Persia: Warrior Within, the sword-slashing sequel to the critically acclaimed Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. Hunted by Dahaka, an immortal incarnation of Fate seeking divine retribution, the Prince embarks upon a path of both carnage and mystery to defy his preordained death. His journey leads to the infernal core of a cursed island stronghold harboring mankind's greatest fears. Only through grim resolve, bitter defiance and the mastery of deadly new combat arts can the Prince rise to a new level of warriorship — and emerge from this ultimate trial with his life.

locale.title: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within
locale.synopsis: Der neueste Streich des persischen Prinzen ist ausgesprochen lebhaft und kommt mit einem völlig neuen Kampfsystem daher. In diesem graphisch aufwändigen Abenteuer fordert der arabische Thronfolger das Schicksal selbst heraus. Mit seinen atemberaubenden Kampfsequenzen und Furcht erregenden Herausforderungen ist Prince of Persia: Warrior Within ein packender Titel, der nicht nur die Fans des adligen Helden begeistern wird.

locale.title: Spirits & Spells
locale.synopsis: In Spirits & Spells, you can choose to play the role of Alicia, a girl disguised as a witch, or Greg, a boy disguised as a devil, as they attempt to rescue their friends from a mad scientist. You can alternate between the two characters at any time during the game and discover their varying abilities. Explore creepy environments such as a haunted house, a dark cemetery, eerie forests, and an abandoned laboratory. To survive this Halloween world, you must solve puzzles and fight a variety of evil creatures.

locale.title: Shrek SuperSlam
locale.synopsis: You can battle characters from the Shrek movies in Shrek SuperSlam. The game lets you play as one of 20 characters, such as the heroic Shrek or villainous Prince Charming. Use weapons, potions, or a character's signature special move to fight through 16 fully-destructible arenas. Then, battle with up to four of your friends or play through more than 30 minigames.

locale.title: Shikigami no Shiro II
locale.synopsis:
Story
In the beginning of the story, a giant castle appeared from above the city of Tokyo. At 40 km, the ship-shaped castle was known as Nejireta castle. The battle of mankind and gods is about to begin.
Gameplay
The game mechanisms are generally carried over from the original Shikigami No Shiro, with the addition of more playable characters.
The game consists of five stages, each with two parts, with a boss at the end of each part. At the end of each stage, dialogue between the player character(s) and the bosses are shown in cut scenes; a unique sequence of dialogue is shown for every different character or combination of two characters.
Each character has a primary weapon, used by tapping or holding one firing button; holding the button for more than a few seconds, however, will switch to the character's secondary "Shikigami" weapon. This tends to be more powerful, but limited in range or utility, and also slows character movement. Each character's weapons are different, sometimes dramatically, in terms of pattern and power; in addition, each Shikigami weapon is available in one of two modes, chosen at the start of each new game. Bombs are also available, and each character's bombs function differently as well.
The leveling up of weapons from the original game is the only mechanic eliminated in the sequel.
Tension Bonus System
As with many shooters, the game places emphasis on obtaining high scores, which is facilitated by the Tension Bonus System (TBS). The TBS causes a player's score received to multiply, by factors of up to eight times, based on the player character's proximity to enemy bullets or enemies themselves; this is characteristic of the "grazing" mechanics found in games of the bullet hell genre. By staying close to hazardous objects, multipliers can be maintained for extended periods of time. In addition, destroyed enemies release coins that give extra points, which are also affected by the multiplier.
The player's weapons also play a part in the TBS; when the multiplier is at maximum, the primary weapon increases in power and range for as long as this is maintained. In addition, coins released by enemies destroyed with the Shikigami weapon are automatically collected. Options
Five difficulty levels are available, for both the regular game and the "extreme mode", in which enemies release additional fire when destroyed.
An alternate soundtrack, "S2MIX", is also available. The original soundtrack has been completely replaced in the European PS2 release.

locale.title: Tony Hawk's Underground 2
locale.synopsis: You've been chosen by Tony Hawk to compete against Bam Margera's team in the World Destruction Tour. In an all-new storyline, Tony Hawk's Underground 2 takes you to skateparks around the world, where you can spray your custom tag, slap stickers, and even create new skate lines. Now you can play as yourself, as your teammates, or as more than 20 special skaters. If you're feeling nostalgic for older Tony Hawk games, you can try Classic mode, which challenges you to accomplish your favorite goals, such as Secret Tape and High Score.

locale.title: Tony Hawk's Underground 2
locale.synopsis: You've been chosen by Tony Hawk to compete against Bam Margera's team in the World Destruction Tour. In an all-new storyline, Tony Hawk's Underground 2 takes you to skateparks around the world, where you can spray your custom tag, slap stickers, and even create new skate lines. Now you can play as yourself, as your teammates, or as more than 20 special skaters. If you're feeling nostalgic for older Tony Hawk games, you can try Classic mode, which challenges you to accomplish your favorite goals, such as Secret Tape and High Score.

locale.title: Tony Hawk's Underground 2
locale.synopsis: Cascades extrêmes, possibilités de personnalisation inégalées et sens de l'humour à la Jackass : ça ne peut être que Tony Hawk. La légende du skate revient sur GameCube et cette fois, l'as de la glisse vous a désigné pour défier son rival Bam Margera lors de sa tournée mondiale. A vous de montrer vos meilleurs grinds et n'hésitez pas à laisser votre trace en taguant les murs et plus généralement en vous comportant de façon aussi "radicale" que possible. Les Modes Scénario et Classique rivalisent d'options fabuleuses et avec la possibilité de créer vos propres skaters et skate-parks, vous pourrez réaliser les tricks les plus fous que vous apprécierez encore plus grâce à l'option de vue au ralenti "focus contrôle". Et même quand les choses ne marchent pas comme on veut, on peut toujours piquer une petite colère pour grappiller quelques points!

locale.title: Tony Hawk's Underground 2
locale.synopsis: Lebensgefährliche Tricks, unübertroffene Möglichkeiten zur eigenen Gestaltung und Jackass-Humor - das muss Tony Hawk sein! Die Skateboard-Legende rollt wieder auf den GameCube. Diesmal musst du dich mit Bam Margera, Tonys Skate-Rivalen, auseinandersetzen. Du legst grandiose Grinds hin, sprühst dein Tag an Wände und verhältst dich so "radikal" wie es eben geht. Dir stehen mehrere Modi (Story- und Classic-Modus) zur Verfügung und du hast die Möglichkeit, eigene Skater und Skateparks nach deinen Vorstellungen zu kreieren. Außerdem kannst du mit dem 'Focus Control'-Feature die wildesten Tricks in Zeitlupe hinlegen. Wenn's mal nicht so läuft, kannst du dir auch ruhig einen gepflegten Wutanfall gönnen und dein Board zur Hölle schicken. In THUG2 bist du der Lord of the Board!

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe 2
locale.synopsis: Joe and Silvia are back in this sequel to Viewtiful Joe. This time you have more style, new special moves, and more than 40 new enemies to defeat. Now Joe's trusty aircraft transforms into various shapes to support his activities throughout the game's many stages. In addition to Joe, you can play as Silva, Joe's girlfriend. Call upon the powers of Joe and Silvia, and get ready to both solve new puzzles and save the day

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe 2: Blackfilm no Nazo
locale.synopsis: Joe and Silvia are back in this sequel to Viewtiful Joe. This time you have more style, new special moves, and more than 40 new enemies to defeat. Now Joe's trusty aircraft transforms into various shapes to support his activities throughout the game's many stages. In addition to Joe, you can play as Silva, Joe's girlfriend. Call upon the powers of Joe and Silvia, and get ready to both solve new puzzles and save the day

locale.title: ビューティフル ジョー 2 ブラックフィルムの謎
locale.synopsis:
強大な力を誇る敵組織ジャドーの侵攻が、 平和な世界“ムービーランド”を襲った。 その圧倒的な悪の軍勢の前に、人々の希望は 潰えたかに見えたが、勇気の男がたった 一人で立ち向かい、悪の帝王を打ち滅ぼした。
…だが、悪の魂は消えてはいなかった。 今ここに、再び悪夢の軍団が押し寄せる。 またもや訪れた地球の危機！！ 帰って来てくれ我らが赤きヒーロー。 If he can’t do it, no one can…! (お前がやらねば、誰がやる！)

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe 2
locale.synopsis: Joe and Silvia are back in this sequel to Viewtiful Joe. This time you have more style, new special moves, and more than 40 new enemies to defeat. Now Joe's trusty aircraft transforms into various shapes to support his activities throughout the game's many stages. In addition to Joe, you can play as Silva, Joe's girlfriend. Call upon the powers of Joe and Silvia, and get ready to both solve new puzzles and save the day

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe 2
locale.synopsis: Viewtiful Joe und seine Freundin Silvia machen sich auf in ein weiteres Abenteuer, in dem Filme zum Leben erweckt werden. Du streifst durch schrille Filmkulissen, knöpfst dir diverse Fieslinge vor und musst verschiedene Rätsel lösen. Silvia kann ihre Pompoms dazu nutzen, Gegner auszuknocken und Energieblitze verschießen, um diese aus der Ferne anzugreifen. Joe hingegen tritt und schlägt im Nahkampf um sich, was verheerende Auswirkungen auf seine Gegner haben kann. Beide Charaktere können auch die VFX-Kraft benutzen, um ein atemberaubendes Repertoire von Zeit und Raum manipulierenden Attacken direkt aus einem Hollywood-Film anzuwenden. Eine außergewöhnliche Grafik, zahlreiche psychopathische Roboter und fiese Bossgegner, die du verhauen kannst, und ein ebenso amüsantes wie anspruchsvolles Gameplay machen diesen Titel zu einem Muss für alle Action-Fans.

locale.title: Sonic Gems Collection
locale.synopsis: A second collection of classic Sonic The Hedgehog games, with nine total games (and some secret games) which include Sonic CD, Sonic R, Sonic the Fighters and more. Also included is a Museum Mode of Sonic history.

locale.title: Sonic Gems Collection
locale.synopsis:
Sonic Gems Collection is a compilation of games not included with Sonic Mega Collection, including the following:
* Sonic CD * Sonic the Fighters * Sonic R
Also included are artwork pieces from Sonic Jam, hidden unlockable games, and more.

locale.title: ソニックジェムズコレクション
Sonic Gems Collection
locale.synopsis:
A second collection of classic Sonic The Hedgehog games, with nine total games (and some secret games) which include Sonic CD, Sonic R, Sonic the Fighters and more. Also included is a Museum Mode of Sonic history.
* Three main titles: Sonic CD, Sonic R and Sonic the Fighters * Six additional Game Gear titles: Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic Spinball, Sonic Triple Trouble, Sonic Drift 2, Tails' Skypatrol and Tails Adventure * Two extra unlockable titles: Vectorman and Vectorman 2

game.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age
locale.synopsis: In The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age, you can travel in the wake of the Fellowship while exploring your own path and periodically intersecting the major events of the film trilogy. Through both familiar and new locations, you must fight to save or destroy Middle-earth in an epic adventure. Encounter the demonic Balrog in the Mines of Moria, defend the fallen city of Osgiliath, or try to destroy Helm's Deep. These choices and many more will confront you as you align yourself with the people of Middle-earth or undertake missions on behalf of Sauron.

locale.title: Der Herr der Ringe: Das dritte Zeitalter
locale.synopsis:
EA GAMES präsentiert das erste Rollenspiel (RPG) für Konsolen im Der Herr der Ringe-Universum: "Der Herr der Ringe: Das dritte Zeitalter". In einem einzigartigen Spannungsbogen wählt der Spieler auf seiner Reise mit den Gefährten seinen eigenen Weg und trifft immer wieder auf die wichtigsten Ereignisse aus der Film-Trilogie von New Line Cinema. In diesem epischen Abenteuer bewegt sich der Spieler auf bekannten und nahezu unbekannten Schauplätzen in seinem Kampf um oder gegen Mittelerde. Er trifft auf den dämonischen Balrog in den Minen von Moria, verteidigt die Stadt Osgiliath oder versucht, Helms Klamm zu zerstören. Vor diese und weitere Möglichkeiten wird der Spieler immer wieder gestellt, während er sich für die Völker Mittelerdes oder die Armeen Saurons entscheidet.
Der Spieler kann in die Rollen komplett neuer Charaktere aus Mittelerde schlüpfen und interagiert mit den Helden, Bösewichten und Nebencharakteren, die diese Welt bevölkern. Er kann seine Helden und Bösewichte stetig aufwerten, ihre Waffen, Kampfstile und Attribute verbessern und verstärken. Dann begibt er sich auf ein großes Abenteuer und kann neben primären Zielen und Missionen auch zahlreiche Nebenaufgaben lösen und dabei auf versteckte Charaktere, geheime Waffen und mächtige Gegenstände stoßen.
Die Armeen von Licht und Schatten kämpfen in einem revolutionären, rundenbasierten Kampfsystem. Gegner können vom Pferderücken aus bekämpft werden, und die Führungsqualität des Spielers entscheidet mit über den Erfolg der Gruppe in vernichtenden Angriffen mit oder gegen die Hauptcharaktere der Filme wie Aragorn, Gandalf und der Balrog.
Eine schöne und realistische Welt, die Inhalte aus allen Filmen vereint, inklusive Filmszenen aus der Herr der Ringe-Trilogie, die so verbunden noch nie gezeigt wurden, Originalstimmen der Schauspieler und Motion-Capturings der Stunt-Doubles aus den Filmen.
Features:
- Licht oder Schatten? In einem Abenteuer, das sich in der Hauptsache an der Geschichte der Filmtrilogie orientiert, kämpft der Spiele auf Seiten der Gefährten in ihrem Versuch, Mittelerde zu retten oder er kann böse Missionen freischalten und auf Seiten Saurons kämpfen.
- Das Gameplay erstreckt sich über alle drei Filme, und der Spieler reist an bekannte und unbekannte Orte wie die Minen von Moria, Helms Klamm, die Pelennor-Felder, Minas Tirith und eine Reihe unerwarteter Schauplätze wie das Weiße Gebirge.
- Helden oder Bösewicht nach eigenen Vorstellungen gestalten: Charaktere können mit ausgefeilten Fähigkeiten-System aufgewertet werden. Sie können hierbei einzigartige Fähigkeiten im Nahkampf, mit Fernwaffen, in Verteidigung und Magie erlernen.
- Eine unglaubliche Sammlung an Waffen, Ausrüstung und Kleidung sowie weitere Gegenstände aus Mittelerde stehen zur Auswahl. Freies, offenes Gameplay durch das der Spieler die Gegend erkunden, Nebenaufgaben lösen und geheime Charaktere freischalten kann, die sich seiner Gruppe anschließen können. Außerdem gibt es Spezialwaffen und -gegenstände, mit denen bereits vorhandene Charaktere ausgerüstet werden können.
- Seite an Seite mit oder gegen die Hauptcharaktere aus dem Herrn der Ringe wie Aragorn, Gandalf, Legolas, Eowyn und dem Balrog.
- Mit neuen benutzergesteuerten Kameras verpasst der Spieler nichts mehr.
- Innovatives rundenbasiertes Kampfsystem ermöglicht Kämpfe vom Pferderücken aus, und die Regeln können neu definiert werden

game.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age (Europe) (EN)

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age
locale.synopsis: In The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age, you can travel in the wake of the Fellowship while exploring your own path and periodically intersecting the major events of the film trilogy. Through both familiar and new locations, you must fight to save or destroy Middle-earth in an epic adventure. Encounter the demonic Balrog in the Mines of Moria, defend the fallen city of Osgiliath, or try to destroy Helm's Deep. These choices and many more will confront you as you align yourself with the people of Middle-earth or undertake missions on behalf of Sauron.

locale.title: Serious Sam: Next Encounter
locale.synopsis: An abandoned mothership of Sirian origin is sending strange signals from the past, and there's only one man with the guns big enough to investigate: Sam "Serious" Stone. If Mental's forces beat Sam to this powerful time-traveling artifact, it's last call for humanity!

locale.title: Serious Sam: Next Encounter
locale.synopsis: Uma nave-mãe abandonada de origem Siriana está enviando sinais estranhos do passado, e há apenas um homem com armas grandes o suficiente para investigar: Sam "Serious" Stone. Se as forças de Mental vencerem Sam neste poderoso artefato de viagem no tempo, será a última chamada para a humanidade!

locale.title: Serious Sam: Next Encounter
locale.synopsis: An abandoned mothership of Sirian origin is sending strange signals from the past, and there's only one man with the guns big enough to investigate: Sam "Serious" Stone. If Mental's forces beat Sam to this powerful time-traveling artifact, it's last call for humanity!

locale.title: Serious Sam: Next Encounter
locale.synopsis: Ein verlassenes sirianisches Mutterschiff sendet seltsame Signale aus der Vergangenheit und es gibt nur einen Mann, der genügend Mumm und Munition besitzt, um durch die Zeit zurückzureisen und der Sache auf den Grund zu gehen – Serious Sam. Wenn Mentals mutierte Armeen dieses mächtige Zeitreise-Artefakt vor Sam erreichen, ist es aus mit der Menschheit! Die Lage ist ernst!

game.name: Carmen Sandiego: The Secret of the Stolen Drums (USA) (EN,FR)

locale.title: Carmen Sandiego: The Secret of the Stolen Drums
locale.synopsis: The last descendant of an African King reveals an ancient secret with his dying words: Deep in the jungles of Rwanda lies a hidden temple containing a great diamond which possesses the knowledge of all nations. The map to the temple has been etched onto the skins of eight drums scattered throughout the world. All eight drums must be re-united to open the temple. But beware, the drums are protected by mysterious powers, and legend has it that elemental spirits guard the treasure. Players travel through nine exotic locations, learning their history and geography, and solving challenging puzzles on their way.

rom.name: Carmen Sandiego: The Secret of the Stolen Drums (USA) (EN,FR).iso

locale.title: XGIII: Extreme G Racing
locale.synopsis: High-speed motorcycle racing and high-stakes futuristic combat collide in X63--an intoxicating, highly addictive arcade experience. Feel every razor sharp turn and roller-coaster drop in the pit of your stomach as you smash through the sound barrier at speeds over 750 mph.

locale.title: XGIII: Extreme G Racing
locale.synopsis: High-speed motorcycle racing and high-stakes futuristic combat collide in X63--an intoxicating, highly addictive arcade experience. Feel every razor sharp turn and roller-coaster drop in the pit of your stomach as you smash through the sound barrier at speeds over 750 mph.

locale.title: エクストリームＧ３
locale.synopsis:
ニンテンドウ64でもご好評を頂いた「エクストリームG」、「エクストリームG2」の最新作「エクストリームG3」がゲームキューブに登場。
前々作と前作でも好評だったジェット機なみのスピード感と、ジェットコースターのような奇抜なデザインの驚異的な高低差のあるサーキットは、本作でも健在です。
更に本作では、レース賞金でアイテムやウエポンの購入をする要素や、２人協力プレイのゲームモードを追加しました。もちろん、４人までの同時対戦プレイも可能です。
ゲームキューブの処理能力で、サーキット周りの細かな風景アニメーションを実現し、ゲームの世界観をより豊かなものにしています。また、爆発などの特殊効果を細かなグラフィックで表現しています。

locale.title: XGIII: Extreme G Racing
locale.synopsis: High-speed motorcycle racing and high-stakes futuristic combat collide in X63--an intoxicating, highly addictive arcade experience. Feel every razor sharp turn and roller-coaster drop in the pit of your stomach as you smash through the sound barrier at speeds over 750 mph.

locale.title: TimeSplitters: Future Perfect
locale.synopsis: In TimeSplitters: Future Perfect, humanity is on the brink of destruction by the evil TimeSplitters. With the help of some familiar faces, Cortez--the tough hero from previous installments--must chase a mystery foe across different time periods to trace the origins of the TimeSplitters. As Cortez, you'll have access to weapons, gadgets, characters, and environments that are unique to each time period. You can also correct the mistakes made in the past or team up with past and future versions of yourself in battles.

locale.title: TimeSplitters: Future Perfect
locale.synopsis:
Mit "TimeSplitters: Future Perfect" kehrt einer der rasantesten First-Person-Shooter für die Konsole zurück, bei welchem der Sieg des Spielers von dessen Vergangenheit, Gegenwart und Zukunft abhängt, in einem Kampf, der sich selbst quer durch die Zeit erstreckt. In "TimeSplitters: Future Perfect" jagt Cortéz, ein Held aus vorhergegangenen Abenteuern, mit der Hilfe einiger bekannter Gesichter einen mysteriösen Feind durch verschiedene Zeitperioden um die Herkunft der TimeSplitters aufzudecken und "den Tag zu retten".
Im Spiel reist der Spieler an viele verschiedene Orte und Zeitperioden in den 1920ern, 1960ern, den 1990ern und der nahen bzw. fernen Zukunft. Hierdurch findet der Spieler nicht nur ein einzigartiges Gameplay, sondern auch eine Vielfalt an Waffen, Erfindungen, Charakteren und Umgebungen vor. Es beinhaltet sogar Fahrzeug Interaktions-Eigenschaften, die einem das Abfeuern von Waffen während der Fahrt ermöglichen. Aufgrund der Fähigkeit, durch die Zeit reisen zu können, kann es dazu kommen, dass Cortéz sich selbst in der Vergangenheit begegnet. Auf diese Weise kann er vergangene Fehler wieder wett machen, oder mit Hilfe seines anderen Ichs besonders knifflige Situationen lösen und so durch besonders komplizierte Abschnitte gelangen, die er sonst nicht zu meistern in der Lage wäre.
FEATURES:
* Verbesserte Storyline die den Spieler durch verschiedene Zeitperioden, wie z.B. den 20ern, 60ern, 90ern und der Zukunft, führt
* Vielfalt an Waffen, Gegenständen, Charakteren und Umgebungen aus verschiedenen Epochen
* Fahrzeug-Interaktions-System
* Lösen von Aufgaben in der Vergangenheit mit Hilfe des vergangenen Ichs von Cortéz
* Verbesserte Single-Player Storyline
* Erweiterung um den lang geforderten Multiplayer Mode
* Komplett in Deutsch

locale.title: Curious George
locale.synopsis: Curious George is a colorful action adventure that is based on the Curious George animated movie. In the game you can help George explore a variety of areas, collect items such as bananas, and unlock minigames. The game features a variety of different objectives set in areas from the movie. You can also unlock scenes from the movie, extra costumes, and production art.

locale.title: Super Monkey Ball Adventure
locale.synopsis: An adventure spin-off for the monkey-rolling franchise. Players will discover that in Super Monkey Ball Adventure their monkey balls now have a whole host of new abilities, including sticking to walls, hovering and the ability to become invisible. Super Monkey Ball Adventure also contains 50 new puzzle levels and six new party games to challenge gamers of all ages. Players can select Aiai, Meemee, Gongon, or Baby to adventure their way through five different Monkey Ball Kingdoms to complete quests by solving puzzles and ultimately uniting the feuding Monkey Kingdoms and defeat the Naysayers who have sucked all the joy from the Monkey Ball world.

locale.title: Super Monkey Ball Adventure

game.name: Tom Clancy's The Sum of All Fears (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Tom Clancy's The Sum of All Fears
locale.synopsis: Based on the novel by Tom Clancy, The Sum of All Fears lets you play as a member of the FBI's Hostage Rescue Team. Everything you have ever trained for will be put to the test as you command your counterterrorist group through 11 dangerous missions. Equipped with 15 authentic gun types, flashbangs, and frag grenades, you can square off against combatants worldwide in six multiplayer zones. If you fail, the most destructive weapon known to humankind will be unleashed on American soil.

Naruto: Gekitô Ninja Taisen! 3
locale.synopsis: Naruto: Gekitō Ninja Taisen! 3 (Naruto: Great Ninja Battle! 3) is the third installment of this series. The game was announced on August 3, 2004, and released in Japan on November 20, 2004. The game covers the events of the anime from the Chunin Exams to the Search for Tsunade arc. This installment introduces the ability to change forms during combat and gives some characters a second special attack. In addition, the game adds on to the tag-team mode from Clash of Ninja 2, granting the player the ability to use team specials. This game was released exclusively in Japan.

locale.title: NARUTO－ナルト－激闘忍者大戦！3
locale.synopsis:
うずまきナルト、うちはサスケなど、個性的な忍者たちを操って様々な忍術バトルを戦い抜く対戦格闘ゲーム。
忍術・体術・幻術など、「NARUTO－ナルト－」に登場するあらゆる忍者アクションを、極めて簡単操作で繰り出すことが可能。
ゲーム初心者でも、ナルトに登場する忍者になりきって爽快感を味わえる。 また、友達や家族との対戦バトルのオモシロさは特筆もので、特に4人対戦モードはハチャメチャに盛り上がること間違いなし！
簡単なボタン操作で、大迫力の忍術バトルが誰にでも楽しめるのが人気の『激闘忍者大戦！』シリーズ！ キャラクターの個性・原作の世界観を見事に再現し、ファン大満足の完成度。 一度プレイしたら、必ずハマること間違いなし！

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3: Mutant Nightmare (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3: Mutant Nightmare
locale.synopsis: TMNT3 puts more of a focus on teamwork, character development and control than any other console Turtles game to date. Gamers can play as their favorite Turtle alone or with up to three friends, earning experience points along the way as they slash and bash Foot Ninjas and powerful, well-known bosses from the TMNT universe. These experience points allow players to improve and evolve their Turtles' traits and abilities for more varied, powerful attacks and moves. The Ninja Scroll System is another new feature on TMMT3. Being able to select which ninja scrolls to use allows the Turtles to use various special abilities strategically. Cooperative play lies at the heart of TMNT3 and gamers who team up with friends for multiplayer action are rewarded with exclusive features such as Cooperative Attack for even more shell shocking damage to enemies. The effect of this attack changes depending on the number of players working together (between 2-4 players). For even greater control, TMNT3 features a new combat system called the Target Attack system that lets gamers play more instinctively and strategically. With the Target Attack system, players will be able to lock onto specific enemies and block, dodge or counter attack accordingly for smoother and more maneuverable combat. Story Mode can be played with 1-4 players. Even when you have less than 4 players to play, the other Turtles will be at your side, controlled through AI. All the Turtles can participate in Cooperative Attack to beat enemies and players can give commands to the AI.

rom.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3: Mutant Nightmare (USA) (EN) (vdisc 1).iso

locale.title: Shrek 2
locale.synopsis: Shrek 2 takes players on a twisted fairy tale adventure with Shrek and his buddies. Revisit key locations from the movie sequel while discovering all-new locations and characters. Shrek 2 combines squad-based action with traditional action adventure elements. You control a team of four and play as Shrek or any of his ten friends, switching between each to best utilize the character's unique abilities to solve puzzles, fight monsters, and complete wild and dangerous adventures.

locale.synopsis: The sport of kings beckons and you answer the call by creating a horse raising and racing empire. Assemble a devoted team of employees and believers who'll help you achieve potential greatness and reputation on the track.

locale.title: NBA Street V3
locale.synopsis: Soar above the rim and leave your mark as NBA Street V3 hits the pavement: 3-on-3, over-the-top, and larger than life. V3 builds on the game-proven, platinum-selling gameplay of the Street series with new tricks and high-flying dunks. All new Trick Stick and interactive Gamebreaker control elevates the game to new heights with unmistakable style and attitude. Featuring today's biggest NBA stars, a collection of the league's all-time greats, and a Hall of Fame cast of past Street characters, V3 is non-stop, fast-paced, action-packed, in-your-face fun. It's as simple as that. NBA Street V3 is packed with highly-detailed authentic street courts, deep player customization options, new Court Creator, and sick online play. Put your rep on the line in the ultimate proving ground: the street courts of NBA Street V3.

locale.title: X-Men: The Official Game
locale.synopsis: Master the power of the X-Men--Obliterate enemies and objects as Wolverine, using your lethal adamantium claws and crushing brute force. As Nightcrawler, scale walls, swing from rafters and teleport through environments to surprise enemies. Shoot ice bursts and create hailstorms as lightning-fast Iceman. For even more power, utilize fury and adrenaline modes. Become a part of the X-Men movie universe--Embark on a globe-spanning conflict featuring every element of the X-Men universe--from favorite villains to famous locations such as Alkali Lake, plus the voices and likenesses of key actors from the films. Battle fierce enemies, join forces with comrades--Face off against movie villains such as Pyro, Magneto and Sabretooth, plus added foes like legions of Sentinels. Storm, Colossus and Cyclops join forces with you in gameplay that includes melee fighting, stealth-style action and time-based missions.

locale.title: Shrek Super Slam
locale.synopsis: You can battle characters from the Shrek movies in Shrek SuperSlam. The game lets you play as one of 20 characters, such as the heroic Shrek or villainous Prince Charming. Use weapons, potions, or a character's signature special move to fight through 16 fully-destructible arenas. Then, battle with up to four of your friends or play through more than 30 minigames.

locale.title: Harvest Moon: Magical Melody
locale.synopsis: Harvest Moon: Magical Melody features plenty of crops, a variety of animals to care for, tons of festivals to participate in and loads of events to create a fun and entertaining game play experience. Play as either a boy or girl: Each gender has 10 potential spouses. Compete against a rival farmer; Your productivity will be judged on a daily basis against that of your rival's...you will also compete against your rival in the festivals. Cultivate a wide variety of crops and trees. Raise cows, sheep, horses and chickens. Harvest Moon: Magical Melody offers 4-player minigames. Purchase different plots of land and expand your farm by building various extensions. The Harvest Goddess has turned to stone and the Harvest Sprites need your help to bring her back. You need to collect Musical Notes throughout the game in hopes of restoring her to her former self. There are 100 Musical Notes in the game and to collect the notes you must do a variety of different tasks, such as shipping a certain number of items, winning a festival or making friends with the wild animals found around your farm. Only by collecting a certain number of notes will the Harvest Goddess come back.

locale.title: 牧場物語 しあわせの詩
Resident Evil 4
locale.synopsis: The fourth installment of Capcom's pivotal "Survival Horror" series continues on Nintendo GameCube and PS2. The title takes place in 2004 some six years after the events that transpired in Resident Evil 2. The government has destroyed the Umbrella Corporation, which has been behind just about every plot and disgusting bio-chemical mutation in the survival horror series. Now-US agent Leon Kennedy (of Resident Evil 2 fame) has been dispatched to Europe to save the President's daughter from "crazed organizations." RE4 boasts some of the most impressive visuals to date on Nintendo's next generation console, and takes the series into the realm of truly three-dimensional gameplay. Stagnant environments found in previous Resident Evil games are replaced by detailed 3D surroundings complete with dynamic camera work.

locale.title: Biohazard 4
locale.synopsis: The fourth installment of Capcom's pivotal "Survival Horror" series continues on Nintendo GameCube and PS2. The title takes place in 2004 some six years after the events that transpired in Resident Evil 2. The government has destroyed the Umbrella Corporation, which has been behind just about every plot and disgusting bio-chemical mutation in the survival horror series. Now-US agent Leon Kennedy (of Resident Evil 2 fame) has been dispatched to Europe to save the President's daughter from "crazed organizations." RE4 boasts some of the most impressive visuals to date on Nintendo's next generation console, and takes the series into the realm of truly three-dimensional gameplay. Stagnant environments found in previous Resident Evil games are replaced by detailed 3D surroundings complete with dynamic camera work.

locale.title: バイオハザード4
locale.synopsis: ラクーンシティの消滅から６年後・・・ 合衆国のエージェント、レオン・Ｓ・ケネディは奇怪な事態に遭遇していた。 誘拐された大統領の娘アシュリーを探すため、単身訪れたヨーロッパのさびれた村。 その村で突如、正気とは思えぬ・・・というより、人とは思えぬ群集に襲われたのである。 案内役の地元警官と別れ、聞き込みに立ち寄った一件の民家。 主人らしい男にアシュリーの写真を見せるも、まともな反応は返って来なかった。 言葉が通じているのかどうかも疑わしい様子である。 仕方ない・・・肩をすくめたレオンが立ち去ろうとしたその時、襲撃は始まった。

locale.title: Resident Evil 4
locale.synopsis: The fourth installment of Capcom's pivotal "Survival Horror" series continues on Nintendo GameCube and PS2. The title takes place in 2004 some six years after the events that transpired in Resident Evil 2. The government has destroyed the Umbrella Corporation, which has been behind just about every plot and disgusting bio-chemical mutation in the survival horror series. Now-US agent Leon Kennedy (of Resident Evil 2 fame) has been dispatched to Europe to save the President's daughter from "crazed organizations." RE4 boasts some of the most impressive visuals to date on Nintendo's next generation console, and takes the series into the realm of truly three-dimensional gameplay. Stagnant environments found in previous Resident Evil games are replaced by detailed 3D surroundings complete with dynamic camera work.

locale.title: Resident Evil 4: Wii Edition
locale.synopsis:
Toen Resident Evil 4 in 2005 uitkwam voor de GameCube, waren zowel critici als fans volledig overdonderd. Het spel werd beschouwd als een sensationele heruitvinding van de overlevingshorror. De prachtige graphics en strakke besturing maakten van Resident Evil 4 een van de meest geprezen spellen aller tijden. Dit spel maakt nu een comeback op de Wii en dat zal de horror dichterbij brengen dan ooit tevoren…
Leon S. Kennedy was vroeger een idealistische nieuweling bij de politie van Raccoon City, maar tegenwoordig is hij agent voor de Amerikaanse overheid. Zijn huidige, strikt geheime missie is het redden van de dochter van de president. Ze heet Ashley en is ontvoerd door een mysterieuze organisatie. Leon begint zijn onderzoek met een trip naar een afgelegen dorpje, ergens in Europa, waar hij een bende aggressieve dorpelingen tegen het lijf loopt. Deze dorpelingen hebben trouw gezworen aan Los Illuminados, de cult die achter de ontvoering van Ashley zit. Terwijl Leon de ene onvoorstelbare verschrikking na de andere meemaakt, moet hij uit zien te vinden wie, of wat, er achter dit alles zit.
Met een gameplay die afgestemd is op het besturingssysteem van de Wii en enkele nieuwe, superspannende hoofdstukken die niet in de GameCube-versie zaten, heeft horror met Resident Evil 4 Wii edition echt een nieuw thuis gevonden…
•Door de Wii-afstandsbediening te bewegen, kunnen spelers hun wapens ergens op richten, herladen, met hun mes slaan, actiescènes besturen en nog veel meer
•Adembenemende, driedimensionale graphics en ongekende special effects
•De camera volgt je van achteren en zorgt zo voor erg intuïtieve bewegingen
•Je vijanden zijn erg sluw en zullen samenwerken om de speler massaal aan te kunnen vallen
•Kruip ook in de huid van de aantrekkelijke agente Ada Wong in vijf nieuwe hoofdstukken die een heel nieuw licht werpen op de originele verhaallijn
•Ondersteunt 16:9 breedbeeld en Dolby Pro Logic® II
Mededeling voor ouders: Resident Evil 4 Wii edition heeft een PEGI-beoordeling van 18+ gekregen, wat betekent dat dit spel niet bedoeld is voor mensen jonger dan 18 jaar. Maakt u zich zorgen over de eventuele toegang van uw kind tot materiaal dat alleen voor volwassenen bedoeld is en wilt u uzelf ervan verzekeren dat uw kind hier niet aan blootgesteld wordt? Klik dan hier om meer te lezen over de mogelijkheid tot ‘Ouderlijk toezicht’.

locale.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
locale.synopsis: Developed by High Voltage Software and licensed by Warner Bros., Charlie and the Chocolate Factory puts players right into the world of the film. You'll find the factory rampaged by the other children, who are running amok with greed and impishness. Use your special candy powers and the assistance of the Oompa-Loompas to restore order to Willy Wonka's sugary establishment. Beyond this, Charlie will have to use a variety of candy to overcome obstacles and potential enemies. Everlasting Gobstoppers, for instance, are basically rocks that Charlie can throw around. The game features celebrity voice talent and the likeness of Johnny Depp as Wonka.

locale.title: FIFA 07
locale.synopsis: FIFA 07 delivers complete authenticity with licenses for all the world's top leagues, including MLS and Mexican 1st Division in North America, and 26 others from over 20 nations. This year, you have the power to shape your club's destiny in the EA Sports Interactive Leagues, a new online mode that enables you to pit your club against supporters of your real-world opponents. The online interactive leagues feature the F.A. Premier League, Bundesliga, French League and the Mexican 1st Division. Experience the future of online gaming as you play your games according to the real-world schedule. When they play, you play. Track your team's progress as the aggregate results determine your club's position in the league table. This year, new intelligent A.I. ensures that your 11 men on the pitch make realistic decisions, finding space and passing like professionals. A complete overhaul of the game engine now means that you have to employ real world tactics, make split-second decisions and think like a player in order to win matches. Watch as your players jostle and collide realistically while trying to win balls. Experience the realism of the world's superstars, who come to life with signature moves and authentic playing styles and a more sophisticated shooting mechanic that gives you greater control to produce finesse shots. Plus you now have the ability to apply topspin or backspin to the ball for more creative set-pieces.

locale.title: Harvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life
locale.synopsis: Updated version of the original Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life (Bokujou Monogatari: Wonderful Life), primarily targeted at female players. Not only is the main character in the game a girl, all the romance scenarios have been completely changed to work better from the viewpoint of the female player. There are five male non-player characters to pursue -- which of course comes in addition to all the standard farm work, tending to crops, expanding the house, and taking care of farm animals. Like its predecessor, the game can be linked up with the Game Boy Advance installment in the series.

game.name: Bokujou Monogatari - Wonderful Life for Girls (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Shrek Smash n' Crash Racing
locale.synopsis: Smash N' Crash through the Shrek universe atop a mount with a personality all its own! Play as your favorite Shrek character and pit your racing and combat skills against an assortment of twisted fairy-tale opponents. Grab your mount and bump, crash and slide your way across 12 fairy-tale locations. If you fall behind, don't worry - use magical pick-ups to even the odds or battle your way back by knocking your opponents off their mounts. Beat your friends to the finish line in this fun and funny smash and crash twisted fairy-tale adventure!

locale.title: The Sims Bustin' Out
locale.synopsis: The Sims are making a big return to the console and this time they are bustin' out of the house and exploring all-new locations around town. In The Sims Bustin' Out, players can choose from a variety of new career paths. Along the way, players can unlock and collect over a hundred of new objects and social moves exclusive to the console. Play, work, and socialize with a cast of over 25 new outrageous characters and climb through a dozen new careers. The Sims Bustin' Out also features new integrated two-player gameplay and memory card support, for those players who like to take their Sims over to a friend's house and show them off.
