locale.title: Les Sims: Permis de Sortir
locale.synopsis: Le temps est enfin venu pour les Sims de sortir de l'univers confiné de leur doux foyer pour affronter la rudesse du monde extérieur avec Les Sims : Permis de Sortir. Pour ceux qui feraient encore partie de cette minorité qui ignore qui sont les Sims, voici un bref rappel. Il s'agit, à l'origine d'un jeu pour PC dont le principe consiste à gérer le quotidien de personnages virtuels plongés dans différentes situations et de les faire évoluer pour leur faire découvrir des objets ou des mouvements. De nombreuses variantes sont sorties comme Les Sims Superstar, Les Sims en vacances, Les Sims et plus si affinités... etc... Mais les Sims n'en sont pas à leur coup d'essai sur console puisque Permis de Sortir est la deuxième adaptation de ce simulateur de vie quotidienne sur GameCube sorti en avril dernier. La grande nouveauté que propose Les Sims : Permis de Sortir, c'est la possibilité de faire sortir vos personnages en ville en scooter ou en voiture et de leur faire découvrir d'innombrables lieux dont notamment un gymnase, une galerie d'art, ou le Club Rubb. Commencez par créer votre personnage puis faites-le évoluer à travers plus de 12 niveaux inédits. Faites-lui choisir l'une des 10 nouvelles carrières professionnelles, de savant fou à athlète, vous aurez un nombre incalculable de possibilités différentes pour débloquer les objets nécessaires à votre avancée. Vous serez donc forcés de sortir de chez vous pour répondre à des besoins aussi naturels que trouver du travail, si vous ne voulez pas être obligé de mendier pour survivre, entretenir des liens sociaux avec vos voisins ou, au contraire, leur gâcher la vie bref, c'est vous qui décidez. Que vous vous comportiez comme le citoyen modèle ou que vous semiez le trouble partout où vous passez, toutes vos actions vous donneront accès à de nouveaux objets ou liens sociaux comme, par exemple, les platines de DJ, le show laser, le Moon Walk ou le French Kiss. Et avec plus de 40 nouveaux personnages hauts en couleur à rencontrer, vous serez loin de vous sentir seuls. Relookez votre personnage des pieds à la tête aussi bien physiquement que mentalement et vous verrez toute l'importance que représente la personnalité de votre alias virtuel. Si, par exemple, vous faites de votre personnage quelqu'un d'extraverti, il sera plus à même d'exceller sur la piste de danse et pourra ainsi débloquer les options correspondantes. Les graphismes nouvelle génération, les effets sonores surprenants, les voix, la toute nouvelle bande-son, les effets visuels fascinants donnent nettement l'avantage à Permis de Sortir par rapport aux versions PC précédentes. Mais l'avantage suprême revient sans aucun doute à la version GameCube qui offre une option de connectivité avec la version Game Boy Advance. La connexion des deux consoles donne accès à un niveau caché du jeu sur Game Boy Advance ainsi qu'à des mini-jeux sur la version GameCube. On peut ainsi télécharger son Sim issu du jeu GameCube vers le jeu Game Boy Advance pour lui faire obtenir des habilités qu'il pourra ramener sur la version GameCube. L'interactivité entre les deux systèmes est donc totale.

locale.title: Die Sims: Brechen Aus
locale.synopsis: Ab dem 12. Dezember kannst du die Fortsetzung von Die Sims, das bereits im April erschienen ist, auf deinem GameCube spielen. Diesmal brechen die Sims aus und erkunden völlig neue Schauplätze und Umgebungen in der Stadt. Zum ersten Mal in der Geschichte dieser populären Lebenssimulation verlassen die Protagonisten ihr trautes Heim. Du erstellst zunächst deinen eigenen Charakter, mit dem du dein virtuelles Leben bestreiten möchtest. Lila Augen, Knollennase, schmaler Mund und eine Vokuhila-Frisur, na wie wäre das? Du kannst Herrn oder Frau Sim natürlich auch nach deinem eigenen Vorbild kreieren und selbst die Hauptrolle übernehmen. Dabei solltest du beachten, dass in diesem Spiel die Persönlichkeit eine große Rolle spielt. Mit neuen hippen Klamotten kannst du dein Aussehen verbessern. Außerdem kannst du deinem Sim Charaktereigenschaften zuweisen, die sein Verhalten im Spiel beeinflussen. Wenn du den Karriereweg Filmstar gewählt hast, dein Protagonist aber schüchtern und introvertiert ist, wirst du auf der Karriereleiter vermutlich nicht sehr weit voran kommen. Um tatsächlich auszubrechen und neue Schauplätze wie die Liebeshütte, das Labor der glänzenden Dinge oder den angesagten Club besuchen zu können, musst du zunächst Muttis Haus verlassen. Und du brauchst einen fahrbaren Untersatz, um mobil zu sein. Allerdings musst du dir diesen auch erst einmal verdienen. Dann stehen dir 10 verschiedene Fahrzeuge zur Verfügung, z. B. ein Motoroller, ein Auto, ein Buggy, etc. Du hast die Qual der Wahl zwischen insgesamt 12 neuen Karrieren wie zum Beispiel Gangster, Athlet und Verrückter Professor. Auf deinem Weg durch die Welt der Sims kannst du viele Objekte, Aktionen und Schauplätze wie die Laser-Show, das DJ-Pult, die Kletterwand, French Kiss und Moon Walk sowie zahlreiche versteckte Accessoires wie Tattoos und Piercings freischalten. Darüber hinaus kannst du mit über 40 schrägen neuen Charakteren wie Bing Bling, dem Partylöwen, oder Goldie Toane, der Fitnesskönigin interagieren. Sie sind die Schlüsselfiguren zum Freischalten von Schauplätzen, Objekten, sozialer Interaktion und zum Gewinnen des Spiels. Weitere Neuerungen sind der Zwei-Spieler-Modus, in dem du gemeinsam mit einem Freund bzw. gegen ihn spielen kannst, und die Memory Card (Speicherkarte)-Unterstützung. Auf diese Weise kannst du deine Sims mit zu einem Freund nehmen und ordentlich mit ihnen auftrumpfen. Wenn du neben der GameCube-Version auch die GBA-Version von Die Sims brechen aus besitzt, kannst du ein weiteres Feature nutzen: Schalte auf dem GameCube ein Mini-Game-Kabinett frei und spiele diverse Mini-Games auf dem GBA. Das Spiel kommt in einem komplett aufgemotzten Gewand daher, mit einer tollen Grafik, Schatten in Echtzeit, einem praktischen User-Interface, das wesentlich mehr Interaktivität zulässt, neuen Stimmen und Soundeffekten sowie brandneuer Musik. Die Sims brechen aus bietet dir unzählige Möglichkeiten, das Leben deines Sims zu gestalten. Vom Tellerwäscher zum Millionär, wie hört sich das an? Alles ist möglich... Und du kannst ruhig auch mal ein Risiko eingehen. Schließlich kannst du, fast wie im wahren Leben, jeder Zeit ins "Hotel Mama" zurückkehren.

locale.title: Los Sims: Toman La Calle
locale.synopsis:
Practica la escalada, pincha tus mejores canciones en el bar de moda o date una vuelta en moto para olvidar la discusión que acabas de tener con tu pareja. Y todo eso sin salir de tu habitación. En efecto. Los Sims Toman la Calle, segunda versión para consola de este clásico para PC, llega a Nintendo GameCube. Siguiendo el argumento característico de la serie, tendrás que crear un alter ego cibernético con el que conducir tu vida virtual en la consola. Consigue un trabajo, una casa, haz amigos, sal de marcha e intenta encontrar tu media naranja interactiva para conseguir una vida ciberperfecta.
Empieza por modelar tu propio Sim: alto, bajo, rechoncho, atlético, roquero o estilo hippy. En este nuevo juego, las opciones son ilimitadas, pero ten en cuenta que, en este caso, la personalidad lo será todo e influirá en el tipo de carrera que escojas. Tímido, atrevido, sociable o enérgico, créalo a tu imagen y semejanza, o no... Una vez satisfecho con tu creación, échate a la calle. Por primera vez en la versión para consola, la diversión no acaba en la casa. En este título tienes toda una ciudad que explorar con 12 nuevas parcelas por las que pasear tus Sims, así que, ¡súbete en tu nueva y flamante scooter y hazle una visita a tu amigo! En Los Sim Toman la Calle podrás elegir entre 10 nuevas trayectorias profesionales con las que satisfacer tus instintos sociales. Desde gángster a científico chiflado, pasando por atleta o víctima de la moda, tendrás que saber hacer un poco de todo si quieres llegar a lo más alto del escalafón social.
Además, es un título diseñado para consolas, por lo que está estructurado en misiones. A medida que las superes obtendrás dinero con el que ir progresando y, por qué no, permitirte unos pequeños lujos. Esta versión esconde 100 nuevos objetos y actividades sociales que desbloquear. Entre los objetos exclusivos para consola están la pared de escalada, la planta carnívora o DJ Booth, entre otros. No te cortes y hazte un tatuaje o ponte un piercing. Quién sabe, quizás así tengas más éxito en el Club Rubb, el nuevo local de moda. A lo largo del juego conocerás a 40 personajes nuevos como, por ejemplo, Bing Bling, fiestero incansable, o Goldie Toane, la reina del fitness. Tendrás que ganarte su amistad si quieres que te ayuden a desbloquear nuevos escenarios y objetos. Inténtalo colaborando con un amigo en el modo para dos jugadores y seguro que lo consigues.
También podrás utilizar la conectividad entre Nintendo GameCube y Game Boy Advance para desbloquear nuevos niveles o descubrir excitantes minijuegos con los que ganar unos simoleones extra. Gráficos mejorados con sombras en tiempo real, nuevas voces y efectos de sonido, una interfaz de usuario optimizada y la impresionante jugabilidad de siempre. Los Sim Toman la Calle. ¿No quieres acompañarles?

locale.title: The Sims: Fuori Tutti
locale.synopsis: "Il mondo è vasto. Veramente vasto. Non riuscireste mai a credere quanto enormemente incredibilmente spaventosamente vasto esso sia" - questo, probabilmente, è quello che i personaggi di The Sims: Fuori Tutti si sono sentiti dire dagli sviluppatori mentre gli veniva presentata la più grande novità con la quale avrebbero avuto a che fare: il mondo! Rinfrancata dall'ottima accoglienza che il pubblico ha riservato al primo episodio della serie (The Sims, disponibile su Nintendo GameCube), Electronic Arts si è subito messa al lavoro per regalare un seguito agli appassionati. The Sims: Fuori Tutti è un gioco che concettualmente ricalca il predecessore, ma che al tempo stesso se ne differenzia in modo netto. Anche questa volta avremo a che fare con i Sims (gli alter ego digitali che dobbiamo assistere nelle incombenze della vita quotidiana), ma a differenza del titolo precedente non saremo più costretti a trascorrere le giornate tra le pareti domestiche: Fuori Tutti, come recita il titolo, ci spinge ad uscire di casa e ad esplorare il vasto mondo che ci circonda! Perché si possa inserire nella variopinta comunità dei Sims, il nostro personaggio ha bisogno di una casa, di un'auto, di un lavoro, di una vita sociale ma soprattutto... di un corpo! La prima incombenza sarà proprio quella di creare da zero il protagonista della storia, decidendo quale aspetto fisico e quale inclinazione caratteriale debba avere; in questa fase preliminare potremo fare affidamento su di un editor molto completo, che consente di elaborare minuziosamente le qualità del personaggio (taglio e colore dei capelli, dimensioni del corpo, vestiti, accessori e via dicendo). La scelta del carattere è forse il momento più delicato nella creazione del nostro Sim, poiché influisce direttamente sulle sue possibilità di successo in un determinato lavoro. Insomma, non vorrete mica costringere il secchione della classe a diventare un atleta, no? I perenni indecisi possono affidare al caso l'attribuzione del carattere: selezionando l'icona a forma di stella, sarà il gioco stesso ad occuparsi di questa scelta amletica - in base al segno zodiacale e alla data di nascita del personaggio. La strada per il successo non è lastricata d'oro, e anzi è vero il contrario: il gioco ruota attorno ad una galassia di missioni che il giocatore deve portare a termine attraverso 16 livelli perché le avventure del Sim vadano a buon fine, permettendogli di realizzarsi pienamente e di raggiungere la felicitá. Esattamente come accade nel mondo reale, i soldi non sono tutto. La felicità del nostro Sim non può prescindere da una vita sociale appagante, che lo porti a stringere nuove amicizie e ad esplorare tutto ciò che gli sta attorno: in sella al proprio scooter o a bordo della propria limousine (passando per la sconfinata gamma di mezzi intermedi che il nostro reddito ci permetterà di acquistare) dovremo avventurarci per tutte le strade della nostra contea virtuale, familiarizzando con più di 40 nuovi personaggi e partecipando a tutti gli eventi che scandiscono la movimentata vita quotidiana della nostra comunità. Dalla preparazione di drink all'animazione di una discoteca, da sessioni di free climbing a tranquille scampagnate al fianco dell'anima gemella, è semplicemente impossibile elencare tutte le opportunità di svago e d'occupazione che il gioco sa offrire. Gli sviluppatori hanno fatto in modo che nel loro titolo potessimo sperimentare tutta la vasta gamma di situazioni che è dato riscontrare nel mondo reale, anche se - ad onor del vero - nel mondo dei Sims anche una tranquilla visita alla farmacia di quartiere può trasformarsi in un'esperienza fuori dell'ordinario... L'imprevisto è sempre in agguato! Se non hai mai giocato ad un titolo della serie The Sims prima d'ora, Fuori Tutti è senza dubbio la migliore introduzione alla più spassosa simulazione di vita reale mai concepita: grafica e sistema di controllo sono stati elaborati avendo bene in mente le particolarità delle console, accantonando le complicate soluzioni con cui hanno invece familiarità gli utenti di personal computer. Tra le altre cose è possibile salvare il proprio personaggio su Memory Card (Scheda Memoria), così da poterlo utilizzare nella partita di un amico per sperimentare nuove situazioni o anche solo per ingaggiare emozionanti sfide in doppio nei numerosi sottogiochi offerti dal titolo EA. Come da tradizione, Electronic Arts ha sfruttato nel migliore dei modi le possibilità offerte dalla connessione con GameBoy Advance: collegando le due console tramite cavo link, è possibile sbloccare un livello inedito nella versione per GameBoy Advance e un'intera sala giochi in quella per Nintendo GameCube. Sorpresa nella sorpresa, la sala giochi ospita diversi minigiochi che si possono scaricare e giocare su GBA. Infine è possibile trasferire il personaggio della versione per Nintendo GameCube in quella per GameBoy Advance, ampliando a dismisura il suo spazio vitale e garantendogli nuove opportunità di svago (e ti credo, perché grazie al trasferimento su GameBoy Advance è possibile portarlo a zonzo con noi facendogli esplorare anche il nostro, di mondo!).

locale.title: NARUTO－ナルト－激闘忍者大戦！4
locale.synopsis: カンタン操作で、超爽快忍者アクションが楽しめる！ 超人気シリーズの最新作がついに登場！ 今回は強敵「音の四人衆」をはじめとした新キャラがぞくぞく参戦！また、新たな合体奥義・キャラチェンジなど、三人一組（スリーマンセル）のバトルがまったく新しくなって、さらにアツイ激闘になることまちがいなし！

locale.title: The Sims 2: Pets
locale.synopsis: Sims Have New Friends - Pets! Sims can share their lives with their new pets and add more fun to the Sims experience. From dogs, cats, caged animals and more, your Sims share new friends to experience life's precious moments. With so many different animals to choose from, there's no telling what unpredictable experiences could occur. Create-A-Pet: Choose from dozens of dog and cat breeds or customize features for a one-of-a-kind pet. You can even modify your pet's body shape by choosing from specific colors and unique markings. Don't like the way they act? Change their personality - from smart and sweet to silly and sloppy - anyone can create their ideal animal friend in The Sims 2 Pets. Your Sims can encourage and discipline pets, training them to shake, roll over, play dead, and more. Unruly pets might dig in the yard, claw the sofa, or topple the trash. Thankfully, a little training can go a long way. Create and control digital characters over a lifetime, setting their goals in life from popularity and romance, to fortune and family- their stories are in your hands. Use special codes to share unlockable pet accessories, fur types or markings with other The Sims 2 Pets players. Take your Sims and their pet for a romp at any of the nearby park areas, or head to the Central Town Park which is a favorite of pet owners. While there, watch your pet play well with others while your Sim can meet others and socialize with fellow animal lovers. Visit the adjoining Town Center, a great gathering spot for Sims that evolves over time. Once you've seen the latest styles and decided on a purchase, deck your pet out in the latest clothing and accessories around. From geek to chic and cool to casual, your Sim can customize their pet's look with one stop in the Town Center.

locale.title: Super Mario Strikers
locale.synopsis: Nintendo's foray into sports titles continues with Super Mario Strikers, a soccer game that's unlike anything ever to hit the pitch. Whether players are freezing their opponents with an ice-cold shell, unleashing a spiny shell on their hapless opponents or making entire teams flee in terror with a roving Chain Chomp, they're sure to see something new around every corner kick. Super Mario Strikers features all the favorite characters from the Nintendo universe, as well as four-person multiplayer action that will have players and their friends cheering all night long. Get ready for the world cup of gaming.

locale.title: スーパーマリオストライカーズ
Mario Smash Football
locale.synopsis: Nintendo's foray into sports titles continues with Mario Smash Football, a soccer game that's unlike anything ever to hit the pitch. Whether players are freezing their opponents with an ice-cold shell, unleashing a spiny shell on their hapless opponents or making entire teams flee in terror with a roving Chain Chomp, they're sure to see something new around every corner kick. Mario Smash Football features all the favorite characters from the Nintendo universe, as well as four-person multiplayer action that will have players and their friends cheering all night long. Get ready for the world cup of gaming.

locale.title: Mario Smash Football
locale.synopsis:
Fußball in einer neuen Dimension!
Vergiss die langweiligen und überflüssigen Dinge des Fußballs wie Regeln, Schiedsrichter und Fairplay. Hier gilt nur ein Motto: ALLES IST ERLAUBT!
Bestreite die nervenaufreibendsten Fußballturniere des Pilz-Königreichs. Wähle einen Spielführer und 4 Kameraden und siege im Bowser-Pokal! Organisiere deine eigenen Turniere und spiele mit bis zu 15 Freunden! Bis zu drei Mitspieler treten gegen dich an oder spielen in deiner Mannschaft.
* Erziele unmögliche Treffer und gib mit deiner einzigartigen Technik an! Von akrobatischen Volleys bis hin zu hohen Pässen ist alles möglich!
* Perfektes Timing ermöglicht dir einen vernichtenden Spezialschuss zu vollführen gegen den der Torhüter chancenlos ist.
* Verhindere jeden Gegentreffer! Halte deine Gegenspieler mit Items und Blutgrätschen auf und wenn das nicht hilft... lass den Kettenhund von der Leine!

locale.title: Mario Smash Football
locale.synopsis:
Il calcio come non lo hai mai visto!
Dimentica le regole, gli arbitri, il fair play... In questo gioco c'è solo una cosa da ricordare: VALE TUTTO! Sbaraglia gli avversari in folli partite 5 contro 5 negli stadi del Regno dei Funghi! Segli il capitano e i compagni di squadra più adatti al tuo stile di gioco e conducili alla vittoria dell'ambita Coppa Bowser! Crea tornei personalizzati per un massimo di 16 giocatori! Sfida i tuoi amici in partite 2 contro 2!

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures
locale.synopsis: This four-player Zelda connectivity adventure combines gameplay on both the GameCube and Game Boy Advance for a mix of competitive and cooperative multiplayer fun. By hooking up GBAs to the GameCube, the action will move from the television screen (when players are on the overworld map), to the GBA screen (when entering houses and caves). Players work together to brave 24 challenges in eight levels in Hyrule Adventure (1-4 players, multiplayer only with GBAs) or compete in 10 frantic multiplayer versus battles (2-4 players, GBAs required). Takes place in similar environments as the SNES classic Link to the Past, but features updated character sprites, new special effects, and overall improved graphics. The Japanese version included an additional mode, known as Navi Trackers.

rom.name: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures (USA) (EN) (v1.0).iso

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures
locale.synopsis: This four-player Zelda connectivity adventure combines gameplay on both the GameCube and Game Boy Advance for a mix of competitive and cooperative multiplayer fun. By hooking up GBAs to the GameCube, the action will move from the television screen (when players are on the overworld map), to the GBA screen (when entering houses and caves). Players work together to brave 24 challenges in eight levels in Hyrule Adventure (1-4 players, multiplayer only with GBAs) or compete in 10 frantic multiplayer versus battles (2-4 players, GBAs required). Takes place in similar environments as the SNES classic Link to the Past, but features updated character sprites, new special effects, and overall improved graphics. The Japanese version included an additional mode, known as Navi Trackers.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures
locale.synopsis:
Vor ewigen Zeiten wurde Hyrule vom bösen Zauberer Vaati heimgesucht. Er verbreitete überall Angst und Schrecken, denn er entführte die jungen und hübschen Mädchen des Landes. Niemand war in der Lage, Vaati zu stoppen, bis eines Tages ein junger Krieger auftauchte, der, nur mit einem Schwert bewaffnet, dem Zauberer gegenüber trat. Doch der junge Krieger verfügte über eine besondere Macht. Listig nutzte er sein Schwert, um sich selbst zu vervierfachen. Nun traten 4 tapfere Krieger dem Zauberer gegenüber, ein Ansturm, dem Vaati nicht gewachsen war. Er wurde besiegt. Die 4 Krieger verbannten Vaati in die tiefsten Kerker Hyrules und versiegelten den Kerker mit ihrem Schwert. Dadurch wurden die Krieger wieder eins und der Ort der Verbannung war von nun an als das Four Sword-Reich bekannt. Lange Zeit geschah nichts, aber schließlich gelang es Vaati, aus seinem Kerker zu fliehen. Er kehrte zurück und nahm sogleich Hyrules Schönste, die bezaubernde Prinzessin Zelda, gefangen. Doch der unerschrockene Link konnte die Macht des Four Sword nutzen, um Vaati erneut in die Knie zu zwingen. Leider währte der Friede in Hyrule nur kurz. Denn schon bei der Zeremonie, in der Vaatis Kerker mit Hilfe von Zelda und den 6 Shrine Maidens für immer versiegelt werden soll, gelingt Vaati eine erneute Flucht. Schlimmer noch, er nimmt 7 Mädchen mit sich. Nun ist es erneut an Link, zur teilenden Macht der Four Sword zu greifen, die Entführten zu retten und als vierfacher Held den Finsterling endgültig zu besiegen.
Features:
- Ultimative Herausforderung für 1 bis 4 Spieler - Nutzt im Multiplayer-Modus den Gameboy Advance als Steuerung - Spieler können gemeinsam 8 riesige Welten entdecken oder einzeln gegeneinander antreten - Innovativer Einzelspieler-Modus erlaubt vielfältige Steuerungsvarianten der Hauptcharaktere - Das High-Resolution-, Top-Down-Gameplay unterstützt fantastische Grafik-Engine - Inklusive GameCube-GBA Link-Kabel

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures
locale.synopsis: Quattro Link, un solo destino! Per anni, la possente Quadrispada ha tenuto prigioniera una forza maligna... finché un'ombra non ha convinto con l'inganno il giovane Link ad estrarre la sacra lama. Ora, divisi dalla maledizione della spada, i quattro Link devono unire le forze per liberare Hyrule dall'oscurità!

rom.name: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Adventures (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT).iso

rom.name: Bokujou Monogatari - Shiawase no Uta for World (Japan) (JA).iso

locale.title: The Sims 2
locale.synopsis: In The Sims 2, you can control your Sims over an entire lifetime for the first time. With the addition of genetics, the game lets your Sims pass their DNA down through generations. Every life choice you make has a relevant and dramatic effect on the lifetime of your Sim. Now it's up to you to take your Sims from the cradle to the grave, while fulfilling their dreams and pushing them to extremes.

locale.title: The Sims 2
locale.synopsis: In The Sims 2, you can control your Sims over an entire lifetime for the first time. With the addition of genetics, the game lets your Sims pass their DNA down through generations. Every life choice you make has a relevant and dramatic effect on the lifetime of your Sim. Now it's up to you to take your Sims from the cradle to the grave, while fulfilling their dreams and pushing them to extremes.

locale.title: Les Sims 2
locale.synopsis:
Le peuple virtuel est de retour dans la suite de l'un des jeux vidéo les plus vendus de l'histoire. Les Sims 2 vous donne la possibilité de créer votre propre collection de personnages virtuels et de dessiner le monde dans lequel ils vivent. Commencez par définir leur personnalité, leur style vestimentaire et leurs objectifs de vie puis lancez-les sur les sentiers de la gloire et, si tout va bien, de la fortune.
Mais si l'argent n'est pas votre priorité, choisissez l'option romantique et optez pour l'amour ou bien faites appel à votre créativité et construisez une maison de rêve pour vos Sims. Créez leur nourriture, dessinez leurs vêtements, trouvez-leur des amis et vivez avec eux les aléas de la vie. Pour construire votre maison, vous n'aurez que l'embarras du choix avec plus de 400 options de constructions et 350 nouveaux objets interactifs. Sinon, tentez d'atteindre les 12 objectifs du Mode Scénario qui contient 60 nouveaux personnages à rencontrer. Et pour ceux qui en veulent toujours plus, vous pouvez jouer en coopération avec un ami grâce au nouveau mode 'deux joueurs' sur écran scindé!

locale.title: Die Sims 2
locale.synopsis:
Die ausgelassenen virtuellen Hausbewohner sind wieder da - in der Fortsetzung eines der bestverkauften Spiele aller Zeiten. Die Sims 2 bietet dir unzählige Möglichkeiten deine eigenen virtuellen Charaktere zu erschaffen und die Welt zu formen, in der sie leben. Zu Beginn kannst du ihr Verhalten, ihren Kleidungsstil und ihre Lebensziele festlegen um sie dann auf ihrem Weg zu Ruhm und - hoffentlich - Reichtum zu begleiten.
Solltest du jedoch nicht scharf auf Kohle sein, kannst du stattdessen den romantischen Weg einschlagen um die große Liebe zu suchen oder deiner Kreativität freien Lauf lassen um deinen Sims ein Traumhaus zu bauen. Du kannst ihre Speisen kreieren, ihre Mode entwerfen, Freundschaften schließen oder sie durch die Höhen und Tiefen ihres Lebens begleiten. Vier frei spielbare Gebiete mit mehr als 400 Baumöglichkeiten und 350 neuen interaktiven Objekten stehen dir zur Verfügung um dein neues Heim zu errichten. Du kannst Dich aber auch an den 12 Zielvorgaben im Story-Modus versuchen, in dem du bis zu 60 neue Charaktere treffen kannst. Mit der neuen Splitscreen-Funktion und einem Freund kannst du den Spaß im Kooperations-Modus sogar noch verdoppeln!

locale.title: De Sims 2
locale.synopsis:
Dat fijne virtuele volkje is weer terug in het vervolg op een van de best verkochte games aller tijden. In De Sims 2 begin je met een schone lei waarop je de personages en de wereld waarin ze leven vorm kunt geven. Bepaal de persoonlijkheid, modestijl en het levensdoel van je Sims en stuur ze dan de wijde wereld in op zoek naar een beetje geluk.
Wellicht is een van je Sims een poenschepper en hunkert een andere naar liefde. Waarom bouw je niet een droomhuis voor een stel van je Sims? Bedenk hun voedsel, ontwerp hun kleding, help ze vrienden maken en deel mee in de perikelen van hun bestaan. Bouw een leven op in de vier vrije speelruimten met meer dan 400 bouwmogelijkheden en 350 verschillende voorwerpen. Misschien probeer je liever de 12 missies van de Story Mode te volbrengen, waarin je 60 nieuwe personages kunt leren kennen. Dubbel zo leuk wordt het natuurlijk wanneer je samen met een van je vrienden speelt in de gloednieuwe stand voor twee spelers in een opgedeeld scherm!

locale.title: Strike Force Bowling
locale.synopsis: You no longer have to wait for league night to enjoy the fun of competitive bowling! Taking the game to a whole new level, Strike Force Bowling features authentic real time physics in an easy-to-use arcade style control. Pins never quite fall the same way twice, bowling balls react according to a combination of spin, material and lane friction. Noise of the alley getting on your nerves? Take your game on the road! Knock over skull-tipped pins on the pitching deck of a pirate ship. Play under the watchful eyes of the Sphinx in ancient Egypt. Bowl over tiki heads at the end of a pier on a tropical island. These and other exotic locations await! Six unique play modes keep things interesting, including Skins, Golf, Challenge and Practice modes, as well as Open and Tournament play. Choose from eight high-polygon players, complete with their own animated reactions to gameplay. Bowling styles can be customized according to strength, accuracy and curve.

locale.title: Scooby-Doo! - Unmasked
locale.synopsis: In this action adventure platform game, players assume the role of Scooby-Doo as he and the teenage sleuths of Mystery Inc. visit Fred's cousin Jed, a monster movie set designer. They find Jed has disappeared and his animatronics are out of control, sending mechanical monsters haywire and making Jed the prime suspect. Players must stop the creepy costumed characters, unmask the truth and prove Jed's innocence. Scooby is able to don Kung Fu, bat and archer costumes so that he can karate chop, glide and aim plungers at monsters. The game consists of three sprawling worlds that each feature multiple levels and mini games with numerous cut scenes and climactic boss battles. Players recognize will the voice of the original Batman television series' Adam West as Winslow Stanton, the game's main villain, as well as authentic Scooby-Doo! cartoon voice actors. In addition, effects from the original cartoon, such as canned laughter and classic catch phrases, have been incorporated into the game.

locale.title: Scooby-Doo! - Unmasked

In addition, effects from the original cartoon, such as canned laughter and classic catch phrases, have been incorporated into the game.

locale.title: Namco Museum 50th Anniversary
locale.synopsis: Namco celebrates their 50th anniversary by packaging 14 of their best classic arcade games onto one disc. The interface lets you browse a virtual game hall with each game shown in its original arcade cabinet. The games included in this collection are: Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Pole Position, Pole Position II, Rolling Thunder, Rally X, Bosconian, Dragon Spirit, Sky Kid, Xevious, and Mappy.

locale.title: Namco Museum 50th Anniversary
locale.synopsis: Namco celebrates their 50th anniversary by packaging 14 of their best classic arcade games onto one disc. The interface lets you browse a virtual game hall with each game shown in its original arcade cabinet. The games included in this collection are: Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Pole Position, Pole Position II, Rolling Thunder, Rally X, Bosconian, Dragon Spirit, Sky Kid, Xevious, and Mappy.

locale.title: Spyro: A Hero's Tail
locale.synopsis: Spyro must save the Dragon Realms from the Evil Red Dragon who has planted light-sapping Dark Gems all over the Dragon Realms in an attempt to control the world. With the help of his allies, Spyro must seek out and destroy all of the Dark Gems to return the land back to normal and to save the Dragon Realms from the evil dragon's tyrannical control. Guide Spyro as he uses his new dragon powers, abilities, and gadgets in lush environments rife with new villains.

locale.title: Spyro: A Hero's Tail
locale.synopsis: Spyro must save the Dragon Realms from the Evil Red Dragon who has planted light-sapping Dark Gems all over the Dragon Realms in an attempt to control the world. With the help of his allies, Spyro must seek out and destroy all of the Dark Gems to return the land back to normal and to save the Dragon Realms from the evil dragon's tyrannical control. Guide Spyro as he uses his new dragon powers, abilities, and gadgets in lush environments rife with new villains.

locale.title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2005
locale.synopsis: Challenge professional golfer Tiger Woods to challenging matches in Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2005. This time, you can modify course dynamics and add longer trees, tighter fairways, undulations to greens, deeper bunkers, and more. The game's EA Sports Game Face features nonproportional bone scaling and texture blending to provide more realistic looks. After creating your own golfer and making a name for yourself, unlock the chance to tee off against some of golf's greatest legends, including Arnold Palmer, Jack Nicklaus, and Ben Hogan.

locale.title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2005
locale.synopsis: Challenge professional golfer Tiger Woods to challenging matches in Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2005. This time, you can modify course dynamics and add longer trees, tighter fairways, undulations to greens, deeper bunkers, and more. The game's EA Sports Game Face features nonproportional bone scaling and texture blending to provide more realistic looks. After creating your own golfer and making a name for yourself, unlock the chance to tee off against some of golf's greatest legends, including Arnold Palmer, Jack Nicklaus, and Ben Hogan.

locale.title: Major League Baseball 2K6
locale.synopsis: Major League Baseball 2K6 is the newest baseball offering from 2K Sports and the only MLB-licensed game this year. Use the new Inside Edge scouting service to get detailed stat tracking and in-depth player reports. MLB 2K6 features detailed controls, letting you use the analog sticks to make precision changes to your swings and throws. ESPN broadcasters Joe Miller and Joe Morgan return to do the commentary. In addition to the single-player season and exhibition modes, MLB 2K6 includes a multiplayer mode.

locale.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3
locale.synopsis: As terrorist attacks against the United States and Venezuela escalate, you are in charge of leading the last line of defense: Rainbow. In Rainbow Six 3, you will lead this top-secret task force dedicated to combating terrorism in all its forms. Your team consists of the best field operatives--equipped with an arsenal of no fewer than 30 weapons--that the United Nations has to offer. You may be the last hope in the war against terror.

locale.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3
locale.synopsis: As terrorist attacks against the United States and Venezuela escalate, you are in charge of leading the last line of defense: Rainbow. In Rainbow Six 3, you will lead this top-secret task force dedicated to combating terrorism in all its forms. Your team consists of the best field operatives--equipped with an arsenal of no fewer than 30 weapons--that the United Nations has to offer. You may be the last hope in the war against terror.

locale.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
locale.synopsis: You can experience the excitement of international soccer competition in FIFA 06. Extensive coaching options give you the opportunity to take control of all of your players on the pitch and determine their formation and strategy. FIFA 06 offers game modes ranging from a tournament to individual skill games. You can also play with real players from famous international teams from around the world. Multiplayer modes let you challenge other gamers.

locale.title: FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft Deutschland 2006
locale.synopsis:
EA SPORTS feiert mit dem einzigen offiziell lizenzierten Videospiel zur FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 das größte Sportereignis der Welt. FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 spiegelt die Emotionen, die Leidenschaft und die sportlichen Rivalitäten der Nationalmannschaften wider und gibt dir die Möglichkeit, mit deinen Helden anzutreten, um den Titel bei der FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft zu gewinnen. Tritt mit deinem Heimatland an und schieße mit deinen Lieblingsspielern die entscheidenden Tore, damit du dich durch die Qualifikation bis in die WM-Endrunde in Deutschland kämpfst. Indem die Fähigkeiten der bekanntesten Spieler der Welt übernommen und eingebaut werden, erweckt EA SPORTS nahezu 100 Superstars zum Leben. Individuelle Tricks, Spielstile und Auftreten werden in diesem Spiel authentisch wiedergegeben. Spielerische Fortschritte beim Passen und Schießen, verbessertes Elfmeterschießen eingeschlossen, machen dieses Spiel zum realistischsten und spielerisch besten Fußballspiel, das es bisher gab. FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 führt einen neuen Spielmodus, die Globale Herausforderung, ein, der auch die besten Spieler auf die Probe stellen wird. Die Globale Herausforderung lässt 40 Klassiker aus der Geschichte der FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft wieder aufleben, die du meistern musst. Vergleiche anschließend dein Ergebnis mit dem tatsächlichen Resultat – kannst du dich mit den weltbesten Fußballern messen? Du kannst nicht nur mit einer der 127 Nationalmannschaften die FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 bestreiten, sondern hast auch die Möglichkeit, Multiplayer-Partien mit bis zu acht Spielern gleichzeitig auszutragen. Verfolge in der „Lounge“ deine Statistiken, führe eigene Ranglisten und verdiene dir Belohnungen. Darüber hinaus wartet das Spiel als einziges offizielles Spiel zur FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 in Deutschland mit jeder Menge freischaltbarer Elemente wie legendären Spielern auf. Spiel mit den besten Fußballern aller Zeiten in exklusiven Outfits.
FEATURES:
- SPIEL MIT DEINEN HELDEN: Die weltweit besten Spieler bewegen sich exakt wie ihre realen Vorbilder und sehen auch genauso aus. Besondere Fertigkeiten und Spielstile jedes Spielers werden absolut authentisch wiedergegeben.
- GEWINNE DIE FIFA FUSSBALL-WELTMEISTERSCHAFT 2006: Du kannst dein Lieblingsteam aus 127 verfügbaren Mannschaften auswählen, mit deinen Spielern die Qualifikationsrunde durchlaufen und anschließend im eigentlichen Turnier dein Können unter Beweis stellen. Für die Partien in Deutschland stehen dabei alle 12 offiziellen Stadien der FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 zur Verfügung.
- GLOBALE HERAUSFORDERUNG: Die Globale Herausforderung lässt 40 Klassiker aus der Geschichte der FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft wieder aufleben, die du meistern musst. Wenn du gut genug bist, kannst du Legenden und zusätzliche Ausrüstung freischalten.
- ELFMETERSCHIESSEN: Erlebe das Elfmeterschießen realistisch wie nie zuvor, mit all der Spannung und Dramaturgie, die dazugehört. Mit neuen Bewegungen kannst du den Torwart in die Irre führen oder als Torhüter den Schützen ablenken. Behalt die Nerven, um mit deinem Team die Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft für dich zu entscheiden.
- VERBESSERTE SCHUSSMÖGLICHKEITEN: Neue Schussmöglichkeiten bieten noch mehr Realismus. Wie im echten Leben hängt der Torerfolg von den Fähigkeiten deines Spielers, seiner Genauigkeit beim Schießen, dem Druck der Verteidiger und der Entfernung vom Tor ab.
- MULTIPLAYER-MODUS: Mit deinem Lieblingsteam kannst du gegen bis zu sieben andere Spieler antreten – von der Qualifikationsrunde bis hin zur Endrunde der FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006.
- FIFAWORLDCUP.COM ZONE: Durch Videos im Spiel erfährst du mehr über die Austragungsorte und Stadien der FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2006 in Deutschland.

locale.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
locale.synopsis: You can experience the excitement of international soccer competition in FIFA 06. Extensive coaching options give you the opportunity to take control of all of your players on the pitch and determine their formation and strategy. FIFA 06 offers game modes ranging from a tournament to individual skill games. You can also play with real players from famous international teams from around the world. Multiplayer modes let you challenge other gamers.

locale.title: 2006 FIFA World Cup
locale.synopsis: Você pode experimentar a emoção das competições internacionais de futebol no FIFA World Cup 2006. Extensas opções de treinamento oferecem a oportunidade de controlar todos os jogadores em campo e determinar sua formação e estratégia. O FIFA 06 oferece modos de jogo que variam de torneio a jogos de habilidade individuais. Você também pode jogar com jogadores reais de times internacionais famosos de todo o mundo. Os modos multijogador permitem desafiar outros jogadores.

locale.title: Madden NFL 06
locale.synopsis: 2006's edition in the unstoppable football series features a brand new passing game in the Quarterback Vision Control system -- depending on where you are looking and how good your QB is, your zone of view affects how accurate your toss is as well as allowing you precision placement ahead of or straight to the receiver. The game now also feature Formation Specific Audibles and other tweaks to the offensive and defensive game. Outside of the huddle, Madden NFL 06 features a brand new Superstar Mode single player game, allowing you to live the life of a single NFL star, earning one of more than 60 Personas ranging from MVP to Movie Star. Import players from NCAA Football NFL STREET 2 player into NFL Superstar Mode to give him a head start, and experience a story mode of endorsement deals, minigames and more.

locale.title: NBA Live 06
locale.synopsis: The evolution of the EA SPORTS Freestyle Control continues with all-new EA SPORTS Freestyle Superstars. Users now dictate the actions of the top NBA stars with full user control over dazzling passes, rebounds, dunks and steals within 5-on-5 gameplay. With the superstars of the NBA playing like their real-life counterparts, Playmakers deliver fast break Freestyle passes on the fly, Stoppers control the paint, and Power players dominate the opposition with powerful user-controlled dunks. An enhanced transition game yields an up-tempo, fast-break, and physical brand of basketball that features players running the lanes and awaiting the open pass. With the NBA LIVE 06 advancements in gameplay and enhanced player graphics, the NBA's superstars look and play more like their real-life counterparts than ever before. A rich collection of game modes adds to the deepest offering of NBA LIVE ever - including Dynasty Mode, EA SPORTS Online, and NBA All-Star Weekend.

locale.title: Mega Man Anniversary Collection
locale.synopsis: Mega Man Compilation disc, put together in celebration of Mega Man's 15th birthday. Paying tribute to Mega Man creator Keiji Inafune, Capcom's Mega Man Anniversary Collection anthology set collects Mega Man 1 through 8 in a single package in addition to two arcade titles never before released in the U.S., Mega Man: The Power Battle and Mega Man: The Power Fighters. In addition to an updated soundtrack, fans of the blue hero will also find a cache of unlockable bonus features that include producer interviews (GameCube only) and a history of the series.

game.name: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning
locale.synopsis: Spyro the purple dragon returns in Sierra Entertainment and Krome Studios’ THE LEGEND OF SPYRO: A NEW BEGINNING for the Game Cube. This time, the game focuses on Spyro’s childhood and recounts the story of his first major battle with Cinder the Dragon. The game begins with Spyro hatching out of an egg and being raised by dragonflies. He has no idea that he’s a dragon, but once Spyro discovers this, he will have access to many of his dragon talents, including fire breathing and flying. He will need all of these abilities to take down the evil black dragon Cinder, who is plotting to resurrect an evil force and take over the world. A New Beginning focuses more on battle than platforming. Spyro’s breath attack can be modified with elemental powers, and each of these four elements has three different attacks that Spyro can access once he collects enough gems. Each attack has its own uses. In addition to elemental blasts, Spyro also has access to one fury move per element. These moves damage enemies across the entire screen. The flying levels work just like aerial shooters, with Spyro blasting his way through Cinder’s flying forces while dodging and spiraling out of the way of incoming blasts. These break up the combat missions and, together, turn THE LEGEND OF SPYRO: A NEW BEGINNING into a great game that explores Spyro’s past and turns him into the dragon hero everyone loves.

rom.name: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning (USA) (EN) (v1.00).iso

game.name: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT,NL)

locale.title: Teen Titans
locale.synopsis: Teen Titans, the popular TV show and DC comic, crosses to another medium as the five main characters undertake a video game-based adventure. All five main characters--Robin, Starfire, Beast Boy, Cyborg, and Raven--use their powers to battle against the team's main archvillains. This action game lets you switch characters on the fly, which lets you maximize their unique abilities throughout each level.

locale.title: Os Jovens Titãs
locale.synopsis: Teen Titans, o popular programa de TV e quadrinhos da DC, passa para outro meio enquanto os cinco personagens principais empreendem uma aventura baseada em videogame. Todos os cinco personagens principais - Robin, Estelar, Mutano, Ciborgue e Ravena - usam seus poderes para batalhar contra os arqui-vilões principais da equipe. Este jogo de ação permite que você troque de personagem rapidamente, o que permite maximizar suas habilidades únicas em cada nível.

locale.title: Teen Titans
locale.synopsis: Teen Titans, the popular TV show and DC comic, crosses to another medium as the five main characters undertake a video game-based adventure. All five main characters--Robin, Starfire, Beast Boy, Cyborg, and Raven--use their powers to battle against the team's main archvillains. This action game lets you switch characters on the fly, which lets you maximize their unique abilities throughout each level.

locale.title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06
locale.synopsis: Tiger Woods 06 pits you against Tiger Woods in a battle to be the best golfer of all time. You can play golf greats in their own eras on their terms to prove that you are the best ever. Tiger Woods 06 includes greater shot control and a "gamebreaker" meter that models the momentum of professional golf competition. You can play on 15 courses, both licensed and fantastical. "Game face" features return to let you customize a character and take him or her through an entire 52-week PGA season. Tiger Woods 06 also adds more multiplayer modes and capabilities.

locale.title: Madden NFL 07
locale.synopsis: The 2007 edition of EA's unstoppable football franchise. The 2007 edition of EA's unstoppable football franchise. In its 17th installment, you control the running game like never before. For the first time ever, step up as the lead blocker to create a hole, and then take control of the tailback and smash through, overpower, or slash away from would-be tacklers as you fight for every yard. Innovative rushing controls give you a game-breaking ground attack featuring all-new jukes, cutbacks, and the distinct running styles of your favorite backs.

locale.title: Pac-Man World Rally
locale.synopsis:
In Pac-Man World Rally, players can race through a variety of environments from Pac-Man World as Pac-Man, Pac Jr. and other beloved characters from past Namco classics. In one of the fastest and most exciting kart racing games ever, players will race for the win or fight it out in colorful Battle Arenas with special weapons, power ups and variety Pac-Man powers.
* Fastest Kart Racing Game Ever - Race against the computer or with your friends in the fastest, most exciting kart racer to date. Feel unprecedented sense of speed as you race on some of the most exciting tracks ever created * Play as either iconic characters from the Pac-Man universe or choose from an all-star cast of classic Namco characters * Battle in Pac-Style - Special power ups, tracks and abilities prove that it's Pac-Man's world, and we only live in it

locale.title: Virtua Quest
locale.synopsis: In Virtua Quest, you play the role Sei, a young boy. As you explore each stage, you'll discover Virtua Souls, data clusters that contain information about the martial arts abilities of the legendary Virtua Fighter characters. With each cluster, you gain the ability to perform complex fighting moves. As the story progresses, you discover that only you can unlock the potential of the Virtua Souls--a discovery that soon gains the attention of Judgement 6, an evil syndicate.

locale.title: バーチャファイター サイバージェネレーション
Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
locale.synopsis: Get ready for a new role-playing adventure as Mario returns to paper form to stop a dangerous threat. In Paper Mario 2, Mario can dodge, inflict damage, and impress the crowd to strengthen his attacks. Also, Mario and his friends have more paper abilities. They can now turn sideways to slip through cracks, fold into a paper airplane to fly, roll into a tube, and more. They can also use a variety of items like hammers and thunderbolts to defeat their enemies.

locale.title: Paper Mario RPG
locale.synopsis: Get ready for a new role-playing adventure as Mario returns to paper form to stop a dangerous threat. In Paper Mario 2, Mario can dodge, inflict damage, and impress the crowd to strengthen his attacks. Also, Mario and his friends have more paper abilities. They can now turn sideways to slip through cracks, fold into a paper airplane to fly, roll into a tube, and more. They can also use a variety of items like hammers and thunderbolts to defeat their enemies.

They can now turn sideways to slip through cracks, fold into a paper airplane to fly, roll into a tube, and more. They can also use a variety of items like hammers and thunderbolts to defeat their enemies.

locale.title: 페이퍼 마리오 - 천년의 문
locale.synopsis: 마리오가 위험한 위협을 막기 위해 종이 형태로 돌아오면서 새로운 롤 플레잉 모험을 준비하세요. 페이퍼 마리오 2에서 마리오는 회피하고 피해를 입히고 군중을 감동시켜 공격을 강화할 수 있습니다. 또한 마리오와 그의 친구들은 더 많은 종이 능력을 가지고 있습니다. 이제 옆으로 회전하여 틈 사이로 미끄러져 들어가고, 종이 비행기로 접어서 날고, 튜브로 구르는 등의 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다. 그들은 또한 망치와 벼락과 같은 다양한 아이템을 사용하여 적을 물리칠 수 있습니다.

locale.title: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
locale.synopsis: Get ready for a new role-playing adventure as Mario returns to paper form to stop a dangerous threat. In Paper Mario 2, Mario can dodge, inflict damage, and impress the crowd to strengthen his attacks. Also, Mario and his friends have more paper abilities. They can now turn sideways to slip through cracks, fold into a paper airplane to fly, roll into a tube, and more. They can also use a variety of items like hammers and thunderbolts to defeat their enemies.

locale.title: Paper Mario: La Porte Millénaire
locale.synopsis: Qui a enlevé la Princesse Peach? Dans quel but? Est-ce que Mario pourra la sauver? Bowser aurait-il quelque chose à voir là-dedans? Préparez-vous pour une aventure en deux dimensions alors que Mario retourne à sa forme de papier pour résoudre l'énigme cachée derrière la légendaire Porte Millénaire. C'est à Mario et ses fabuleux compagnons qu'incombent de sauver le monde dans un jeu de rôle et d'aventure plein d'humour! Même fin comme une feuille, Mario résistera à la tempête! Oserez-vous l'accompagner de l'autre côté de la Porte Millénaire?

locale.title: Paper Mario: Die Legende vom Äonentor
locale.synopsis:
Was gehört zu jedem großen Mario-Abenteuer? Richtig, die Entführung von Prinzessin Peach. Und auch bei "Paper Mario: Die Legende vom Äonentor" ist die Prinzessin einmal mehr Opfer eines Fieslings geworden. Doch diesmal ist es ausnahmsweise nicht der lumpige Bowser, der Peach gefangen hält. Ein neuer Schurke, der gemeine Riesendrache Hooktail, hat seine ungewaschenen Klauen nach der holden Prinzessin ausgestreckt.
Mario macht sich also wieder einmal auf, die Prinzessin zu retten. Hilfreich ist dabei seine Form, denn in "Paper Mario: Die Legende vom Äonentor" ist unser Held platt wie eine Flunder, was ihm ungekannte Fähigkeiten verleiht. Er kann sich zu einem Papierflieger zusammenfalten, um weite Abgründe zu überqueren, oder sich zur Seite drehen und passt so auch durch die engsten Ritzen in Gemäuern. Doch Mario erhält noch mehr Unterstützung. Im Laufe des Spiels trifft er auf viele bekannte Figuren des Nintendo-Universums, die ihm bei seiner Mission weiterhelfen.
Um noch mehr Abwechslung ins Spielgeschehen zu bringen, kann man neben Mario auch noch andere Charaktere steuern. So kann der Spieler das Abenteuer auch aus der Sicht von Prinzessin Peach erleben und sogar der um seinen Status als Fiesling besorgte Bowser spielt an einigen Stellen des Games die Hauptrolle.
Kein Wunder also, dass "Paper Mario: Die Legende vom Äonentor" ein Riesenspaß und absolutes Highlight jeder Spielesammlung ist.
FEATURES:
- Außergewöhnliches 2D-Design versetzt Mario in eine ganz und gar aus Papier gestaltete Welt
- In Kämpfen entscheidet die Unterstützung der Zuschauer über den Erfolg
- Mario kann sich verwandeln, unter anderem in einen Papierflieger
- Zahlreiche neue Charaktere tauchen auf, einige von ihnen begleiten Mario sogar bei seinem Abenteuer

locale.title: Paper Mario: Il Portale Millenario
locale.synopsis: Paper Mario: Il Portale Millenario, conosciuto come Paper Mario: RPG in Giappone, è il seguito di Paper Mario, rilasciato per il GameCube nel 2004. In questo gioco, Mario cerca le sette Gemme Stella per aprire il Portale Millenario, mentre Peach viene rapita da una banda di alieni chiamata Incrociati. La storia del gioco è divisa in otto differenti capitoli e Mario dovrà conquistare una delle otto preziose Gemme Stella in questi diversi livelli. I compagni di Mario sono numerosi e si uniscono dopo aver fatto la loro conoscenza, o dopo aver svolto un piccolo compito da loro assegnato.

locale.title: Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo Dassutsu! Hajike Royale
locale.synopsis: Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo Dassutsu! Hajike Royale is a 2005 action video game developed and published by Hudson Soft. The game was released only in Japan. The games is based on the Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo manga and anime.

locale.title: ボボボーボ・ボーボボ 脱出!!ハジケ・ロワイヤル
무적 코털 보보보 탈출!! 하지케 로얄
Battle Stadium D.O.N
locale.synopsis: Uma batalha confusa entre os três heróis principais finalmente acontece! Use cada técnica para sobreviver nos vários estágios que apareceram no original! !! Pegue uma Hachachike e lute com suas próprias regras! Fique animado com movimentos especiais à vontade, grandes batalhas, jogos de pachinko e muito mais!

locale.title: バトルスタジアムD.O.N
locale.synopsis: ３大ヒーローが繰り広げるはちゃめちゃバトルがついに開催!!原作に登場した様々なステージでそれぞれの技を駆使して勝ち残れ!!如意棒、パチンコ、手裏剣、爆弾などたくさんのアイテムで闘いを有利に進めろ!！ハチャチケを手にして自分だけのルールで戦え！必殺技打ち放題、巨大バトル、パチンコ勝負などなどハチャメチャバトルで盛り上がれ!!

locale.title: Battalion Wars
locale.synopsis: Nintendo presents Battalion Wars for the Game Cube, a military action strategy game that doesn’t take itself too seriously. Instead, the game presents players with a unique style of graphics and character design, fun shooter controls, and a good amount of humor. Players take on the role of a field officer in Battalion Wars. As an officer in the Western Frontier army, players find themselves battling the forces of the Tundran Empire at first, but the Empire and the Frontier quickly find themselves signing a peace treaty and uniting against the Xylvanians, a third faction that attacks both groups after they are weakened. Players then take direct control of their squad and head to the battlefield. One of the interesting aspects of Battalion Wars is that players aren’t represented by any one character. Instead, they can take control of any unit on the battlefield. This allows gamers to jump around during the battle, controlling an infantryman for a few minutes, then switching to a vehicle to perform a quick assault, then taking control of a heavily armed solider to take down a bunker. The other units, of course, continue their attacks even when the player isn’t controlling them, creating an interesting system of battle. Battalion Wars combines strategy with a third person shooter in such a way that players will enjoy. With the ability to command many different units in the same battle and plan strategies involving different units, Battalion Wars is a great humorous war game for all players.

locale.title: Battalion Wars
locale.synopsis: A Nintendo apresenta Battalion Wars para o Game Cube, um jogo de estratégia de ação militar que não se leva muito a sério. Em vez disso, o jogo apresenta aos jogadores um estilo único de gráficos e design de personagens, controles de tiro divertidos e muito humor. Os jogadores assumem o papel de um oficial de campo nas Guerras de Batalhão. Como um oficial do exército da Fronteira Ocidental, os jogadores lutam primeiro contra as forças do Império Tundran, mas o Império e a Fronteira rapidamente assinam um tratado de paz e se unem Mais uma vez, os Xilvanianos, uma terceira facção que ataca os dois grupos depois de enfraquecidos. Os jogadores então assumem o controle direto de seu esquadrão e vão para o campo de batalha. Um dos aspectos interessantes das Guerras de Batalhão é que os jogadores não são representados por nenhum personagem. Em vez disso, eles podem assumir o controle de qualquer unidade no campo de batalha. Isso permite que os jogadores saltem durante a batalha, controlando um soldado de infantaria por alguns minutos e depois mudando para um veículo As outras unidades, é claro, continuam seus ataques mesmo quando o jogador não as está controlando, criando um sistema de batalha interessante. Battalion Wars combina. Estratégia com um jogo de tiro em terceira pessoa de tal forma que os jogadores irão gostar. Com a capacidade de Comande muitas unidades diferentes na mesma batalha e planeje estratégias envolvendo unidades diferentes. Battalion Wars é um ótimo jogo de guerra bem-humorado para todos os jogadores.

locale.title: Totsugeki!! Famicom Wars
locale.synopsis: Nintendo presents Battalion Wars for the Game Cube, a military action strategy game that doesn’t take itself too seriously. Instead, the game presents players with a unique style of graphics and character design, fun shooter controls, and a good amount of humor. Players take on the role of a field officer in Battalion Wars. As an officer in the Western Frontier army, players find themselves battling the forces of the Tundran Empire at first, but the Empire and the Frontier quickly find themselves signing a peace treaty and uniting against the Xylvanians, a third faction that attacks both groups after they are weakened. Players then take direct control of their squad and head to the battlefield. One of the interesting aspects of Battalion Wars is that players aren’t represented by any one character. Instead, they can take control of any unit on the battlefield. This allows gamers to jump around during the battle, controlling an infantryman for a few minutes, then switching to a vehicle to perform a quick assault, then taking control of a heavily armed solider to take down a bunker. The other units, of course, continue their attacks even when the player isn’t controlling them, creating an interesting system of battle. Battalion Wars combines strategy with a third person shooter in such a way that players will enjoy. With the ability to command many different units in the same battle and plan strategies involving different units, Battalion Wars is a great humorous war game for all players.

locale.title: 突撃!!ファミコンウォーズ
Battalion Wars
locale.synopsis: Nintendo presents Battalion Wars for the Game Cube, a military action strategy game that doesn’t take itself too seriously. Instead, the game presents players with a unique style of graphics and character design, fun shooter controls, and a good amount of humor. Players take on the role of a field officer in Battalion Wars. As an officer in the Western Frontier army, players find themselves battling the forces of the Tundran Empire at first, but the Empire and the Frontier quickly find themselves signing a peace treaty and uniting against the Xylvanians, a third faction that attacks both groups after they are weakened. Players then take direct control of their squad and head to the battlefield. One of the interesting aspects of Battalion Wars is that players aren’t represented by any one character. Instead, they can take control of any unit on the battlefield. This allows gamers to jump around during the battle, controlling an infantryman for a few minutes, then switching to a vehicle to perform a quick assault, then taking control of a heavily armed solider to take down a bunker. The other units, of course, continue their attacks even when the player isn’t controlling them, creating an interesting system of battle. Battalion Wars combines strategy with a third person shooter in such a way that players will enjoy. With the ability to command many different units in the same battle and plan strategies involving different units, Battalion Wars is a great humorous war game for all players.

locale.title: Battalion Wars
locale.synopsis: Ein Bataillon marschiert mit brandheißer Action auf den Nintendo GameCube! Du hast jede Menge Ressourcen zur Verfügung, kannst einen Spähtrupp einsetzen, um deine Feinde auszuspionieren, kannst schwere Artillerie verwenden und setzt dich mit deinen Feinden in einer Reihe von Gefechten auseinander. Dein Waffenarsenal umfasst Gewehre, Panzerfäuste und sogar Flammenwerfer. Außerdem kannst du in Geländewagen, Panzern, Kampfflugzeugen und Kampfhubschraubern gegen deine Feinde vorgehen. Du kannst ganze Truppen kommandieren oder dich auf eine einzige Einheit konzentrieren. Battalion Wars bietet ein Trommelfeuer taktischer Action in über 20 verschiedenen Missionen. In jeder Mission gibt es wiederum Untermissionen und du hast mehrere Möglichkeiten dein jeweiliges Ziel zu erreichen. Battalion Wars ist einfach aufgebaut, bietet jedoch eine anspruchsvolle taktische Herausforderung. Echtzeitstrategie war noch nie so leicht zugänglich!

locale.title: Battalion Wars
locale.synopsis: A Nintendo apresenta Battalion Wars para o Game Cube, um jogo de estratégia de ação militar que não se leva muito a sério. Em vez disso, o jogo apresenta aos jogadores um estilo único de gráficos e design de personagens, controles de tiro divertidos e muito humor. Os jogadores assumem o papel de um oficial de campo nas Guerras de Batalhão. Como um oficial do exército da Fronteira Ocidental, os jogadores lutam primeiro contra as forças do Império Tundran, mas o Império e a Fronteira rapidamente assinam um tratado de paz e se unem Mais uma vez, os Xilvanianos, uma terceira facção que ataca os dois grupos depois de enfraquecidos. Os jogadores então assumem o controle direto de seu esquadrão e vão para o campo de batalha. Um dos aspectos interessantes das Guerras de Batalhão é que os jogadores não são representados por nenhum personagem. Em vez disso, eles podem assumir o controle de qualquer unidade no campo de batalha. Isso permite que os jogadores saltem durante a batalha, controlando um soldado de infantaria por alguns minutos e depois mudando para um veículo As outras unidades, é claro, continuam seus ataques mesmo quando o jogador não as está controlando, criando um sistema de batalha interessante. Battalion Wars combina. Estratégia com um jogo de tiro em terceira pessoa de tal forma que os jogadores irão gostar. Com a capacidade de Comande muitas unidades diferentes na mesma batalha e planeje estratégias envolvendo unidades diferentes. Battalion Wars é um ótimo jogo de guerra bem-humorado para todos os jogadores.

locale.title: Mark Davis Pro Bass Challenge
locale.synopsis: Mark Davis Pro Bass Challenge is a Fishing game, developed by Sims and published by Natsume, which was released in 2005.

locale.title: 実況パワフルプロ野球9決定版
Crash Tag Team Racing
locale.synopsis: For the first time ever in a racing game, players will be able to fuse two cars together on the fly to form a super vehicle with the all-new "clashing" technology. In Crash Tag Team Racing, players can combine their car with an opponent's mid-race to make a super-car equipped with a powerful turret gun. When clashed, players can either get behind the wheel and drive or fire an onboard weapon. Each character has his or her own uniquely deadly 360˚ rotating turret. Players can continue the action out of the car where they can explore the entire world on foot and collect upgrades for their cars and unlock bonus tracks.

locale.title: Crash Tag Team Racing
locale.synopsis:
Auf die Plätze, Action - los!
Gang rein, Vollgas und ab auf die Piste! Verbinde zwei Fahzeuge zu einem Superauto mit abgefahrenen Geschützen. Schnapp dir das Steuer oder nimm die Gegner unter Beschuss! Liefere dir verrückte Rennen mit oder gegen deine Freunde in völlig abgedrehten Multiplayer-Spielen!
Kombinieren! Wegpusten! * Vernichte die Konkurrenz mit frei beweglichen 360 Grad Geschützen!
Mehr als nur ein Racing-Game! * Geh' auf Entdeckungstour, um neue Strecken und Fahrzeuge freizuschalten! * Verrückte Minigames! * Action und Abenteuer in Hülle und Fülle!

Crash Tag Team Racing

locale.title: Sonic Heroes
locale.synopsis: Sonic teams up with Knuckles, Tails and nine other characters from Sega's classic Sonic universe in a new take on platforming action in Sonic Heroes for PlayStation 2, GameCube, and Xbox. Utilize the abilities of three different characters in order to complete levels by switching on the fly. Four teams of three characters: Team Sonic, Team Dark, Team Chaotix, and Team Rose race through specially designed levels that require logical character switching. Level designs promote replay value by adding multiple paths and missions. New Sonic story is told through cinematic pre-rendered movies between levels.

locale.title: Shark Tale
locale.synopsis: In the murky depths of the ocean, the fate of Reef City lies in the fins of one little fish--at least that's what he wants you to think. Dive into the underwater metropolis of Shark Tale and play as Oscar, a fast-talking fish whose little fib gets him into big trouble. Based on DreamWorks' animated film, Shark Tale features 25 missions that will have you exploring Reef City, racing through the coral, fighting Fish Fu and great white sharks, and dancing to the sounds of hip-hop tracks.

locale.title: All-Star Baseball 2002
locale.synopsis: Marketed behind 4-Time World Series Champion and New York Yankee Shortstop, Derek Jeter, All-Star Baseball 2002 brings to the Gamecube its fantastic double play combination of superior game-play and outstanding graphics. In fact, the All-Star Baseball franchise is so strong, it has the distinction of being selected twice as Baseball Game Of The Year!

locale.title: All-Star Baseball 2003
locale.synopsis: All-Star Baseball 2003 combines true-to-life graphics with superior gameplay to create the most exciting baseball experience for any fan. Featuring Derek Jeter, four-time World Series Champion, All-Star Baseball 2003 is the only baseball game available this year on all next generation hardware systems.

locale.title: All-Star Baseball 2003
locale.synopsis: All-Star Baseball 2003 combines true-to-life graphics with superior gameplay to create the most exciting baseball experience for any fan. Featuring Derek Jeter, four-time World Series Champion, All-Star Baseball 2003 is the only baseball game available this year on all next generation hardware systems.

locale.title: オールスターベースボール2003
All-Star Baseball 2004
locale.synopsis: The 2004 installment in Acclaim's long-running baseball series. The game features more than 80 new features and improvements, including a deeper, more customizable franchise mode. The biggest change comes in the interface. You still hit the same buttons to swing, bunt, steal, and field, but the batting cursor has been visually altered. It's still the same triangle shape as before, just with a different outline. Bunting is more unique, though. Instead of aiming the cursor when you go to bunt, a large arrow points on the ground. Aim your bunt in the desired direction and hope for the best. Fielding has also received a slight change, with the ball cursor changing color. Four up to four players.

locale.title: Backyard Sports Baseball 2007
locale.synopsis: Backyard Baseball 2007 is the fifth iteration of the best selling youth baseball video game of all time and the only kid's game to hold the coveted Major League Baseball (MLB) and Major League Baseball Players Association (MLBPA) licenses. Backyard Baseball 2007 features a roster full of top MLB pros as kids and includes all 30 MLB teams, uniforms, and logos. In addition, the game's kid-friendly, non-violent format, and high level of diversity makes it especially popular with parents.

locale.title: Disney's Mickey & Minnie Trick & Chase
locale.synopsis: Minnie Mouse has been kidnapped by mysterious flying creatures, and it's up to Mickey to rescue her. Now, as either Mickey or Minnie, you must fight your way through three different stages, including a warehouse, museum, and ruins, and master special tricks and combinations. In each area, you'll solve puzzles, run, jump, and hide from enemies. Mickey can also hang onto ropes, climb onto containers, and use stealth maneuvers to evade foes. Disney's Hide and Sneak features more than 30 animated sequences for both playable characters.

locale.title: ディズニーのミッキー＆ミニー トリック＆チェイス
locale.synopsis: ある晴れた日。 ピクニックに出かけたミッキーとミニーは大きなキノコを発見。しかし、そのキノコは、宇宙からやってきたナゾの生命体「ルルー」だった！ルルーは、ミニーを背中にのせたまま空へと飛び去ってしまう。 「ミニー、すぐいくよ！」 ミッキーの新たな冒険が今、始まる！ ‥待ち受けるルルーたちをかわして、ミニーを助けに行こう。 プレイヤーはミッキーとなり、ボタンを押すだけのカンタン操作で、あるときはカッコよく、またあるときはコミカルに身をかくす！ステージ中に散らばっているエナジースターを集めて、スペシャルトリックを発動すれば、ミッキーが所せましと大活躍！ ミニーで冒険もできるよ。ミニーのかわいいアクションでミッキーを助け出そう！

locale.title: Zatch Bell! Mamodo Fury
locale.synopsis: Players join Zatch, Kiyo and other characters from the hit manga and TV series ZATCHBELL! as they battle to become the mighty mamodo king. This time, up to four players can choose from more than 20 different playable teams. With three gameplay modes including Story Mode, VS mode and Arcade Mode, players can experience all the action in environments faithful to the TV series. All voice acting is even done by the U.S. TV show cast.

game.name: Konjiki no Gashbell!! Go! Go! Mamono Fight!! (Japan) (JA)

金色のガッシュベル!! ゴー!ゴー!魔物ファイト!!
금색의 갓슈벨: 고! 고! 마물 파이트!!

game.name: Army Men: Air Combat The Elite Missions (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Army Men: Air Combat The Elite Missions
locale.synopsis: Army Men: Air Combat - The Elite Missions is a fast and furious game of toy helicopter-based combat set in the Army Men universe. It combines the trigger-twitching action of shooter-style gameplay with more strategic environment interaction via the winch mechanic. Continuing the classic struggle between the Green and Tan Armies, the heroic Captain Blade and his Alpha Wolf Squadron once again take to the skies with an onslaught of missions, incredible helicopter physics, deep gameplay, stunning cinematics and exciting character interaction. Real Combat. Plastic Men.

rom.name: Army Men: Air Combat The Elite Missions (USA) (EN).iso

locale.title: どうぶつの森 e+
locale.synopsis: 「どうぶつの森」は、架空の世界で気ままに暮らすことができるゲームです。 あなたはゲームの中の村に住んで、近所の人と話をしたり、 買い物をしたり、手紙を書いたり、好きなことができるのです。

locale.title: Animal Crossing
locale.synopsis:
Occasionally strange but completely addictive, Nintendo's Animal Crossing for the GameCube is not so much a game as a simulation of life on a small town. Players begin the game by setting out to live life on their own in a colorful town, where they are greeted by a seemingly endless supply of things to do and characters to meet.
Time passes in Animal Crossing in real-time, as the month, day, season, and time of day matches that of the player's. Holiday seasons come and go in Animal Crossing, just as they would in the real world. Experience the freedom to fish, decorate your house, go bug catching, garden, write letters, and even play original Nintendo NES games in this imaginative, and addictive game.

locale.title: Animal Forest +
locale.synopsis: Occasionally strange but completely addictive, Nintendo's Animal Crossing for the GameCube is not so much a game as a simulation of life on a small town. Players begin the game by setting out to live life on their own in a colorful town, where they are greeted by a seemingly endless supply of things to do and characters to meet. Experience the freedom to fish, decorate your house, go bug catching, garden, write letters, and even play original Nintendo NES games in this imaginative, and addictive game.

locale.title: Animal Crossing
locale.synopsis:
Animal Crossing ist kein gewöhnliches Videospiel. Du wirst darin weder auf Monster stoßen, die es zu bekämpfen gilt, noch auf zu überwindende Abgründe. Und du musst auch keine Prinzessinnen retten. Stattdessen bietet ein bezauberndes Waldgebiet dem Spieler ein einzigartiges Erlebnis. Du kannst mit zahlreichen Lebewesen Freundschaft schließen, führst ein ehrenwertes Leben, verkaufst deine Rüben oder vertreibst dir die Zeit mit Videospielen.
Es gibt Dutzende Charaktere, mit denen du interagieren kannst, und zudem eine Reihe ebenso schräger wie reizvoller Tätigkeiten, mit denen du dich bei Laune halten kannst. Vom Fischen bis zur Schatzsuche, vom Briefeschreiben an Freunde bis hin zu Reparaturen an deinem Heim. Animal Crossing macht es dir wahrlich schwer, wieder in die wirkliche Welt zurückzukehren...
In Japan und Amerika hat Animal Crossing die Herzen der Spieler im Sturm erobert. Und auch in Europa wartet die Spielergemeinde schon seit langem gespannt auf den Release dieses RPG-Simulationshits. Ein Grund dafür ist sicher die große Freiheit, die Spieler hier genießen können. Denn bei Animal Crossing geht es darum, sich seine eigene, kleine, perfekte Welt zu schaffen. Noch nie hatten Gamer ein derart großes Spielfeld, um ihre eigene Kreativität auszuleben. Animal Crossing liefert mit einer Kleinstadt voller niedlicher Einwohner die Rahmenbedingungen - was der Spieler daraus macht, bleibt ganz ihm selber überlassen. Doch auch der Multiplayer-Spaß kommt bei Animal Crossing nicht zu kurz. Bis zu 4 Spieler können ihre Häuser in der Ortschaft einrichten. Und selbstverständlich kann jeder seine ganz eigenen Beziehungen zu den Einwohnern pflegen. Ein ganz besonderes Feature bietet das Spiel allen, die einen Game Boy Advance besitzen. Denn damit kann man sogar Freunde in anderen Ortschaften besuchen. Und als besonderes Bonbon ist der GBA sozusagen das Ticket in den Urlaub, denn nur mit ihm kann man eine Insel entdecken, die ansonsten verborgen bleibt.
Besonderheiten: - Inklusive speziell präparierter Memory Card 59 - Spezielle Events an Muttertag oder Halloween durch die Synchronisation mit der internen GameCube-Uhr - Entdecke deine eigene, ganz einzigartige Welt - GBA-kompatibel. Auch unterwegs Aufgabenstellungen aus dem GameCube-Spiel lösen und mit Freunden Daten tauschen - Für bis zu 4 Spieler

locale.title: Animal Crossing
locale.synopsis:
Ocasionalmente estranho, mas completamente viciante, Animal Crossing para GameCube da Nintendo não é tanto um jogo quanto uma simulação da vida em uma pequena cidade. Os jogadores começam o jogo decidindo viver sozinhos em uma cidade colorida, onde são recebidos por um suprimento aparentemente infinito de coisas para fazer e personagens para encontrar.
O tempo passa no Animal Crossing em tempo real, conforme o mês, dia, estação e hora do dia coincidem com os do jogador. As temporadas de férias vêm e vão em Animal Crossing, assim como fariam no mundo real. Experimente a liberdade de pescar, decorar sua casa, caçar insetos, jardinar, escrever cartas e até mesmo jogar jogos Nintendo NES originais neste jogo imaginativo e viciante.

Time passes in Animal Crossing in real-time, as the month, day, season, and time of day matches that of the player's. Holiday seasons come and go in Animal Crossing, just as they would in the real world. Experience the freedom to fish, decorate your house, go bug catching, garden, write letters, and even play original Nintendo NES games in this imaginative, and addictive game.
