locale.synopsis:
Ocasionalmente estranho, mas completamente viciante, Animal Crossing para GameCube da Nintendo não é tanto um jogo quanto uma simulação da vida em uma pequena cidade. Os jogadores começam o jogo decidindo viver sozinhos em uma cidade colorida, onde são recebidos por um suprimento aparentemente infinito de coisas para fazer e personagens para encontrar.
O tempo passa no Animal Crossing em tempo real, conforme o mês, dia, estação e hora do dia coincidem com os do jogador. As temporadas de férias vêm e vão em Animal Crossing, assim como fariam no mundo real. Experimente a liberdade de pescar, decorar sua casa, caçar insetos, jardinar, escrever cartas e até mesmo jogar jogos Nintendo NES originais neste jogo imaginativo e viciante.

locale.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL
locale.synopsis: Caesar and his elite troops have pulled off the impossible! Taking advantage of a sudden spring storm and the absence of our two heroes, the Romans invaded the indomitable Gaulish village. Everybody is now Ceasar’s prisoner! The Romans have also seized a cauldron full of Magic Potion that Getafix was busy brewing. While the cauldron is on its way to Rome, the Gaulish prisoners have been split up and scattered across the provinces of the Roman Empire.

locale.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL
locale.synopsis: César e suas tropas de elite conseguiram o impossível! Aproveitando uma repentina tempestade de primavera e a ausência de nossos dois heróis, os romanos invadiram a indomável aldeia gaulesa. Todo mundo agora é prisioneiro de Ceasar! Os romanos também apreenderam um caldeirão cheio de Poção Mágica que Getafix estava preparando para preparar. Enquanto o caldeirão está a caminho de Roma, os prisioneiros gauleses foram divididos e espalhados pelas províncias do Império Romano.

locale.title: Alien Hominid
locale.synopsis: Your UFO has crash landed, and the FBI is out to get you! Time to take them out!

locale.title: Alien Hominid
locale.synopsis: Seu OVNI foi abatido e o FBI está atrás de você! É hora de eliminá-los!

locale.title: Midway Arcade Treasures
locale.synopsis: Arcade classics collection, featuring the best Midway classics for hundreds of hours of timeless entertainment. Midway Arcade Treasures includes fully emulated versions of SpyHunter, DefenderII, Gauntlet, Joust, Paperboy, Rampage, Marble Madness, Robotron: 2084, Smash TV, Joust 2, Bubbles, RoadBlasters, Blaster, Rampart, Sinistar, Super Sprint, 720°, Toobin', KLAX, SPLAT!, Satan's Hollow, Vindicators, and more. In addition to the games, the developers also included DVD Content, such as interviews with the creators and game histories. Purists will be happy to hear that games designed around multiplayer gameplay, such as Joust, Rampage, Gauntlet, and Championship Sprint, feature their two, three, or four-player modes as well.

locale.title: Midway Arcade Treasures
locale.synopsis: Coleção de clássicos de arcade, apresentando os melhores clássicos da Midway para centenas de horas de entretenimento atemporal. Midway Arcade Treasures inclui versões totalmente emuladas de SpyHunter, DefenderII, Gauntlet, Joust, Paperboy, Rampage, Marble Madness, Robotron: 2084, Smash TV, Joust 2, Bubbles, RoadBlasters, Blaster, Rampart, Sinistar, Super Sprint, 720 °, Toobin ', KLAX, SPLAT !, Satan's Hollow, Vindicators e muito mais. Além dos jogos, os desenvolvedores também incluíram Conteúdo em DVD, como entrevistas com os criadores e histórias dos jogos. Os puristas ficarão felizes em saber que os jogos desenvolvidos com base na jogabilidade multijogador, como Joust, Rampage, Gauntlet e Championship Sprint, também apresentam seus modos de dois, três ou quatro jogadores.

locale.title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
locale.synopsis: Frantic multiplayer fighting returns with Super Smash Bros. Melee on the Nintendo GameCube. More than just a minor upgrade to the popular N64 game, the GameCube Smash Bros. is chock full of so many options and features it will make your head spin. Players can pummel each other with 25 classic Nintendo characters, and fight in 18 various game-themed arenas (not to mention an assortment of unlockable secret arenas). Multiple play modes include objective based missions, Stadium Contests, side-scrolling courses, Melee mode, and Versus mode. Stunning orchestrated soundtrack includes exciting remixes of classic game themes. High polygon character models and detailed environments animate smoothly and display in progressive scan.

locale.title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
locale.synopsis: A luta multiplayer frenética está de volta com Super Smash Bros. Melee no Nintendo GameCube. Mais do que apenas uma pequena atualização para o popular jogo N64, o GameCube Smash Bros. está repleto de tantas opções e recursos que farão sua cabeça girar. Os jogadores podem bater uns nos outros com 25 personagens clássicos da Nintendo e lutar em 18 várias arenas temáticas de jogos (para não mencionar uma variedade de arenas secretas desbloqueáveis). Os vários modos de jogo incluem missões baseadas em objetivos, concursos de estádio, percursos de rolagem lateral, modo corpo-a-corpo e modo Versus. Impressionante trilha sonora orquestrada inclui remixes emocionantes de temas de jogos clássicos. Modelos de personagens de alto polígono e ambientes detalhados são animados suavemente e exibidos em varredura progressiva.

locale.title: Dairantou Smash Brothers DX
locale.synopsis: Frantic multiplayer fighting returns with Super Smash Bros. Melee on the Nintendo GameCube. More than just a minor upgrade to the popular N64 game, the GameCube Smash Bros. is chock full of so many options and features it will make your head spin. Players can pummel each other with 25 classic Nintendo characters, and fight in 18 various game-themed arenas (not to mention an assortment of unlockable secret arenas). Multiple play modes include objective based missions, Stadium Contests, side-scrolling courses, Melee mode, and Versus mode. Stunning orchestrated soundtrack includes exciting remixes of classic game themes. High polygon character models and detailed environments animate smoothly and display in progressive scan.

locale.title: 大乱闘スマッシュブラザーズDX
Super Smash Bros. Melee
locale.synopsis: Frantic multiplayer fighting returns with Super Smash Bros. Melee on the Nintendo GameCube. More than just a minor upgrade to the popular N64 game, the GameCube Smash Bros. is chock full of so many options and features it will make your head spin. Players can pummel each other with 25 classic Nintendo characters, and fight in 18 various game-themed arenas (not to mention an assortment of unlockable secret arenas). Multiple play modes include objective based missions, Stadium Contests, side-scrolling courses, Melee mode, and Versus mode. Stunning orchestrated soundtrack includes exciting remixes of classic game themes. High polygon character models and detailed environments animate smoothly and display in progressive scan.

locale.title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
locale.synopsis:
Nintendos Star-Kämpferriege ist wieder da, zusammen mit einer neuen Schar von Schlägern, die den Nintendo GameCube kräftig aufmischen wollen. Mit seiner unberechenbaren Action und den pausenlosen animierten Angriffen ist Super Smash Bros. Melee das ultimative Kampfspiel für vier Spieler.
Am meisten beeindruckt an Super Smash Bros. Melee die fantastische Optik. Marios Overall ist bis hin zu den Nieten detailliert dargestellt, und Prinzessin Peachs Kleid flattert verblüffend realistisch im Wind. Bei den Spezialangriffen wird das GameCube-Potenzial für spektakuläre Lichteffekte voll ausgenutzt, und der GameCube zeigt dir all das mit 60 Bildern pro Sekunde, ohne auch nur leicht ins Schwitzen zu kommen.
Zusätzlich zu den neuen Charakteren verfügt Super Smash Bros. Melee über ganz neue Kampfarenen, Spielmodi, Optionen und Wertetabellen. Ein aufgemotzter Einzelspieler-Modus sorgt dafür, dass auch Solo-Schläger jede Menge Spaß haben. Das grundlegende Spielprinzip von Super Smash Bros. Melee hat sich seit dem Original für Nintendo 64 nicht verändert. Die Charaktere kämpfen in interaktiven Umgebungen gegeneinander, wobei sie Spezialangriffe und verschiedene Gegenstände benutzen, um sich gegenseitig in den Abgrund zu befördern. Durch einige neue Defensivtechniken erhält der Kampf sogar noch mehr Komplexität.
Neu bei Super Smash Bros. Melee ist zum Beispiel die Fähigkeit, Angriffen und Geschossen auszuweichen. Alle Charaktere können diese Fähigkeit mitten in der Luft oder auch am Boden einsetzen. Außerdem ist es möglich, die meisten Wurfgeschosse zu fangen, indem man den A-Knopf drückt, kurz bevor der Gegenstand den eigenen Kämpfer trifft. Darüber hinaus beherrschen alle Charaktere einen Move, der Fox' Reflektorschild ähnelt; er wird eingesetzt, indem du den Schildknopf drückst, kurz bevor das Geschoss trifft.
Zusätzlich zur gewohnten Art der handfesten Auseinandersetzung gibt es neue Variationen wie den Münzenmodus (verprügle die anderen und sammle Münzen), den Turniermodus und viele viele weitere Extras zum freispielen.

locale.title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
locale.synopsis: A luta multiplayer frenética está de volta com Super Smash Bros. Melee no Nintendo GameCube. Mais do que apenas uma pequena atualização para o popular jogo N64, o GameCube Smash Bros. está repleto de tantas opções e recursos que farão sua cabeça girar. Os jogadores podem bater uns nos outros com 25 personagens clássicos da Nintendo e lutar em 18 várias arenas temáticas de jogos (para não mencionar uma variedade de arenas secretas desbloqueáveis). Os vários modos de jogo incluem missões baseadas em objetivos, concursos de estádio, percursos de rolagem lateral, modo corpo-a-corpo e modo Versus. Impressionante trilha sonora orquestrada inclui remixes emocionantes de temas de jogos clássicos. Modelos de personagens de alto polígono e ambientes detalhados são animados suavemente e exibidos em varredura progressiva.

locale.title: Army Men Sarge's War
locale.synopsis: Global Star Software, who picked up the license to the popular ARMY MEN series from 3DO, brings fans of the little plastic soldiers ARMY MEN: Sarge's War for the Gamecube. Following the character of Sarge, a war-scarred veteran, gamers must stop a renegade sect of the Tan Army before they can derail the signing of a peace treaty between the Green and Tan armies. A third-person perspective shooter game, Sarge's War is an easy game to pick up but a difficult one to master. The levels get progressively harder, with Sarge facing waves of enemies at a time. Fortunately, the game has a target lock feature, so Sarge can pick off his enemies one at a time. Some levels require Sarge to destroy walls, fences, or enemy artillery, and in other levels, he takes command of turret gun to wreak some major damage. In addition to the single-player campaign, ARMY MEN: Sarge's War contains several multiplayer modes, including death match, capture the flag, and team advance. Fans of the ARMY MEN series will be glad to see it continued with ARMY MEN: Sarge's War. Players who have fond memories of waging war with the little plastic army men or enjoy third-person shooters will also find Sarge's War a fun, entertaining game to pick up.

locale.title: Army Men Sarge's War
locale.synopsis: A Global Star Software, que obteve a licença da popular série ARMY MEN da 3DO, traz fãs dos pequenos soldados de plástico ARMY MEN: Sarge's War para o GameCube. Seguindo o personagem de Sarge, um veterano com cicatrizes de guerra, os jogadores devem parar uma seita renegada do Exército Tan antes que eles possam inviabilizar a assinatura de um tratado de paz entre os exércitos Green e Tan. Um jogo de tiro em terceira pessoa, Sarge's War é fácil de aprender, mas difícil de dominar. Os níveis ficam cada vez mais difíceis, com Sarge enfrentando ondas de inimigos ao mesmo tempo. Felizmente, o jogo tem um recurso de bloqueio de alvo, então Sarge pode matar seus inimigos um de cada vez. Alguns níveis exigem que Sarge destrua paredes, cercas ou artilharia inimiga e, em outros níveis, ele assume o comando da arma da torre para causar grandes danos. Além da campanha para um jogador, ARMY MEN: Sarge's War contém vários modos multijogador, incluindo jogo mortal, captura da bandeira e avanço da equipe. Os fãs da série ARMY MEN ficarão felizes em ver a continuação com ARMY MEN: Sarge's War. Os jogadores que têm boas lembranças de travar uma guerra com os pequenos homens do exército de plástico ou gostam de jogos de tiro em terceira pessoa também acharão Sarge's War um jogo divertido e interessante de aprender.

locale.title: Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt
locale.synopsis: Based on the multiple Emmy Award-winning animated series from Warner Bros. Animation and Amblin Entertainment, and featuring the actual voice actors from the series. Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt is a third-person action adventure, which brings the colourful and hysterical world of the Animaniacs wonderfully to life. Players must guide the Warner brothers - and the Warner sister - through six levels in a quest to locate the hidden Edgar trophies. Wakko, Yakko and Dot each have their own special abilities, and each must be used in order to fully explore the luscious landscapes. Five 'Pinky & The Brain mini-games vary the pace of the adventure, as they explore the huge Animaniacs world, which is populated with dozens of characters from the cartoon.

locale.title: Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt
locale.synopsis: Baseado na série de animação ganhadora de vários Emmy da Warner Bros. Animation e Amblin Entertainment, e apresentando os verdadeiros dubladores da série. Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt é uma aventura de ação em terceira pessoa, que traz o mundo colorido e histérico dos Animaníacos maravilhosamente à vida. Os jogadores devem guiar os irmãos Warner - e a irmã Warner - por seis níveis em uma missão para localizar os troféus Edgar escondidos. Wakko, Yakko e Dot, cada um tem suas próprias habilidades especiais, e cada um deve ser usado para explorar totalmente as paisagens exuberantes. Os mini-jogos Five 'Pinky & The Brain variam o ritmo da aventura, à medida que exploram o enorme mundo Animaniacs, que é habitado por dezenas de personagens do desenho animado.

locale.title: Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt
locale.synopsis: Based on the multiple Emmy Award-winning animated series from Warner Bros. Animation and Amblin Entertainment, and featuring the actual voice actors from the series. locale.title: American Chopper 2 - Full Throttle
locale.synopsis: A motorcycle enthusiast's game based on Discovery Channel's hit TV series. Gamers take on the role of Paul Sr., Paulie, Mikey or Vinnie and are challenged to build four choppers for an upcoming motorcycle competition. All the while, gamers must compete in family battles, races and other biker challenges in order to earn bike parts and the respect of Paul Sr. Players test their custom creations at the final showdown.

locale.title: American Chopper 2 - Full Throttle
locale.synopsis: Um jogo para entusiastas de motocicletas baseado na série de TV de sucesso do Discovery Channel. Os jogadores assumem o papel de Paul Sr., Paulie, Mikey ou Vinnie e são desafiados a construir quatro choppers para uma competição de motocicletas que se aproxima. Ao mesmo tempo, os jogadores devem competir em batalhas familiares, corridas e outros desafios de motociclistas para ganhar peças de bicicleta e o respeito de Paul Sr.. Os jogadores testam suas criações personalizadas no confronto final.

locale.title: Aquaman: Battle of Atlantis
locale.synopsis:
Rumbles of revolt star amongst the populace. Old enemies resurface, umted in one goal: the complete destruction and ruin of Atlantis and Aquaman. Take control of the legendary hero Aquaman with all his powers and skills. Warrios; general and guardian of Atlantis - you are Aquaman. the hero!
•21 levels, including 4 submarine attack levels. •Fight over 11 enemy types in bruising three dimensional, underwater battles •Control Aquaman's cybernetic morphing hook-hand and telephatic powers. •Pilot an attack sub in first-person mode as you defend Atlantis. •Unlock and play as Classic Aquaman, Tempest or the arch-villain, Black Manta.

locale.title: Aquaman: Battle of Atlantis
locale.synopsis:
Estrondos de revolta estrela entre a população. Antigos inimigos ressurgem, direcionados a um objetivo: a destruição completa e a ruína de Atlantis e Aquaman. Assuma o controle do lendário herói Aquaman com todos os seus poderes e habilidades. Guerreiros; general e guardião da Atlântida - você é Aquaman. o herói!
• 21 níveis, incluindo 4 níveis de ataque submarino. • Lute contra 11 tipos de inimigos em batalhas subaquáticas tridimensionais devastadoras • Controle os poderes cibernéticos de mão em gancho e telepáticos de Aquaman. • Pilote um submarino de ataque no modo de primeira pessoa enquanto defende Atlantis. • Desbloqueie e jogue como Classic Aquaman, Tempest ou o arqui-vilão, Black Manta.

locale.title: Army Men: RTS
locale.synopsis: 3DO's famous green plastic soldiers move into the realm of real-time strategy in Army Men RTS. On a mission to defeat a colonel who has defected to the enemy, you command a number of units including infantry and several types of vehicles. Guide your elite corps of plastic troops across toy-proportioned battlefields such as a house's front yard, living room, and attic. Collect plastic and electricity resources to build structures and additional units. Use your radio call unit to bring death from above in the form of paratroopers or the dreaded magnifying glass which melts enemy forces.

locale.title: Army Men: RTS
locale.synopsis: Os famosos soldados de plástico verde da 3DO entram no reino da estratégia em tempo real em Army Men RTS. Em uma missão para derrotar um coronel que desertou para o inimigo, você comanda uma série de unidades, incluindo infantaria e vários tipos de veículos. Guie seu corpo de elite de tropas de plástico em campos de batalha com proporções de brinquedo, como o jardim da frente de uma casa, sala de estar e sótão. Colete recursos de plástico e eletricidade para construir estruturas e unidades adicionais. Use sua unidade de chamada de rádio para trazer a morte de cima na forma de paraquedistas ou a temida lupa que derrete as forças inimigas.

locale.title: ソニックアドベンチャー デラックス
ATV Quad Power Racing 2
locale.synopsis: ATV: Quad Power Racing 2 is all about big tricks, big boots to the face and big finishes. It's arcade ATV racing. ATV Quad Power Racing 2 combines 10 of the top pro riders in the world and 40+ real-life sponsors with fast, edge of your seat, arcade gameplay. Game features include 10 of the top professional riders from all over the world including Dana Creech, Kory Ellis, Tim Farr and others plus 10 stylized characters; 15 massive tracks in 5 different globe-spanning environments plus two freestyle arenas; kick attacks that teach your competitors not to even think about passing you; over-the-top control system and physics model give you the power pull huge air and ridiculous power slides; 20+ freestyle tricks; and real-life sponsors.

locale.title: ATV Quad Power Racing 2
locale.synopsis: ATV: Quad Power Racing 2 tem tudo a ver com grandes truques, grandes botas no rosto e grandes acabamentos. É uma corrida de ATV de fliperama. ATV Quad Power Racing 2 combina 10 dos melhores pilotos profissionais do mundo e mais de 40 patrocinadores da vida real com uma jogabilidade arcade rápida e inabalável. As características do jogo incluem 10 dos melhores pilotos profissionais de todo o mundo, incluindo Dana Creech, Kory Ellis, Tim Farr e outros, além de 10 personagens estilizados; 15 pistas massivas em 5 ambientes diferentes em todo o globo, mais duas arenas de estilo livre; ataques de chute que ensinam seus concorrentes a nem pensar em ultrapassá-lo; sistema de controle over-the-top e modelo de física fornecem a você o poder de puxar o ar enorme e deslizamentos de energia ridículos; Mais de 20 truques de estilo livre; e patrocinadores da vida real.

locale.title: ATV Quad Power Racing 2
locale.synopsis: ATV: Quad Power Racing 2 is all about big tricks, big boots to the face and big finishes. It's arcade ATV racing. ATV Quad Power Racing 2 combines 10 of the top pro riders in the world and 40+ real-life sponsors with fast, edge of your seat, arcade gameplay. Game features include 10 of the top professional riders from all over the world including Dana Creech, Kory Ellis, Tim Farr and others plus 10 stylized characters; 15 massive tracks in 5 different globe-spanning environments plus two freestyle arenas; kick attacks that teach your competitors not to even think about passing you; over-the-top control system and physics model give you the power pull huge air and ridiculous power slides; 20+ freestyle tricks; and real-life sponsors.

locale.title: Auto Modellista
locale.synopsis: Faithful port of Capcom's cel-shaded PlayStation 2 racer, sans online support. The game features nine tracks in all, eight normal and one hidden, and 69 real-world, licensed vehicles -- presented anime-style thanks to the toon-shading technique. Players can choose from arcade mode, a standard enter and race scenario, garage life, which is the career mode of the game, and VJ and Theater, an arena enabling players to watch, edit and direct race replays of their choice. Cars can be fully customized down to the tires, brakes, suspension, turbine kits, mufflers, transmissions and more with hundreds of parts to choose from. Supports two-player split-screen racing.

locale.title: Auto Modellista
locale.synopsis: Versão fiel do piloto de PlayStation 2 com sombreamento de células da Capcom, sem suporte online. O jogo apresenta nove pistas ao todo, oito normais e uma oculta, e 69 veículos licenciados do mundo real - apresentados no estilo anime graças à técnica toon-shading. Os jogadores podem escolher entre o modo arcade, um cenário de entrada e corrida padrão, vida de garagem, que é o modo de carreira do jogo, e VJ e Teatro, uma arena que permite aos jogadores assistir, editar e dirigir replays de corrida de sua escolha. Os carros podem ser totalmente personalizados, incluindo pneus, freios, suspensão, kits de turbinas, silenciadores, transmissões e muito mais, com centenas de peças à sua escolha. Suporta corridas em tela dividida para dois jogadores.

locale.title: Auto Modellista: U.S.-tuned
locale.synopsis: Faithful port of Capcom's cel-shaded PlayStation 2 racer, sans online support. The game features nine tracks in all, eight normal and one hidden, and 69 real-world, licensed vehicles -- presented anime-style thanks to the toon-shading technique. Suporta corridas em tela dividida para dois jogadores.

locale.title: アウトモデリスタ U.S.-tuned
locale.synopsis: カプコンのセルのシェードプレイステーション2レーサー、サンセリフを買うの忠実なポート をサポートします。ゲームは全部で9曲を収録、8通常、1つ隠れて、 69実世界では、ライセンス車両 - にアニメ風のおかげで提示 漫画-シェーディング技術。プレイヤーは、アーケードモードでは、標準入力から選択できます。 とレースのシナリオでは、ゲームのキャリアモードですガレージの生活、そしてVJを と劇場は、舞台見て選手を有効にすると、直接レースのリプレイ編集 自分の好きな。車は完全にタイヤ、ブレーキには、ダウンカスタマイズすることができます 懸濁液、タービンキット、マフラー、トランスミッション、何百もの、より 部品の中から選択します。サポートの2つのプレーヤー分割スクリーンレース。

locale.title: Avatar The Last Airbender
locale.synopsis: Based on Nickelodeon's show, fans will play as Aang, Katara, Sokka and Haru as they grow into an unstoppable team utilizing the kung fu-inspired bending arts through the Avatar universe. Players will explore the four Avatar nations and battle new enemies.

locale.title: Avatar The Last Airbender
locale.synopsis: Baseado no show da Nickelodeon, os fãs jogarão como Aang, Katara, Sokka e Haru enquanto eles crescem em um time imparável utilizando as artes de dobra inspiradas no kung fu através do universo Avatar. Os jogadores irão explorar as quatro nações Avatar e lutar contra novos inimigos.

locale.title: Avatar: The Legend of Aang
locale.synopsis: Based on Nickelodeon's show, fans will play as Aang, Katara, Sokka and Haru as they grow into an unstoppable team utilizing the kung fu-inspired bending arts through the Avatar universe. Players will explore the four Avatar nations and battle new enemies.

locale.title: Avatar : Le Dernier Maître de l'Air
Avatar: The Legend of Aang
locale.synopsis: Baseado no show da Nickelodeon, os fãs jogarão como Aang, Katara, Sokka e Haru enquanto eles crescem em um time imparável utilizando as artes de dobra inspiradas no kung fu através do universo Avatar. Os jogadores irão explorar as quatro nações Avatar e lutar contra novos inimigos.

locale.title: The Ant Bully
locale.synopsis: Go pick on someone your own size! After bullying an innocent ant colony, a young boy named Lucas is magically shrunk down to ant size and embarks on a remarkable adventure. Play as Lucas, experiencing the dangerous and thrilling life of an ant as you battle, explore and forge new friendships with natives and other species in his new ant world. Help Lucas evolve from recluse to hero in his quest to save the colony from extermination. Based on the exciting moments from Warner Bros CG animated movie directed by John A. Davis (of the Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius series.)

locale.title: Lucas: Um Intruso no Formigueiro
locale.synopsis: Escolha alguém do seu tamanho! Depois de intimidar uma colônia de formigas inocentes, um menino chamado Lucas é magicamente reduzido ao tamanho de uma formiga e embarca em uma aventura notável. Jogue como Lucas, experimentando a vida perigosa e emocionante de uma formiga enquanto você luta, explore e forje novas amizades com nativos e outras espécies em seu novo mundo de formigas. Ajude Lucas a evoluir de recluso a herói em sua busca para salvar a colônia do extermínio. Baseado nos momentos emocionantes do filme animado em CG da Warner Bros dirigido por John A. Davis (da série Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius.)

locale.title: Midway Arcade Treasures 2
locale.synopsis: Arcade classics collection, featuring the best Midway classics for hundreds of hours of timeless entertainment. The second edition of the series includes fully emulated versions of A.P.B., Arch Rivals, Championship Sprint, Cyberball 2072, Gauntlet 2, Hard Drivin’, Mortal Kombat, Mortal Kombat II, Mortal Kombat III, NARC, Pit Fighter, Primal Rage, Rampage World Tour, Spy Hunter 2, Steel Talons, STUN Runner, Timber, Total Carnage, Wizard of Wor, Xenophobe, and Xybots. In addition to the games, the developers also included as part of the DVD content, such as interviews with the creators and game histories. Purists will be happy to hear that games designed around multiplayer gameplay feature their multi-player modes as well.

locale.title: Midway Arcade Treasures 2
locale.synopsis: Coleção de clássicos de arcade, apresentando os melhores clássicos da Midway para centenas de horas de entretenimento atemporal. A segunda edição da série inclui versões totalmente emuladas de APB, Arch Rivals, Championship Sprint, Cyberball 2072, Gauntlet 2, Hard Drivin', Mortal Kombat, Mortal Kombat II, Mortal Kombat III, NARC, Pit Fighter, Primal Rage, Rampage World Tour, Spy Hunter 2, Steel Talons, STUN Runner, Timber, Total Carnage, Wizard of Wor, Xenophobe e Xybots. Além dos jogos, os desenvolvedores também incluíram como parte do conteúdo do DVD, entrevistas com os criadores e histórias dos jogos. Os puristas ficarão felizes em saber que os jogos desenvolvidos com base na jogabilidade multijogador também apresentam seus modos multijogador.

game.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
locale.synopsis: The Dementors are coming, and this time Harry needs his friends. From the opening scene on the Hogwarts Express to the climatic finale on the shore of the great lake at Hogwarts, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban immerses you in the world of Harry Potter. As Harry, Ron, and Hermione, you'll face the dreaded Azkaban guards, fly the Hippogriff around towers, and explore Hogwarts with the Marauder's Map. Learn spells that allow you to freeze creatures, control dragons, and conjure a Patronus. New two-player minigames include Flying Seahorse Fishing and Dueling Club minigames.

locale.title: Harry Potter und der Gefangene von Askaban
Harry Potter e o Prisoneiro de Azkaban
locale.synopsis: Os dementadores estão chegando, e desta vez Harry precisa de seus amigos. Desde a cena de abertura no Expresso de Hogwarts até o final climático na margem do grande lago em Hogwarts, Harry Potter e o Prisioneiro de Azkaban mergulha você no mundo de Harry Potter. Como Harry, Ron e Hermione, você enfrentará os temidos guardas de Azkaban, fará o hipógrifo voar ao redor das torres e explorar Hogwarts com o Mapa do Maroto. Aprenda feitiços que permitem congelar criaturas, controlar dragões e conjurar um Patrono. Os novos minijogos para dois jogadores incluem os minijogos Flying Seahorse Fishing e Dueling Club.

rom.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (Europe) (DE) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: ハリー・ポッターとアズカバンの囚人
locale.synopsis:
「ハリー・ポッター」シリーズ第3巻「ハリー・ポッターとアズカバンの囚人」とその劇場版に基づいたストーリーを楽しむことができるアクションアドベンチャー『ハリー・ポッターとアズカバンの囚人』。 本作では、主人公のハリー・ポッターだけでなく、親友の「ロン・ウィーズリー」と「ハーマイオニー・グレンジャー」を操作することができるように。ハリー、ロン、ハーマイオニーを場面場面で操作できる人物が変わり、それぞれの特徴を活かして謎を解いていきます。 また、「有名な魔女と魔法使いのカード」や「獣と生物のカード」を探して集めたり、学校内の他の生徒とミニゲームを楽しんだりと、本編以外でも色々と楽しむことができます。 さらにGBAケーブルを使用してゲームボーイアドバンス版『ハリー・ポッターとアズカバンの囚人』と接続することで、ミニゲームをゲームボーイアドバンスにダウンロードして遊ぶことができます。
■ ３人を操作！ ハリー、ロン、ハーマイオニーの3人で困難に立ち向かいます。場面によってハリー、ロン、ハーマイオニーの誰かを操作して様々な困難や謎に挑みます。 ■ 新しい魔法 敵を固めたり、ドラゴンの炎を操ったりといった新しい魔法が多数登場します。もちろん、今まで登場したあの魔法も使うことができます。 ■ 固有のアイテム ３人にはそれぞれ固有のアイテムがあり、それを使いこなして敵と戦ったり、謎を解いていきます。 ■ ヒッポグリフに搭乗できる！ 鷲と馬が半分半分となった生き物ヒッポグリフ。そのヒッポグリフに乗って空を飛び回ることができます。 ■ 忍びの地図 第3巻にも登場した魔法の地図「忍びの地図」を使ってホグワーツを探索していきます。 ■ ロード時間の短縮 従来のハリー・ポッタータイトルと比べ、ロードの頻度と時間が短縮されています。 ■ ミニゲームのダウンロード ホグワーツ内にある「フレッドとジョージの店」でミニゲームを購入し、ゲームボーイアドバンス版『ハリー・ポッターとアズカバンの囚人』と接続することで、そのミニゲームをゲームボーイアドバンスにダウンロードして遊ぶことができます。

locale.synopsis: Volte para Bomberman Land, o maior parque temático de todos os tempos, enfrente as atrações e torne-se o Piece King!

locale.title: ボンバーマンランド2 ゲーム史上最大のテーマパーク
locale.synopsis: ボンバーマンランド内にあるたくさんのアトラクションをクリアして、ピースキングを目指そう！

locale.title: 봄버맨 랜드 2 - 게임 사상 최대 규모의 테마파크
BMX XXX
locale.synopsis: The first action sports video game designed specifically for audiences over the age of 17, this adults-oriented break in Acclaim's BMX series BMX XXX is one of the most talked about titles for the 2002 holiday season. Combining outrageous Hollywood humor and characters, beautiful women from New York's famous Scores club, incredible arcade action and a dynamic soundtrack from today's top recording artists, BMX XXX goes where no other game has gone. The game also features 2,000 tricks, Create-A-Rider/Park modes, 8 levels, 50 sponsors and new bike add-ons.

locale.title: BMX XXX
locale.synopsis: O primeiro videogame de esportes de ação projetado especificamente para o público com mais de 18 anos, esta pausa voltada para adultos na série BMX XXX da Acclaim, é um dos títulos mais comentados para a temporada de férias de 2002. Combinando humor e personagens ultrajantes de Hollywood, belas mulheres do famoso clube Scores de Nova York, incrível ação de arcade e uma trilha sonora dinâmica dos melhores artistas da atualidade, BMX XXX vai aonde nenhum outro jogo jamais foi. O jogo também apresenta 2.000 truques, modos Create-A-Rider / Park, 8 níveis, 50 patrocinadores e novos complementos de bicicleta.

locale.title: BMX XXX
locale.synopsis: The first action sports video game designed specifically for audiences over the age of 17, this adults-oriented break in Acclaim's BMX series BMX XXX is one of the most talked about titles for the 2002 holiday season. locale.title: Burnout 2: Point of Impact
locale.synopsis: Burnout 2: Point of Impact builds upon this strong speed-driven franchise with improved gameplay, new game options and bigger, better and more insane crashes. Players can test their nerves and skills by taking to the air, sliding through corners, and swerving to avoid head-on collisions, while filling their meter to unleash a burst of speed previously exclusive to airplanes. In addition to an offensive driving 101, Burnout 2 features a four-player crash mode, six different locations with 30 stages, realistic weather effects, and 14 cars (plus hidden ones). The GameCube release improves over the PlayStation 2 original with 15 additional crash junctions. Supports DPL2 and 480p.

locale.title: Burnout 2: Ponto de Impacto
locale.synopsis: Burnout 2: Ponto de Impacto baseia-se nesta franquia de alta velocidade com jogabilidade aprimorada, novas opções de jogo e batidas maiores, melhores e mais insanos. Os jogadores podem testar seus nervos e habilidades voando pelo ar, deslizando pelos cantos e desviando para evitar colisões frontais, enquanto abastecem seu medidor para liberar uma explosão de velocidade antes exclusiva dos aviões. Além de uma direção ofensiva 101, Burnout 2 apresenta um modo de colisão para quatro jogadores, seis locais diferentes com 30 fases, efeitos climáticos realistas e 14 carros (mais os ocultos). O lançamento do GameCube melhora em relação ao PlayStation 2 original com 15 junções de batidas adicionais. Suporta DPL2 e 480p.

locale.title: Burnout 2: Point of Impact
locale.synopsis: Burnout 2: Point of Impact builds upon this strong speed-driven franchise with improved gameplay, new game options and bigger, better and more insane crashes. Players can test their nerves and skills by taking to the air, sliding through corners, and swerving to avoid head-on collisions, while filling their meter to unleash a burst of speed previously exclusive to airplanes. In addition to an offensive driving 101, Burnout 2 features a four-player crash mode, six different locations with 30 stages, realistic weather effects, and 14 cars (plus hidden ones). The GameCube release improves over the PlayStation 2 original with 15 additional crash junctions. Supports DPL2 and 480p.

locale.title: Burnout 2: Point of Impact
locale.synopsis:
Du denkst, du kennst dich aus mit Burnout? Falsch gedacht!
Erlebe die gnadenlose Rivalität in Straßenverkehr mit Burnout 2. Noch explosivere Crashes, mehr Autos, mehr Strecken, bessere Grafik, nagelneue Spielmodi und was keiner für möglich hielt... das Ganze ist noch schneller als je zuvor! Ob alleine oder zu zweit im Splitscreen Modus, das Adrenalin fließt hier in Strömen.
Liefere dir heiße Verfolgungsjagden im PURSUIT MODUS oder übertrumpfe deinen Freund im CRASH FOR CASH MODUS, mit den wahnsinnigsten Unfällen, die es je in einem Rennspiel gegeben hat.
FEATURES:
* 32 Rennkurse quer durch die USA
* Spektakuläre Unfälle
* Crash Modus
* Heiße Verfolgungsjagden auch im Multiplayer-Modus

locale.title: Burnout 2: Ponto de Impacto
locale.synopsis: Burnout 2: Ponto de Impacto baseia-se nesta franquia de alta velocidade com jogabilidade aprimorada, novas opções de jogo e batidas maiores, melhores e mais insanos. Os jogadores podem testar seus nervos e habilidades voando pelo ar, deslizando pelos cantos e desviando para evitar colisões frontais, enquanto abastecem seu medidor para liberar uma explosão de velocidade antes exclusiva dos aviões. Além de uma direção ofensiva 101, Burnout 2 apresenta um modo de colisão para quatro jogadores, seis locais diferentes com 30 fases, efeitos climáticos realistas e 14 carros (mais os ocultos). O lançamento do GameCube melhora em relação ao PlayStation 2 original com 15 junções de batidas adicionais. Suporta DPL2 e 480p.

locale.title: NBA 2K2
locale.synopsis: Can you say Dynasty? After two years of roundball domination on Dreamcast, Sega Sports unleashes its award-winning NBA franchise on the next-generation basketball court with Sega Sports NBA 2K2. Building upon a foundation of vibrant graphics and crisp, detailed player animation, Sega Sports NBA 2K2 talks the talk and walks the walk! High Pick and Roll? We got it! Killer Crossover? It's in there! The Big Man's game? You betcha! On offense, use the versatile low post game to drop step around your defender and explode past him for a posterizing dunk, back him down into the key and pull up for a sweet hook, or lull him to sleep and pass to the open man. Tight AI defenders take away the baseline, deftly rotate to the open man, and establish rebounding position in the paint.

locale.title: NBA 2K2
locale.synopsis: Você pode dizer Dinastia? Após dois anos de domínio do roundball no Dreamcast, a Sega Sports lança sua premiada franquia da NBA na quadra de basquete de próxima geração com a Sega Sports NBA 2K2. Construído sobre uma base de gráficos vibrantes e animações de jogador nítidas e detalhadas, Sega Sports NBA 2K2 fala o que falar e anda! High Pick and Roll? Conseguimos! Crossover assassino? Está aí! O jogo do Big Man? Pode apostar! No ataque, use o versátil jogo de pós-baixa para desviar de seu defensor e explodir por ele para uma enterrada de posterização, apoie-o na chave e puxe para cima para um gancho doce ou acalme-o para dormir e passe para o homem aberto. Defensores de IA rígidos tiram a linha de base, giram habilmente para o homem aberto e estabelecem a posição de rebote na pintura.

locale.title: BloodRayne
locale.synopsis: As the vampiric agent BloodRayne, you'll travel through the eerie swamps of Louisiana, to Argentina and Germany in this battle-heavy, third-person thriller. The game features non-linear gameplay in more than 40 levels and three massive worlds, the ability to suck blood for health, and to use slow-motion, zoom and aura visions to aid in death dealing. Pull off fantastic acrobatic moves to bend the environment to your will and dispatch enemies with BloodRayne's blades and kicks for awesome in-your-face combat. BloodRayne can use and carry any weapon her enemy uses including guns, explosives and rocket launchers -- all in all there are more than 40 weapons in game. Fill the Bloodlust meter to activate Blood Rage for damaging over-the-top attacks to defeat Nazis, mutants, swamp creatures, ancient parasitic monsters and blood-sucking beasts.

locale.title: BloodRayne
locale.synopsis: Como a agente vampírica BloodRayne, você viajará pelos pântanos misteriosos da Louisiana, para a Argentina e a Alemanha neste thriller em terceira pessoa com muitas batalhas. O jogo apresenta jogabilidade não linear em mais de 40 níveis e três mundos enormes, a capacidade de sugar sangue e usar câmera lenta, zoom e visões de aura para ajudar na execução. Realize movimentos acrobáticos fantásticos para dobrar o ambiente à sua vontade e despachar inimigos com as lâminas e chutes de BloodRayne para um combate frontal incrível. BloodRayne pode usar e carregar qualquer arma que seu inimigo use, incluindo revólveres, explosivos e lançadores de foguetes - ao todo, há mais de 40 armas no jogo. Encha o medidor de Bloodlust para ativar a Blood Rage e causar danos de ataques over-the-top para derrotar nazistas, mutantes, criaturas do pântano, antigos monstros parasitas e bestas sugadoras de sangue.

locale.title: BloodRayne
locale.synopsis: As the vampiric agent BloodRayne, you'll travel through the eerie swamps of Louisiana, to Argentina and Germany in this battle-heavy, third-person thriller. The game features non-linear gameplay in more than 40 levels and three massive worlds, the ability to suck blood for health, and to use slow-motion, zoom and aura visions to aid in death dealing. locale.title: BloodRayne
locale.synopsis: Une héroïne sexy buveuse de sang, oui ça existe ! Dans BloodRayne, un jeu d'action sur Gamecube, incarnez cette femme fatale mi-humaine mi-vampire dans un univers fantaisiste se déroulant durant l'entre-deux guerres. Les Nazis projettent de dominer le monde à l'aide de forces surnaturelles, mais cela n'est pas du goût de l'agent BloodRayne. Affrontez l'ennemie dans la peau de la vampire en n'oubliant pas de satisfaire sa soif de sang humain.

locale.title: Backyard Football
locale.synopsis: All 32 National Football League teams; 10 PRO players as kids or 30 Backyard Kids; Play Single Games or a whole season; Create and save custom players; Track player and team stats in Season play; Cool 3D environments and multiple camera angles;

locale.title: Bomberman Generation
locale.synopsis: Bomberman Generation, the next game in the series, will feature fully cel-shaded graphics similiar to Bomberman Online. Players will explore a huge 3D land, solving puzzles and fighting enormous boss foes. Using power-ups and bombs Bomberman will have to battle through 5 different worlds, holding 16 levels each.

Players will explore a huge 3D land, solving puzzles and fighting enormous boss foes. Using power-ups and bombs Bomberman will have to battle through 5 different worlds, holding 16 levels each.

Bomberman Generation

locale.title: Bomberman Generation
locale.synopsis:
Bomberman feiert sein explosives Debüt auf dem Nintendo Gamecube!
Mujoe und seine Bande wenden mal wieder ihre alten Tricks an. Diesmal sind sie hinter den Bomben-Elementen her, mit deren Hilfe sie die Welt-Herrschaft übernehmen könnten.
Aber keine Angst! Bomberman kümmert sich darum!
Features:
- 6 Welten mit mächtigen Bossen!
- Herausfordernde Mini-Games!
- Bis zu 4 Spieler!
- Ein brandneues 3D-Abenteuer!
- Klassischer Multiplayer-Spaß!

locale.title: Mystic Heroes
locale.synopsis: In Mystic Heroes, it's up to you to find hidden Runes that will help you defeat an enemy army. As one of four main characters, you'll battle through Mt. Hoshin, Mt. Senkai, and The City of the Ancients. In each stage, you must equip your Runes strategically in order to defeat powerful enemies and bosses. The more Runes you gather, the more spells you unlock and levels you advance. There are 70 total Runes hidden throughout the single-player missions and multiplayer modes.

locale.title: バトル封神
locale.synopsis:
中国古代、周の国を震撼させた「受王の乱」から二年が経ち、仙界の力は無くなり、人々は平和な暮らしを取り戻しつつあった。
そんなある日、「周建国の戦い」で封神されたはずの「紂王」「妲己」「聞仲」「悪来」の４人が、封神台から逃げ出した。「紂王」が祖先の呪文を使って「聖龍」を呼び出し、その力の源である「龍玉」を奪ったのだ。
「龍玉」の力で死者や怪物を蘇らせた紂王は、大軍を率いて周王朝に復讐をたくらむ。紂王の動きを知った「子牙」「麗蘭」「太公望」「ナタ」の４人は「元始天尊」の命を受け、紂王に敢然と立ち向かった。
迫りくる死者の大軍、そして巨大な怪物。果たして４人は平和を取り戻すことができるのか……。

locale.title: Mystic Heroes
locale.synopsis: In Mystic Heroes, it's up to you to find hidden Runes that will help you defeat an enemy army. As one of four main characters, you'll battle through Mt. Hoshin, Mt. The more Runes you gather, the more spells you unlock and levels you advance. There are 70 total Runes hidden throughout the single-player missions and multiplayer modes.

locale.title: Resident Evil
locale.synopsis: Raccoon City has been completely overrun by mutant beasts and bloodthirsty zombies. You are a member of S.T.A.R.S.--a rescue squad sent into the community to investigate the ominous mansion at the core of the disaster. Take the role of operative Jill Valentine or Chris Redfield and uncover the secrets behind a radical, genetic research facility. With an array of weapons to master and horrors around every corner, the ultimate test may be just to make it out alive.

locale.title: Biohazard
locale.synopsis: Raccoon City has been completely overrun by mutant beasts and bloodthirsty zombies. You are a member of S.T.A.R.S.--a rescue squad sent into the community to investigate the ominous mansion at the core of the disaster. With an array of weapons to master and horrors around every corner, the ultimate test may be just to make it out alive.

locale.title: Backyard Baseball
locale.synopsis: Major League Baseball pros join the Backyard Kids. Now, for the first time on the Sony PlayStation 2 computer entertainment system, young baseball fans can pick Alex Rodriguez, Alfonso Soriano and 14 other stars, all playing as kids. Choose lineups, team logos, and awesome fields and control every pitch. With outrageous power-ups and surprises, kids can smash homeruns, throw clutch strikeouts and have a one-of-a-kind Backyard Sports experience. Features include all 30 MLB team logos, customizable players, quick, single games and Season Play mode, Home Run Derby mini-game, full stats and standings in Season Play, multiple camera views and instant replay, unlockable fields and special players, tutorial mode, baseball darts and other mini-games.

locale.title: Bloody Roar: Primal Fury
locale.synopsis: Primal Fury, called Bloody Roar Extreme in Japan, is a traditional 3D polygonal fighter that boasts a brawling style similar to that of Fighting Vipers. The twist is that each of the game's 16 characters can transform from human to beast shape and take on new fighting abilities. Bloody Roar: Primal Fury comes as an updated port to the PlayStation 2 released Bloody Roar 3, and is differentiated by enhanced, more detailed graphics, more rounded character models and a better framerate, among other additions. Developed by Eighting, the game is rated "T" for Teen by the ESRB.

locale.title: Bloody Roar: Primal Fury

Developed by Eighting, the game is rated "T" for Teen by the ESRB.

locale.title: Batman: Dark Tomorrow
locale.synopsis: The storyline begins with the disappearance of Gotham City Police Commissioner James Gordon and the lockdown of Arkum Asylum. As Batman, players will have to infiltrate Arkum Asylum to find Gordon and uncover clues that reveal a bigger plot involving a criminal mastermind. Batman: Dark Tomorrow is a third-person action adventure game in which players will have to use a number Batman's skills in order to progress through the game. To aid him, Batman will also have access to plenty of traditional Bat-gadgets. The game will take place in a variety of locations in Gotham City, including Arkum Asylum, the docks, the sewer system, an abandoned steel factory, and Gazette Square.

locale.title: Batman: Dark Tomorrow
locale.synopsis: A história começa com o desaparecimento do Comissário da Polícia de Gotham City, James Gordon, e o bloqueio do Asilo Arkum. Como Batman, os jogadores terão que se infiltrar em Arkum Asylum para encontrar Gordon e descobrir pistas que revelam uma trama maior envolvendo um gênio do crime. Batman: Dark Tomorrow é um jogo de ação e aventura em terceira pessoa no qual os jogadores terão que usar várias habilidades do Batman para progredir no jogo. Para ajudá-lo, Batman também terá acesso a muitos dispositivos tradicionais de morcegos. O jogo acontecerá em uma variedade de locais em Gotham City, incluindo Arkum Asylum, as docas, o sistema de esgoto, uma fábrica de aço abandonada e Gazette Square.

locale.title: ウォーリアーブレイド ラスタンvsバーバリアン編
locale.synopsis:
戦場は様々なトラップが仕掛けられた広大な１０ステージ。壮絶な混合バトルは４人対戦が可能！バトルロイヤルやチームバトルなど色々な戦い方が楽しめ、最大８人の戦士が入り乱れた戦いが繰り広げられます。 殴る、蹴る、魔法のほか、多彩な攻撃が可能です。クエストモードはストーリーにあわせてステージを選ぶ事ができ、展開がかわります。 さらに、クリアする毎にキャラクターを自分好みにレベルアップする事ができます。
ゲームモードは、ストーリーにそって戦う１人専用の「クエスト」、対戦の「バーサス」のほか、基本の操作方法やマジック、コンボなど、メニューごとに練習することができる「トレーニングモード」も搭載。

locale.title: 워리어 블레이드: 라스탄 vs 바바리안 편
Burnout
locale.synopsis: Burnout is a street-racing game where you are put in the drivers seat racing across 14 circuits. Every dance with death earns you more 'Burn' power that you can use to tear up the road at turbo speeds. Smashing into traffic costs you time. You'll get bonus points for your near-misses, trying to actually win a race while the city bustles around you. Your opponents can be a pack of ruthless computer drivers, or you can turn up the aggression and battle against a friend in multiplayer races, ramming them into walls, steering them into oncoming traffic or causing pile-ups that they have to swerve around or dive through!

locale.title: Burnout
locale.synopsis: Burnout is a street-racing game where you are put in the drivers seat racing across 14 circuits. Every dance with death earns you more 'Burn' power that you can use to tear up the road at turbo speeds. Smashing into traffic costs you time. You'll get bonus points for your near-misses, trying to actually win a race while the city bustles around you. Your opponents can be a pack of ruthless computer drivers, or you can turn up the aggression and battle against a friend in multiplayer races, ramming them into walls, steering them into oncoming traffic or causing pile-ups that they have to swerve around or dive through!

locale.title: Burnout
locale.synopsis:
Crashs unlimited & Spielspaß pur
Einsteigen, Gas geben und Spaß haben! Burnout, die neue Action-Racer-Referenz rast nun auf dem GameCube. Ort der Raserei sind alltägliche Situationen im Straßenverkehr, viel Verkehr, Staus und wenig Zeit, aber ein verdammt schnelles Auto.
Ob Straßenschluchten, Autobahnen oder Landstraßen, die geniale KI der Verkehrsteilnehmer und der drei Gegner bringen den Spieler ordentlich auf Trab. Durch spektakuläre Crashs mit anschließender Zeitlupen-Wiederholung im Matrix-Stil wird der Spielspaß auf einem konstant hohen Niveau gehalten. Die Steuerung ist faszinierend einfach und sorgt für starke Motivation.
Features:
- 14 Tracks quer durch die USA und Europa
- "Geisterfahren ist erlaubt": Lerne den Verkehr von der anderen Seite kennen!
- Mehr als 300 "intelligente" Fahrzeuge auf jedem Kurs (Taxis, Autos, LKWs, Busse)
- 9 verschiedene Fahrzeuge (u.a. ein Bus) mit unterschiedlichen physischen Eigenschaften
- Geniale Steuerung: "Einsteigen, Gas geben und Spaß haben"
- One-Player Modi: Championship, Duell, Single Race, Time Attack, Survival
- Multi-Player Modi: Head-to-Head mit 2-Spieler-Split-Screen
- Je spektakulärer der Fahrstil, desto schneller lädt sich dein "Burnout-Meter" auf
- Unglaublich realistische Darstellung der Unfälle mit anschließender Zeitlupen-Wiederholung im Matrix-Stil
- Detaillierte Darstellung von Spiegelungen und Lichteffekten auf den Fahrzeugen
- Crasheffekte werden dynamisch und in Echtzeit generiert

game.name: The Baseball 2003 - Battle Ball Park Sengen Perfect Play Pro Yakyuu (Japan) (JA)

THE BASEBALL 2003 バトルボールパーク宣言 パーフェクトプレープロ野球
야구 2003 배틀 볼 파크 선언 퍼펙트 플레이 프로 야구

rom.name: The Baseball 2003 - Battle Ball Park Sengen Perfect Play Pro Yakyuu (Japan) (JA).iso

locale.title: Rocket Power: Beach Bandits
locale.synopsis: Summer is just around the corner, and the kids from Ocean Shores look forward to the Annual Ocean Shores Surf Contest. But as Otto, Reggie, Twister, and Sam finally reach the beach, they make a startling discovery--most of the sand is missing, and the surf contest has been postponed. Now it's up to you to guide the kids through Ocean Shores, The Lakes, The Robot Factory, and Mondo Mountain in the effort to discover who stole the sand. In each area, you'll battle robot minions, use the new wave runner and zip-line glide, and play extreme sports, such as skateboarding and inline skating.

locale.title: Rocket Power: Beach Bandits
locale.synopsis: Summer is just around the corner, and the kids from Ocean Shores look forward to the Annual Ocean Shores Surf Contest. In each area, you'll battle robot minions, use the new wave runner and zip-line glide, and play extreme sports, such as skateboarding and inline skating.

locale.title: Bloody Roar Extreme
locale.synopsis:
Bloody Roar: Extreme known as Bloody Roar: Primal Fury in North America and PAL territories is fighting game developed by Eighting/Raizing that boasts a brawling style similar to that of Fighting Vipers. The twist is that each of the game's 16 characters can transform from human to beast shape and take on new fighting abilities.
There is an extra character featured only in this release, known as Fang.

locale.title: ブラッディ ロア エクストリーム
Beach Spikers: Virtua Beach Volleyball
locale.synopsis: Beach Spikers is a simple, decidedly unsophisticated volleyball game, but it also happens to be a lot of fun. The title has enough gameplay modes and options to keep all of us busy for a long time and the AI character building elements even longer. I've spent some 10 hours just building various characters up to their full potentials and had a great time doing it. But there's more to the game than just these areas; there are entire other modes to explore, from the Point Kick matches to the highly entertaining Beach Countdown, in which the volleyball becomes a ticking time bomb.

locale.title: Beach Spikers: Virtua Beach Volleyball
locale.synopsis: Beach Spikers é um jogo de vôlei simples e sem sofisticação, mas também é muito divertido. O título tem modos de jogo e opções suficientes para nos manter ocupados por um longo tempo e os elementos de construção de personagem de IA ainda mais. Passei cerca de 10 horas apenas construindo vários personagens com todo o seu potencial e me diverti muito fazendo isso. Mas há mais no jogo do que apenas essas áreas; Existem outros modos para explorar, desde as partidas de Point Kick até a altamente divertida Beach Countdown, em que o voleibol se torna uma bomba-relógio.

locale.title: Beach Spikers: Virtua Beach Volleyball
locale.synopsis: Beach Spikers is a simple, decidedly unsophisticated volleyball game, but it also happens to be a lot of fun. The title has enough gameplay modes and options to keep all of us busy for a long time and the AI character building elements even longer. I've spent some 10 hours just building various characters up to their full potentials and had a great time doing it. But there's more to the game than just these areas; there are entire other modes to explore, from the Point Kick matches to the highly entertaining Beach Countdown, in which the volleyball becomes a ticking time bomb.

locale.title: Beyblade VForce - Super Tournament Battle
locale.synopsis: Beyblade is a baffling game that is both so niche and so ill- executed that I can only recommended to the true fanatics out there who devour anything the franchise has to offer. Everyone else will be downright insulted by the simple, stupid game mechanics and horrendously outdated visual and audio presentations. This title does not look, sound or act any differently from its PS1 predecessor, which is a travesty. Stay as far away from this unfortunate digital afterbirth as possible.

locale.title: Batman: Vengeance
locale.synopsis: Batman Vengeance, developed by Ubi Soft Montreal, is a 3D action-adventure based on the animated television series. The game pits players as the Dark Knight himself on a quest to stop a mysterious crime wave in Gotham City. Batman has full freedom of movement to go anywhere within wide-open, sprawling 3D environments -- some that stretch up and up and up. The caped crusader can walk, run, sneak against walls, climb, glide through the air with his cape and engage in hand-to-hand combat. The game features 19 stages, 40 minutes of rendered cinematics, and plenty of Bat gadgets, like batarangs, batgrapples, flash bombs, remote charges, batcuffs, nets, the batlauncher, batscope and more.

locale.title: Batman Vengeance
locale.synopsis: Batman Vengeance, developed by Ubi Soft Montreal, is a 3D action-adventure based on the animated television series. The game pits players as the Dark Knight himself on a quest to stop a mysterious crime wave in Gotham City. Batman has full freedom of movement to go anywhere within wide-open, sprawling 3D environments -- some that stretch up and up and up. The caped crusader can walk, run, sneak against walls, climb, glide through the air with his cape and engage in hand-to-hand combat. The game features 19 stages, 40 minutes of rendered cinematics, and plenty of Bat gadgets, like batarangs, batgrapples, flash bombs, remote charges, batcuffs, nets, the batlauncher, batscope and more.

locale.title: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
locale.synopsis: Publisher LucasArts takes players to period a long time ago in a galaxy far, far away. This time around, though, players don't assume the role of a powerful Jedi or an ambitious Rebel pilot, but rather a rough bounty hunter employed by the very enemies of Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda. Jango Fett, who won't think twice about killing anybody in his way -- good or bad, is brought to the digital arena third-person shooter-style. Armed with all the weapons and gadgets he can carry and a jetpack to boot, the character flies and shoots his way through a variety of gargantuan worlds and encounters recognizable creatures from the movies.

locale.title: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
locale.synopsis: Es war einmal vor langer Zeit in einer weit, weit entfernten Galaxis ... da lebte ein Star Wars-Charakter namens Boba Fett. Er redete nicht viel und wurde bald von einem Sarlacc verspeist, aber sein kleiner Beitrag zum Star Wars-Universum wurde legendär. George Lucas hielt es daher für angebracht, in den ersten Star Wars-Episoden mehr über die Familiengeschichte der Fetts zu erzählen, und in Episode II erfuhren die Fans endlich die ganze Geschichte. Wir lernten Boba Fett als Kind kennen, und was noch wichtiger war, auch seinen Vater Jango. Mit seiner blau gestreiften Mandalorian-Rüstung, dem bekannten Schiff der Fetts, der Slave 1, und einigen der schrecklichsten Waffen weit und breit gehörte Jango zu den Höhepunkten von Star Wars Episode II. Und jetzt, mit dem Erscheinen seines eigenen Videospiels, hat er richtigen Kultstatus erreicht. Star Wars Bounty Hunter spielt zwischen den Ereignissen von Episode I und II und gibt dir Gelegenheit, selbst in Jangos Rolle zu schlüpfen, um den Abschaum des Universums mit einem einzigartigen Arsenal von Waffen und sonstigen Geräten fertig zu machen. Jango ist angeheuert worden, um einen gefährlichen Dark Jedi - den Anführer eines geheimnisvollen Kults - aufzuspüren. Das allein wäre schon schwierig genug, aber außerdem gibt es da noch eine Gestalt aus Jangos Vergangenheit, die andere Pläne hat. Herausgekommen sind insgesamt 18 Level Kopfgeldjagd in der Er-Perspektive. Jango verfolgt seine Beute von den sandigen Weiten von Tatooine bis in die Straßen von Coruscant und begegnet vielen bekannten (und weniger bekannten) Charakteren aus der Star Wars-Galaxis. Immer wieder musst du dir Jangos Arsenal von Waffen und sonstigen Geräten zunutze machen, darunter auch den klassischen Blaster und den Raketen-Rucksack sowie eine Fackel, die sich durch verschlossene Türen brennen kann. Praktisch, wenn man mal den Schlüssel vergessen hat ... Das Spiel ist dank Industrial Light and Magic und Skywalker Sound reichlich mit Star Wars-Filmsequenzen und -Soundeffekten ausgestattet. Außerdem wird in Star Wars Bounty Hunter enthüllt, warum Jango Fett als Modell für die Armee der Klonkrieger aus Star Wars Episode II ausgewählt wurde - für Fans also ein Muss.

Armed with all the weapons and gadgets he can carry and a jetpack to boot, the character flies and shoots his way through a variety of gargantuan worlds and encounters recognizable creatures from the movies.

locale.title: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
locale.synopsis: Il y a très longtemps, dans une galaxie très très lointaine... il y avait un personnage de Star Wars portant le nom de Boba Fett. À peine capable de parler, il devint vite le repas d'une créature Sarlacc, mais sa petite contribution à l'univers de Star Wars est devenue une légende. C'est à juste titre que George Lucas a décidé de faire figurer l'histoire de la famille de Fett dans ses épisodes précédent les premiers Star Wars, et dans l'Episode II les fans eurent la chance de découvrir l'histoire dans son intégralité. C'est là que l'enfance de Boba Fett nous fut présentée et, plus important, on rencontra aussi son père Jango. Paré de son armure Mandalorian à rayures bleues, aux commandes du vaisseau familier à Fett, Slave 1, et équipé d'un armement parmi les plus terrifiants de tout le système stellaire, Jango était vraiment un personnage marquant de Star Wars Episode II. Et il atteint maintenant un véritable statut de star, avec la sortie de son propre jeu vidéo. Placé entre les Episodes I et II, Star Wars Bounty Hunter vous offre la chance d'enfiler les chaussures de Jango et de faire disparaître la lie de l'univers grâce à un inégalable arsenal d'armes et de gadgets. On a embauché Jango pour poursuivre un dangereux Dark Jedi - le leader d'une secte mystérieuse - ce qui serait déjà assez compliqué pour qu'on se passe de l'apparition d'une vieille figure du passé de Jango, qui semble nourrir des projets fort différents. Parcourez 18 niveaux de chasse à la prime, en vue subjective à la troisième personne, alors que Jango voyage des terres sableuses de Tatooine aux vertigineux décors urbains de Coruscant, à la poursuite de ses proies, en rencontrant de nombreuses vieilles connaissances (et pas tellement amicales) issues de la galaxie Star Wars. Vous aurez bien besoin de tout l'arsenal d'armes et de gadgets de Jango, dont les classiques pistolets lasers et le sac à dos lance-roquette, plus une torche capable de découper des portes closes. Pratique quand on a oublié ses clés... Le jeu regorge de séquences cinématiques et d'effets sonores de Star Wars, grâce à Industrial Light and Magic et Skywalker Sound. En plus, Star Wars Bounty Hunter permet aussi de savoir pourquoi Jango Fett fut choisi pour servir de modèle aux combattants clonés de l'armée, comme on le voit dans Star Wars Episode II, ce qui est un plus indéniable pour les fans.

Armed with all the weapons and gadgets he can carry and a jetpack to boot, the character flies and shoots his way through a variety of gargantuan worlds and encounters recognizable creatures from the movies.

locale.title: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
locale.synopsis: Hace mucho tiempo, en una galaxia muy, muy lejana...había un personaje de Star Wars llamado Boba Fett. Apenas hablaba, y pronto se convirtió en el almuerzo de una criatura de Sarlacc, pero su pequeña contribución al universo Star Wars ha pasado a ser algo legendario. George Lucas acertó al pensar que sería buena idea presentar la historia familiar de Fett en los nuevos episodios de Star Wars. Por eso, en el Episode II los fans han tenido por fin la oportunidad de ver la historia completa. De niños conocimos ya a Boba Fett y, más importante aún, a su padre Jango. Equipado con su armadura Mandalorian de rayas azules, pilotando la nave de la familia Fett, la Slave 1, y llevando consigo algunas de las armas más temidas de su sistema solar, Jango ha sido uno de los puntos clave de Star Wars Episode II. Y ahora, con la llegada de su propio videojuego, se ha convertido en una auténtica estrella. La historia tiene lugar entre los acontecimientos que se desarrollan en Episodes I and II. En Star Wars Bounty Hunter tendrás la oportunidad de ponerte en la piel de Jango y destruir toda la escoria del universo con tu exclusivo arsenal de armas y artilugios. Jango ha sido contratado para localizar a un peligroso Dark Jedi, el líder de una misteriosa secta. Esta misión sería ya lo bastante dura, si no fuera por una figura del pasado de Jango, que tiene otras ideas. Atraviesa 18 niveles en tercera persona, siguiendo el viaje de Jango desde las arenas de Tatooine hasta la poblada urbe de Coruscant en busca de su presa, encontrándote a muchos personajes conocidos (y a otros no tan conocidos) de la galaxia Star Wars. Tendrás que recurrir al arsenal de armas y artilugios de Jango, incluyendo las clásicas pistolas láser y la mochila-cohete, además de una linterna que te ayudará a cruzar las puertas cerradas con llave. Muy útil cuando se te olvidan las llaves... El juego está plagado de secuencias cinematográficas y efectos de sonido de Star Wars, cortesía de Industrial Light and Magic y Skywalker Sound. Además, Star Wars Bounty Hunter también revela por qué Jango Fett fue elegido para ser el modelo de los guerreros clones, como se ve en Star Wars Episode II, por lo que para los fans se trata de una asignatura obligatoria.

locale.title: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2
locale.synopsis: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2 is the sequel to the smash hit Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX. Play as Dave Mirra or as any of the 14 pro riders such as Ryan Nyquist, Mike Laird and Collin Mackay. Ride 8 massive levels and test your skill and risk your skull pulling off over 1,500 tricks. Let your imagination run wild with the Create-A-Rider and Park Editor features as you create the riding experience you always wanted.

locale.title: Super Bubble Pop
locale.synopsis: Dance to the beat of crazy music and play 150 levels of bubble popping action in this 3D puzzle game. Make your move and work quickly to take out the bubbles before they take you out. A crazy collection of DJs are waiting inside for their chance to become the ultimate popper. You are given the chance to pick from one of up to five characters each with their own unique special attack. Special attacks and bubbles keep the gameplay fast and furious. With rocking soundtracks and fast-paced gameplay, Super Bubble Pop will keep you grooving to the beat for hours.

game.name: Resident Evil Zero (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Resident Evil Zero
locale.synopsis: Resident Evil 0 marks the first totally exclusive, original survival horror title for Nintendo's GameCube system. Starring Rebecca Chambers, and a new character Billy Coen in a prequel to Resident Evil 1. Explore new areas of Raccoon City, and search to uncover the secrets of the T-Virus. Control both characters simultaneously, switching between back and forth and splitting up to solve new puzzles. Items can now be dropped anywhere in the game, replacing the traditional item boxes in previous games. Detailed character models and realistic backgrounds (mixing pre-rendered pictures with animated effects) take the horror to the next level.

game.developer: Capcom Production Studio 4 / Capcom Production Studio 3

game.name: Conflict: Desert Storm II: Back to Baghdad (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Conflict: Desert Storm II: Back to Baghdad
locale.synopsis: Part 2 in the series, Back to Baghdad is a squad-based shooter that picks up right where the first Desert Storm left off. John Bradley, Paul Foley, Mick Connors, and David Jones are back once again to team up and once again take on Saddam's henchmen. Whether it's protecting friendly choppers from enemy fire, the burning oil fields, Iraq's chemical weapons program, or secret superguns, there was apparently enough unfinished business left to serve as the basis for a second game. For the sequel, the developers improved on the team-mate AI and game UI, but the biggest appeal is once again the split-screen co-operative multiplayer for up to four players.

locale.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Mayhem
locale.synopsis: Scooby and the Gang are back in an all-new adventure. Join your favorite slackers as they try to solve a mystery of supernatural proportions. The gang starts out on a routine case in the search of ghosts. During their search, a scheming business tycoon, who will stop at nothing to grow his empire, uses the Tome of Doom to unlock some of the creepiest monsters our gang has every seen. Help Scooby and Shaggy find the Tome of Doom, capture monsters, and solve the mystery. Would you help Scooby and Shaggy solve this mystery for a Scooby Snack?

game.name: Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula Road To The EVOLUTION (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula Road To The EVOLUTION
locale.synopsis: Futuristic racing game based on the Shinseiki GPX anime series, featuring a higher speed version of Formula One racing. Cyber Formula cars are designed to go as fast as 600km per hour, racing around sci-fi inspired circuits at break-neck speeds. Modes include Grand Prix (standard GP style racing, complete with qualification laps and multi-circuit competition), Arcade (drive free run, one match, survival match, point match, or time attack races), private area (a museum of sorts, with history, shops, card gallery, audio room, and more), as well as a two-player split-screen Versus mode. Select from drift or grip machine types, and use a built-in turbo boost to leave the competition in the dust.

locale.title: Cocoto: Kart Racer
locale.synopsis: Play Cocoto and his friends in devilish races! Choose among 12 characters and their crazy karts! 4 play modes from 1 to 4 players: championship, simple race, battle and time trial. Beat your opponents with lots of devastating attacks!

locale.title: Pokémon Colosseum
locale.synopsis: Pokémon fans can now battle their favorite Pokémon on the grand stage. Starring a brand new leading character, Pokémon, Colosseum offers a story mode that pits you against tough trainers who routinely catch damaged Pokémon. In Battle mode, you can use the Game Boy Advance cable to send your team from your Pokémon Ruby or Pokémon Sapphire Game Pak to your Gamecube, then witness the true potential of your team. Rescue Pokémon and watch them come to life in spectacular Colosseum battles.*NOTE- This game requires 48 blocks on a memory card to save, a standard memory card has only 59 blocks*

locale.title: Pokémon Colosseum
locale.synopsis:
Endlich gibt es - zum ersten Mal in der Pokémon-Geschichte überhaupt - mit dem Story-Modus eine umfassende dreidimensionale Pokémon-Welt, in der man nach Herzenslust herumstreifen und Abenteuer erleben kann. Doch schon bald wird die Freude getrübt, denn im Spiel treibt eine Lumpenbande ihr Unwesen.
Die miesen Schurken vom Team Snagem verwandeln die putzigen kleinen Pokémon in heimtückische dunkle Gesellen - die so genannten Shadow-Pokémon. Doch Seth, der Held von Pokémon Colosseum, macht sich auf, um die Pokémon aus den Fängen der schurkischen Bande zu befreien. Dabei steht ihm Kosma zur Seite. Das Mädchen besitzt die Fähigkeit, die dunklen Kräfte der Shadow-Pokémon zu erkennen - denn auf den ersten Blick sind die Shadow-Pokémon von ihren liebenswerteren Verwandten kaum zu unterscheiden. Auf ihrer Reise durch die verschiedenen Städte erwarten Seth und Kosma viele fantastische Abenteuer und knifflige Aufgaben. Hoffentlich gelingt es den beiden am Ende, die Shadow-Pokémon von ihrem schlimmen Schicksal zu erlösen.
Doch damit ist der Spielspaß noch längst nicht vorbei, denn im Battle-Modus warten noch einmal ganz neue Herausforderungen. Hier können bis zu vier Spieler in kolossalen Arenen gegeneinander antreten und ihr Können bei 2-gegen-2-Fights unter Beweis stellen. Man kann hier entweder die im Story-Modus gefundenen Pokémon antreten lassen oder mit Hilfe des Game Link-Kabels die Pokémon aus Rubin oder Saphir in die Arena führen. Wofür man sich auch entscheidet, die spektakulären Effekte der Attacken und die faszinierende 3D-Grafik der Pokémon werden jeden Spieler in ihren Bann ziehen.
FEATURES:
- Ein Pokémon-Abenteuer mit mehr als 30 Stunden Gameplay, erstmals auf dem Nintendo GameCube
- Mitreißende Pokémon-Kämpfe und eine zauberhafte Welt in fantastischen 3D-Animationen
- Kompatibel mit den Pokémon-Editionen Rubin und Saphir - bring deine eigenen Pokémon mit in die Arena und lass sie gegen die deiner Freunde antreten
- Inklusive Memory Card 59

locale.title: クラッシュ・バンディクー 爆走！ニトロカート
Conan
locale.synopsis:
As the days grew shorter and colder, the nights longer and darker, home seemed to be no more than a distant memory for our brave warrior. He finally approached his destination of Grannach when a band of armoured riders pounded through the crowd of corpses. Their dark shapes were rushing towards him, but our warrior could not tear his eyes away from the reflecting vulture symbol on one of the riders armour.
As the riders passed, our hero could barely make out his village through the dust - but as the dust lifted, there remained only burning cinders and carnage of his native home&
Take control of the sword of the greatest hero to roam the lands of Hyboria - Conan. Having seen your native village of Grannach burnt to the ground you now begin your quest for revenge.
You will fight your way across the Black Mountains and rivers in search of the cult who brought death to your home. You will have to master various swords, axes and the mace in order to complete this perilous journey.
As the story unfolds you will find yourself face to face with strange mystical creatures that test your fighting skills to the death.
Discover the entrances to temples and caves along the way, where you will scale walls, leap obstacles, solve puzzles and retrieve the pieces of the Atlantean Sword in order to help you in achieving your destiny of defeating The Vulture Cult.

locale.title: Cubix: Robots for Everyone Showdown
locale.synopsis: All over Bubble Town, robots of all shapes and kinds are going out of control! Solex has infected them, causing them to go haywire and destroy the environment. Connor, Abby, and the rest of the Cubix gang must track down these rogue robots before the evil Dr. K and his gigantic robot Kolossal do.

game.name: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex
locale.synopsis: The fifth Crash adventure features engaging gameplay, quirky characters and exotic locales. Still smarting from his last defeat, Dr. Neo Cortex has developed a new diabolical plan to steal ancient crystals and unleash destructive gods on Crash and the planet Earth. With Crash and his sister Coco, it's now up to you to find and return all the crystals across dangerous levels, including a volcanic island, a Japanese village, and the jungles of Africa. You'll find many ways to move around, whether you maneuver a Jeep, fly a hang glider, or pilot a Crash-Mech. But don't marvel too long at the new inventions, because you might find yourself in a heap of destruction.

rom.name: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex (USA) (EN).iso

locale.title: Crash Bandicoot: La Vengeance de Cortex
Crash Bandicoot: Der Zorn des Cortex
locale.synopsis:
Crash Bandicoot ist ZURÜCK... um Cortex zu besiegen!
Dr. Neo Cortex nutzt die zerstörerische Kraft der Vier Elemente, um Crunch, den Super-Bandicoot, zu erschaffen. Der hat nur ein Ziel: alles zu zerstören, was seinen Weg kreuzt. Werden Crash und Coco dieser Herausforderung gewachsen sein? Darauf kannst du deinen Bandicoot verwetten!
* Das bisher größte Abenteuer! - 30 NEUE action-geladene Levels mit genialen, riesigen Umgebungen * Zwei auf einen Streich - Zum ersten Mal ist Coco, Crash's gewitzte Schwester, als voll spielbarer CHarakter mit von der Partie * Viele Fahrzeuge führen zum Chaos?! - Steuere 8 verschiedene Vehikel - vom Crash-Gleiter bis zum gigantischen Roboter * Du wirst Augen machen! - Die wahnwitzigsten Spezialeffekte, die je in einem Crash- Spiel zu sehen waren!

locale.title: Crash Bandicoot: La Venganza de Cortex

rom.name: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT,NL).iso

locale.title: Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles
locale.synopsis: Square's first game for a Nintendo console since the days of the Super NES takes the lush fantasy world from the Final Fantasy franchise and adds in hack-and-slash-style four-player action. The game does away with traditional experience points and instead focuses on action-oriented combat with a unique co-op slant. Up to three friends can join in on the quest, by using Game Boy Advance units connected to the GameCube as controllers. While all the main action takes place on the screen, the GBAs enable the players to access menus, organize their spell spheres, and perform upgrades without slowing down the action. The initial release of this game included a GBA Cable to allow players instant access to the game.

locale.title: ファイナルファンタジー・クリスタルクロニクル
locale.synopsis:
ついに「ＦＦ」がゲームキューブに登場！ 村を救うために「ミルラの雫」を求めて旅立つキャラバン隊。 「ＦＦ」シリーズならではの、美麗なグラフィックや壮大なファンタジーの世界が、 ストーリーを盛り上げ、プレイヤーを魅了します。
Story: 世界は瘴気に包まれた。 ひとたび触れると、もはや生命を保つ事が不可能な瘴気。 しかし、人々はその瘴気から逃れる術を得ていた。 クリスタル------------------。 その存在は、人々を瘴気から守る存在であった。 しかし、クリスタルの力も永遠ではない。 人々はその力を維持するために、年に一度ミルラの雫でクリスタルを清めなければならなかった。そのため人々は毎年、それぞれの村からクリスタル・キャラバンと呼ばれる若者たちを送り出し、ミルラの雫を得る事を続けてきたのだ。 この物語は、そうしたとある辺境の村の、若者たちの物語である。

locale.title: ファイナルファンタジー・クリスタルクロニクル
Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles

locale.title: Resident Evil Code: Veronica X
locale.synopsis: Direct GameCube port of the Resident Evil/BioHazard side chapter, previously released on Dreamcast and later PS2. This time you play as Claire Redfield from Resident Evil 2. After narrowly surviving the horrific onslaught in Raccoon City, Claire now seeks clues in search of her missing brother, Chris. To her horror, she discovers Umbrella Corporation's insidious activities are not isolated to the remote, mid-western city. Something much larger is going on! Flesh-eating zombies and horrific beasts haunt Claire's every move. Just how far does this twisted conspiracy extend? What is Umbrella Corporation really up to? And who is behind this bio-tech terror? Ships on two discs.

locale.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
locale.synopsis: Infiltrate terrorists' positions, acquire critical intelligence by any means necessary, execute with extreme prejudice, and exit without a trace. In Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell, you are Sam Fisher, a highly trained secret operative of the NSA's secret arm: Third Echelon. Suit up with the latest classified field operative gear and weapons as you travel through diverse mission objectives. The world's future is in your hands, as cyber terrorism and international tensions are about to explode into WWIII.

locale.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
locale.synopsis: Infiltrate terrorists' positions, acquire critical intelligence by any means necessary, execute with extreme prejudice, and exit without a trace. The world's future is in your hands, as cyber terrorism and international tensions are about to explode into WWIII.

locale.title: Conflict: Desert Storm
locale.synopsis: Conflict: Desert Storm lets you take charge of the best known and most feared special operations forces in the world: the elite British SAS or the US Delta Force squads. You're the best trained, best equipped and best organised Special Forces in the world. The area that has been assigned to you is yours for the taking. Seek, locate and destroy enemy targets and personnel. Create havoc and confusion throughout the enemy's lines of communication and supply. What lies before you is an opportunity in a soldier's lifetime. Take your equipment, take your training and use it well. Features included squad-based combat (both alone or co-operatively with friends), 15 missions, and scripted events.

locale.title: Charlie's Angels
locale.synopsis: The whole world is startled at the unbelievable series of events that are currently taking place. Somehow, the world's most famous monuments are being stolen - one after the other. Their size and weight are of no signifance for these cunning thieves and their devious mastermind. Police and special task forces from every country are baffled. Tourism is down, and governments are desperate as the list of missing monuments keeps growing - the Statue of Liberty, the Eiffel Tower, the Great Wall of China, you name it...all have vanished without a trace. However, the call has been made, and Charlie has been briefed.

locale.title: Charlie's Angels: Les Anges se Déchaînent
WWE Crush Hour
locale.synopsis: WWE Entertainment Crush Hour takes the intensity, competitiveness, and brute strength from the wrestling ring to the world of car combat. More than 20 WWE superstars jump into their super cars for brutal vehicular carnage. Lay the rubber down in the Rock's speedster, cruise and bruise in the Hardy Boys' souped-up Woody, or pummel the competition in the Big Show's diesel. In 12 levels littered with deadly traps and hazards, it's going to take more than a three-count to win.

locale.title: WWE Crush Hour

locale.title: The Sims
locale.synopsis: Build, buy, and live. The Sims give you the chance to create simulated people and build their homes, then help your Sims pursue careers, earn money, make friends, and find romance--or totally mess up their lives. Keep your Sims happy by decorating your home with over 150 objects in the game and downloadable ones from TheSims.com. Test your "people skills" as you deal with family, friends, careers, and chaos. There is no right or wrong way to play the game.

locale.title: The Sims
locale.synopsis: Build, buy, and live.
