There is no right or wrong way to play the game.

locale.title: Les Sims
locale.synopsis: Vous vous êtes électrocuté avec une ampoule, vous avez avalé tellement de café que vous passez votre temps aux toilettes, vous avez le visage couvert de marques de doigts suite à une petite séance coquine à la pause de 10 heures au boulot. Et pour couronner le tout, votre majordome est parti faire des singeries dans sa cabane dans les arbres. Pour certains, c'est somme toute une journée tout à fait normale. Mais pour la plupart d'entre nous, cela passe par quelques heures aux commandes du simulateur de vie quotidienne qu'est le jeu des Sims, merveilleusement conçu pour nous par les créateurs de SimCity, SimEarth, SimAnt et d'autres, aujourd'hui mis à jour pour Nintendo GameCube. C'est dans le mode " Changez de vie " des Sims que vous commencez votre nouvelle existence virtuelle, après avoir choisi l'apparence physique de votre alias à l'écran (Sim), avec un visage, des cheveux et des vêtements assortis aux vôtres, naturellement... Au début de ce mode vous êtes complètement fauché, vous ne savez toujours rien faire, et vous ne possédez qu'un lit qui trône dans le séjour chez votre mère. Le but de ce jeu sur sept niveaux est bien de Changer de vie. Vous commencez par apprendre à réparer une télé pour finir par décrocher un super boulot, vous marier, faire des enfants qui sont bien sûr premiers de la classe, et avoir une super salle de bain toute à vous. Pour réussir à couper le cordon et quitter maman, il faudra apprendre à jongler pour répondre à toutes les nécessités quotidiennes de votre Sim : maintenir une bonne hygiène, manger, vivre décemment, rencontrer d'autres gens, tout en fixant un nombre d'objectifs à atteindre. Alors, il faudra non seulement que M. ou Mme Sim apprenne quelques trucs pour éviter de mettre le feu à sa cuisine, mais aussi qu'il ou elle n'oublie pas d'aller aux toilettes, de prendre sa douche, de sortir les poubelles et de faire son lit, et tout ça au bon moment, sinon bonjour la déprime et la misère ! Et c'est pas comme ça qu'on trouve chaussure à son pied quand on cherche à se marier. C'est ça l'attrait des Sims : faire naître sous ses doigts toute une existence, essentiellement faite d'humour. Les détails de cette vie sont d'un réalisme à vous couper le souffle comme, par exemple, la musique que vous pouvez passer dans votre salon virtuel. Les possibilités du jeu sont quasi-illimitées : dans cette vie virtuelle vous pouvez vous commander une pizza, faire toutes les grasses matinées que vous voulez, refuser de payer la facture d'électricité, jouer au flipper, vendre votre frigo, et même choisir de devenir cambrioleur de métier. Les parcours pour remplir les objectifs de " Changez de vie " sont fixés. Pour bénéficier d'une promotion, il vous faut prendre des douches régulièrement et raconter des blagues. Une soirée réussie signifie que la bouffe est bonne, que la musique cartonne, et que vous réussissez à faire se déplacer la police. Dans l'ensemble vous pouvez quand même faire tout ce qui vous plaît, ce qui n'est pas vraiment le cas dans la vraie vie, sauf si vous êtes méchamment riche. Avec des contrôles mini-menus très simples, la possibilité de mettre en pause, ou celle d'avancer rapidement dans le temps grâce aux boutons L et R, vous pouvez faire marcher vos Sims à la baguette le plus facilement du monde. Mais ce ne sont pas les bafouillages de votre perso qui vont vous aider à prendre des décisions pour avancer ! Pour cela, vous avez des icônes à l'intérieur des bulles de dialogues ainsi que des sons très réalistes. Si une petite icône lit apparaît dans la bulle de votre Sim, c'est qu'il a sommeil. Si vous entendez des bourdonnements, c'est que les mouches vous conseillent de nettoyer la nourriture pourrie sur le sol de la cuisine. " Changez de vie " : le but des Sims - vous pouvez également choisir de jouer en mode " Jouez avec les Sims ", un mode sans objectif et complètement freestyle, dans lequel vous pouvez diriger comme bon vous semble jusqu'à quatre Sims dans la même maison. Faites-les manger, jouer, nettoyer et se marier, tant que vous voulez, jusqu'à ce que vos amis dans la vraie vie se demandent où vous êtes passé. Les modes deux joueurs sont aussi un méga bonus : un jeu essentiellement coopératif qui inclut également des challenges pour tester vos capacités à flirter, quémander ou à nettoyer. Que votre existence soit rose où semée d'embûches, lancez-vous avec les Sims - une aventure où la vie est véritablement un jeu.

locale.title: Die Sims
locale.synopsis: Du hast dir an der Glühbirne einen Schlag geholt, so viel Espresso in dich geschüttet, dass du zwei Mal ohnmächtig geworden bist und dir dabei in die Hose gemacht hast, und auf deinem Gesicht sind, dank eines miesen Flirts um 10 Uhr morgens bei der Arbeit, drei rosarote Handabdrücke zu sehen. Und zu allem Überfluss ist dein Butler-Affe mal wieder in seinem Baumhaus verschwunden. Für einige Leute ist das ein ganz normaler Tag. Die meisten von uns werden so etwas aber nur nach einigen Stunden bei den Sims erleben, der Lebenssimulation, die von den selben Leuten stammt, die auch schon SimCity, SimEarth, SimAnt und vieles mehr entwickelt haben, und die nun mit einigen Verbesserungen für den Nintendo GameCube erscheint. Deine virtuelle Existenz beginnt im 'Leben'-Modus der Sims', nachdem du das Aussehen deines Alter Ego auf dem Bildschirm ('Sim') festgelegt hast - und natürlich kannst du ihm oder ihr ein Gesicht, eine Frisur und Kleidung verpasst, die deiner eigenen entsprechen. Zu Anfang besitzt du kein Geld und keine Fähigkeiten, und dein Bett steht im Wohnzimmer im Haus deiner Mutter. Dein Ziel ist nun, dir über sieben Level ein Leben aufzubauen. Zunächst lernst du, wie man den Fernseher repariert, am Ende hast du einen Job, einen Ehepartner, Kinder, die die Besten in ihrer Klasse sind, und - ja! - eine Power-Dusche ganz für dich allein. Um endlich auf eigenen Beinen stehen zu können, musst du die Grundbedürfnisse deines Sims - Hunger, Hygiene, Komfort, Sozialleben - mit einigen festen Zielen unter einen Hut bringen. Während Herr oder Frau Sim also lernt, wie man kocht, ohne dabei die Küche abzufackeln, musst du sie oder ihn zur richtigen Zeit auf die Toilette, unter die Dusche, zur Mülltonne und ins Bett schicken, um nicht depressiv zu werden und sozial abzurutschen - denn dann findet sich nur schwer ein Ehepartner. Das macht auch den Reiz der Sims aus - du steuerst ein echtes Leben, das voller Humor steckt und selbst kleinste Details wie die Musik der Stereoanlage im Wohnzimmer bietet. Es gibt kaum Grenzen und fast alles ist möglich - im virtuellen Leben kannst du eine Pizza bestellen, den ganzen Tag im Bett liegen, die Stromrechnung nicht bezahlen, Flipper spielen, den Kühlschrank verkaufen oder sogar 'Einbrecher' als Beruf wählen. Es gibt einige feste Abläufe - eine Beförderung bedeutet regelmäßiges Duschen und Witzeerzählen, für eine coole Party braucht es gute Musik und gutes Essen, und eventuell schaut auch einmal die Polizei vorbei - aber ansonsten kannst du das alles anstellen, was im richtigen Leben einfach nicht denkbar ist. Es sei denn du bist steinreich. Mit einem einfachen Minimenü und der Möglichkeit, mit den R- und L-Tasten die Zeit anzuhalten beziehungsweise zu beschleunigen, geht die Steuerung der Sims sehr leicht von der Hand. Das unverständliche Gebrabbel deiner virtuellen Persönlichkeit wird dir nur wenig helfen - aber dank der Symbole in den Sprechblasen und der realistischen Soundeffekte weißt du trotzdem immer, was gerade zu tun ist. 'Spricht' dein Sim ein Bett-Symbol, ist es Zeit ins Bett zu gehen. Hörst du das Summen von Fliegen, wäre es wohl angebracht, das schimmelige Essen vom Küchenboden zu wischen. Der 'Leben'-Modus bildet das Herzstück der Sims - aber es gibt auch einen freien Spielmodus ohne Ziele, bei dem bis zu vier Sims in einem Haus leben, die du essen, spielen, putzen und heiraten lassen kannst, bis deine Freunde im richtigen Leben einen Suchtrupp nach dir ausschicken. Auch die Zweispieler-Modi machen riesig viel Spaß - ihr könnt entweder den Hauptmodus zusammen spielen, oder gegeneinander antreten, um eure Fähigkeiten beim Flirten, Betteln oder Putzen zu messen. Und ganz gleich, ob du nun mit einem silbernen Löffel im Mund geboren wurdest oder ein armer Schlucker bist, bei den Sims kannst du dein Leben von vorne beginnen - und hier ist das Leben wirklich ein Spiel.

locale.title: Los Sims
locale.synopsis:
Te has electrocutado con una bombilla, te has metido tantos cafés en el cuerpo que te has desmayado dos veces, y llevas la cara marcada por culpa de un coqueteo inusual en el trabajo a las 10 de la mañana. Para acabarlo de arreglar, tu mayordomo macaco ha vuelto ha desaparecer y se ha fugado a su casa del árbol. Para algunos, esto es el pan de cada día. Pero para la mayoría de nosotros son sólo nuestras experiencias al pasar algunas horas al timón de Los Sims, el simulador de vida diseñado por los creadores de SimCity, SimEarth, SimAnt y otros. Además, esta nueva versión ha sido actualizada y mejorada para Nintendo GameCube.
El modo "Get a Life" de Los Sims es donde comienza tu existencia virtual, aunque antes ya habrás elegido el aspecto físico de tu yo virtual ('Sim') y le habrás dado una cara, un peinado, y una ropa parecidos a los tuyos (menudo creído). En este modo empiezas sin un duro, sin habilidades, y con una cama colocada con orgullo en el comedor de la casa de tu madre. El objetivo a lo largo de los siete niveles es "Get a Life" (Labrarse un porvenir), es decir, empezar aprendiendo lo suficiente sobre electricidad para arreglar la TV, y acabar con un trabajo, una pareja, unos niños que son los mejores del colegio, y ¡tachán! una ducha a presión. Para conseguir soltarte de las faldas de tu madre, tendrás que cubrir las necesidades básicas de tu Sim: hambre, higiene, comodidad, necesidades sociales, persiguiendo varios objetivos establecidos. Así que mientras el Sr. o la Sra. Sim aprenden las habilidades culinarias que necesitan para no incendiar la cocina, también tendrán que ir al baño, a la ducha, al cubo de la basura y a la cama en el momento adecuado para evitar caer en la depresión y la miseria y espantar a sus futuros/as cónyuges.
Ése es el atractivo principal de Los Sims: aquí, a las órdenes de tus dedos, hay una vida auténtica, plagada de humor y de pequeños detalles, tan minuciosos como la música de la cadena del comedor. Hay muy pocos límites, y apenas echarás nada en falta, en tu vida virtual puedes pedir una pizza, dormir todo el día, negarte a pagar las facturas de la luz, jugar al pinball, vender la nevera, e incluso hacerte "ladrón" profesional. Hay rutas fijas para los objetivos de "Get a Life": conseguir un ascenso implica ducharse regularmente y contar chistes, para dar una fiesta fabulosa necesitas buena música, buena comida, y puede que hasta una visita de la poli. A parte de este tipo de cosas, eres libre de hacer el loco a tu aire como no puedes hacerlo en la vida real. A menos que estés podrido de dinero. Con sencillos controles de mini-menús y la posibilidad de pausar y avanzar en el tiempo con los botones L y R, podrás dar órdenes a los Sims con el mínimo esfuerzo.
El farfullar de tu yo virtual no te dará muchas pistas sobre el camino a seguir, pero lo sabrás gracias a los iconos dentro de los bocadillos y a esos graciosos sonidos tan realistas. Si tu Sim "dice" un icono de una cama diminuta, es porque necesita dormir. Si oyes un zumbido, significa que las moscas te están diciendo que tienes que recoger la comida podrida del suelo de la cocina. Aunque "Get a Life" es el modo principal de Los Sims, también puedes acceder a un modo libre y sin objetivos llamado "Play the Sims", donde harás de maestro de ceremonias controlando a hasta cuatro Sims en una casa, haciéndoles comer, jugar, limpiar y casarse, y con el que tus amigos de la vida real mandarán un equipo de rastreo para rescatarte de la pantalla. Otra agradable sorpresa son los modos para dos jugadores: el juego principal puede jugarse en equipo, y además puedes participar en desafíos competitivos para poner a prueba tus habilidades para ligar, pedir limosna o limpiar. Tanto si tu vida es un lecho de rosas como si es un colchón relleno de ortigas, siempre puedes probar suerte con Los Sims, donde la vida realmente es un juego.

game.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory (USA) (EN,FR,ES)

locale.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory
locale.synopsis: As Sam Fisher, Third Echelon's most skilled Splinter Cell operative, you are assigned to execute a hazardous series of operations to investigate and eliminate a new source of information attacks originating in North Korea. At your disposal is a lethal array of tactics ranging from Combat Knife techniques to experimental prototype weapons skills and more-radical hand-to-hand techniques such as the Inverted Chokehold. Experience the intensity of acting as a lone operative fighting tomorrow's threats in the field and of cooperating online with a partner to accomplish crucial missions.

locale.title: 톰 클랜시의 스플린터 셀: 카오스 이론

locale.title: Cel Damage
locale.synopsis: Imagine a world where 'toons rule the road and the demolition derby is a way of life. In Cel Damage, the world's toughest 'toons face off against each other in souped-up, weapon-laden vehicles to out-maneuver, out-race, and out-smack each other for personal glory. These gas-powered gladiators battle it out in highly interactive cartoon environments where they can roam freely, discover hidden areas, interact with set gag pieces (such as the 100 ton weight), perform stunts, and whack the heck out of their opponents. And with a host of wild weapons, such as giant boxing gloves and baseball bats, at their disposal, these 'toons with attitude take part in vehicular combat as it has never been seen before.

locale.title: Cel Damage

locale.title: Muscle Champion ~Battle of Muscle Island~
locale.synopsis: Muscle Champion, based on a popular Japanese TV show, features 21 mini games. These games include: High Power Force, Shotman Catch, Corner Kick Target, Brain Big Panic, Strike Out Panic, and Guru Guru Flag among others. It supports up to 4 players and you are able to create custom characters.

locale.title: マッスルちゃんぴょん ~筋肉島の決戦~
locale.synopsis: 金剛くんをはじめとする、あの一流アスリート達がゲームキューブに集結。 妙に可愛くなった選手達が繰り広げる真剣勝負。 最大４人で、「ストラックアウト」や「キックターゲット」で対戦プレイが楽しめる。 ＴＶでおなじみの競技を対戦用にアレンジして、その数２１競技。 ゲームならではの味付けは、遊べば遊ぶほどしみ出してくる。 そして、あの伝説の魔城「ＳＡＳＵＫＥ」が遂に対戦で遊べてしまう。 画面２分割で同時対戦、どちらが早くクリアできるのか勝負。 もちろん、キャラクターエディットは健在。ゲームキューブならではのグラフィック性能でかっこいいキャラでもおもしろキャラでも思いのまま。

locale.title: Crash Nitro Kart
locale.synopsis: Crash hits the track in his fastest adventure yet--Crash Nitro Kart. Kidnapped by the ruthless Emperor Velo and forced to race in his galactic coliseum, Crash must race his way to victory in order to save the Earth from destruction--but it won't be easy, as he must compete against foes both old and new before a final showdown with Velo himself. Crash Nitro Kart mixes 18 rollercoaster raceways, devastating weapons, a variety of single and multiplayer modes and maps, and customizable arenas, and a cast of unique characters into a game that showcases kart-racing at its best.

locale.title: Crash Nitro Kart
locale.synopsis: Crash hits the track in his fastest adventure yet--Crash Nitro Kart. locale.title: Call of Duty: Finest Hour
locale.synopsis: Call of Duty: Finest Hour is a squad-based console first-person shooter set in WWII. Head to the frontlines of combat to experience intense battlefield moments from World War II's most legendary conflicts including the Russian infantry charge at Stalingrad, the British PPA Commando raids in North Africa and the American led tank charges in Belgium -- through the eyes of citizen soldiers from an alliance of countries who together helped shape the course of modern history. Take on the Nazi war machine through authentic single-player combat missions and utilize an explosive arsenal of WWII weapons from the Russian, British, American and German armories, including pistols, machine guns, sniper rifles and grenades. Play as an American, British or Russian soldier, each with his own story.

locale.title: Call of Duty: Finest Hour
locale.synopsis:
Der neueste Teil der preisgekrönten Call of Duty-Reihe - Call of Duty: Finest Hour - versetzt den Spieler aufs Neue direkt an die Front, um die brisantesten Momente des 2. Weltkriegs in filmreifer Intensität zu erleben. Call of Duty: Finest Hour wurde speziell für die aktuellen Konsolensysteme entworfen und sorgt mit brandneuen Missionen, truppenbasierten Kämpfen und beeindruckenden Spezialeffekten für ein fesselndes Spielerlebnis aus der First-Person-Perspektive.
Erleben Sie in Call of Duty: Finest Hour brisante Gefechte, darunter die russische Infanterieattacke bei Stalingrad, die Angriffe des britischen PPA-Kommandos in Nordafrika und die von Amerika angeführten Panzervorstöße in Belgien. Sehen Sie die Welt durch die Augen einfacher russischer, amerikanischer und britischer Soldaten.
FEATURES:
- Filmreife Intensität: Spielen Sie bekannte Schlachten des 2. Weltkriegs, umgeben von den Bildern und Geräuschen des Krieges. Nehmen Sie es in zwölf authentischen Missionen quer durch vier Länder mit der Kriegsmaschinerie der Deutschen auf. Die Missionen umfassen historische Schlachten mit Hunderten von Soldaten sowie koordinierte taktische Angriffe, Sabotage, Tarnung, Scharfschützeneinsätzen und fahrzeugbasierte Kämpfe
- Vielfältige Aufgaben: Dank der ausgereiften KI verhält sich Ihr Trupp wie eine ausgebildete Militäreinheit samt authentischer Taktik - legen Sie Sperrfeuer, geben Sie Feuerschutz, koordinieren Sie Angriffe auf feindliche Stellungen. Alle Soldaten Ihres Trupps haben verschiedene Hintergründe und Persönlichkeiten und können somit wichtige Rollen innerhalb der Missionen übernehmen
- Authentische Waffen: Setzen Sie 30 authentische Waffen der Russen, Briten, Amerikaner und Deutschen ein, darunter Pistolen, Maschinengewehre, Scharfschützengewehre und Granaten

locale.title: Call of Duty: Finest Hour
locale.synopsis: Call of Duty: Finest Hour is a squad-based console first-person shooter set in WWII. Head to the frontlines of combat to experience intense battlefield moments from World War II's most legendary conflicts including the Russian infantry charge at Stalingrad, the British PPA Commando raids in North Africa and the American led tank charges in Belgium -- through the eyes of citizen soldiers from an alliance of countries who together helped shape the course of modern history. Play as an American, British or Russian soldier, each with his own story.

locale.title: Call of Duty: Finest Hour
locale.synopsis: Call of Duty: Finest Hour é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa baseado em esquadrão ambientado na Segunda Guerra Mundial. Vá para a linha de frente do combate para vivenciar momentos intensos no campo de batalha dos conflitos mais lendários da Segunda Guerra Mundial, incluindo o ataque da infantaria russa em Stalingrado, os ataques do Comando PPA britânico no Norte da África e os ataques de tanques liderados pelos americanos na Bélgica - através dos olhos de soldados cidadãos de uma aliança de países que juntos ajudaram a moldar o curso da história moderna. Enfrente a máquina de guerra nazista através de autênticas missões de combate para um jogador e utilize um arsenal explosivo de armas da Segunda Guerra Mundial dos arsenais russo, britânico, americano e alemão, incluindo pistolas, metralhadoras, rifles de precisão e granadas. Jogue como um soldado americano, britânico ou russo, cada um com sua própria história.

locale.title: Casper: Spirit Dimensions
locale.synopsis: You are Casper! So spiral into phantom dimensions and travel to mysterious realms that are populated by ghosts of the past, present and future; all possessed by the evil Kibosh. Use your powers of flight and fright to become the quickest, smartest and most powerful ghost in the Spirit Dimension!

game.name: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Chaos Bleeds (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Chaos Bleeds
locale.synopsis: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds is a 3rd person action-adventure game based on the successful cult series Buffy the Vampire Slayer. Just like the show, the adventure takes place at ground zero for all things vampire -- Sunnydale, California. Developed with the show's writers as a 'lost episode' from season 5, Chaos Bleeds involves an unraveling tale in which a dimensional bleed has been enabled by Pure Evil to consume humanity once and for all. It's up to Buffy and her friends to stop it all from happening ... again!

locale.title: Buffy im Bann der Dämonen: Chaos Bleeds

locale.title: Street Racing Syndicate
locale.synopsis: From fancy cars to beautiful import models, Street Racing Syndicate delivers the fast-paced world of street racing. You can race for money, pink slips, and more through the streets of LA, Philadelphia, and Miami. With each win, you'll earn cash, respect, and the affections of real-world street racing models. Use your cash to customize vehicles with licensed parts and graphic upgrades. Showcase your vehicle in online races, but be ready to drive off track if the police come

locale.title: Street Racing Syndicate
locale.synopsis: De carros sofisticados a belos modelos importados, Street Racing Syndicate oferece o mundo acelerado das corridas de rua. Você pode correr por dinheiro, bilhetes cor-de-rosa e muito mais pelas ruas de Los Angeles, Filadélfia e Miami. A cada vitória, você ganhará dinheiro, respeito e o afeto de modelos de corrida de rua do mundo real. Use seu dinheiro para personalizar veículos com peças licenciadas e atualizações gráficas. Mostre seu veículo em corridas online, mas esteja pronto para sair da pista se a polícia vier.

locale.title: Street Racing Syndicate
locale.synopsis: From fancy cars to beautiful import models, Street Racing Syndicate delivers the fast-paced world of street racing. You can race for money, pink slips, and more through the streets of LA, Philadelphia, and Miami. With each win, you'll earn cash, respect, and the affections of real-world street racing models. Use your cash to customize vehicles with licensed parts and graphic upgrades. Showcase your vehicle in online races, but be ready to drive off track if the police come

locale.title: Crazy Taxi
locale.synopsis: As a fearless cabbie with attitude, your goal is to rack up the mega-bucks before your shift ends. It's a race against the clock as you pick up passengers and peel rubber through busy streets and back alleys to their various destinations. To keep that meter collecting cash, you've gotta take the fastest route possible, even if it means bending the traffic laws - just a little. So get a grip on the wheel, sharpen your senses, and don't lose your cool.

locale.title: Crazy Taxi
locale.synopsis: As a fearless cabbie with attitude, your goal is to rack up the mega-bucks before your shift ends. To keep that meter collecting cash, you've gotta take the fastest route possible, even if it means bending the traffic laws - just a little. locale.title: Crazy Taxi
locale.synopsis: As a fearless cabbie with attitude, your goal is to rack up the mega-bucks before your shift ends. It's a race against the clock as you pick up passengers and peel rubber through busy streets and back alleys to their various destinations. To keep that meter collecting cash, you've gotta take the fastest route possible, even if it means bending the traffic laws - just a little. So get a grip on the wheel, sharpen your senses, and don't lose your cool.

locale.title: Crazy Taxi
locale.synopsis:
Das verrückteste Taxi der Welt!
Dieses Taxi sollten sie lieber nicht rufen. Denn der direkte Weg ist hier immer der kürzeste, wenn auch nicht immer der angenehmste. Über Treppen, Parks und selbst durch U-Bahn-Tunnel darf abgekürzt werden.
Stunts und guten Fahrstil kommentiert der Fahrgast mit einem Bonus, Crashs dagegen mit üblen Flüchen. Fußgänger springen rechtzeitig mit einem Schrei zur Seite und wird das Fahrziel nicht rechtzeitig erreicht, steigt der Gast mit einem bösen Kommentar aus.
Die Städte sind derart groß, dass auch nach langer Spielzeit immer wieder etwas neues zu entdecken ist. Die Straßen sind bevölkert von Autos, Lastwagen, Bussen, Bahn und einer Menge Fußgängern. Häuser und Umgebung wiederholen sich nicht, was den Eindruck vermittelt in einer echten Stadt unterwegs zu sein.
Features:
- Leicht erlernbares Spielprinzip, das bereits nach 1 Minute in Fleisch und Blut übergeht
- Atemberaubendes und abwechslungsreiches Leveldesign mit vielen Abkürzungen und Alternativrouten, die erst nach und nach entdeckt werden
- 4 verschiedene Charaktere mit unterschiedlichen Taxen + Bonusfahrzeug
- 9 innovative Mini-Games halten die Motivation am Kochen
- Arcade-Modus mit einer Nachbildung der Metropole San Francisco
- Original-Modus mit einer exklusiven neuen Strecke, die es nicht im Spielautomaten gab
- Exzellenter Soundtrack mit bekannten Bands wie z.B. Offspring oder Bad Religion

locale.title: NCAA Football 2005
locale.synopsis: NCAA Football 2005, for the Xbox, PS2 and GameCube, is taking another huge step towards differentiating the game of college football from pro football thanks to the inclusion of the new Home Field Advantage feature and a slew of tweaks geared towards the presentation, players performance and other aspects that make the game of college football a whole different ballgame. The new version of NCAA Football also boasts enhancements and additions such as improved graphics and an all new user-controlled celebrations feature.

locale.title: Cubivore: Survival of the Fittest
locale.synopsis: Will you have what it takes to become the new king of the beasts? Explore a number of different environments while consuming other animals to evolve into one of 100 possible creature combinations. Also, by collecting different items you can have access to stronger body parts such as horns and fangs, which can give you the edge in this dog-eat-dog world. However, no creature lives forever, so you’ll need to pass on your strongest traits to your offspring and the circle of life will begin again. Ultimately, the goal is to become powerful enough to topple the alpha creature and earn your rightful place at the top of the food chain.

game.name: Mahou no Pumpkin - An to Greg no Daibouken (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Mahou no Pumpkin - An to Greg no Daibouken
魔法のパンプキン 〜アンとグレッグの大冒険〜

rom.name: Mahou no Pumpkin - An to Greg no Daibouken (Japan) (JA).iso

locale.title: Castleween
locale.synopsis: In Castleween, you can choose to play the role of Alicia, a girl disguised as a witch, or Greg, a boy disguised as a devil, as they attempt to rescue their friends from a mad scientist. You can alternate between the two characters at any time during the game and discover their varying abilities. Explore creepy environments such as a haunted house, a dark cemetery, eerie forests, and an abandoned laboratory. To survive this Halloween world, you must solve puzzles and fight a variety of evil creatures.

locale.title: Catwoman
locale.synopsis: Based on the movie, Catwoman follows the story of Patience Philips, who is killed after she uncovers a dark secret held by her employers. Brought back to life by a rare Egyptian cat, she becomes Catwoman and sets out to discover the truth about herself and her murder. Players encounter key characters from the movie, including challenging bosses such as Armando, Hedare's head henchman and Laurel Hedare, the beautiful face behind the evil empire. Boasting incredible acrobatic skills, Catwoman can leap across roofs, run up walls, pounce on prey, utilize unique "cat senses," and avoid enemy bullets with feline grace. In addition, players can use Catwoman's whip to swing through the air and utilize the fully interactive enviroments to trap or knock her foes unconscious. The game features seven different locations from the movie, including the jewelery store, the Hedare Factory, mansion and grounds.

locale.title: Dinotopia - The Sunstone Odyssey
locale.synopsis: Dinotopia: The Sunstone Odyssey is being billed as an action-adventure title offers a unique blend of puzzle, role-playing and exploration elements. The game revolves around Drake Gemini, as he embarks on a personal quest to reunite his family and become a Guardian of Dinotopia. Drake will get to explore the skies and lands in an around the fabled civilization where men and dragons live together (and fight together) with uncanny harmony.

locale.title: ドラゴンドライブ ディマスターズショット
Digimon Rumble Arena 2
locale.synopsis: Digimon Rumble Arena 2 lets you play as and against your favorite Digimon characters. The game features all the popular Digimon from all four seasons of the TV show, plus secret Digimon. Each Digimon has a signature move that can earn Digipoints and, with enough Digipoints, you can Digivolve and destroy your opponents. In locations ranging from icy glaciers to fields of fire, you can conquer the Digimon in single-player mode or compete against three of your friends in multiplayer brawls.

locale.title: Dragon Ball Z - Budokai
locale.synopsis: GameCube version of Atari's best-selling DBZ brawler.

locale.title: 드래곤 볼 Z - 격투 천하제일 무도회
Dragon Ball Z: Budokai
locale.synopsis: GameCube version of Atari's best-selling DBZ brawler.

locale.title: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai
locale.synopsis:
Über 60 fantastische Kombo-Schläge! Atemberaubende 3D-Grafiken! Schalte neue Gegner im Story-Modus frei.
Halte deine Helden bereit...

locale.title: 드래곤 볼 Z: 격투 천하제일 무도회
Drome Racers
locale.synopsis: Drome Racers is a multi-terrain racing experience that will leave young speedsters breathless. Players take on the role of Max Axel who has trained intensely for the challenging Drome Championship and wants to take home the trophy. Getting behind the wheel of high-tech cars based on the 2002 LEGO? Racers construction toy range, players must face tough Multi-Challenge Races (MCR's). Each race is a seamless set of stages, mixing tracks with realistically stunning city, mountain and canyon environments. Unlike its predecessors, Drome Racers is a fast-paced "anything goes" game that will appeal to all ages and abilities with its varied, realistic terrains; sleek, LEGO Technic style cars; and road, off-road or drag racing.

locale.title: ドラえもん みんなで遊ぼう ! ミニドランド
Speed Kings
locale.synopsis: It will take nerves of steel and lightning-fast reflexes to make your way through the crowded streets of Speed Kings. In the world of street motorcycle racing, you'll weave through traffic, pull off flashy stunts, run from police, and race to the finish line. Your high-performance bikes--including sport, road, touring, and custom models--each have their own type of handling and top speeds. Perform jumps, power-downs, skids, wheelies, and stoppies, but be careful--failed attempts at these tricks result in real-time damage to both bike and rider.

locale.title: Speed Kings

locale.title: Disney's Donald Duck: Goin' Quackers
locale.synopsis: Donald runs amuck, gets hyper and goes berserk across 22 levels in this hilarious quest to rescue Daisy.

locale.title: Disney's Donald Duck: Qu@ck Att@ck
locale.synopsis: Donald runs amuck, gets hyper and goes berserk across 22 levels in this hilarious quest to rescue Daisy.

locale.title: Baldur's Gate Dark Alliance
locale.synopsis: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance features a distinctive blend of action and adventure set in the most popular Dungeons & Dragons campaign setting: The Forgotten Realms franchise owned by Wizards of the Coast Inc. Played from a third person perspective, Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance immerses players in the port town of Baldur's Gate. Faithful adaptation of the third edition rules set for the Dungeons & Dragons roleplaying game and customizable player and character development allow for an engrossing gameplay experience for up to two players at once. Dramatic spell effects and powerful abilities enhance this action-packed game, assisting the player in combat against an abundance of terrifying monsters found throughout the adventure.

locale.title: Baldur's Gate Dark Alliance
locale.synopsis: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance spielt in einer düsteren Welt, voller Intrigen, Abenteuer und Kämpfe auf Leben und Tod! Dunkelheit hat sich über das Land und auch über die Hafenstadt Baldur's Gate ausgebreitet, die an der malerischen Schwertküste liegt. Diebe und Räuber überschwemmen die gesamte Gegend und überfallen Sie selbst in den vermeintlich sicheren Mauern von Baldur's Gate. In der nächsten Schänke Zuflucht suchend, erfahren Sie von der dunklen Bedrohung, die sich über die Schwertküste legt und begeben sich auf die gefahrvolle Suche nach der Wahrheit, um Baldur's Gate vor der tödlichen Bedrohung zu retten. Ihr Weg führt Sie unter anderem auf die windumtosten Spitzen der Sonnenuntergangsgebirge, bevor die Ereignisse eskalieren und Sie auf der Suche nach der Wahrheit einen Krieg entfesseln, der die einst so schöne Schwertküste blutrot färben wird...

locale.title: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance
locale.synopsis: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance features a distinctive blend of action and adventure set in the most popular Dungeons & Dragons campaign setting: The Forgotten Realms franchise owned by Wizards of the Coast Inc. Played from a third person perspective, Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance immerses players in the port town of Baldur's Gate. Faithful adaptation of the third edition rules set for the Dungeons & Dragons roleplaying game and customizable player and character development allow for an engrossing gameplay experience for up to two players at once. Dramatic spell effects and powerful abilities enhance this action-packed game, assisting the player in combat against an abundance of terrifying monsters found throughout the adventure.

locale.title: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance
locale.synopsis: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance apresenta uma mistura distinta de ação e aventura no cenário de campanha mais popular de Dungeons & Dragons: a franquia Forgotten Realms de propriedade da Wizards of the Coast Inc. Jogado de uma perspectiva de terceira pessoa, Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance envolve os jogadores na cidade portuária de Baldur's Gate. A adaptação fiel das regras da terceira edição definidas para o RPG Dungeons & Dragons e o desenvolvimento personalizável de jogadores e personagens permitem uma experiência de jogo envolvente para até dois jogadores ao mesmo tempo. Efeitos de feitiço dramáticos e habilidades poderosas aprimoram este jogo cheio de ação, auxiliando o jogador no combate contra uma abundância de monstros terríveis encontrados ao longo da aventura.

locale.title: Baldur's Gate: Dark Alliance

locale.title: Baldur's Gate Dark Alliance
locale.synopsis: Aventurez-vous sur des terres périlleuses et contrez l'armée des forces du mal à la seule force de votre lame et de votre puissance magique. Faites évoluer votre personnage et affrontez toute une horde de créatures maléfiques.

locale.title: Defender
locale.synopsis: An intense combat-action flying experience, Defender offers players the ultimate in next-generation action and strategy. Players defend and protect the human race from an alien invasion as they assume the controls of next-generation combat-ready Defender ships. Battling an onslaught of vicious aliens, players strategically pilot their ship through more than 14 treacherous missions spanning the solar system, executing dynamic tactical maneuvers such as barrel rolls, 360-degree loops and spinning reversals in order to evade the enemy.

locale.title: Defender: For All Mankind
locale.synopsis: An intense combat-action flying experience, Defender offers players the ultimate in next-generation action and strategy. Players defend and protect the human race from an alien invasion as they assume the controls of next-generation combat-ready Defender ships. Battling an onslaught of vicious aliens, players strategically pilot their ship through more than 14 treacherous missions spanning the solar system, executing dynamic tactical maneuvers such as barrel rolls, 360-degree loops and spinning reversals in order to evade the enemy.

game.name: Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair
locale.synopsis: Princess Daphne has been kidnapped by the evil dragon Singe and hidden in a medieval castle owned by Mordroc, a powerful and malevolent wizard. To save her, you will take on the persona of Dirk the Daring, a goofy but courageous knight As he advances through the castle with the help of a magical amulet, Dirk must overcome a slew of challenges, from jumping over flaming pits and climbing ropes to flying across chasms and battling swarms of the wizard's minions. Use cat-quick reflexes, cunning and resourcefulness to solve puzzles, defeat a variety of enemies, and fight your way through the castle to find Daphne and save the kingdom from Mordroc's clutches. Dragon's Lair 3D is an entirely new, built-from-the-ground-up, three-dimensional version of the 1980s coin-op phenomenon. While it stays true to the design and storyline of the arcade game, it offers a massive 3D experience unlike anything else Dragon's Lair fans have played before along with unexpected twists for a whole new adventure. Game features include full control over Dirk the Daring for the first time - make him jump, run, roll, climb, swing, and somersault; 43 huge areas and over 250 rooms; over 30 kinds of enemies, including over a dozen new creatures designed by Don Bluth; new items, weapons, and potions along the way to choose and collect. Also featured are brand-new intro and ending movies, technically innovative and amazingly fluid animation with a unique, cell-shaded look, original 60-minute musical score, Dolby Surround Sound (Pro Logic) and a bonus feature, exclusive documentary footage from the original creators and a music video for "He's My Guy", a brand new theme song by Christopher Stone.

rom.name: Dragon's Lair 3D: Return to the Lair (USA) (EN).iso

locale.title: Dragon's Lair 3D Special Edition
locale.synopsis: Princess Daphne has been kidnapped by the evil dragon, Singe, and hidden in a medieval castle owned my Mordroc, a powerful and malevolent wizard. To save her, you will take on the role of Dirk the Daring, a goofy but courageous knight. As he advances through the castle with the help of a magical amulet, Dirk must overcome a slew of challenges, from jumping over flaming pits and climbing ropes to flying across chasms and battling swarms of the wizard's minions. Use quick reflexes, cunning, and resourcefulness to fight your way through the castle to find Daphne and save the kingdom from Mordroc's clutches.

locale.title: Die Hard: Vendetta
locale.synopsis: In Die Hard: Vendetta, tactics and stealth are just as important as having a big gun and being a quick shot. The story picks up five years after the movie Die Hard With a Vengeance, and you play as LA cop John McClane. Your daughter, now a full-grown woman on the police force, finds herself in danger, and it's up to you to save her. In your investigation, you'll meet old friends, uncover helpful clues, and solve objectives--all while using stealth or an arsenal of weaponry to move past enemies.

locale.title: Die Hard: Vendetta
locale.synopsis: In Die Hard: Vendetta, tactics and stealth are just as important as having a big gun and being a quick shot. The story picks up five years after the movie Die Hard With a Vengeance, and you play as LA cop John McClane. Your daughter, now a full-grown woman on the police force, finds herself in danger, and it's up to you to save her. In your investigation, you'll meet old friends, uncover helpful clues, and solve objectives--all while using stealth or an arsenal of weaponry to move past enemies.

locale.title: Die Hard: Vendetta

locale.title: Die Hard - Stirb Langsam: Vendetta
locale.synopsis:
John McLane ist zurück... nur dieses Mal ist der Kampf härter denn je - jetzt geht es um das Leben seiner Tochter. Vertrauen Sie auf Mc Clanes legendären Polizeiinstinkt. Nutzen Sie all Ihre Sinne und jedes Ihnen zur Verfügung stehende Hilfsmittel, um sich Ihren Weg durch L.A.'s sündige Unterwelt zu bahnen. Machen Sie den schweren Jungs das Leben zur Hölle, bringen Sie den Tag gut zu Ende und und führen Sie damti die unvergleichliche Die Hard-Saga fort.
FEATURES: - Bedienen Sie sich eines umfangreichen Arsenals an Waffen inklusive Dual-Waffen und Sprengstoff. - komplett neue Storyline mit neuen Charakteren u.a. der Tochter von McClane Lucy und vielen alten Bekannten aus den Kino-Hits. - Verschiedene Levellziele: Tarnung, Geiselbefreieung, Sabotage- und Verletzungsgrad. - Automatische Zielerfassung und automatisches Springen wurden speziell für den NINTENDO GAMECUBE entwickelt. Inklusive der original deutschen Synchronstimme von John McClane Manfred Lehmann.

locale.title: Die Hard: Vendetta
locale.synopsis: In Die Hard: Vendetta, tactics and stealth are just as important as having a big gun and being a quick shot. The story picks up five years after the movie Die Hard With a Vengeance, and you play as LA cop John McClane. Your daughter, now a full-grown woman on the police force, finds herself in danger, and it's up to you to save her. In your investigation, you'll meet old friends, uncover helpful clues, and solve objectives--all while using stealth or an arsenal of weaponry to move past enemies.

locale.title: Digimon World 4
locale.synopsis: The Digimon are ready to embark on a new adventure filled with intense battles. In Digimon World 4, all access to the real world has been terminated, security has been breached, and a new mysterious world has been discovered. Now it's up to you, the Digital Security Guard, to investigate and bring peace back to the Digital World. You can play as your favorite Digimon from the TV series and unlock special Digivolved Digimon by mastering skills and techniques. With the PlayStation 2 multitap, you can play with up to three of your friends in multiplayer mode.

locale.title: Digimon World X
locale.synopsis: The Digimon are ready to embark on a new adventure filled with intense battles. In Digimon World 4, all access to the real world has been terminated, security has been breached, and a new mysterious world has been discovered. Now it's up to you, the Digital Security Guard, to investigate and bring peace back to the Digital World. You can play as your favorite Digimon from the TV series and unlock special Digivolved Digimon by mastering skills and techniques. With the PlayStation 2 multitap, you can play with up to three of your friends in multiplayer mode.

locale.title: デジモンワールドＸ
locale.synopsis:
本作は、今までの「デジモンワールド」シリーズのような壮大なストーリーを踏襲しつつも、シリーズ初となるアクション性に特化したアクションＲＰＧ！
プレイヤーの操作によって、敵を殴る・斬る・撃つと攻撃したり、ジャンプして飛び跳ねたりとデジモンたちが画面狭しと大暴れ！また、最大４人での同時プレイが可能。はじめから４人でプレイすることはもちろん、ゲーム途中から人数を増やしてプレイすることもできる。
また、デジモンならではの進化要素も満載！各デジモンごとに得意な武器やスキルが存在するので、どの進化体を選び、どのスキルを極めるかはプレイヤー次第だ。 育成したデジモンを持ち寄ってストーリーをプレイしよう！

locale.title: Disney Sports: Soccer
locale.synopsis: Disney Sports Soccer takes the fun of a neighborhood soccer game and adds your favorite Disney characters. In three different game modes, including a multiplayer mode, you can use magic, power-ups, and special moves to defeat your opponents. Up to four players can assume the role of Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Goofy, or other Disney favorites, and they can compete in a variety of stadiums, including Eagle Summit. You can also exchange items between your Game Boy Advance and GameCube.

locale.title: Disney Sports: Soccer
locale.synopsis: Get ready for hard-hitting tackles and wild touchdowns as Mickey, Goofy, and other Disney characters take to the gridiron. In Disney Sports Football, you'll create a team and compete in four modes: Challenge, Cup, Exhibition, and Practice. You'll have plenty of running and passing plays, offensive and defensive formations, and turbo moves to master, plus magic items to boost your team's performance. In single or multiplayer modes, you'll face a variety of opponents inside fantastic stadiums.

locale.title: ディズニースポーツ:サッカー
Disney Sports: Football
locale.synopsis: Get ready for hard-hitting tackles and wild touchdowns as Mickey, Goofy, and other Disney characters take to the gridiron. In Disney Sports Football, you'll create a team and compete in four modes: Challenge, Cup, Exhibition, and Practice. You'll have plenty of running and passing plays, offensive and defensive formations, and turbo moves to master, plus magic items to boost your team's performance. In single or multiplayer modes, you'll face a variety of opponents inside fantastic stadiums.

locale.title: Disney Sports: Fußball
locale.synopsis:
"Disney Sports: Fußball" beinhaltet den Spass eines Nachbarschafts-Fußballspiels und begeistert zusätzlich mit dem Disney-typischen Flair. Drei Spielmodi inklusive dem Callenge Cup, Ligamodus und Multiplayer-Modus sorgen für ein spannendes wie witziges Fußballerlebnis. Benutzen Sie aufregende "Magis Moves", um Ihre Lieblingsfiguren aus der Disney-Welt zum Sieg zu führen.
FEATURES:
- Konamis Fun-Fußballspiel mit Disney-Lizenz
- Kunterbuntes Cartoonspiel mit allen beliebten Disneyfiguren
- Unkompliziertes Fungame, mit einzigartigen "Magic Moves"
- In der Zukunft wird es noch andere Disney Sports Titel geben (z.B. Basketball, Snowboarding, Skateboarding und Motocross)
- Exclusiv für Nintendo-Konsolen (GameCube + GBA)

locale.title: Disney Sports: Basketball
locale.synopsis: Disney Sports Basketball brings exaggerated moves and original locations to life as your favorite Disney characters take to the court. Mickey and his pals, who include Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, and Goofy, come together for three-on-three-style basketball action with arcade-style gameplay. Choose your team, and then take on five game modes, including Exhibition, Season, and All-Star Game, among others. If you can master the game's intuitive controls, you can take your team all the way to the finals or dominate three of your friends in Multiplayer mode.

game.name: Disney's Magical Mirror Starring Mickey Mouse (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Disney's Magical Mirror Starring Mickey Mouse
locale.synopsis: Everyone's favorite character, Mickey Mouse, makes his Nintendo Gamecube debut in this interactive story. Trapped in a magical mirror, Mickey Mouse finds himself in an alternate universe that strangely resembles his house. Mickey yearns to get through the mirror, back to his bed and his peaceful dreams! Getting there won't be easy though, because he will need to recover the broken mirror pieces strewn about the house by a mischievous, troublemaking ghost.

locale.title: ドカポンDX －わたる世界はオニだらけ－
도카폰 DX: 살아갈 세상은 귀신 투성이
Disney's Donald Duck: PK
locale.synopsis: A third-person action game based on the popular sci-fi comic book series published by Disney.

locale.title: Disneys Donald Duck: Phantomias - Platyrhynchos Kineticus
locale.synopsis:
Phantomias, der beliebte Held aus zahlreichen Disney Comic-Büchern ist zurück. Beschützen Sie als Phantomias die Welt vor der Bedrohung der Evronians, die nur eins im Sinn haben - die Versklavung der Menschheit. Erleben Sie aufregende Abenteuer in einer faszinierenden Sci-Fi-Welt ganz im Stil der berühmten Disney-Cartoons.
FEATURES:
- Alle Charaktere stammen aus den original Comics von Disney
- Cel-Shading ermöglicht eine einzigartige Graphik im Disney typischen Cartoon-Stil
- 4 traumhafte Sci-Fi Welten: von der Unterwasserbasis bis zum Mutterraumschiff der Evronians mit insgesamt 13 aktionsgeladenen Leveln
- Einzigartiges Gameplay: Jump & Run Shooter - im Kampf gegen die Evronians steht Ihnen eine durchschlagende Waffe zu Seite
- Unzählige Animationssequenzen und brillante Soundeffekte
- Komplett in Deutsch

locale.title: ミスタードリラー ドリルランド
Darkened Skye
locale.synopsis: A real-time action/adventure game for teens and adults based around several of the popular and enigmatic Skittles: Taste the Rainbow fantasy television commercials. It features a level-based, third-person-shooter style of design, but also includes a rich story line and a healthy dose of adventure game-type puzzles. Skye, our heroine, fights and puzzles her way through 30 real-time levels. Gameplay within each level is open-ended, free-roaming and non-linear. Magic takes the place of high-tech weaponry in the frequent combat encounters, while cutting-edge humor replaces blood and gore. The game is rendered in beautiful, high fantasy style and the quest is serious but Skye and her companion, a mouthy little gargoyle named Draak, make a steady stream of irreverent observations that poke fun at gaming cliches, themselves and their hopeless quest.

locale.title: Darkened Skye

locale.title: Dead to Rights
locale.synopsis: A cop framed for murder and facing execution makes a daring escape and seeks revenge on those who killed his father and set him up. What he discovers sends him on a downward spiral into a labyrinth of corruption betrayal and crime. Can he get the culprits DEAD TO RIGHTS??

locale.title: Dead to Rights
locale.synopsis: A cop framed for murder and facing execution makes a daring escape and seeks revenge on those who killed his father and set him up. What he discovers sends him on a downward spiral into a labyrinth of corruption betrayal and crime. Can he get the culprits DEAD TO RIGHTS??

locale.title: Dark Summit
locale.synopsis: Snowboarders have never felt welcome on Mt. Garrick, a once quiet and peaceful ski resort. Chief O' Leary, the resident ranger, has led the charge against boarders and limited their access to certain sections of the mountain. But the situation has progressed. Chief O'Leary has mysteriously closed the summit to all boarders and is trying desperately to drive them off the mountain.

locale.title: Dark Summit
locale.synopsis: Snowboarders have never felt welcome on Mt. Garrick, a once quiet and peaceful ski resort. Chief O' Leary, the resident ranger, has led the charge against boarders and limited their access to certain sections of the mountain. But the situation has progressed. Chief O'Leary has mysteriously closed the summit to all boarders and is trying desperately to drive them off the mountain.

locale.title: Def Jam Vendetta
locale.synopsis: Def Jam VENDETTA invites you to the underground circuit of hardcore brawling. Get your props as you hook up with the urban local legends and battle for ultimate supremacy. Featuring an original storyline and more than 45 unique characters, Def Jam VENDETTA by EA SPORTS BIG provides over 1,500 varying moves, including dozens of signature special moves and taunts. This is your chance to earn money, power, and respect. Advance through more than 10 highly-detailed hip-hop venues, each filled with animated crowds, hot beats, and original music, and see if you can overthrow D-Mob, the underground king.

locale.title: Def Jam Vendetta
locale.synopsis: Def Jam VENDETTA invites you to the underground circuit of hardcore brawling. Get your props as you hook up with the urban local legends and battle for ultimate supremacy. Featuring an original storyline and more than 45 unique characters, Def Jam VENDETTA by EA SPORTS BIG provides over 1,500 varying moves, including dozens of signature special moves and taunts. This is your chance to earn money, power, and respect. Advance through more than 10 highly-detailed hip-hop venues, each filled with animated crowds, hot beats, and original music, and see if you can overthrow D-Mob, the underground king.

locale.title: デュエル・マスターズ 熱闘!バトルアリーナ
Driven
locale.synopsis: In Story mode, you follow the skid-mark adventures of cagey vet Joe Tanto as he tries to reign in young hotshot Jimmy Bly. As you progress in Story mode, you can unlock hidden cars and tracks. In all, there are 12 drivers to choose from, each with unique personalities and driving styles. The eight tracks include Angel's Bay in California, downtown New York traffic and the English countryside. The main difference between this racing game and all the others is that it emphasizes teamwork, with one driver blocking to ensure that his partner can capture success for the team.

locale.title: Disney Sports Football
locale.synopsis: Mickey and his pals turn football upside down! Get ready for some serious game with explosive tackles and spectacular touchdowns as Mickey, Goofy and other Disney favorites take to the gridiron. With pick-up-and-play controls and the unique combination of Disney fun and football action, this game is perfect for players of all ages.

locale.title: Disney Sports - American Football
locale.synopsis: Mickey and his pals turn football upside down! Get ready for some serious game with explosive tackles and spectacular touchdowns as Mickey, Goofy and other Disney favorites take to the gridiron. With pick-up-and-play controls and the unique combination of Disney fun and football action, this game is perfect for players of all ages.

locale.title: ディズニースポーツ：アメリカンフットボール
Disney Sports Skateboarding
locale.synopsis: Grind and ollie with Mickey and his pals in Disney Sports Skateboarding. As Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, Goofy, or other Disney characters, you'll skateboard through eight expansive levels and five game modes. In each level, you can perform character-specific special moves and more than 40 different tricks. As you complete goals, such as scoring a certain number of points or reaching checkpoints, you'll unlock skateboards, outfits, and stickers. You can also skate the streets by yourself or with a friend in Multiplayer mode.

locale.title: Midway Arcade Treasures 3
locale.synopsis: The third installment in the successful Midway Arcade Treasures series, this package focuses on Midway's run of blockbuster arcade racing games. Complete with multiplayer competitive experiences (in the arcade games that apply), the package includes San Francisco Rush -- The Rock: Alcatraz Edition, San Francisco Rush 2049, Hydro Thunder, Badlands, Off Road Thunder: Mud, Sweat 'N Gears, Super Off Road (and its Bonus Tracks Pack), Race Drivin', and S.T.U.N. Runner.

locale.title: 4x4 Evo 2
locale.synopsis: So you've had enough of watching your favorite SUV pillage some rocky terrain in a TV commercial and decide to imitate art. Only, you paid a lot for that SUV and the idea of scratching its paint or blowing out its transmission is holding you back from your dirty dreams. Worry not, Mud Warrior, just slip in 4x4 EVO 2 and witness the awesome power high torque all terrain vehicles possess. The game features Quick Race, Free Roam, Time Attack and Career Racing, hundreds of licensed vehicles, parts for customization, and 30 racing stages from across the world.

locale.title: TMNT: Mutant Melee
locale.synopsis: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles return in their first party game experience. Gather your friends to join you in a variety of minigames and adventures that feature more than 20 playable characters, including all four turtles, Casey Jones, April O'Neil, Master Splinter, and even the evil Shredder. TMNT Mutant Melee features two modes--adventure story and melee match--which are playable either solo or with up to three other players. In each mode, you can collect tokens to unlock additional content.

game.name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures (USA) (EN,FR)

locale.title: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures
locale.synopsis: Midway brings back all the craziness of the Cartoon Network's ED, EDD, N EDDY with ED, EDD, N EDDY: MIS-EDVENTURES for the Game Cube. Centering around three kids with the same name, MIS-EDVENTURES follows Ed, Edd, and Eddy through yet another of their zany adventures. Gamers will control all three kids throughout the game, switching between them at any point. Each of the three had their own special abilities, and players will need to master each character to get through the puzzle-filled levels. Ed is the powerhouse of the team, able to pick up large objects and move them out of the way. Edd can operate machinery and can make use of different items. Eddy has stealth abilities and is the only character who can use stink bombs to get enemies out of the way. Each of the three also has an unique team-up move that involved all three characters working together. The levels contain the typical insanity often found in the cartoon. On the first level, for example, players have to try to sell a number of snow cones from their snow cone stand; however, to get the business going, players have to steal ice from other characters. There are eight different scams to complete, each of which involves Ed, Edd, and Eddy making use of whatever they can find or steal. Gamers who love ED, EDD, N EDDY will love stepping into the characters' shoes with ED EDD N EDDY: MIS-EDVENTURES.

locale.title: 에드, 에드 엔 에디: 더 미스-에드벤쳐스

rom.name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures (USA) (EN,FR).iso

locale.title: Skies of Arcadia Legends
locale.synopsis: Enhanced port of the Dreamcast RPG, offering a mix of real-time exploration and turn-based battle sequences. Like the RPGs of old, Final Fantasy and Dragon Warrior, the basic idea is to send a player out into the world to slay groups of enemies, gain experience, buy weapons and items, and accomplish something grand. As lead character Vyse and his trusty female sidekick, Aika, you dock one of the evil Valuan's ships to take it over and grab some loot. As members of the Blue Rogues -- pirates that in Robin Hood fashion give to the poor and steal from the corrupted rich -- it's your whole life. In the process, you stumble into more than you bargained for. The actual gameplay itself revolves around several different devices: turn-based ground and air battles, airship-to-airship duels, and real-time 3D exploration.

locale.title: Eternal Arcadia Legends
locale.synopsis:
Described by Sega as the "director's cut" of the acclaimed Skies of Arcadia for the SEGA Dreamcast, "Skies of Arcadia Legends" features a refined battle system and hours of all-new gameplay chronicling the back-story of the original game's main characters.
In the game, you take on the role of the leader of a roaming band of Air Pirates on a perilous quest spanning six diverse worlds. Skies of Arcadia Legends teems with more than 300 unique characters, more than 70 weapons and dozens of magic spells and items.

locale.title: エターナルアルカディア レジェンド
Skies of Arcadia Legends
locale.synopsis: Enhanced port of the Dreamcast RPG, offering a mix of real-time exploration and turn-based battle sequences. Like the RPGs of old, Final Fantasy and Dragon Warrior, the basic idea is to send a player out into the world to slay groups of enemies, gain experience, buy weapons and items, and accomplish something grand. As lead character Vyse and his trusty female sidekick, Aika, you dock one of the evil Valuan's ships to take it over and grab some loot. As members of the Blue Rogues -- pirates that in Robin Hood fashion give to the poor and steal from the corrupted rich -- it's your whole life. In the process, you stumble into more than you bargained for. The actual gameplay itself revolves around several different devices: turn-based ground and air battles, airship-to-airship duels, and real-time 3D exploration.

locale.title: Skies of Arcadia Legends
locale.synopsis:
Skies of Arcadia Legends umfasst eine gigantisch große Welt, die in sechs Kontinente unterteilt ist. Erleben Sie ein fesselndes Abenteuer in einer lebendigen Umgebung, das über 40 Stunden Rollenspielspaß pur bietet. Im Laufe der Handlung treffen Sie auf mehr als 300 interessante Charaktere, von denen jeder seine eigene Geschichte zu erzählen hat.
Besser als jemals zuvor:
Skies of Arcadia bietet neue Gameplay-Features, eine noch umfangreichere Storyline sowie ein optimiertes Kampfsystem. Über 70 Waffen und zahllose weitere Ausrüstungsgegenstände stehen Ihnen ebenso zur Verfügung, wie eine Vielzahl an wirkungsvollen Zaubersprüchen. Skies of Arcadia Legends erzählt die packende Geschichte einer Expedition ans Ende der Welt. In der Rolle von Vyse, dem Anführer einer Gruppe rebellischer Luftpiraten, machen Sie und Ihre Gefährten sich auf die Suche nach den sechs heiligen Mondsteinen. Nur wer sie besitzt, hat die Macht über die Gigas - unbesiegbare magische Wesen.
FEATURES:
- Über 40 Stunden Rollenspielspaß pur
- Mehr als 300 Charaktere
- Kämpfe mit über 70 Waffen und 36 magischen Fähigkeiten in atemberaubenden Schiffsschlachten
- Erstelle dein eigenes Luftschiff und heuere bis zu 22 Crew Mitglieder an
- Neue "Fahndungslisten"-Kämpfe, neue Charaktere und vieles mehr...

locale.title: Evolution Snowboarding
locale.synopsis: The unprecedented experience of Evolution Snowboarding offers players a selection of 10 real riders - including 2002 Winter Olympic silver medallist Danny Kass - and top of the line gear that only the best snowboarders in the world use themselves. Once gamers have chosen their boarder and equipment, nothing can stop them from performing wicked tricks and shredding up the slopes. This action-packed slopes experience offers an easy-to-use control scheme for snowboarders and novice gamers alike, while fusing combative action with high speed riding down the hills. A new "Mission Style" mode adds to the excitement by featuring unique new mysterious and exotic levels - including Chinatown - along with fun objectives to accomplish.

locale.title: Evolution Snowboarding

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis: Mature, third-person horror adventure from the makers of the original Legacy of Kain. Featuring 12 playable characters throughout history, including a Roman Centurion and a priest during the period of Inquisition, the story follows Alexandra Roivas, a young, beautiful woman whose grandfather's body has just been found in his dark and moody mansion, bloodied and torn apart, his head missing. When she learns that the local police have been unable to uncover any clues regarding the obvious murder, she decides to take matters into her own hands. It's when she arrives at her deceased relative's mansion to investigate that the tale of Eternal Darkness truly begins.

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis: Maturo, Aventura de terror em terceira pessoa dos criadores do original Legacy of Kain. Apresentando 12 personagens jogáveis ao longo da história, incluindo um centurião romano e um sacerdote durante o período da Inquisição, a história segue Alexandra Roivas, uma jovem e bela mulher cujo corpo do avô acaba de ser encontrado em sua mansão escura e sombria, ensanguentado e dilacerado, sua cabeça faltando. Quando ela descobre que a polícia local não conseguiu descobrir nenhuma pista sobre o assassinato óbvio, ela decide resolver o problema por conta própria. É quando ela chega à mansão de seu parente falecido para investigar que o conto das Trevas Eternas realmente começa.

locale.title: エターナルダークネス －招かれた13人－
locale.synopsis: 太古の地球を支配し、数千年の時を隔てて 復活を企てる「エンシャント」。 そして、その野望をくい止めようと立ち向かう １２人の選ばれし者たち…。 ２０００年を越える歴史と 世界中のロケーションを舞台に、 彼等は人類の存続をかけて、 人知を超えた存在「エンシャント」に 立ち向かう。

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis: Mature, third-person horror adventure from the makers of the original Legacy of Kain. Featuring 12 playable characters throughout history, including a Roman Centurion and a priest during the period of Inquisition, the story follows Alexandra Roivas, a young, beautiful woman whose grandfather's body has just been found in his dark and moody mansion, bloodied and torn apart, his head missing. When she learns that the local police have been unable to uncover any clues regarding the obvious murder, she decides to take matters into her own hands. It's when she arrives at her deceased relative's mansion to investigate that the tale of Eternal Darkness truly begins.

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis:
Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem est un jeu qui vous lance dans une aventure qui traverse le temps et l'espace pour vous faire voyager avec 12 personnages jouables sur 2000 ans d'histoire et vous faire découvrir les plus grands secrets du passé de l'humanité.
Dans ce voyage de la Rome antique à nos jour qu'est Eternal Darkness, l'intrigue se noue autour des aventures d'une pétulante jeune étudiante répondant au nom d'Alexandra Roivas qui décide de se rendre aux États-Unis, dans le Rhode Island, pour enquêter sur la mort mystérieuse de son grand-père. Elle est vite confrontée à de troublantes découvertes.
À mesure que le récit avance, Alexandra fait l'expérience de plusieurs événements différents au travers des autres personnages du jeu et finit par percer les mystères de deux millénaires d'avancée humaine.
Ne vous y trompez pas ! Le jeu n'est pas juste une petite leçon d'histoire tranquille. Il vous faudra également combattre à travers les ages avec des armes propres à chaque époque, que vous incarniez un centurion de la Rome antique ou que vous soyiez membre d'un dangereux gang des années 2000.
Avec Eternal Darkness, vous découvrirez aussi un système inédit de jauge de santé mentale de votre personnage. Ceci vous permet de ressentir les émotions de votre héros à l'écran comme jamais auparavant. Si votre personnage ne parvient pas à avoir le dessus sur les monstres, votre Jauge de Folie augmente et votre personnage (et vous par la même occasion) va se mettre à halluciner !
Le jeu offre également un système d'animation tout à fait révolutionnaire qui vous permet d'apprécier les réactions et émotions de vos personnages avec une lisibilité extraordinaire, sans compter les superbes graphismes 3D avec des prouesses techniques comme le placage de textures, ou les effets de lumière ou de brouillard volumétriques.
En plus, Eternal Darkness est un régal pour les oreilles autant que pour les yeux. Avec une bande son obsédante et des effets sonores à vous donner la chair de poule, vous allez vous retrouver dans une aventure extraordinaire comme vous n'en avez jamais vue.
Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem harmonise musique, effets sonores, travail artistique, technologie et gameplay pour obtenir un résultat dépassant de loin tout ce que vous avez déjà pu voir jusqu'à maintenant.

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis:
In einer Geschichte über Raum und Zeit hinweg bietet „Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem“ 12 steuerbare Figuren, die die Geheimnisse der menschlichen Geschichte der letzten 2000 Jahre enträtseln. Die Geschichte von „Eternal Darkness“, vom antiken Rom bis zur Gegenwart, entwickelt sich rund um eine junge Studentin mit Namen Alexandra Roivas. Sie reist nach Rhode Island, USA, um den geheimnisvollen Tod ihres Großvaters zu untersuchen. Aber bald entdeckt sie viel mehr, als sie erwartet hätte.
Im Spielverlauf widerfahren Alexandra einige Ereignisse durch die anderen Charaktere des Spiels und nach und nach entschlüsselt sie die Mysterien hinter zwei Jahrtausenden menschlicher Entwicklung. Aber dies ist keine einfache Geschichtsstunde. Du musst mit historisch genauen Waffen deinen Kampf durch die Zeit bestreiten: von einem Zenturio im antiken Rom bis zu einem gefährlichen Fight im Jahr 2000 irgendwo in einem Stadtzentrum in den USA.
„Eternal Darkness“ bietet auch ein einzigartiges Verstands-System, durch das die Gefühle deiner Bildschirmfigur wie noch nie zuvor auf dich selbst rückkoppeln. Wenn du es nicht schaffst, die Monster zu besiegen, steigt deine Verstands-Anzeige und löst dadurch Halluzinationen aus, die sich in der „realen Welt“ manifestieren.
Das Spiel basiert auf einer epochalen Animations-Engine, die die Figuren mit sichtbaren, emotionalen Ausdrücken zum Leben erweckt. Technische Tricks wie Bump-Mapping, Raytraced Lightmaps und Volumetric Fogging erzeugen beeindruckende 3D-Grafiken. Aber „Eternal Darkness“ wirkt auf die Ohren genau so gut wie auf die Augen. Ein beklemmender Soundtrack und gruselige, atmosphärische Klangeffekte nehmen dich in der Handlung gefangen wie noch nie zuvor.
Fakt ist: „Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem“ wird Musik, Klangeffekte, Artwork, Technik, Story und Gameplay in einer Art und Weise vereinen, die du noch nie in einem Videospiel gesehen haben wirst.

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis:
Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem, una historia que se extiende en el tiempo y el espacio, con 12 personajes que desentrañan los secretos de la historia de la humanidad en los últimos 2000 años.
Desde la antigua Roma a la actualidad, la historia de Eternal Darkness gira entorno a una joven estudiante, Alexandra Roivas. Ésta viaja a Rhode Island, EE.UU. para investigar la misteriosa muerte de su abuelo. Pero descubre más de lo que esperaba. A medida que avanza el juego, Alexandra vive experiencias a través de los distintos personajes y termina desvelando el misterio que se esconde tras dos milenios de historia. No se trata sólo una clase de historia. Debes luchar con armas acordes con el momento histórico: desde un centurión en la Roma Clásica al peligro de la gran ciudad en la América de 2000. Eternal Darkness también contiene un sistema de salud único: te hace sentir las emociones de tu personaje como nunca antes. Si no consigues derrotar a los monstruos, tu medidor de salud aumenta, dando lugar a alucinaciones que se manifiestan en el "mundo real". El juego contiene un sensacional motor de animación que hace que los personajes cobren vida de modo muy visible, además de fantásticos gráficos 3D con lindezas técnicas como bump-mapping, mapas de luz con raytracing y niebla volumétrica. Eternal Darkness es tan agradable al oído como a la vista. La música evocadora y los escalofriantes efectos de sonido te harán imbuirte en la acción como nunca antes. De hecho, Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem combina, música, efectos de sonido, gráficos, tecnología, argumento y jugabilidad de un modo jamás visto en un videojuego.

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis:
In una storia che abbraccia spazio e tempo, Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem introduce 12 personaggi da controllare attraverso i segreti che hanno caratterizzato la storia dell'umanità negli ultimi 2000 anni.
Dall'antica Roma ai giorni d'oggi, la storia di Eternal Darkness si evolve intorno a una giovane ed elegante studentessa, Alexandra Roivas, che si reca in viaggio a Rhode Island, negli Stati Uniti, per investigare sulla misteriosa morte di suo nonno. Ma Alexandra scoprirà ben presto molto di più di quanto si aspetta.
Con lo svolgimento del gioco, Alexandra è resa partecipe degli eventi attraverso gli altri personaggi, riuscendo a sbloccare i misteri che si nascondono dietro a due millenni di evoluzione umana.
Ma non si tratta di una semplice lezione di storia. Nelle tue battaglie attraverso il tempo, devi combattere con armi adeguate per ogni periodo temporale, trasformandoti da centurione dell'antica Roma a pericoloso teppista del Bronx dei giorni nostri.
Eternal Darkness presenta inoltre l'esclusivo misuratore di instabilità mentale, che ti fa provare le emozioni del tuo personaggio sullo schermo come mai prima d'ora. Se non riesci a sconfiggere i mostri, l'indicatore aumenta, scatenando allucinazioni che si manifestano nel "mondo reale".
Il gioco è inoltre caratterizzato da un innovativo motore grafico che porta in vita i personaggi dotandoli di reazioni emotive visibili, accanto a sorprendenti effetti di grafica tridimensionale che include tecniche astute come la mappatura dei salti, mappe a irraggiamento e nebbia volumetrica.
Eternal Darkness è piacevole non solo per la vista, ma anche per l'udito. Con un motivo musicale ossessionante ed effetti sonori dall'atmosfera raccappricciante, sarai intrappolato nell'azione come mai prima d'ora.
Effettivamente, Eternal Darkness: Sanity?s Requiem si può considerare come una combinazione di musica, effetti sonori, artwork, tecnologia, storia e gameplay mai sperimentata finora in un videogioco.

locale.title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem
locale.synopsis: Maturo, Aventura de terror em terceira pessoa dos criadores do original Legacy of Kain. Apresentando 12 personagens jogáveis ao longo da história, incluindo um centurião romano e um sacerdote durante o período da Inquisição, a história segue Alexandra Roivas, uma jovem e bela mulher cujo corpo do avô acaba de ser encontrado em sua mansão escura e sombria, ensanguentado e dilacerado, sua cabeça faltando. Quando ela descobre que a polícia local não conseguiu descobrir nenhuma pista sobre o assassinato óbvio, ela decide resolver o problema por conta própria. É quando ela chega à mansão de seu parente falecido para investigar que o conto das Trevas Eternas realmente começa.

game.name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg
locale.synopsis: Action platformer from the makers of Sonic. Players take control of the clucky title character, Billy Hatcher, and try to bring light back to his now darkened home world. To do so, he must free a bunch of elders that are trapped inside golden chicken eggs. The idea is to find these and other eggs and roll them around the sprawling levels, smash enemies and collect fruit until they are ready to hatch, and then crack the suckers open to bring a small, friendly animal into this world. Billy can hatch penguins, seals, and other creatures and command them to help him on his quest

光與蛋～比利哈恰的大冒險～

locale.title: Egg Mania: Eggstreme Madness
locale.synopsis: The puzzle genre has gone largely ignored for GameCube over the past year since it has launched. Only Tetris Worlds and ZooCube have been released to appease purist puzzle fanatics' desires. Too unpolished and boring to some, both titles were met with mediocre reviews, and we looked forward to the next company that would try to bring something to the genre. As it turns out, Kemco's Egg Mania: Eggstreme Madness, developed by HotGen Studios, is the next puzzle installment on GameCube. It offers up a novel take on the foundation that Tetris laid down over a decade ago,

locale.title: エッグマニア つかんで!まわして!どっすんぱずる!
에그 매니아: 잡고! 돌려! 돗슨 퍼즐!
Eggo Mania
locale.synopsis: The puzzle genre has gone largely ignored for GameCube over the past year since it has launched. Only Tetris Worlds and ZooCube have been released to appease purist puzzle fanatics' desires. Too unpolished and boring to some, both titles were met with mediocre reviews, and we looked forward to the next company that would try to bring something to the genre. As it turns out, Kemco's Egg Mania: Eggstreme Madness, developed by HotGen Studios, is the next puzzle installment on GameCube. It offers up a novel take on the foundation that Tetris laid down over a decade ago,

locale.title: James Bond 007: Everything Or Nothing
locale.synopsis: Think like Bond, act like Bond, and experience an entirely new Bond adventure. James Bond, the world's greatest secret agent, returns in Everything or Nothing with new guns and gadgets, combat skills, and clever tricks--and it's up to you to put them to good use. Travel through four exciting continents including the Valley of the Kings in Egypt and the French Quarter in New Orleans. The game also features two-player co-op missions and four-player multiplayer arena modes.

locale.title: James Bond 007: Alles oder Nichts
locale.synopsis: "James Bond 007: Alles oder Nichts" kennt keine Grenzen. Das Spiel kombiniert die mitreißende Action eines Third-Person-Shooters mit wilden Verfolgungsjagden in Hubschraubern, Sportwagen und auf Motorrädern. Du kannst Qs neueste Gadgets ausprobieren, den Ladys schöne Augen machen und diverse Extras freischalten, indem du spezielle "Bond-Momente" erlebst. Außerdem kannst du dich mit einem befreundeten Agenten in Multiplayer-Duellen messen oder mit ihm in gemeinsamen Missionen kooperieren. Eine komplette Original-Story mit den Gesichtern und Synchronstimmen von Stars wie Pierce Brosnan, Willem Dafoe, Heidi Klum und vielen Anderen macht es möglich, dass du dich fühlst wie in deinem eigenen 007-Film.

locale.title: 007: Everything or Nothing

locale.title: 007 - Everything or Nothing
locale.synopsis: Pense como Bond, aja como Bond e experimente uma aventura de Bond inteiramente nova. James Bond, o maior agente secreto do mundo, retorna em Everything or Nothing com novas armas e dispositivos, habilidades de combate e truques inteligentes - e cabe a você colocá-los em bom uso. Viaje por quatro continentes empolgantes, incluindo o Vale dos Reis no Egito e o Bairro Francês em Nova Orleans. O jogo também apresenta missões cooperativas para dois jogadores e modos de arena multijogador para quatro jogadores.

locale.title: Capcom vs. SNK 2 EO
locale.synopsis: Capcom VS SNK 2 is composed almost entirely of classic Street Fighter and SNK fighting techniques, which means lots of charge moves, half and quarter circles, and super moves. What's new to the game are the different "grooves," or fighting styles. Although the "Capcom" and "SNK" grooves were introduced in a previous game, Capcom VS SNK 2 takes this concept a step further by introducing six different grooves: C, A, P, S, N, and K. Depending on which groove you choose, the type and number of fighting techniques you have available changes, with half of the grooves leaning towards traditional Capcom fighting and the other half leaning towards SNK-styled battle. The difference between the two fighting styles is mainly the availability of certain non-lethal moves such as air blocks, dodging, and rolling, with each groove having its own balanced mixture of the said moves.

locale.title: Capcom vs. SNK 2 EO: Millionaire Fighting 2001
locale.synopsis: Mehr Kämpfer... Mehr Kampfstile... Mehr Techniken... Action extrem! Zwei Kampf-Legenden kehren in einem sensationellen Titel zurück! Capcom vs SNK 2 EO entfesselt geschmeidige, blitzschnelle Animationen und klassische Arcade-Action auf dem Nintendo Gamecube. Wählen Sie aus über 44 Figuren aus den Capcom- und SNK-Kampfuniversen und entwickeln Sie Ihren Kampfstil mit noch mehr "Grooves". Capcom vs SNK 2 EO - ein knochenharter Kampf von epischen Ausmaßen! * Die gewaltige Fortsetzung zum 'Fighter des Jahres' Capcom vs SNK. * Erweitern und perfektionieren Sie Ihren Stil in 6 verschiedenen "Grooves". * Über 44 Figuren aus den Capcom- und SNK-Universen. * Fantastische Animationen und Capcoms erstklassiges Gameplay. * Der erste Capcom vs SNK-Titel für den Nintendo Gamecube.

locale.synopsis: Konami's take on extreme sports includes boss fights and a cameo by Solid Snake.

locale.title: Shinki Sekai Evolutia
locale.synopsis: Evolution Worlds is the next episode in the epic adventure of heroes, Mag and Linear, from Evolution and Evolution 2. After the demise of a superior ancient civilization, Cyframe technology -- enchanted mechanical body weaponry -- is discovered. Every young adolescent aspires to be a Cyframe "Adventurer," including Evolution Worlds' feisty hero, Mag.

locale.title: 神機世界エヴォルシア
locale.synopsis:
『神機世界エヴォルシア』は、プレイヤーであるあなたが冒険家となり先史の超古代文明の謎を解き明かす“本各冒険ロールプレイングゲーム”です。 田舎町のパンナムタウンに住む冒険家の少年マグ・ランチャーと謎多き少女リニア、マグの家に仕える執事のグレにランチャー家のライバル、ガン家の娘チェインが「幻のサイフレーム」を探し求めて巨大な敵と戦うドキドキワクワクのストーリーが楽しる。さあ、いますぐ冒険に出かけよう！
先史の超文明が滅んで何万年も過ぎた後の世界。 後発の人類文明がようやく潜水艦や航空艇を作るにまで進化した西方暦９３０年代も終わりの頃。 先史文明遺跡から発掘された古代の道具-サイフレーム-を持つ者は『冒険家』あるいは『サイフレーム使い』と呼ばれ、ソシエテという調査機関からの依頼を受けながら遺跡の発掘作業を生業としていた。パンナムタウンに住む少年マグ・ランチャーの夢は、両親のような一流の冒険家になることだ。 ランチャー家は代々有名な冒険家を輩出してきた一流の家系だったが、今は没落する一方だった。 マグの両親は冒険の旅に出たまま行方不明になっており、ランチャー家を支えているのは若き当主であるマグだった。マグの住むパンナムタウンの近くには先史の遺跡が数多くあり、他国から有能な冒険家が遺跡発掘のために訪れる街であった。マグも他の冒険家同様、遺跡発掘の冒険を繰り返す毎日を送っていた。遺跡の発掘作業をするマグの横にはいつもリニアという少女がいた。３年前、突然マグの家に現れたリニアはマグの父が書いた手紙を持っていた。父が書いたその手紙には『マグ、この子リニアを守れ』とだけ書いてあった。執事のグレが見守る中、マグはサイフレームを自在に操り、今日もリニアと冒険へ向かう…。
