locale.title: Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure
locale.synopsis: Disney characters step out of the movies and onto skateboards in Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure. You can play as your favorite Disney and Pixar characters, such as Buzz Lightyear and Woody from Toy Story 2, Simba and Rafiki from The Lion King, and Young Tarzan and Terk from Tarzan. Now you can skate, pull off tricks, and solve puzzles in all the exciting places you've seen in the movies, including Pride Rock, the Jungle Treehouse, and Pizza Planet.

locale.title: Fight Night Round 2
locale.synopsis: Packing in more fearsome punches, players can now dominate the ring with the all-new EA SPORTS Haymaker allowing gamers to knock down their opponents with one devastating blow by adding extra power to each punch. Every hit counts in the game with powerful punches inflicting dynamic injuries on opponents, and thus reducing a fighter's ability to defend himself. Players will also manage the boxers inside and out of the ring. Utilizing the new EA SPORTS Cutman, gamers can minimize damage on their fighters by helping them heal critical wounds between rounds.

locale.title: ファイトナイト ラウンド２
locale.synopsis:
敵の攻撃を紙一重で避け、強烈なパンチを打ち込み、目の前の敵をリングに沈める…… このシンプルかつ奥深いボクシングの極限の攻防を、直感的な操作で体感する「ファイトナイト」の最新作がついにゲームキューブに登場！ 熱狂うず巻くリングで拳を交えるのは、一時代を築き上げた伝説のボクサーから現役のトップランカーまで、総勢36名の実名ボクサーたち。プレイヤーは2本のスティックを駆使して、まるで本当にパンチを放っているような感覚を味わいながら、チャンピオンを目指します。
直感操作でパンチを放つ!! 実際に左右のパンチを放つ軌道でCスティックを操作し、攻撃を行う「トータル・パンチ・コントロール」システムを搭載。ジャブ、ストレート、フック、アッパーなど、プレイヤーは直感操作で多彩なコンビネーションを繰り出すことができます。

game.name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg
locale.synopsis: Action platformer from the makers of Sonic. Players take control of the clucky title character, Billy Hatcher, and try to bring light back to his now darkened home world. To do so, he must free a bunch of elders that are trapped inside golden chicken eggs. The idea is to find these and other eggs and roll them around the sprawling levels, smash enemies and collect fruit until they are ready to hatch, and then crack the suckers open to bring a small, friendly animal into this world. Billy can hatch penguins, seals, and other creatures and command them to help him on his quest

rom.name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg (USA) (EN).iso

locale.title: F1 2002
locale.synopsis: Kick off a brand-new season of racing with all the speed, glamour, and rivalry of Formula One. Officially licensed from the Formula One Administration Limited, F1 2002 features real drivers, teams, cars, and tracks from the 2002 FIA Formula One World Championship. Join new teams--Toyota and Renault--and complete all-new challenges that test your driving skills. The higher you place in each race, the more points you receive, and the closer you are to the Constructor's Cup.

locale.title: F1 2002
locale.synopsis: F1 Career Challenge lets the player assume the role of an up and coming rookie on his quest to become the best there is. Completing difficult license tests, winning races, and building a general reputation with their peers is how players will advance over the game's four-year setup. To add the usual bells and whistles we've come to expect from EA Sports, F1CC will also feature customizable helmet designs, improved artificial intelligence, motion captured mechanics, and personalized feedback from the team boss and chief MC. Not to mention all the cars, drivers, racetracks, drivers, and team changes made during the 1999-2002 race season -- which are in the game as well.

locale.title: NFL 2K3
locale.synopsis: Sega's hard-hitting football series is ready for the 2002-03 season. Are you? Step out onto the gridiron for the most realistic football imaginable, enjoying full NFL rosters, detailed stadiums, and more. Using its new ESPN endorsement, the game presents its action in full television style, complete with spinning graphics, awesome slow-motion replays, stats, analysis, and the rest of the fixings. With better player models and more focused physics, NFL 2K3 takes on the feel of the pros, and new motion-capture animations further articulate the game-day action; one-handed tips, animated coaches, hurried throws, and other brilliant minutia are at play throughout the games, and team AI has been honed to perfection. Franchise mode puts you in the role of GM, challenging you to make good draft decisions and smart trades all from within the strict confines of a salary cap. Of course, you can always play a single game or enjoy a full season as well, and there are plenty of other goodies for pigskin fans, too.

locale.title: Fantastic 4
locale.synopsis: Based on the 2005 movie of the same name, Fantastic Four lets you control the team of superheroes known as the Fantastic 4. Each character possesses a unique set of abilities that you can use and combine in the hunt for Doctor Doom. The game includes single-player, cooperative, and two-player versus modes.

locale.title: FIFA Football 2005
locale.synopsis: FIFA Soccer 2005 gives you more control than ever with improved button and control sensitivity and an intuitive Off the Ball Control. Now you can take command of players not in possession of the ball by calling in tackles, jostling for space, and sending your teammates on runs as you control the pitch. With more than 350 official team and league licenses from around the world, an enhanced Career mode, and an improved broadcast, FIFA Soccer 2005 gives you a complete and authentic soccer experience.

locale.title: FIFA 06
locale.synopsis: EA Sports takes players back to the field with FIFA SOCCER 06 for the Game Cube. Featuring nearly ever soccer team in existence and hundred of players, plus tweaks in game play and several new additions. Gamers will first notice the slight changes in controlling their teams. The passing and dribbling controls have been fine-tuned, allowing gamers to control nearly every aspect of the game. Each player has a strength rating that comes into effect when passing, as does the amount of weight players put behind the kick. A new shooting method, called the Optimized Shot Meter, requires more control and attention, as well. All of these realistic details make gamers feel like they're actually in the game and in control of everything. Manager mode now requires players to keep their club's budgets and handle purchases. Players have to decide how much to spend on staff, recruiting, stadium expenses, and other items. Then gamers have to decide if they want to sign with a sponsor to bring in extra income. All of this adds up to create a game that requires managers to really manage their team. FIFA SOCCER 06 contains all of the modes that made the previous FIFA SOCCER games great, including season, tournament, shoot-out, and verses modes. Voice-over commentary for the 06 version is provided by Clive Tydsley and Andy Gray. Soccer fans will enjoy hearing their expert commentary throughout the season as they recruit, train, and guide a soccer club to victory in FIFA SOCCER 06.

locale.title: FIFA Soccer 06
locale.synopsis: EA Sports takes players back to the field with FIFA SOCCER 06 for the Game Cube. Featuring nearly ever soccer team in existence and hundred of players, plus tweaks in game play and several new additions. Gamers will first notice the slight changes in controlling their teams. The passing and dribbling controls have been fine-tuned, allowing gamers to control nearly every aspect of the game. Each player has a strength rating that comes into effect when passing, as does the amount of weight players put behind the kick. A new shooting method, called the Optimized Shot Meter, requires more control and attention, as well. All of these realistic details make gamers feel like they're actually in the game and in control of everything. Manager mode now requires players to keep their club's budgets and handle purchases. Players have to decide how much to spend on staff, recruiting, stadium expenses, and other items. Then gamers have to decide if they want to sign with a sponsor to bring in extra income. All of this adds up to create a game that requires managers to really manage their team. FIFA SOCCER 06 contains all of the modes that made the previous FIFA SOCCER games great, including season, tournament, shoot-out, and verses modes. Voice-over commentary for the 06 version is provided by Clive Tydsley and Andy Gray. Soccer fans will enjoy hearing their expert commentary throughout the season as they recruit, train, and guide a soccer club to victory in FIFA SOCCER 06.

locale.title: Star Fox: Assault
locale.synopsis: Team Star Fox is back for more intense combat as they engage a new threat by air and by land. A few years after disaster was barely averted on Dinosaur Planet, Lylat Central Command gets wind of a new threat spreading throughout the solar system. The Star Fox team--composed of classic team members Fox McCloud, Slippy Toad, Peppy Hare, and Falco Lombardi, along with some new faces--is sent in to engage this new enemy. Now, as part of the Star Fox team, you can participate in solo or co-op missions or plug in with up to three other players.

Star Fox: Assault

locale.title: Star Fox: Assault
locale.synopsis: StarFox : Assault sur Gamecube est un jeu d'action/shoot'em up vous plongeant dans l'univers des guerres du système Lylat. A bord de votre Arwing, rejoignez Fox, Draco, Sloppy et Peppy face à la team Starwolf. Le jeu comporte également quelques phases terrestres, à bord d'un tank ou à pied et conserve une vue à la troisième personne dans tous ces cas de figure.

locale.title: Star Fox: Assault
locale.synopsis:
Schlüpfe in die Rolle des fuchsigen Fox McCloud, wenn er sich seinen schlimmsten Feind vorknöpft. Slippy Toad, Peppy Hare und Falco Lombardi halten dir den Rücken frei, wenn du Horden intergalaktischer Feinde zu Lande und in der Luft angreifst. Spring auf den Arwing, um wilde Luftkämpfe zu bestreiten und auf Landmaster-Panzer, wenn du dich am Boden durchschlägst.
Natürlich kannst du auch einfach zu Fuß herumlaufen und mit deinem Laser für Gerechtigkeit sorgen. Bereits der Einzelspieler-Modus ist große Klasse, aber der Splitscreen-Modus für bis zu vier Spieler ist überwältigend. Dieser Fuchs hat Snipergewehre und Raketenwerfer bei sich, man sollte sich besser nicht mit ihm anlegen.

locale.title: FIFA Street
locale.synopsis: FIFA Street is a combination of arcade action blended with the culture of freestyle street soccer. By removing the rules from the simulation soccer experience, FIFA Street exposes the heart of the world's beautiful game, on-the-ball flare and individual style. Leading this movement are the worlds top professional players, showing off their skills and individual style in 4-on-4 match-ups against the backdrop of global venues that represent the true culture of street soccer. As the first game to support dynamic 1-on-1 encounters, beating your opponent will require skill, technique, and the careful selection of specific moves. As a gamer you'll take on the best and be required to earn their respect, gradually building your reputation and team into an unstoppable force that leads the tide of street soccer.

locale.title: FIFA Football 2003
locale.synopsis: All the speed, style and passion of the world's game come alive in FIFA Soccer 2003. With enhanced team play, improved ball control and deeper tactics, FIFA Soccer 2003 lets you take the pitch with your favorite players and teams from around the world. Game features include all the best clubs, players and national teams; The Club Championship highlights the top 18 club teams with intense detail, including team-specific stadiums and chants; Total Ball Control allows players to use their feet and head to control the ball like never before; new Set Pieces: Use free kicks and corner kicks to set up a shot or even score directly; Game-changing AI: Computer opponents will adopt tactics based on the real game situations.

locale.title: FIFA Football 2003
locale.synopsis:
Kontrolliere das Spiel. Du bist der 12. Mann.
Features * Die Absolute Spielerfahrung - Verbesserte Dribbling-, Schuss-, Flanken- und Passmöglichkeiten sowie verbesserte Spieler-KI * Die absolute Ballkontrolle - Die weltbesten Spieler mit neuen Animationen und Spezialfähigkeiten * Total Club Championship - Eine spannungsgeladene Atmosphäre in Duellen gegen die europäische Elite in autehntischen Stadien mit echten Fangesängen * Die absolute Kontrolle - Realistische Standardsituationen ermöglichen bessere Kontrolle bei Freistößen - die richtige Power, die richtige Ecke, der richtige Torjubel * Absoluter Realismus - Über 10.000 echte Spieler spielen für pber 350 offizielle Teams in 16 der besten Ligen der Welt * Absolute Fähigkeiten - Täuschen des Gegners durch besondere Fähigkeiten mit Hilfe der EA SPORTS Freestyle Control
* Neue dynamische Freistosssteuerung * Verbesserte Ballkontrolle * Neue detaillierte Spieleranimationen * Realistische Torhüter * Neue Stadionatmosphäre

locale.title: FIFAヨーロッパサッカー2003
locale.synopsis:
FIFA公認の「FIFAサッカー」シリーズの最新作『FIFA2003 ヨーロッパサッカー』。操作性や選手のモーション、AIの進化など新たに生まれ変わった『FIFA2003 ヨーロッパサッカー』でサッカーをトコトン楽しもう！ サッカーゲームファンはもちろん、サッカーファンの期待も裏切らない内容。AIの進化により、実際の選手さながらにコンピュータ選手が動く。これでイマジネーションあふれるプレイがゲームの中で実現できる。 さらに欧州列強の6大リーグを含む各国リーグを収録。その数なんと、350チーム。所属する選手も8,000人以上が実名で登場し、海外に移籍した日本人選手も登場。日本人選手の新たな海外移籍もあり、ますます盛り上がるヨーロッパクラブリーグサッカーを体験しよう！
今作では、各国代表チームのみならず欧州強豪クラブチームを実名で楽しめる唯一のサッカーゲームとして「欧州サッカーをプレイしつくせ！」というゲームコンセプトのもと、中田英寿選手と共に、欧州を象徴するプロサッカー選手として、稲本潤一選手を起用致しました。

locale.title: FireBlade
locale.synopsis: Budget-priced high-action title that pits players in the cockpit of a military helicopter to indulge in dozens of day and night-based missions, all of which takes place in real world locations. Players take the helm of two distinct choppers and fly attack and rescue missions in 18 different levels. The game features four campaigns in a variety of environments including the Swiss Alps, Arizona Desert, Amazon Jungle and the Arctic Circle. Players blast opponents with the help of high-tech weaponry, including EMP weapons, rail guns, homing missiles, and special turbo upgrades that give the helicopter jet aircraft capabilities.

locale.title: Fireblade
locale.synopsis: Budget-priced high-action title that pits players in the cockpit of a military helicopter to indulge in dozens of day and night-based missions, all of which takes place in real world locations. Players take the helm of two distinct choppers and fly attack and rescue missions in 18 different levels. The game features four campaigns in a variety of environments including the Swiss Alps, Arizona Desert, Amazon Jungle and the Arctic Circle. Players blast opponents with the help of high-tech weaponry, including EMP weapons, rail guns, homing missiles, and special turbo upgrades that give the helicopter jet aircraft capabilities.

locale.title: F1 Career Challenge
locale.synopsis: F1 Career Challenge is a Formula One racing game. It is the first F1 game which has a career mode. It is based on four seasons: the 1999 Formula One season, the 2000 Formula One season, the 2001 Formula One season and the 2002 Formula One season.

locale.title: Freedom Fighters
locale.synopsis: With fierce conflict unfolding in the streets of America, it's your patriotic duty to fight back. Take on the role of Christopher Stone, and evolve from an average New Yorker into a fearless patriot who recruits and leads an army of freedom fighters in the streets of New York City. Freedom Fighters combines the depth of a squad-based game with the intensity of an action-packed war game, all of which unfolds in the streets, subways, and buildings of a modern-day urban battleground.

locale.title: Freedom Fighters
locale.synopsis:
In einer veränderten Realität ist Russland der Sieger des Kalten Krieges und besetzt mit der Roten Armee die Straßen New Yorks! In dieser Situation stellt sich der Spieler einem Freiheitskampf voller atemberaubender Action. Gefährliche Missionen müssen exakt vorbereitet und neue, steuerbare Kämpfe rekrutiert werden. Kommt es zum Kampf auf offener Straße, zaubert die fantastische Glacier-Engine bombastische 3D-Spezialeffekte auf den Bildschirm. Das einzigartige und einfache Gameplay dieses Third-Person Shooters überzeugte die Fachpresse und brachte dem Titel ausgezeichnete Preview-Wertungen. Für den erstklassigen Soundtrack konnte das Budapester Staatsorchester gewonnen werden. Mit Freedom Fighters kommt ein Titel der Spitzenklasse in den Handel, der Maßstäbe setzt!
FEATURES:
- Mit dem revolutionären System von "Rekrutieren und Kommandieren" kannst Du bis zu 12 Freiheitskämpfer ins Feld schicken
- Starke Action aus der Sicht der 3. Person in den Straßen und Gassen von New York
- Bekämpfe den Feind mit Waffen und Guerillataktik
- Durch miteinander verbundene Missionen wirkt sich der auf einem Level geführte Krieg auf die Kämpfe eines anderen Levels aus

locale.title: Freedom Fighters
locale.synopsis: With fierce conflict unfolding in the streets of America, it's your patriotic duty to fight back. Take on the role of Christopher Stone, and evolve from an average New Yorker into a fearless patriot who recruits and leads an army of freedom fighters in the streets of New York City. Freedom Fighters combines the depth of a squad-based game with the intensity of an action-packed war game, all of which unfolds in the streets, subways, and buildings of a modern-day urban battleground.

locale.title: Freedom Fighters
locale.synopsis: Com o conflito feroz se desenrolando nas ruas da América, é seu dever patriótico revidar. Assuma o papel de Christopher Stone e evolua de um nova-iorquino comum para um patriota destemido que recruta e lidera um exército de lutadores pela liberdade nas ruas de Nova York. Freedom Fighters combina a profundidade de um jogo baseado em esquadrão com a intensidade de um jogo de guerra cheio de ação, que se desenrola nas ruas, metrôs e edifícios de um campo de batalha urbano moderno.

locale.title: Freedom Fighters

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis: First console installment of the strategy-RPG series since the SNES days. Previously released on Famicom (Japan-only), Super Famicom (Japan-only), and Game Boy Advance, Fire Emblem leaves the 2D overhead maps of old behind to serve up 3D villages, fields, and caves, and polygonal battle sequences. The continent of Tellius is divided into humans and half-man/half-beast demi-humans. These two races have battled for centuries and only recently established an uneasy peace. Now, a new force threatens to tear apart the seven kingdoms and reignite the flames of war. Joining the Fire Emblem ranks are new units, such as such as the shape-shifting laguz who transform into beasts to attack their foes. Additionally, characters can now learn unique skills as they gain experience, giving players even more ways to customize their strategy.

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis: Primeira parcela da série de estratégia-RPG desde os dias do SNES. Lançado anteriormente para Famicom (apenas no Japão), Super Famicom (apenas no Japão) e Game Boy Advance, Fire Emblem deixa para trás os mapas aéreos 2D antigos para servir a aldeias, campos e cavernas 3D e sequências de batalha poligonais. O continente de Tellius é dividido em humanos e semi-humanos meio-homem / meio-besta. Essas duas raças lutaram por séculos e só recentemente estabeleceram uma paz inquietante. Agora, uma nova força ameaça separar os sete reinos e reacender as chamas da guerra. Juntando-se às fileiras do Fire Emblem estão novas unidades, como os laguz que mudam de forma, que se transformam em feras para atacar seus inimigos. Além disso, os personagens agora podem aprender habilidades únicas à medida que ganham experiência, dando aos jogadores ainda mais maneiras de personalizar sua estratégia.

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Souen no Kiseki

Additionally, characters can now learn unique skills as they gain experience, giving players even more ways to customize their strategy.

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis:
Fire Emblem, la série stratégique prend une nouvelle dimension à l'occasion de sa première apparition sur Nintendo GameCube !
Le continent de Tellius est divisé entre humains, créatures mi-humaines mi-bestiales. Ces deux races se sont battues pendant des siècles et ont récemment réussi à instauré une fragile trève. Maintenant, une nouvelle force menace de mettre les sept royaumes à feu et à sang en ravivant les flammes de la guerre.
De nouvelles unités viennent grossir les rangs de Fire Emblem, comme Iaguz qui est capable de changer de forme et de se transformer en bête pour attaquer ses ennemis. En plus, les personnages peuvent améliorer leurs capacités au fur et à mesure qu'ils gagnent en expérience, donnant ainsi au joueur une plus grande liberté pour mettre au point sa stratégie. Grâce à l'ajout de séquence magnifiquement animées, Fire Emblem est aussi génial à regarder qu'à jouer.

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis:
Die rundenbasierte Strategiespiel-Serie Fire Emblem stößt mit ihrem ersten Nintendo GameCube-Titel in eine neue Dimension vor!
Der Kontinent Tellius ist in Menschen und Halbmenschen unterteilt. Die beiden Rassen haben sich Jahrhunderte lang bekämpft und erst vor Kurzem einen instabilen Frieden geschlossen. Jetzt droht eine neue Macht die sieben Königreiche auseinander zu reißen und die Flammen des Krieges erneut zu entzünden.
In Path of Radiance gibt es einige neue Einheiten wie die Laguz, die sich in wilde Bestien verwandeln können, um so ihre Gegner anzugreifen. Zusätzlich können die Charaktere jetzt einzigartige Fähigkeiten erlernen, wenn sie an Erfahrung gewinnen. Auf diese Weise haben die Spieler noch mehr Möglichkeiten, ihre Strategie anzupassen. Mit seinen wunderschön animierten Videosequenzen und den dreidimensionalen Schlachten sieht Fire Emblem so toll aus wie nie zuvor. Und dementsprechend spielt es sich auch...

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis:
La aclamada serie Fire Emblem da una nueva vuelta de tuerca a los juegos de estrategia en su debut para GameCube.
El continente Tellius está dividido en humanos y seres mitad humanos, mitad bestias. Tras años de duras guerras, estas dos razas han firmado ahora una delicada paz. Por desgracia, una tercera fuerza aparece en escena con la amenaza de destruir los siete reinos y reavivar las llamas de la guerra.
A los ya conocidos rangos de Fire Emblem se incorporan nuevas unidades, como los laguz, capaces de transformarse en poderosas bestias antes de atacar a sus rivales. Además de esto, los personajes pueden aprender ahora habilidades únicas a medida que ganan en experiencia, dando a los jugadores diferentes modos de personalizar su estrategia. Con preciosas escenas intermedias y una jugabilidad suprema, este Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance es un combate que no te quieres perder.

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis:
La serie strategica Fire Emblem assume un'altra dimensione nel primo titolo per Nintendo GameCube!
Il continente di Tellius è diviso in umani e semi-umani, metà uomini e metà animali. Queste due razze hanno combattuto per secoli e solo da poco hanno instaurato una pace traballante. Ora una nuova forza minaccia di dividere i sette regni e riaccendere le fiamme della guerra.
Nuove unità si uniscono all'esercito di Fire Emblem come gli laguz, che cambiano forma trasformandosi in animali per aggredire i nemici. Inoltre, i personaggi possono imparare delle abilità uniche guadagnando esperienza, fornendo ai giocatori maniere diverse di personalizzare la propria strategia. Con l'aggiunta di bellissime scene animate e battaglie in 3-D, Fire Emblem si gioca ancora meglio di prima.

locale.title: Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
locale.synopsis: Primeira parcela da série de estratégia-RPG desde os dias do SNES. Lançado anteriormente para Famicom (apenas no Japão), Super Famicom (apenas no Japão) e Game Boy Advance, Fire Emblem deixa para trás os mapas aéreos 2D antigos para servir a aldeias, campos e cavernas 3D e sequências de batalha poligonais. O continente de Tellius é dividido em humanos e semi-humanos meio-homem / meio-besta. Essas duas raças lutaram por séculos e só recentemente estabeleceram uma paz inquietante. Agora, uma nova força ameaça separar os sete reinos e reacender as chamas da guerra. Juntando-se às fileiras do Fire Emblem estão novas unidades, como os laguz que mudam de forma, que se transformam em feras para atacar seus inimigos. Além disso, os personagens agora podem aprender habilidades únicas à medida que ganham experiência, dando aos jogadores ainda mais maneiras de personalizar sua estratégia.

locale.title: Freaky Flyers
locale.synopsis: An open-ended kart-like airplane racer with a strong focus on humor, Freaky Flyers features over 13 different characters, 9 stages ranging from exotic islands to roaring Chicago, and varying game modes. Midway describes Freaky Flyers as a "flying/racing/adventure game" due to its story-focused single-player mode. Players attempt to win races and beat a variety of mini-games to progress through the story-driven adventure mode. More than 90 minutes of cinematics follow each character's storyline as it unfolds in a movie-quality presentation. In addition to racing, skill-oriented stunt flying provides the player with the thrills of doing dangerous aerial stunts.

locale.title: Frogger Beyond
locale.synopsis: Hop into the latest addition to the Frogger franchise with Frogger Beyond, a new adventure that takes you through eight expansive worlds. As the amphibious hero, Frogger, you'll encounter a wide range of enemies, obstacles, and new challenges. This time, you can snowboard ice-covered mountains, travel through lava caverns, and navigate the depths of outer space. Frogger Beyond revives the series with 40 new enemies, new frog abilities, and hidden areas and power-ups.

locale.title: Frogger
locale.synopsis: Hop into the latest addition to the Frogger franchise with Frogger Beyond, a new adventure that takes you through eight expansive worlds. As the amphibious hero, Frogger, you'll encounter a wide range of enemies, obstacles, and new challenges. This time, you can snowboard ice-covered mountains, travel through lava caverns, and navigate the depths of outer space. Frogger Beyond revives the series with 40 new enemies, new frog abilities, and hidden areas and power-ups.

locale.title: Frogger Beyond
locale.synopsis: Hop into the latest addition to the Frogger franchise with Frogger Beyond, a new adventure that takes you through eight expansive worlds. As the amphibious hero, Frogger, you'll encounter a wide range of enemies, obstacles, and new challenges. This time, you can snowboard ice-covered mountains, travel through lava caverns, and navigate the depths of outer space. Frogger Beyond revives the series with 40 new enemies, new frog abilities, and hidden areas and power-ups.

locale.title: Neighbours from Hell
locale.synopsis: The reality TV show of neighborly nastiness and community commotion moves on to the next round. This time, your neighbor wants to enjoy an undeserved holiday on a cruise liner--reason enough for Woody and the camera team to turn the vacation into a nightmare. This is your chance to get revenge on your neighbor by playing tricks on him and his mother. In addition to the cruise liner, the game features several different locations, including China, India, and Mexico, where you can cause trouble.

locale.title: 2002 FIFA World Cup
locale.synopsis: Hot on the heels of FIFA Soccer 2002, Electronic Arts has readied a World Cup-themed alternate version of the game. As the name suggests, the game focuses squarely on the World Cup tournament which takes place in Japan and Korea (May 31 to June 30 2002). Though FIFA 2002 featured a Road to the World Cup mode, players who wanted to take their favorite national team to victory were out of luck: qualification was as far as you could go. 2002 FIFA World Cup picks up where the old game left off and brings the excitement of the tournament home like no other game.

locale.title: 2002 FIFA World Cup
locale.synopsis: Logo após o FIFA Soccer 2002, a Electronic Arts preparou uma versão alternativa do jogo com o tema da Copa do Mundo. Como o nome sugere, o jogo foca diretamente no torneio da Copa do Mundo que acontece no Japão e na Coréia (31 de maio a 30 de junho de 2002). Embora o FIFA 2002 apresentasse um modo Caminho para a Copa do Mundo, os jogadores que queriam levar sua seleção favorita à vitória estavam sem sorte: a qualificação era o mais longe que se podia chegar. A Copa do Mundo da FIFA de 2002 começa de onde o jogo anterior parou e traz a emoção do torneio para casa como nenhum outro jogo.

locale.title: Freekstyle
locale.synopsis:
EA Sports Big, the label known for leading-edge extreme sports titles, speeds into the world of extreme motocross with Freekstyle 2002. If you don't have the guts to hit a 40-foot launch at 70 mph, you don't belong here, 'cause that's the only way to grab the big air you need to pull off 80 insane freestyle tricks. There's no room for fear.
Real-life riders like Mike Metzger, Clifford "The Flyin' Hawaiian" Adpptante, and Jessica Patterson are available to choose from, each with his or her own bike, outfit, and riding style. Ride through nine venues looking for hidden shortcuts, or roam freely over the freestyle tracks. Master the moves to earn the points and speed boosts familiar to extreme sports games. You can also challenge a second player to race via split-screen.

locale.title: Family Stadium 2003
locale.synopsis: Family Stadium 2003 is a Sports game, published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 2003.

locale.title: ファミリースタジアム2003
Finding Nemo
locale.synopsis: Finding Nemo, which has been in development for several months, are scheduled for worldwide release day and date with the Finding Nemo theatrical debut in summer 2003. THQ?s interactive adventures based on Finding Nemo are the first under the Company?s exclusive, multi-property publishing agreement with award-winning interactive entertainment publisher Disney Interactive and the Academy Award-winning Pixar Animation Studios.

locale.title: ファインディング・ニモ
locale.synopsis:
誠実だけどちょっと心配性で野暮なお父さんマーリンが、ダイバーに捕まってしまった息子ニモを探し出すために大冒険の旅に出る。オーストラリアのグレートバリアリーフに繰り広げられる魚たちの物語。
* 誰もがグレートバリアリーフでの冒険を楽しめるステージクリア型アクションゲーム 小さな子供達にもプレイしやすいシンプルな操作方法でミッションをクリアしていく、ステージクリア型アクションゲームです。 奥に向かっていくステージや横スクロールになっているステージ、またこちらに向かってくるようなステージなど様々な演出によるステージが用意されています。
* 映画と同じストーリーで豊富なイベントシーンが満載 お父さんマーリンが、ダイバーに捕まってしまった息子ニモを探し出すために大冒険の旅に出る。色々な危険を乗り越えて無事にニモと出会えるのか・・・？。 そんな映画の大冒険のストーリーそのままにゲームが進みます。途中には謎解きあり、ミニゲームあり、ドキドキわくわくのイベントシーンが満載。 また、ステージでのチャレンジすべきタスクは音声やテキストで分かり易く表示しており、小さな子供達や映画を見ていない人にもわかりやすいように表現しています。
* ピクサー社制作の美しいムービーシーンが満載。 ゲームの途中にはアメリカのトップアニメーションスタジオ「ピクサー社」が制作した実際の映画のムービーシーンをふんだんに盛り込みました。 グレートバリアリーフの美しい水中の世界と映画の感動のシーンをゲーム中でも体験できます。

locale.title: The Fairly OddParents - Shadow Showdown
locale.synopsis: A creepy feeling surrounds Dimmsdale leading Cosmo, Wanda and Timmy to journey into a deserted Fairy World! Equipped with the most awesome wishes, the trio begins their journey to uncover a mysterious villain that nobody could have ever suspected! Bonus Features include: Tons of unlockable clips from the hit TV show. Multiplayer action includes Cosmo and Wanda as playable characters.

locale.title: Frogger: Ancient Shadow
locale.synopsis: Frogger is Back to His Classic Beginnings. His home of Firefly Swamp is being overrun by Dr. Wani and his evil plans. Join Frogger in his latest adventure as he explores seven different worlds and tries to restore order to his beloved swamp. Features classic, addictive "hop and dodge" gameplay. Mini games with up to 4 players on all platforms. Over 30 levels of play. Wide range of character moves, such as the double jump, tongue grab, and more. Special bonus - orignial 1981 Frogger arcade game included on all platforms.

locale.title: Frogger's Adventures: The Rescue
locale.synopsis: Frogger's Adventures: The Rescue goes beyond Firefly Swamp and brings a multiplayer mode to Frogger fans. The series' hop-'n'-dodge gameplay returns as Frogger travels across seven diverse worlds with more than 25 levels. Each of these worlds includes mysterious clues, challenging puzzles, and menacing enemies to slow down your progress. Don't rest until you conquer the wide range of miniquests and side stories or until you dominate three of your friends in multiplayer mode.

locale.title: 2002 FIFA World Cup
locale.synopsis: Hot on the heels of FIFA Soccer 2002, Electronic Arts has readied a World Cup-themed alternate version of the game. As the name suggests, the game focuses squarely on the World Cup tournament which takes place in Japan and Korea (May 31 to June 30 2002). Though FIFA 2002 featured a Road to the World Cup mode, players who wanted to take their favorite national team to victory were out of luck: qualification was as far as you could go. 2002 FIFA World Cup picks up where the old game left off and brings the excitement of the tournament home like no other game.

locale.title: FIFA Fußball-Weltmeisterschaft 2002
locale.synopsis:
Das einzige interaktive Fußball-Spiel mit offizieller Lizenz zur Verwendung des FIFA-Weltmeisterschaftspokals, der Logos und Maskottchen sowie aller 20 neuen Stadien in Japan und Korea.
FEATURES:
- Star Spieler: Realistische Darstellung aller Star-Spieler, die an der WM teilnehmen, mit ihren ganz eigenen Stärken und Eigenschaften, die ihren Stil authentisch wiederspiegeln.
- Leicht zugängliches und aufregendes Gameplay: Einfach zu steuernde Kopfbälle, Volleys und viele weitere Aktionen. Spektakuläre und schnelle Aktionen, die von Anfang an problemlos gesteuert werden können.
- Turniermodus: Eine Serie von Spielen über sieben Runden, angefangen bei Qualifikationsspielen über Playoffs bis zum Finale wird es zunehmend spannender.
- Neue Spieler/Spieler Animationen: Neue Spieleranimationen resultieren in aggressiven Kämpfen um den Ball sowohl in der Luft als auch am Boden.
- Weltmeisterschaftsmomente: Die wichtigsten und dramatischen Augenblicke der WM. Anpfiff und Abpfiff sowie die entscheidenden Tore werden in einzigartigen Filmsequenzen wiedergegeben.
- Moment Zooms: Neue Kameraperspektiven und Wiederholungen fangen die Intensität der Weltmeisterschaft noch besser ein und sorgen für beeindruckende Authentizität. Die Reaktionen der Spieler bei knappen Entscheidungen, Fouls und Toren werden auf realistische Art und Weise in ihren Gesichtern und durch ihre Gestik wiedergespiegelt.
- Neue Stadionumgebungen: Die Teams werden lautstark von den Fans unterstützt, die länderspezifische Farben tragen und entsprechende Fangesänge erklingen lassen. Mit zahlreichen Effekten wie Laser, Konfetti und Flaggen
- Komplett in Deutsch.

locale.title: FIFA Soccer 2002
locale.synopsis: The 2002 installment in the Electronic Arts soccer series. The game features 16 leagues, 500-plus teams and a total of 10 tournaments. FIFA also makes use of a reward system that lets you unlock new tournaments and even get some player cards. All of the game's rosters can be manipulated, teams can be edited (uniforms, stadiums, etc.), current players can be tweaked and new players can be created. As far as modes go, FIFA 2002 adds a World Cup qualification tournament. This allows you to take any of the teams in the AFC, CONCACAF, UEFA, or CONMEBOL and go through a series of matches that determine who gets to participate in the 2002 World Cup in Korea in Japan.

locale.title: FIFA 2002 ロード・トゥ・FIFAワールドカップ
locale.synopsis:
欧州や南米を始めとする大陸予選を勝ち抜くFIFAワールドカップTM 予選モードとFIFAワールドカップTM 本戦モードを搭載。予選のない日本でもコンフェデレーションズカップをはじめとするフレンドリーマッチのスケジュールが組まれています。本戦モードでは予選突破32カ国を、搭載されている122カ国からユーザーが設定可能。独自のFIFAワールドカップTM や12月1日の抽選結果を見て本番をいち早くシミュレートすることも可能です。
主要16カ国のリーグを搭載したシーズンモードでは現在欧州で活躍する中田英寿選手をはじめとする日本人プレイヤーたちの活躍するリーグを、シーズンを通して戦うことが可能です。

locale.title: 2002 FIFA World Cup

locale.title: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
locale.synopsis: Welcome to Mario Golf, a purely Nintendo take on the classic game of skill and accuracy. This enhanced sequel to the Nintendo 64 hit, takes players for an exciting game of golf in the Mushroom Kingdom. Play as your favorite Nintendo character such as Mario, Princess Peach, and Donkey Kong, while taking care to avoid dangerous course obstacles, and using warp pipes to your advantage. Participate in several game modes including Tournament play, and Match golf. Up to four players can compete on the green in each fantasy golf course. Supports Dolby Pro Logic II surround sound, and supports high-definition displays with Progressive Scan support.

locale.title: Mario Golf: Family Tour
locale.synopsis: Welcome to Mario Golf, a purely Nintendo take on the classic game of skill and accuracy. Supports Dolby Pro Logic II surround sound, and supports high-definition displays with Progressive Scan support.

locale.title: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
locale.synopsis: Savez-vous quel est le passe-temps favori des footballeurs professionnels, des cadres supérieurs d'entreprise, des plombiers, des princesses, des dinosaures et des singes ? Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour. La suite sur Nintendo GameCube du Mario Golf 64 tant aimé de la Nintendo 64 plante le décor et met en scène des joueurs et des moments plus géniaux et bizarres que jamais. Les suspects habituels, Mario, Luigi, Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario et bien d'autres, se sont mis au pantalon de golf (avec du mal dans le cas de Wario, et pour Donkey Kong disons qu'il s'agit plutôt du genre cravate) pour tenter d'amener la petite balle blanche dans le trou. Le tournoi Toadstool Tour, avec sa myriade de parcours semés d'embûches, ne récompense que les meilleurs parmi les meilleurs. Les autres se contentent d'une très grande frustration. Avec votre aide, le personnage de votre choix brandira la coupe avec un grand sourire. Entrez dans Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour et les multiples parcours de golf, tous plus saisissants les uns que les autres, se déroulent sous vos yeux ébouriffés. Les parcours « réalistes » sont tous des ensembles de gazon et de buttes parfaits, de mares étincelantes, véritables pièges à balles, et de forêts verdoyantes. Mais bien entendu, Nintendo apporte sa touche personnelle aux monuments célèbres comme le Mont Rushmore, où les grands présidents américains sont remplacés par Yoshi et Luigi. Toadstool Tour présente aussi les greens sur le thème Mushroom Kingdom, avec leurs champignons à pois, leurs arbres tout ronds, leurs pièges Piranha Plant et Chain Chomp et même les tuyaux distordus qui propulsent la balle d'une section du green à une autre. Dans des environnements aussi imprévisibles, les perdants potentiels peuvent se retrouver en première place le temps de dire Yoshi ! Mais les talents que vous déploierez dans cette aventure déjantée qu'est Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour ne seront pas inutiles, croyez-nous, que vous vouliez monter sur le podium ou non. La barre de puissance revient : appuyez sur le bouton A pour arrêter une barre vagabonde et déterminer la puissance du coup. Mais attention, vous avez désormais le choix entre deux modes de swing. Les novices sont assistés automatiquement, à l'exception de la force, et les joueurs expérimentés peuvent combiner rapidement les boutons A et B pour lifter, couper et ajouter bien d'autres coups. Avec un peu de pratique dans ce nouveau système, la balle monte vers le ciel avec une puissance extraordinaire et revient sur terre comme si elle venait de rebondir contre un plafond imaginaire. Ajoutez à cela un sac de golf bourré de fers et de putters, les possibilités de spin latéral et les effets spéciaux comme le power shot, et Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour devient un système de contrôle fabuleux qui vous sauve des situations les plus embarrassantes. Les nouveaux venus à Mario Golf ne seront toutefois pas bloqués bogey après bogey. Une flèche vous indique le parcours de la balle (quoique dans ce monde idéal sans vent, collines, obstacles ni rebonds, nous ne voulons pas vous rendre les choses trop faciles), et des grilles pratiques sont collées sur le green pour signaler les courbes et les emplacements accidentés. En plus, la caméra vous obéit au doigt et à l'oeil, alors visualisez le chemin jusqu'au trou à vol d'oiseau ou partez en éclaireur pour découvrir le terrain. Des fonctions précieuses. Alors que vous progressez sur des greens de plus en plus difficiles et vous heurtez à des virages difficiles à négocier, des précipices et nombre de mares et de lacs périlleux, vous vivez l'aventure au fil d'animations superbes, totalement époustouflantes. Mario et sa bande crèvent l'écran alors qu'ils swinguent, frappent la balle dans une explosion d'étincelles (au son de « JOLI COUP ! » si vous faites contact pil poil avec la balle) et s'esclaffent ou boudent à tous les birdie, bogey ou trous en un. Princess Peach est plus jolie que jamais, toute bronzée après ses vacances à Super Mario Sunshine et toujours en minijupe, et le bon gros DK fait tout ce qu'il peut pour tenir son golf délicatement dans ses gros poings velus. Hilarant. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour pétille d'action quand deux, trois ou quatre joueurs s'unissent sur le green, ne serait-ce que d'un coup de Manette +, votre personnage crie un « encouragement » au moment propice, de quoi déstabiliser le swing de l'adversaire ! Regardez votre rival délirer et rappelez-vous : vous avez de la chance que le combat à coup de clubs soit interdit, sinon, vous en auriez déjà un autour du cou. Et comme si vous n'étiez pas assez gâtés comme ça, vous pouvez aussi faire une partie de Mario Golf Advance Tour pour Game Boy Advance sur votre Nintendo GameCube à l'aide du câble Game Boy Advance, et vous pouvez même transférer des personnages entre les deux versions. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour combine deux ingrédients de choix, l'univers de Mario et le golf, pour les rendre inséparables et vous concocter une de ces aventures dont Nintendo a le secret. Les pantalons ne sont pas obligatoires, mais bon, si vous y tenez vraiment, allez-y, mettez-les ! Vous savez, nous, les goûts et les couleurs... tout est permis.

locale.title: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
locale.synopsis: Es ist die liebste Freizeitbeschäftigung von Fußballprofis, Topmanagern - und jetzt auch von Klempnern, Prinzessinnen, Dinosauriern und Affen. In Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, dem Nintendo GameCube-Nachfolger des heißgeliebten Mario Golf auf Nintendo 64, finden einige der bizarrsten und brilliantesten Szenen des Golfsports statt. Die übliche Gang - Mario, Luigi, Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario und andere - hat sich in Golfklamotten geworfen (nicht ganz einfach für Wario; und für Donkey Kong reicht eine Golfkrawatte), um den kleinen weißen pockennarbigen Ball ins richtige Loch zu bugsieren. In der Toadstool Tour-Meisterschaft mit ihren unzähligen, mit Fallen übersäten Bahnen hat nur der geschickteste Golfer eine Chance, während andere ihren Frust an der Grasnarbe austoben. Mit deiner Hilfe wird dein Lieblingscharakter schließlich grinsend den Siegespokal über dem Kopf schwenken können. Wenn du die diversen Golfplätze der Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour betrittst, werden dir vor lauter Schönheit die Augen überlaufen. Die lebensechten Fairways bestehen aus saftigem grünem Gras, Hügeln und Wasserfallen, sowie schimmernden Waldrändern - und natürlich ein paar Nintendo-Spezialitäten wie z.B. Mt. Rushmore, wo statt der Konterfeis amerikanischer Präsidenten das unverschämte Grinsen von Yoshi und Luigi prangt. In der Toadstool Tour gibt es aber auch nagelneue Bahnen aus dem Mushroom Kingdom - übersät mit den bekannten getupften Pilzen, Blasenbäumen, Piranha Plant-und Chain Chomp-Fallen, und sogar mit Warpröhren, die den Ball zu einem anderen Teil des Parcours schleudern. In einer Umwelt, die derart aller Regeln spottet, können sich auch Beinahe-Verlierer plötzlich an der Spitze wiederfinden. Trotzdem entscheidet natürlich im neuen Balldresch-System von Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour vor allem dein Talent darüber, ob du letztendlich auf dem Siegertreppchen landest. Das Stärkebalken-System ist wieder da - drücke auf den A-Knopf, um die Anzeige zu stoppen und die Stärke des Schlags zu bestimmen. Aber jetzt gibt es zwei Schlagvarianten. Anfänger können außer der Schlagstärke alles automatisch steuern lassen - erfahrene Spieler können schnelle Kombinationen der A- und B-Knöpfe verwenden, um Topspin, Backspin, Slice und andere Spezialschläge auszuführen. Mit etwas Übung können Experten in diesem großartigen neuen System den Ball mit erstaunlicher Kraft gen Himmel schleudern oder zur Erde zurücktauchen lassen, als sei er von einer unsichtbaren Decke abgeprallt. Dazu kommt eine randvolle Golftasche mit Schlägern und Puttern aller Art, zusätzlichen Möglichkeiten zum Sidespin und ein von Spezialeffekten beflügelter Power Shot. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour bietet ein Steuersystem von großer Tiefe, das einen auch in den haarigsten Situationen nicht im Stich lässt. Mario Golf-Neulinge brauchen aber nicht zu befürchten, dass sie nichts als Bogeys erzielen. Ein Führungspfeil zeigt den Weg des Balls an (aber nur den idealen Weg, der Wind, Hügel, Hindernisse und Abprall nicht berücksichtigt - zu einfach soll es schließlich auch nicht werden), und nützliche Raster auf dem Green zeigen dir tückischen Beulen, Dellen und Kurven an. Außerdem kannst du die Kamera nach Belieben führen - betrachte den Weg zum Loch aus der Vogelperspektive, oder blicke weit voraus, um das Gelände zu erkunden. Wie praktisch. Während du dich durch immer schwierigere Bahnen hindurcharbeitest - mit kniffligen Richtungswechseln, gähnenden Abgründen und vielen frustrierenden Wasserfallen - erlebst du ein Feuerwerk erstklassiger Animation. Mario und die anderen strotzen nur so vor Persönlichkeit, wenn sie ihren Schläger hinter sich herschleifen, den Ball schlagen, dass die Funken sprühen (und ,PRIMA SCHLAG!' schreien, wenn du geschickt auf die Knöpfe drückst), und sich über jedes Birdie, Bogey oder Hole-in-One freuen oder ärgern. Princess Peach, soeben zurück aus ihrem Super Mario Sunshine-Urlaub und im kürzesten aller Miniröcke, ist noch hübscher geworden, und die Art, wie DK den doch recht kleinen Schläger in seinen riesigen Pratzen hält, ist witzig wie immer. Bei Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour kommt erst richtig Leben in die Bude, wenn zwei, drei oder vier Spieler sich zu einer Partie zusammentun - nicht zuletzt deshalb, weil dein Charakter durch Druck auf das Steuerkreuz ,,anfeuernde" Kommentare rufen kann - just in dem Moment, wo der Gegner zum Schlag ausholt. Freu dich über die Wutausbrüche deiner Rivalen - und darüber, dass hier nicht mit richtigen Golfschlägern gespielt wird, sonst würden sie dir vermutlich einen um den Hals wickeln. Und auch das ist noch nicht alles: verbinde dich über das Nintendo GameCube Game Boy Advance-Kabel mit deiner Mario Golf Advance Tour für Game Boy Advance, und schon kannst du zwischen den beiden Versionen Charaktere austauschen. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour kombiniert zwei wunderbare Dinge - das Mario-Universum und Golf - auf solch uneingeschränkt unterhaltsame Weise, dass man sich kaum noch vorstellen kann, dass diese Elemente jemals getrennt waren.Und du brauchst zum Spielen auch keine peinlichen karierten Hosen anzuziehen. Es hält dich natürlich auch niemand davon ab...

locale.title: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
locale.synopsis:
Es el pasatiempo preferido de los futbolistas profesionales, de los ejecutivos de empresa y ahora también de los fontaneros, las princesas, los dinosaurios y los simios. En Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, la continuación para Nintendo GameCube del adorado Mario Golf 64 para Nintendo 64, el campo de golf nos ofrece algunos de sus mejores y más extraordinarios momentos. Nuestros amigos de siempre, Mario, Luigi, Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario y compañía, se han puesto sus pantalones de golf (Wario con alguna dificultad y Donkey Kong con su "corbata de golf" roja) para meter la pelotita blanca dentro del pequeño hoyo. El campeonato Toadstool Tour, con sus numerosos circuitos llenos de obstáculos, hará patalear de frustración hasta al más experto de los golfistas. Con tu ayuda, el personaje que escojas logrará salir triunfante y hacerse con la copa.
Entra en uno de los numerosos y variados campos de golf que ofrece Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour y disfruta de una belleza impresionante con la que se te hará la boca agua. Circuitos "del mundo real" con campos verdes, montículos, lagos y zonas de bosques frondosos con algún que otro toque especial que Nintendo ha dado a famosos monumentos, como el Monte Rushmore, en el que los respetados antepasados de Estados Unidos han sido reemplazados por la pícara sonrisa de Yoshi y Luigi. Pero además, Toadstool Tour presenta nuevos campos temáticos como Mushroom Kingdom decorados con esas famosas setas de lunares, árboles de burbujas, con los obstáculos Piranha Plant y Chain Chomp e incluso con teletransportadores que llevarán a la bola de una sección a otra del campo. En estos entornos tan cambiantes, los perdedores potenciales se pueden poner de repente en cabeza y todo puede cambiar en un instante. Pero tu talento a la hora de dominar el nuevo sistema de golpeo de bola de Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour desempeñará un papel importante a la hora de decidir si te subirás al podio de los ganadores.
Vuelve a aparecer también el mismo sistema de indicador de fuerza. Pulsa el Botón A para detener el indicador y determinar la potencia con la que golpearás la bola. Pero ahora además hay dos modos diferentes de juego. Los jugadores novatos pueden hacer que todo esté controlado de forma automática salvo la fuerza del golpe, mientras que los jugadores expertos podrán usar rápidas combinaciones del Botón A y el Botón B para añadir golpes de efecto, golpes del revés, de derecha y muchos más. Con la práctica, este nuevo y genial sistema permite a los jugadores expertos lanzar la bola por los aires con una fuerza sorprendente o hacer que descienda sobre la tierra a toda velocidad como si rebotase contra un techo invisible. Si añadimos a todo esto una bolsa de golf llena de palos y putters diferentes, con nuevos efectos de golpe y la posibilidad de ejecutar un golpe de fuerza (Power Shot) cargado de efectos especiales, en Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour tendrás un control absoluto que te permitirá salir airoso de las situaciones más complicadas. A pesar de todo, los principiantes de Mario Golf no tienen por qué conformarse con ejecutar un bogey tras otro. Una flecha guía mostrará el trayecto de la bola (aunque en un mundo ideal no habría viento, ni colinas ni obstáculos y la bola no rebotaría, tampoco queremos ponértelo demasiado fácil). Aparecerán sobre el campo útiles cuadrículas que señalan esos baches, montículos y curvas peligrosas. Además la cámara está a tu completa disposición, así que úsala para ver el trayecto hasta el hoyo desde una perspectiva aérea, o enfoca a distancia para comprobar el terreno. Te servirá de mucha ayuda. A medida que avanzas por los complicados greens, te encontrarás con giros difíciles, fosas profundas y muchos obstáculos acuáticos.
Podrás disfrutar de una impresionante animación de primera clase. La personalidad de Mario y compañía sale a relucir en cuanto se preparan para golpear y la bola sale disparada con una explosión de chispas (además aparecerá el mensaje '¡BUEN GOLPE!' si pulsas el Botón en el momento justo). Podrás ver cómo celebran o se enfadan tras cada birdie, bogey u hoyo en uno. La Princesa Peach está más guapa que nunca, recién llegada de sus vacaciones en Super Mario Sunshine, y con una minifalda aún más corta. Y si quieres troncharte de risa, sólo tienes que fijarte en las enormes manos de DK agarrando el diminuto palo...
Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour es el no va más cuando dos, tres o hasta cuatro jugadores se reúnen para dar unos golpes, y además, con el Panel de Control, tu personaje podrá lanzar un grito de "ánimo" justo a tiempo para arruinar el golpe de tu oponente. Mira cómo se enfada tu rival. Tienes suerte de que los palos de golf no sean de verdad porque si no ya tendrías uno estampado en la cabeza. Y por si todo esto no fuese suficiente, conecta tu cartucho de Mario Golf Advance Tour para Game Boy Advance, usando el Cable Game Boy AdvanceTM de Nintendo GameCubeTM y podrás transferir los personajes de una versión a otra. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour nos ofrece dos grandes elementos, el universo de Mario y el golf, y los une de una forma tan perfecta y divertida que es difícil imaginarlos separados. Además, para jugar no tendrás que ponerte esos ridículos pantalones a cuadros. Aunque, bueno, si quieres puedes...

locale.title: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour
locale.synopsis: È il passatempo preferito di giocatori professionisti di football e dirigenti d'azienda. Adesso anche di idraulici, principesse, dinosauri e scimmie. In Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, il sequel per Nintendo GameCube del popolare Mario Golf 64 per Nintendo 64, il green del campo da golf ospiterà alcune delle scene più bizzarre e brillanti mai viste prima. Tutti i soliti sospetti (Mario, Luigi, Peach, Donkey Kong, Wario e molti altri) hanno indossato le scarpette da golf (con una certa difficoltà nel caso di Wario, mentre per Donkey Kong è decisamente meglio parlare di 'cravatta da golf') per mandare in buca la piccola pallina bianca. Il campionato Toadstool Tour, con una miriade di percorsi colmi di pericoli, premia solo il golfista più abile: agli altri non resta che sbattere i piedi sull'erba in preda alla frustrazione. Con il tuo aiuto, il personaggio che avrai scelto potrà sollevare sorridente la coppa. Cammina sui tantissimi green di Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour e vedrai delle meraviglie da rifarti gli occhi. I campi da golf del gioco, come quelli del 'mondo reale', sono composti da erba verdissima, collinette di sabbia, laghetti, e lussureggianti perimetri di bosco. A questo aggiungi la strana fissa di Nintendo per i monumenti famosi, come il Monte Rushmore, dove i volti degli stimati fondatori degli USA sono stati rimpiazzati dai maliziosi sorrisi di Yoshi e Luigi. Ma in Toadstool Tour si possono calpestare anche i nuovissimi green ispirati al Mushroom Kingdom e abbelliti con i familiari funghetti a pallini, alberi di bolle, Piranha Plant e pericolosi Chain Chomp, oltre a tubature di teletrasporto che trasferiscono la pallina da una sezione all'altra del percorso. In ambienti dove le regole vengono continuamente distorte, i potenziali sconfitti possono ritrovarsi al primo posto in un batter d'occhio. Ma anche il tuo talento con il nuovo sistema per colpire la pallina di Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour svolgerà un ruolo importante per decidere se riuscirai a salire sul gradino più alto del podio. Torna il sistema di barre di potenza: premi il pulsante A per fermare una barra di potenza in movimento e determinare la forza del colpo. Adesso sono inoltre disponibili addirittura due modalità per colpire la pallina. I novellini possono decidere che tutto, tranne la forza, venga controllato automaticamente, mentre i giocatori esperti potranno utilizzare veloci combinazioni dei pulsanti A e B per aggiungere effetti di topspin (giro verso l'alto), backspin (giro all'indietro), taglio e molti altri. Con un po' di pratica questo nuovo stupendo sistema consentirà ai giocatori esperti di spedire la pallina in orbita con una potenza sorprendente oppure di farla scendere in picchiata verso terra come se fosse rimbalzata contro un soffitto invisibile. Aggiungi una sacca da golf piena di mazze con differenti abilità, ulteriori opportunità per imprimere effetti di sidespin (giro laterale) e la possibilità di eseguire uno speciale Power Shot colmo di effetti, e in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour giocherai con un sistema di comando decisamente sofisticato che ti aiuterà a trarti d'impiccio anche nelle situazioni più antipatiche. Tuttavia, se sei un neofita di Mario Golf non dovrai impantanarti in serie interminabili di tiri. Una freccia ti mostrerà la traiettoria della pallina (anche se non in un mondo da sogno dove non esistono vento, colline, ostacoli e rimbalzi della pallina... non aspettarti che ti rendiamo le cose troppo facili) e comode griglie sono sovrapposte al green per indicare le collinette, gli avvallamenti e le curve più pericolose. Inoltre, la telecamera è completamente sotto il tuo controllo, e quindi puoi alzare l'inquadratura per vedere il percorso fino alla buca dal punto di vista di una nuvola oppure percorrere velocemente la distanza che ti separa dalla buca per controllare il terreno. Molto comodo. Mentre avanzi su green sempre più difficili, incontrando curve insidiose, baratri mozzafiato e molti laghetti che ti faranno perdere le staffe, potrai ammirare un'animazione di prima classe. Mario e compagni trasudano carisma quando portano la mazza alle spalle, colpiscono la pallina con un'esplosione di graziose scintille (con tanto di messaggio 'BEL COLPO!', se hai premuto i pulsanti nel modo migliore) e gioiscono o si imbronciano per ogni buon tiro e ogni buca raggiunta in un colpo solo. Princess Peach è più bella che mai, appena tornata dalla vacanza di Super Mario Sunshine e con una minigonna più mini del solito, mentre le "manone" di DK che afferrano una mazza (al confronto minuscola) sono più divertenti che mai. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour entra veramente nel vivo quando due, tre o quattro giocatori si uniscono per una partita. Dà un contributo fondamentale in questo senso il fatto che utilizzando la pulsantiera di comando + il tuo personaggio potrà urlare un "incoraggiamento" proprio nel momento giusto per far sbagliare il tiro a un avversario. Fai quindi attenzione alle urla del tuo rivale e ringrazia il cielo che non stai giocando con mazze vere, altrimenti puoi star sicuro che te ne ritroveresti qualcuna attorcigliata al collo! Inoltre, come se tutto questo non fosse abbastanza, se colleghi la tua copia di Mario Golf Advance Tour per Game Boy Advance tramite il Cavo Game Boy Advance per NINTENDO GAMECUBE potrai trasferire i personaggi da una versione all'altra. Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour unisce due cose stupende: l'universo di Mario e il golf. E le confeziona in un modo così divertente e perfetto che è difficile immaginare che un tempo fossero separate. In più, non dovrai nemmeno indossare un paio di imbarazzanti pantaloni a quadri per giocare. Oddio, se proprio vuoi, nessuno ti impedisce di farlo...

locale.title: Future Tactics: The Uprising
locale.synopsis:
The reality you know is under threat.
The reality you know has been infected with a retroactive virus capable of rewriting history in its own image. The reality you know must end in order to save it.
At an indeterminable point in mankind's future, ordered society has reverted to a feudal state, scattered groups of survivors huddling together in small villages and nomadic enclaves. Mankind is running scared of the greatest to it's existence since reality first sputtered into existence.
Decades ago, the face of the planet changed, entire cities disappeared overnight, whole countries vanished. Left in their place were creatures, hideous shambling monstrosities, technologically advance, and yet intellectually retarded. And as mankind would soon discover, this was an enemy that could not be stopped and killed. Strike one down, and it would be reborn without so much as a scratch.
In the dark years ahead, when our enemies are but warped reflections of ourselves, and where our allies may be more than they seem, a boy, his sister, and a rag-tag assembly of unlikely warriors are the planets last hope. But as they soon discover, immortality comes at a price. Twisting perceptions, time and emotions.
Future Tactics is a tale of love, loss, hope...and some mean green ugly muthas.
Features: * Nine beautifully crafted characters, each with unique weapons and attributes * Nineteen levels, each with varied landscapes and challenges from rural idylls to deserted cities complete with seasons * High explosive action combined with turn based strategy allows the player to choose the pace of progress * Advanced AI enemies that respond intelligently to your every move * Unlimited replay opportunities as the combination of a unique enemy AI and deformable landscapes means that no two games are ever the same * Compelling plot driven missions written by TV script writer Paul Rose (of East enders fame) complete with rich FMV story driven objectives at the beginning of each mission * Fully destructible landscapes, buildings and scenery. * Enjoy the story-driven campaign or challenge a friend for a thrilling duell!

locale.title: NFL Blitz Pro
locale.synopsis: NFL Blitz Pro is an 11-on-11 licensed smash-mouth football videogame experience, delivering a new and sophisticated online feature set combined with its blend of lightning-fast, adrenaline-style gameplay. NFL Blitz has been reinvented, without leaving behind the edginess of the previous games in the series. For the first time, NFL Blitz Pro will showcase authentic 11-on-11 gameplay with realistic rules, features, and online play. New features also include a new Franchise mode, a reworked running game, and an improved AI.

game.name: The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' Da Rules (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' Da Rules
locale.synopsis: "Da Rules" book--the ultimate guide to having Fairy Godparents--has disappeared in Fairly Odd Parents: Breakin' Da Rules, and Cosmo and Wanda are left without their magical powers. Throughout this platform adventure, you play as Timmy as he enters the comic book world, battles evil viruses, avoids boy-eating plants, and finally comes to the rescue of his Fairy Godparents. Set off on an amazing adventure to recover all the pages from "Da Rules" book and restore his Fairy Godparents' powers.

rom.name: The Fairly OddParents: Breakin' Da Rules (USA) (EN) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: Freestyle Metal X
locale.synopsis:
Freestyle Metal Xunleashes anarchy with the freedom to do what you want, when you want. Be anti-establishment: break windows, run over people, ride where you normally can't ride…and get away with it.
With an unlimited stunt system and a lawless energy, Freestyle Metal X dares riders to push the envelope with psychotic tricks in limitless, freestyle environments full of challenges and side events.
Freestyle Metal X doesn't just cross the line, it eliminates it. A sizable dose of insanity will help you perform stunts on the tops of buildings, get air over the Vegas Strip, or shoot yourself out of a cannon onto the Marina streets.

locale.title: FIFA Street 2
locale.synopsis: FIFA Street 2 is second installment in EA's four-on-four soccer game. FIFA Street 2 will feature improved controls, many more tricks, and a new juggle mechanic. Take part in game modes, such as friendly, rule the street, and skills challenge. Choose from 20 national teams and 300-plus real-life soccer stars. There are 10 playable venues ranging from London's Westway Leisure Center to the sandy beaches of Brazil.

locale.title: FIFA Street 2
locale.synopsis: FIFA Street 2 is second installment in EA's four-on-four soccer game. FIFA Street 2 will feature improved controls, many more tricks, and a new juggle mechanic. Take part in game modes, such as friendly, rule the street, and skills challenge. Choose from 20 national teams and 300-plus real-life soccer stars. There are 10 playable venues ranging from London's Westway Leisure Center to the sandy beaches of Brazil.

locale.title: F-Zero GX
locale.synopsis: The classic Nintendo franchise that has inspired countless futuristic racing games returns with F-Zero GX on the Nintendo GameCube. Long-time rival Sega collaborated with Nintendo to redefine the futuristic racing genre with intense competition, blazing speeds, and brilliant track designs. F-Zero GX offers 20 different tracks and over 30 unique pilots, as well as a custom craft editor where players can create their own vehicle. Multiple game modes including Grand Prix, Time Attack, Versus mode, and the all new challenging story mode offer a multitude of alternatives to traditional racing. Players can laso save their game data on a memory card and use it to race custom vehicles in the arcade version of F-Zero GX.

locale.title: F-Zero GX
locale.synopsis: A clássica franquia da Nintendo que inspirou incontáveis jogos de corrida futuristas está de volta com F-Zero GX no Nintendo GameCube. A rival de longa data Sega colaborou com a Nintendo para redefinir o gênero de corrida futurista com intensa competição, velocidades estonteantes e designs de pista brilhantes. O F-Zero GX oferece 20 pistas diferentes e mais de 30 pilotos exclusivos, bem como um editor de artesanato personalizado onde os jogadores podem criar seus próprios veículos. Vários modos de jogo, incluindo Grand Prix, Time Attack, modo Versus e o novo modo de história desafiadora, oferecem uma infinidade de alternativas às corridas tradicionais. Os jogadores podem salvar seus dados de jogo em um cartão de memória e usá-lo para competir com veículos personalizados na versão arcade do F-Zero GX.
