It has lead character Samus Aran, a bounty hunter by trade, chasing down the evil Space Pirates. Their intention is to use a genetic mutagen called Phazon to create a super army and take over the universe. While the installments in the series before have never been home to deeply involving storylines, Metroid Prime breaks the shell to offer up one of the most intriguing and read-worthy sagas yet. Developed by Texas-based Retro Studios. Metroid Prime brings all of the elements of the acclaimed franchise into a massive 3D arena.

locale.title: メトロイドプライム
locale.synopsis:
腕利きのバウンティ・ハンター、サムス・アランの活躍により全滅させられたかに思われた宇宙海賊（スペースパイレーツ）であったが、惑星ゼーベスの軌道上に浮かぶ宇宙船内で戦禍を逃れた一団があった。生き延びた彼らは、２つの部隊に分かれ、一方はゼーベスに戻りサムスに破壊された要塞の再建を目指した。 他方は、新たな星での再建をめざして強力なエネルギー反応を感知したターロンIVに降り立った。彼らが目にしたのは、かつて鳥人族文明がその場所にあったことを伝える遺跡の数々であった。 やがて彼らは、謎のエネルギーが、遺跡の１つである神殿の地下に封印された隕石から漏れ出していることを突き止める。
のちに「フェイゾン」と名づけられたこのエネルギー物質に生物を変異させる特性があることを発見した宇宙海賊（スペースパイレーツ）は、この惑星の生物に「フェイゾン」を組み合わせる実験を始めるとともに、何とか神殿地下の「フェイゾンの核」である隕石を手に入れようとした。しかし核を護るように建てられた神殿の封印を解くことができず、これを果たせずにいた。 その頃、サムスの乗ったスターシップのレーダーが、ターロンIV軌道上に浮遊する彼らの宇宙船をとらえていた。宇宙船の内部に侵入したサムスは、宇宙海賊（スペースパイレーツ）により「フェイゾン」を使った生物実験の結果を目撃することになる。
今作から採用されたサムス視点（主観視点）によるプレイは、プレイヤー自身が サムスとなって未知の世界を探索しているかのような臨場感を実現している。 ボタン１つで敵をロックオンできるので、主観視点シューティングが苦手な方でもストレスなく迫力のシューティングを堪能できる。もちろん、ただ撃ちまくるだけでなく、敵の属性に合わせて効果的なビームを選択するなどの戦略性を備えた。 さらに新機能「バイザーシステム」が導入されたことで、メトロイドシリーズの醍醐味である謎解き要素も一層充実。局面に応じて４種類のバイザーを使い分けることが惑星 ターロンIV 攻略のカギになる。 サムス視点のほかにも、モーフボール（丸まり状態）時の客観視点プレイや、随所にインサートされるカットインムービーによる演出が巧みに紡ぎ合わされ、いわゆる既存のＦＰＳ とは一線を画 する作品に。 薄暗い洞窟を進む「恐さ」、飛び交うビーム攻撃をくぐり抜ける「スリル」、パワーアップアイテム を苦心の末発見する「達成感」など "メトロイドらしさ" は残しつつも、これらの新 システムによってメトロイドプライムは新たな面白さをプレイヤーに提供する。

locale.title: Metroid Prime
locale.synopsis: Everyone's favorite heroine, Samus Aran, is back! Packed to the gills with exploration, creative power-ups, and wicked enemies, Metroid Prime is a first-person adventure worthy of the Metroid stamp. An action-packed adventure set in the first-person perspective, Metroid Prime takes place just after the events in the original Metroid (NES). It has lead character Samus Aran, a bounty hunter by trade, chasing down the evil Space Pirates. Their intention is to use a genetic mutagen called Phazon to create a super army and take over the universe. While the installments in the series before have never been home to deeply involving storylines, Metroid Prime breaks the shell to offer up one of the most intriguing and read-worthy sagas yet. Developed by Texas-based Retro Studios. Metroid Prime brings all of the elements of the acclaimed franchise into a massive 3D arena.

locale.title: Metroid Prime
locale.synopsis: Les Space Pirates font peut-être encore des leurs, mais la chasseresse de Metroid Samus Aran voit la vie sous un nouvel angle. Pour la première fois, vous verrez le monde à travers le regard de Samus tandis qu'elle s'embarque dans une toute nouvelle aventure qui constitue la suite du scénario palpitant déjà publié sur trois générations de consoles Nintendo. Si vous ne connaissez pas bien l'histoire, en voici un résumé. Samus a d'abord empêché les ignobles Space Pirates et Mother Brain de rassembler une armée de Metroids sur la planète Zebes, dans le jeu Metroid pour la NES. Elle a ensuite été envoyée sur la planète SR388 pour y terminer sa mission en débarrassant l'univers de toutes les larves Metroid, dans le jeu Metroid II pour la Game Boy. Dans Super Metroid pour la Super Nintendo, Samus a contrecarré les projets de Mother Brain qui tentait de voler les larves Metroid conservées par les scientifiques, sur Ceres. Ce quatrième chapitre attendu avec grande impatience commence dans le plus pur style Metroid lorsque le vaisseau de Samus se pose sur un vaisseau abandonné. En moins de temps qu'il n'en faut pour le dire, Samus se retrouve plongée dans les vastes mondes de la planète Tallon IV à la recherche des Space Pirates voleurs de Metroid. Metroid Prime associe la méthode de tir explosive caractéristique de la série Metroid à des graphismes époustouflants qui oscillent sans qu'on s'en aperçoive entre le point de vue subjectif et le point de vue objectif. Et ce n'est pas tout. Samus a le choix entre deux modes de viseur : combat et balayage, pour combattre et explorer les lieux tout en se frayant un chemin à travers le monde dangereux de Tallon IV. Metroid Prime comporte également de nombreuses armes bien connues des habitués de l'univers de Metroid, telles que le Wave Beam et le Freeze Beam, ainsi que de nombreux armements flambant neufs. Ce n'est pourtant pas uniquement en gardant un doigt chatouilleux sur la gâchette que vous remporterez ce combat. Vous devrez faire appel à tous les atouts de Samus, comme ses combinaisons spéciales qui activent de nouvelles compétences et l'incontournable Morph Ball qui recherche tous les secrets cachés. Avec ce fantastique mélange de tirs explosifs, d'énigmes à résoudre et de graphismes à couper le souffle, Metroid Prime vous laissera pantois!

locale.title: Metroid Prime
locale.synopsis: Die Space Pirates kommen vielleicht mit ihren alten Tricks, aber Metroid-Jägerin Samus Aran sieht das Leben jetzt anders. Zum ersten Mal siehst du durch Samus´ Augen den Eintritt in ein ganz neues Abenteuer - die Fortsetzung einer spannenden Geschichte, die sich durch drei Generationen von Nintendo-Systemen zieht. Wenn du die Story noch nicht kennst, lies diese Zusammenfassung. In Metroid für das NES hielt Samus die bösen Space Pirates und Mother Brain davon ab, auf dem Planeten Zebes eine Armee von Metroiden aufzubauen. Dann, in Metroid II für den Game Boy, wurde sie gebraucht, um den Job auf dem Planeten SR388 zu vollenden und das Universum ein für alle mal, bis auf eine einzige Metroid-Larve, zu befreien. In Super Metroid für das Super Nintendo durchkreuzte Samus Mother Brains Versuch, die gefangene Metroid-Larve von den Wissenschaftlern auf Ceres zu stehlen. Das langerwartete vierte Kapitel beginnt nach echter Metroid-Art, als Samus' Schiff an ein gefährlich aussehendes, verlassenes Raumschiff andockt. Es dauert nicht lange, bis sie sich auf der Suche nach den Metroid-Räubern, den Space Pirates, auf dem Planeten Tallon IV wiederfindet. Metroid Prime kombiniert das großartige Gameplay der Feuerkämpfe, das man von der Metroid-Serie gewohnt ist, mit unglaublichen Grafiken, die nahtlos zwischen der First-Person- und Third-Person-Perspektive umschalten. Und das ist noch nicht alles. Samus kann zwischen zwei Modi ihres Visiers wählen: Kampf- und Scanmodus, einer geeignet zum Gefecht, der andere zur Erforschung der gefährlichen Welt von Tallon IV. Dazu bietet Metroid Prime viele bekannte Waffen aus der Geschichte der Metroid-Serie, wie den Wave Beam und den Freeze Beam, sowie einige brandneue Rüstungen. Aber du brauchst nicht nur einen zuckenden Zeigefinger am Drücker, um diese Schlacht zu gewinnen. Um alle Geheimnisse auszukundschaften, musst du Samus' ganzes Können benutzen, darunter auch spezielle Anzüge, die neue Fähigkeiten aktivieren, oder den ständig präsenten Morph Ball. Mit diesem tollen Mix aus Feuergefechten, Rätsellösen und erstklassiger Grafik wird dich Metroid Prime ganz schnell in seinen Bann ziehen!

locale.title: Metroid Prime
locale.synopsis:
Puede que los Space Pirates hayan vuelto a las andadas, pero la cazadora de Metroid, Samus Aran, tiene una nueva visión de la vida.
Por primera vez, verás a través de los ojos de Samus, que se embarca en una nueva aventura -continuando la genial historia que se ha extendido a lo largo de tres generaciones de sistemas Nintendo. Si no la conoces, a continuación tienes una puesta al día. Samus primero impidió que los malvados Space Pirates y Mother Brain formaran un ejército de Metroids en el planeta Zebes, con Metroid para NES. Después se le llamó para acabar la tarea en el planeta SR388, en Metroid II para Game Boy, liberando al final al universo de todas las larvas de Metroid salvo una. En Super Metroid, para Super Nintendo, Samus frustró el intento de Mother Brain de robar la larva de Metroid cautiva a los científicos de Ceres. Esta esperada cuarta entrega comienza al puro estilo Metroid: la nave de Samus va a parar a una astronave abandonada de aspecto peligroso. Pero en poco tiempo se adentrará en el vasto mundo el planeta Tallon IV en busca de los Space Pirates ladrones de Metroid. Metroid Prime combina acción con tiroteo, lo que cabe esperar de las series Metroid con gráficos increíbles que fusionan a la perfección perspectivas en primera y tercera persona. Y eso no es todo. Samus puede seleccionar dos modos de visión: combate o escáner, para batallar y explorar el peligroso mundo Tallon IV. Además, Metroid Prime contiene muchas armas conocidas de la historia de Metroid, como el Wave Beam y Freeze Beam, y armamento nuevo. Pero te hará falta más que un gatillo fácil para ganar esta batalla. Deberás emplear todas las habilidades de Samus, incluyendo los trajes especiales que activan capacidades, y la omnipresente Morph Ball, para buscar los secretos. Una sensacional mezcla de acción, resolución de puzzles y gráficos de vanguardia. ¡Metroid Prime te hará disfrutar a lo grande!

locale.title: Metroid Prime
locale.synopsis: Gli Space Pirates possono anche combinarne una delle loro, ma la cacciatrice di Metroid, Samus Aran, ha una nuova visione della vita. Per la prima volta, vedrete le cose attraverso gli occhi di Samus, che si imbarca in un'avventura del tutto nuova, continuando così l'avvincente storia che ha attraversato tre generazioni di sistemi Nintendo. Se questa storia non vi è familiare, eccovi un aggiornamento. Samus dapprima ha fermato i cattivi Space Pirates e Mother Brain nel loro progetto di ammassare un esercito di Metroids sul pianeta Zebes, in Metroid per NES. Quindi, è stata chiamata a completare il lavoro sul pianeta SR388, in Metroid II per Game Boy, liberando finalmente l'universo da tutte le larve di Metroid eccetto una. In Super Metroid, per Super Nintendo, Samus ha contrastato il tentativo di Mother Brain di strappare la larva di Metroid dalle mani degli scienziati su Ceres. Questo quarto capitolo molto atteso inizia in vero stile Metroid, con la nave di Samus che aggancia un'astronave abbandonata dall'aspetto minaccioso. Ma non ci vorrà molto perché si avventuri nei vasti mondi del pianeta Tallon IV in cerca di quegli Space Pirates ladri di Metroid. Metroid Prime combina lo stupendo gioco di sparatorie che vi aspettate dalla serie Metroid e una grafica incredibile che alterna fluidamente la prospettiva in prima persona a quella in terza persona. E non è tutto! Samus può scegliere tra due modalità visore: combattimento e scansione, per avanzare combattendo ed esplorando nel pericoloso mondo di Tallon IV. Inoltre, Metroid Prime vanta numerose armi già note nella tradizione di Metroid, come il Wave Beam e il Freeze Beam, oltre ad alcuni armamenti totalmente nuovi. Ma avrai bisogno di ben altro che un dito impaziente sul grilletto per vincere questa battaglia. Devi fare appello a tutte le facoltà di Samus, inclusi vestiti speciali che attivano nuove capacità, e l'immancabile Morph Ball, per scovare qualunque segreto. Con uno stupefacente mix di armi da fuoco per sparare, enigmi da risolvere, e grafica attualissima, Metroid Prime ti trascinerà con sé!

locale.title: Muppets Party Cruise
locale.synopsis: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Animal, plus all your other favorite Muppets are going on a cruise and you can go with them. In Muppet Party Cruise, you'll play 30 fast minigames to help earn the Muppets a place on the first- class deck. Other Muppet characters appear as you compete in minigames, such as Rhythm Mayhem, Shuffle Chalk, and Bunsen's Burners. Whether you play the full interactive board game, or just jump aboard into the minigames, Muppet Party Cruise delivers plenty of four-player fun.

game.name: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16 Licensed to Drive (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Mary-Kate and Ashley: Sweet 16 Licensed to Drive
locale.synopsis: You're invited to the Mary-Kate and Ashley's sweet 16 birthday bash. Head to the DMV, earn your license, and then put the pedal to the metal. In true Hollywood style, go racing in cars, jetskis, sailboards, and ATVs. The party continues with over 30 minigames, including Birthday Blowout, Caught Up in Fashion, and Freeway Frenzy. Invite up to three of your friends to celebrate with head-to-head competition. Mary-Kate and Ashley will turn 16 only once, so with some friends, two game boards, and a slew of vehicles, this will be a day to remember.

locale.title: Super Monkey Ball
locale.synopsis: Labyrinth/Marble Madness hybrid with a unique platform twist, based on the Sega arcade game of the same name. Players control not a character, but tilt the entire environment to guide their "monkey ball" to the goal. Super Monkey Ball's "Main Mode" is constructed of more than 110 different levels of various difficulty, most of them taken from the arcade game. Players begin their monkey adventure going through these different levels on various settings of difficulty. There are an initial 10 Beginner levels, 30 Advanced, and 50 Expert, as well as extra versions on top of it all. A smattering of multiplayer modes rounds off the package.

locale.title: Super Monkey Ball
locale.synopsis:
Hey, ihr Party-Tiger!
Ruft eure Freunde an und warnt eure Nachbarn schon mal vor, denn jetzt geht's rund!
Lasst den Affen raus in über 90 Levels, in verrückten Mehrspieler-Modi und 7 coolen Spielvarianten. Zugleich "Party" und "Spiel", wird euch Super Monkey Ball sicher "rundum" gefallen.
6 verschiedene Games sind zu spielen: Monkey-Billard, Monkey-Bowling, Monkey-Golf, Monkey-Kampf, Monkey-Rennen und Monkey-Ziel.

locale.title: Madden NFL 2002
locale.synopsis: Madden NFL Football features all the teams, players, and features that you've come to know and love, Madden puts you right on the field with the big hitters! Play a full season with your favorite team and take them to the Super Bowl, or try the franchise mode and build a dynasty. With all-new realistic player animations, Madden Cards, a training mode, and the Two-Minute Drill, Madden truly has it all!

game.name: Men In Black II: Alien Escape (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Men In Black II: Alien Escape
locale.synopsis: Equipped with an arsenal of unearthly ammo, it's up to Agents Jay and Kay to save the Earth from the scum of the universe. As part of this covert team, you'll wield stylish weapons while fighting off aliens, such as Shark Guy and Jarra. Enlist the aid of Zed and clean up the planet in multiple New York City locations, including a nuclear station and the alien space hulk. Both familiar and new characters from the movie appear in the game, but it's up to you to decide which ones are on your side.

locale.title: 맨 인 블랙 II: 에일리언 이스케이프

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Frontline
locale.synopsis: Head back behind enemy lines with Lt. Jimmy Patterson in MEDAL OF HONOR FRONTLINE. In this installment of the smash-hit Medal of Honor series, Lt. Patterson returns and must infiltrate the German frontline to steal the HO-IX flying wing, an experimental Nazi weapon so powerful it could turn the tide of World War II.

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Frontline
locale.synopsis:
Das Spielen ist vorbei, melde dich freiwillig.
19 gefährliche Missionen
* Sei dabei bei der Landung in der Normandie * Überliste kampferprobte deutsche Offiziere * Sabotiere deutsche U-Boote
Besiege die Feinde
* Eliminiere Hunderte deutscher Soldaten * Kämpfe an der Seite abgehärteter Alliierter
Bewältige die Ausbildung beim OSS
* Zerstöre gegnerische Festungen * Erlerne den Umgang mit 18 authentischen Waffen
Gewaltige Multiplayer-Kämpfe
* Stell dich dem Feind auf acht herausfordernden Karten * Kämpfe als einer von 20 Soldaten auf der Seite der Alliierten oder der Achsenmächte * Spiele mit bis zu vier Spielern über geteilten Bildschirm

locale.title: Matt Hoffman's Pro BMX 2
locale.synopsis: Matt Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 takes you for a ride through free-roaming cities, where you can perform a variety of stunts on your bike. Choose from an array of professional riders--including Matt Hoffman, Ruben Alcantara, Cory Nastazio, Mike Escamilla, Nathan Wessel, and Joe Kowalski--and begin a skating career. You'll travel to eight expansive cities that come to life with helicopters, boats, cars, and pedestrians. Then, challenge your friend in Push mode, where every time you score big, your side of the screen gets bigger while your friend's shrinks.

locale.title: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2
locale.synopsis: Matt Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 takes you for a ride through free-roaming cities, where you can perform a variety of stunts on your bike. Choose from an array of professional riders--including Matt Hoffman, Ruben Alcantara, Cory Nastazio, Mike Escamilla, Nathan Wessel, and Joe Kowalski--and begin a skating career. You'll travel to eight expansive cities that come to life with helicopters, boats, cars, and pedestrians. Then, challenge your friend in Push mode, where every time you score big, your side of the screen gets bigger while your friend's shrinks.

locale.title: Mission Impossible: Operation Surma
locale.synopsis: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to save the free world from certain doom. Ethan Hunt is back in Mission: Impossible Operation Surma, a stealth action adventure featuring an incredible arsenal of the latest weaponry, hi-tech gadgets, and mind-blowing disguises. Ethan and his IMF team travel to exotic international locations in an effort to thwart the Surma Corporation's diabolical plans for global domination. Throughout your mission, you'll be called upon to use your brains and brawn to get the job done.

locale.title: Monster Jam: Maximum Destruction
locale.synopsis: Get behind the wheel of the world's most famous monster trucks with a brutal arsenal of weapons and go head-to-head in savage vehicular combat. Jump in, hold on, and grind it out through interactive arenas with multiple sub-levels, tricks, traps, and surprises. Play for total carnage as you master your tricks of play including a Freestyle session and the no-holds-barred Championship mode where your rewards pay off in the ultimate in MONSTER TRUCK DESTRUCTION.

locale.title: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance
locale.synopsis: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance marks the relaunch of the Mortal Kombat series with an all-new engine delivering punishing action that will reward long-time fans of the franchise as well as next-generation game lovers. The game features intense hand-to-hand and special-weapon combat, secret hidden moves and combinations with deadly body blows and fatalities.

locale.title: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance
locale.synopsis: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance marks the relaunch of the Mortal Kombat series with an all-new engine delivering punishing action that will reward long-time fans of the franchise as well as next-generation game lovers. The game features intense hand-to-hand and special-weapon combat, secret hidden moves and combinations with deadly body blows and fatalities.

locale.title: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance
locale.synopsis: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance marks the relaunch of the Mortal Kombat series with an all-new engine delivering punishing action that will reward long-time fans of the franchise as well as next-generation game lovers. The game features intense hand-to-hand and special-weapon combat, secret hidden moves and combinations with deadly body blows and fatalities.

locale.title: ESPN MLS ExtraTime 2002
locale.synopsis: With the 2002 World Cup Tournament just around the corner, it's no surprise that console soccer games are a dime a dozen right now. Since EA's got the official World Cup license locked up in the US, other sports game makers are trying their best to stand out and convince footie fans that their game is the one to get. The lineup is fairly clearly defined: SEGA's games cater to arcade gamers, FIFA skews more on the sim side, and Midway's RedCard falls somewhere in between. Konami, a football fan's favorite in both Europe and Japan, joins the fray with the US incarnation of its popular Winning Eleven

locale.title: Monsters, Inc. Scream Arena
locale.synopsis: Afraid of having a little fun? Scaring humans has never been such a gas, and that is the very objective of this raucous video game. The action is based on the plot of Disney or Pixar's Monsters, Inc., an animated film, and all of the playable characters are monsters! The game's 10 levels include hidden bonuses, mini-games, and puzzles to solve. Access all of your progress with the use of a password.

locale.title: Monsters, Inc. Scream Arena
locale.synopsis: Afraid of having a little fun? Scaring humans has never been such a gas, and that is the very objective of this raucous video game. locale.title: Micro Machines
locale.synopsis: Features: • Isometric, overhead racing action in the vein of classics such as RC Pro-Am on the NES • Choose from one of eight over-the-top, personality-packed characters • Hop into one of 48 different Micro Machines vehicles and hit the gas • Vehicles come in one of five flavors: Standard Car, Sports Car, Motorbike, Off-Road Vehicle, and Aquatic Vehicle (a.k.a. boats) • Snag weapons and power-ups as you cruise around the tracks to send your opponents reeling off course • Race against human or CPU opponents in one of five gameplay modes: Micro GP, Race, Bomb Tag, Micro Machines, and Training • Eight different real-world, small-scale environments, with a total of 16 tracks spread throughout • Grab up to four friends for head-to-head racing or duke it out in a two-player Bomb Tag mode • For one to four players simultaneous

locale.title: Mario Party 4
locale.synopsis: Toad, Koopa, and other party-planning pranksters have hidden birthday presents for their closest friends inside the Party Cube. To win the presents, Mario, Yoshi, Peach, and other Mushroom Kingdom favorites will have to plunge into a circus of minigame trickery. As always, keep an eye out for Bowser and his trouble-making goons. Even Whomp and Thwomp have rockin' surprises for you in their Extra Room. Packed with surprises, wild multiplayer action, and zany challenges, Mario Party 4 is your ticket to a good time.

locale.title: Mario Party 4
locale.synopsis: Toad, Koopa, and other party-planning pranksters have hidden birthday presents for their closest friends inside the Party Cube. locale.title: Mario Party 4
locale.synopsis:
Jetzt wird gefeiert, bis die Wände wackeln. In Mario Party 4 für den Nintendo GameCube ist Mario erneut Gastgeber einer großartigen Fete. Mit ihm am Start sind die anderen partylöwen Yoshi, Luigi sowie die All Stars aus Mushroom Kingdom. Mario Party 4 umfasst mehr als 50 faszinierende Mini-Games, in denen bis zu 4 Spieler gleichzeitig auf zahlreichen 3D-Spielbrettern würfeln. Auf blauen und roten Spielfeldern sowie auf den altbekannten Fragezeichenfeldern geht dann richtig die Post ab. Außerdem dürfen sich Mario-Fans auf neue Features wie das Mini-Giant-System freuen. Es lässt die Figuren schrumpfen oder wachsen, so dass sie unterschiedliche Bereiche des Spielbretts erreichen können. Eingeladen auf Marios Fest sind natürlich auch Bowser und Buhu. Mit Buhus Hilfe stehlen die Gamer Goldmünzen und Sterne und im Tag-Battle treten sie in Zweier-Teams beim Sammeln der Sterne gegeneinander an. Die Stimmung steigt weiter mit vielen neuen Mini-Games wie Basketball, in dem Körbe auf Zeit geworfen werden müssen. Tolle neue Spielideen, fantastische Grafiken und atemberaubende Flammeneffekte - mit Mario Party 4 werden Nintendo Fans mit dem Feiern gar nicht mehr aufhören wollen!
FEATURES
- Mit vielen beliebten Nintendo Stars
- Ultimativer Spielspaß auf zahlreichen witzig gestalteten 3D-Spielbrettern
- 50 brandneue und spannende Mini-Games
- Abwechslungsreich durch verschiedene Spielmodi und tolle neue Features wie dem Mini-Giant-System und dem Tag-Battle

locale.title: Monopoly Party
locale.synopsis: When MONOPOLY Party was first announced as a next-generation title many considered the game would be best suited for one system, GameCube, due to the demographics. But, as with the release of all titles based on large franchises, MONOPOLY Party was a multiplatform release. Coming from Runecraft and Infogrames, MONOPOLY Party Uses a new system that allows players to take turns without waiting and gameplay modes supporting up to four-players the digital version seems to be living up to its cardboard ancestor. MONOPOLY Party will also make use of 3D-themed environments and new properties and tokens not present in the original.

locale.title: Big Air Freestyle
locale.synopsis: Big Air Freestyle launches GameCube owners into the stratosphere where they can pull insane tricks even the pros won?t try. Freestyle arenas filled with huge jumps, rings of fire, exploding barrels and destructible objects put gamers into a world of action way beyond reality. Players can also catch huge air and pull tricks while tearing through over 20 supercross and motocross tracks.

locale.title: Big Air Freestyle

locale.title: Super Mario Sunshine
locale.synopsis: Mario makes his debut on the Nintendo GameCube with Super Mario Sunshine. On a vacation away from the Mushroom Kingdom, Mario finds himself in a messy situation on the island of Delphino, where a Mario look alike has been causing all kinds of trouble. Explore huge 3D environments that range from a lush waterfall paradise, to an exciting amusement park complete with a rollercoaster you can ride. Mario makes use of a new water pack, which allows him to hover, launch, and rocket around levels, as well as spray enemies with. Mario has never had so many cool new moves, or looked so good in 3D.

locale.title: スーパーマリオサンシャイン
locale.synopsis: 南の島「ドルピック島」をラクガキで汚す犯人を 追って繰り広げられる、おなじみマリオの大活劇！

locale.title: Super Mario Sunshine
locale.synopsis: Mario makes his debut on the Nintendo GameCube with Super Mario Sunshine. On a vacation away from the Mushroom Kingdom, Mario finds himself in a messy situation on the island of Delphino, where a Mario look alike has been causing all kinds of trouble. locale.title: Super Mario Sunshine
locale.synopsis: Auf einen würdigen Nachfolger zu Super Mario 64, dem Spiel, das die Welt der Videogames 1996 vollkommen umgekrempelt hat, warten wir ja nun schon allzu lange. Aber ein Blick auf Super Mario Sunshine genügt, und es ist sonnenklar, dass Shigeru Miyamoto, der führende Kopf der Games-Entwicklung bei Nintendo, die letzten sechs Jahre mit der Entwicklung eines grandiosen Nintendo GameCube-Debüts verbracht hat, wie es die Mario-Reihe verdient hat. Super Mario Sunshine fängt schon gut an: Mario packt jede Menge rote T-Shirts und blaue Latzhosen für die nächsten zwei Wochen ein und jettet mit Princess Peach in die wohlverdienten Ferien auf einer tropische Insel, um unter Palmen mal richtig auszuspannen. Aber wie das Leben nun mal so spielt hat er nicht lange seine Ruhe ... von wegen Entspannung! Ein heimtückischer Vandale macht die traumhafte Landschaft kaputt - und schlimmer noch: Er ist Mario wie aus dem Gesicht geschnitten! Da stellen sich Mario die Schnurrbarthaare vor Wut - und schon zieht Mario los, um die Insel zu retten ... und seinen eigenen Ruf. Für dich heißt das: Eine CD mit acht Zentimetern Durchmesser, gestopft voll mit dem besten Mario-Abenteuer aller Zeiten. Da heißt es laufen, springen, hopsen, rutschen und klettern - in einer unmöglich riesigen, umwerfend schönen 3D-Welt, im strahlenden Sonnenschein und in stundenlanger packender Faszination mit dem typisch genialen Mario-Gameplay. Aber ein Mario-Abenteuer wäre kein Mario-Abenteuer, wenn es nicht eine total verrückte Neuerung gäbe: Bei Super Mario Sunshine ist es eine merkwürdige Wasserpumpe, die der pummelige Installateur auf dem Rücken trägt. Zum einen ist dieses mit Wasserkraft arbeitende Gerät die bevorzugte Methode von Mario, den Matsch und die Schweinerei zu beseitigen, die der falsche Mario überall hinterlässt ... und der starke Strahl macht nicht nur die Arbeit, sondern hat auch umwerfende Wasser-SFX. Aber der multifunktionale Rucksack kann auch zum Herumjetten am kristallklaren Himmel der Insel verwendet werden, Mario bei halsbrecherischen Purzelbäumen an Seilen helfen, den latzbehosten Helden auf Lilienblättern über Teiche befördern ... und noch jede Menge andere aufregende, noch geheime Sachen, mit denen wir dich bei Marios Kampf um die Macht des Shine auf der Insel überraschen wollen. Mario trifft in Super Mario Sunshine natürlich wieder jede Menge alte Bekannte. Besonders freut er sich schon auf eine ,,Feindwäsche"-Tour auf Yoshi über die gesamte Insel. Und eine ganze Palette neuer Moves hat er natürlich auch auf Lager, unter anderem einen ziemlich beeindruckenden Kreiselsprung und einen noch besseren Bauchrutscher, mit dem er die Matschmengen besser bewältigen kann, mit denen die Landschaft dank seines fiesen Gegners überzogen ist. Wie üblich behält Herr Miyamoto die größten Geheimnisse unter seiner Mario-Mütze für sich - da kann man sich sicher sein, dass Super Mario Sunshine genauso bahnbrechend brillant mit Geistesblitzen, tollen Welten und super Geheimnissen sein wird wie alle anderen Mario-Abenteuer es eben auch sind. Für Besitzer eines Nintendo GameCube sieht die Zukunft wirklich äußerst rosig aus ...

locale.title: Disney's Party
locale.synopsis: Uncle Scrooge has invited you and a whole cast of Disney characters to visit his new Party Park, which he designed himself with all of his favorite youngsters in mind. Disney's Party drops you into the mix with Mickey Mouse and friends to embark on challenging adventures that include collecting magical objects, solving puzzles, and maneuvering through obstacle courses. Each player must complete his or her game board by buying or winning special items, such as stars, lollipops, and teacups. In four different gameplay modes, you can compete with friends in minigames, solve puzzles, and explore a variety of environments.

locale.title: ディズニーのマジカルパーク
Disney's Party
locale.synopsis: Welcome to Disney´s Party! Join a cast of your favorite Disney characters at Uncle Scrooge´s fun-filled party. Playing as one of six Disney characters, you´ll enjoy many fun games and mini-games, and tons of fantastic surprises and prizes. With a variety of ways to play and many different and amusing places to visit in Party Park, this adventure is truly amazing. So, what are you waiting for? Get ready to join Tinkerbell as she guides you through the park of a lifetime!

locale.title: Dr. Muto
locale.synopsis: Dr. Muto is a fully 3D, free-roaming, third person, action-adventure videogame set in a stylized universe full of fiendish puzzles, mind-bending devices, freakish monstrosities, and twisted comedy! You are Dr. Muto ? a maniacal and genius mad scientist whose latest experiment has accidentally destroyed his own home planet (except for his laboratory)! Featuring a cast of unusual characters including Dr. Muto?s sidekick, Janky, and his nemesis, Professor Burnital, Muto will use his latest invention, the Splizz Gun, to mutate and morph with any living organism in order to accomplish tasks no human could achieve alone. By simply sampling some DNA, the doctor will be able to morph into a spider, mouse, gorilla or whatever creature he sees fit to become. Now he must use his fiendish gadgets and morphing ability to steal organic matter from the neighboring planets in order to rebuild his world.

locale.title: Minority Report: Everybody Runs
locale.synopsis: The year is 2054 and you are Precrime Officer John Anderton, head of an elite police force division that can apprehend murderers before the crime can be committed. Everyone thought the system was perfect, until a precrime report lists you as the prime suspect. Now, you're on the run through 40 futuristic levels filled with both human and robot enemies in a mission to clear your name. With an arsenal of weapons, hand-to-hand combat skills, and a Jetpack that allows you to fly through levels, it's up to you to stop an evil conspiracy before it's too late.

Agora, você está correndo por 40 níveis futuristas cheios de inimigos humanos e robôs em uma missão para limpar seu nome. Com um arsenal de armas, habilidades de combate corpo a corpo e um Jetpack que permite que você voe pelos níveis, cabe a você impedir uma conspiração do mal antes que seja tarde demais.

locale.title: Enter The Matrix
locale.synopsis: Based on the second movie in the trilogy, Enter the Matrix features a mixture of gunplay and martial arts that bend the rules of the Matrix, insane driving and stunts, and the chance to pilot the fastest hovercraft in the fleet. This game isn't just set in the Matrix universe, it's designed to be an integral part of the entire Matrix experience, with a story that weaves in and out of The Matrix: Reloaded, the sequel to the Academy Award-winner. Enter the Matrix is the story-behind-the-story. Features bullet time effects, never-before-seen life-action footage starring the cast of the movies, and more.

locale.title: Enter The Matrix
locale.synopsis: Based on the second movie in the trilogy, Enter the Matrix features a mixture of gunplay and martial arts that bend the rules of the Matrix, insane driving and stunts, and the chance to pilot the fastest hovercraft in the fleet. This game isn't just set in the Matrix universe, it's designed to be an integral part of the entire Matrix experience, with a story that weaves in and out of The Matrix: Reloaded, the sequel to the Academy Award-winner. Enter the Matrix is the story-behind-the-story. Features bullet time effects, never-before-seen life-action footage starring the cast of the movies, and more.

locale.title: Enter The Matrix
locale.synopsis:
ゲーム『ENTER THE MATRIX』は、映画「マトリックス」の監督・脚本を手掛けている LARRY & ANDY WACHOWSKI 兄弟によって、脚本が書かれました。また、彼らは約１時間にもおよぶゲーム専用のムービーを監督・撮影しています。映画と同じ俳優・スタッフを使って映画と同様のクオリティで撮影されたこの映像はゲームでしか見ることができません。 ハリウッド映画において、ビデオゲームと映画監督との大規模なクリエイティブ・コラボレーションが行われたのは、過去に例がありません。このコラボレートによってマトリックスのリアル感あふれる映像が、ゲームの中で忠実に再現されているのです。 もちろんプレーヤーが操作するゲーム中には、映画「マトリックス リローデッド」でのキャラクター全員が登場します。
ゲーム登場キャラクター（出演俳優）： ネオ（キアヌ・リーブス）、トリニティー（キャリー＝アン・モス）、モーフィアス（ローレンス・フィッシュバーン）、エージェント・スミス（ヒューゴ・ウィービング）、ナイオビ（ジェイダ・ビンケット・スミス）、ゴースト（アンソニー・ウォン）、スパークス（ラッキー・ヘルム）、パーセフォニー（モニカ・ベルッチ）
映画「マトリックス」シリーズ： 映画「マトリックス」は、1999年9月11日より世界33ヵ国で公開し530万人以上を動員した大ヒット映画です。ＶＨＳ＆ＤＶＤも総売上額325百万ドルを記録する大ヒットとなりました。 2003年6月7日より２作目「マトリックス リローデッド」が日本で公開、11月には第３作「マトリックス レボリューションズ」の公開が予定されており、2003年はまさに「マトリックス・イヤー」として盛り上がりが期待されています。
ゲームの中のカンフーなどのアクションは映画と同様に、殺陣師のマスター・ウー・ピン氏によって行われた。プレーヤーは壁を自在に歩き回れ、部屋一杯のエージェントたちを多彩なアクションで倒すことが可能。また、ゲームには、様々な要素が詰め込まれている。カンフー格闘、MATRIX世界への冒険、激しいドライビング／シューティングアクション、各種取り揃えた武器の数々、敵エージェント組織…。プレーヤーは使用キャラを選択してMATRIXの世界へとのめり込んでいく。ゲーム中、ホバークラフトを運転するのもハッキングするのも自由自在だ。
ゲームはMATRIX世界と同じルールに基づいている。人類のために、数々のミッションをクリアしていき、エージェント・スミス達を相手に戦っていく。映画同様、ゲームにもすばらしいビジュアル効果がみられるのも特徴だ。また、ゲーム映像には映画に含まれていないシーンがあり、WACHOWSKI 兄弟によってゲームだけに撮影された秘密のシーンで、ここでしか体験できない。

locale.title: Enter The Matrix
locale.synopsis: Based on the second movie in the trilogy, Enter the Matrix features a mixture of gunplay and martial arts that bend the rules of the Matrix, insane driving and stunts, and the chance to pilot the fastest hovercraft in the fleet. This game isn't just set in the Matrix universe, it's designed to be an integral part of the entire Matrix experience, with a story that weaves in and out of The Matrix: Reloaded, the sequel to the Academy Award-winner. Enter the Matrix is the story-behind-the-story. Features bullet time effects, never-before-seen life-action footage starring the cast of the movies, and more.

locale.title: 激闘プロ野球 水島新司オールスターズVSプロ野球
locale.synopsis:
日本プロ野球と野球漫画界の巨匠水島新司との強力タッグがここに実現！ 「ドカベン」、「あぶさん」など数多くの野球漫画を生み出した水島新司の人気キャラクターが、日本プロ野球に参戦、自分の好きなチームの一員となって激突します！アニメ調（トゥーンシェード）で表現された魅力溢れる水島キャラとリアルに再現された実在のプロ野球選手達が夢の共演。さらに水島漫画の特徴である秘打秘球も完全再現。水原勇気の「ドリームボール」や、殿馬一馬の「秘打・白鳥の湖」がユーザーの手で蘇ります。 漫画の中でしか見られなかった心躍る夢の対決が今実現します！
プロ野球12球団の実名選手が300名以上登場します。 もちろん選手やチームオーダーデータは、2003年度の最新データを忠実に再現。星野監督のもとで首位を走る好調阪神、それを追いかける盟主巨人。さらに今年の新人王候補のダイエー新垣や和田も登場します。もちろん近鉄中村紀の豪快なバッティングフォームや、松井稼頭央の華麗な動き、いぶし銀、種田のがに股打法など、選手の細かな動きや、癖などもリアルに再現しています。
今作は単なるアクション野球ゲームにとどまらず、本格的なキャラクター育成モードを搭載。育てたキャラクターは水島キャラと同様に様々な秘打･秘球を使えるようになるのです。 プレイヤーが育てたキャラクターが秘打・秘球を操り、水島キャラやプロ野球選手と対決する。そんなわくわくするシーンもこのゲームで実現します。

locale.title: 격투 프로 야구 미즈시마 신지 올 스타즈 VS 프로 야구
Monster 4x4: Masters Of Metal
locale.synopsis: Get ready to pilot the world's most powerful trucks and go head-to-head in pulse-pounding off-road competitions. You can pick from over 20 unstoppable Monster trucks, including Grave Digger, El Toro Loco, Bulldozer, Bounty Hunter, Blue Thunder, and Maximum Destruction. Whether you're grinding through mud pits in Louisiana, crunching up cliffs in California, or smashing up trees to make the ride a little bumpier for the guy behind you, keep your eyes on the prize: The cash you earn on the circuit goes to buy new trucks and build up your ultimate Monster machine.

locale.title: Nascar: Dirt To Daytona
locale.synopsis: Can you survive in the world of NASCAR? NASCAR Dirt to Daytona challenges you to become the ultimate racer in four different NASCAR racing series. Racing to win is the key for drivers hoping to advance from small town dirt tracks to modified cars, trucks, and eventually the highly prized NASCAR Winston Cup cars. Learn the harsh realities of the racing world where losing can cost drivers not only points in the standings but loss of money from a sponsor. NASCAR Dirt to Daytona also features Single Races, Season Championships, Beat the Heat, and Pro Trainer modes rounding out a complete racing experience.

locale.title: NHL Hitz 2003
locale.synopsis: In the world of NHL Hitz 20-03, hard-checking and highlight-reel action is common. This year's installment in the action-packed NHL Hitz series showcases three-on-three gameplay with players who leap, glide, check, pass, and score on defenders. New features include a deeper New Season mode, player trades, a playoff tree, and official NHL awards. The game also boasts bigger, stronger, and faster players, plus improved goalie logic, behavior, animations, and control, making it tougher to score.

locale.title: NHL Hitz 2003
locale.synopsis: In the world of NHL Hitz 20-03, hard-checking and highlight-reel action is common. This year's installment in the action-packed NHL Hitz series showcases three-on-three gameplay with players who leap, glide, check, pass, and score on defenders. New features include a deeper New Season mode, player trades, a playoff tree, and official NHL awards. The game also boasts bigger, stronger, and faster players, plus improved goalie logic, behavior, animations, and control, making it tougher to score.

locale.title: NASCAR 2005: Chase for the Cup
locale.synopsis: Do you have what it takes to be a top NASCAR driver? In NASCAR 2005: Chase for the Cup, you can become a superstar owner or driver and decide where, how, and what to drive. During races you can even rattle rivals with the all-new Intimidator button. Push them too far and you might find yourself in a postrace confrontation. Develop essential racing skills, increase fan support, and compete in four racing series to become the driver that top NASCAR teams are looking for.

locale.title: NHL 2005
locale.synopsis: Capture all the speed, finesse, and action of professional hockey with NHL 2005. The game's new EA Sports Open Ice Control lets you execute offensive plays, such as a give-and-go and a breakaway pass, and you can also call for defensive double-teams. Dynasty mode has been enhanced with more interactive GM/owner relationships, including a new e-mail system. NHL 2005 also delivers all the action of the World Cup of Hockey with International Teams and venues from North America and Europe.

locale.title: NHL 2005
locale.synopsis: Capture all the speed, finesse, and action of professional hockey with NHL 2005. The game's new EA Sports Open Ice Control lets you execute offensive plays, such as a give-and-go and a breakaway pass, and you can also call for defensive double-teams. Dynasty mode has been enhanced with more interactive GM/owner relationships, including a new e-mail system. NHL 2005 also delivers all the action of the World Cup of Hockey with International Teams and venues from North America and Europe.

locale.title: NHL 06
locale.synopsis: The EA Sports hockey franchise returns with a host of new features in NHL 06. You can carefully place your shots and time your dekes with the new "skill stick" system. More-realistic physics have you adjust to a player's speed and size as you navigate the ice. In addition to NHL stars, you can create your own player or team from the ground up and lead them through an NHL season. NHL 06 also includes both online and offline multiplayer game modes.

locale.title: NHL 06
locale.synopsis: The EA Sports hockey franchise returns with a host of new features in NHL 06. You can carefully place your shots and time your dekes with the new "skill stick" system. More-realistic physics have you adjust to a player's speed and size as you navigate the ice. In addition to NHL stars, you can create your own player or team from the ground up and lead them through an NHL season. NHL 06 also includes both online and offline multiplayer game modes.

locale.title: NFL Street 2
locale.synopsis: Get ready for more fancy moves, new modes, and online play in the sequel to NFL Street. Now you can jump 15 feet high to make catches off the wall, dive into the end zone, or pull off wild jukes. You can master these new abilities in seven new game modes, including "crush the carrier" and "own the city." Create your own player, master new skills, and hit the streets both offline and online.

locale.title: NFL Street 2
locale.synopsis: Get ready for more fancy moves, new modes, and online play in the sequel to NFL Street. Now you can jump 15 feet high to make catches off the wall, dive into the end zone, or pull off wild jukes. You can master these new abilities in seven new game modes, including "crush the carrier" and "own the city." Create your own player, master new skills, and hit the streets both offline and online.

locale.title: NBA Live 2004
locale.synopsis: EA Sports gives basketball fans a heaping dose of NBA action with NBA Live 2004 for the GameCube, Xbox, PlayStation 2, and PC. Live 2004 delivers the most realistic basketball recreation yet from EA with redesigned player models, as well as all 29 accurately rendered NBA arenas. Customize the level of computer competition with easy-to-use AI adjusting slider controls. Simplified controls scheme allows players to run play formations at the touch of a single button. Exclusive EA Sports "Freestyle Control" lets players express their game easily with the right analog stick. Updated Dynasty Mode integrates the ability to import favorite college players in order to create the ultimate NBA team.

locale.title: NBA Live 2004
locale.synopsis: EA Sports gives basketball fans a heaping dose of NBA action with NBA Live 2004 for the GameCube, Xbox, PlayStation 2, and PC. Live 2004 delivers the most realistic basketball recreation yet from EA with redesigned player models, as well as all 29 accurately rendered NBA arenas. Customize the level of computer competition with easy-to-use AI adjusting slider controls. Simplified controls scheme allows players to run play formations at the touch of a single button. Exclusive EA Sports "Freestyle Control" lets players express their game easily with the right analog stick. Updated Dynasty Mode integrates the ability to import favorite college players in order to create the ultimate NBA team.

locale.title: Nickelodeon Party Blast
locale.synopsis: Choose your favorite Nicktoons star and let the multiplayer mayhem begin. Nickelodeon Party Blast lets up to four players duke it out as SpongeBob SquarePants, Otto and Reggie Rocket, Angelica and Tommy Pickles, Invader Zim, Eliza Thornberry, and Jimmy Neutron. In five different game types with multiple levels, you can lob food at Tommy, race Otto Rocket down rapids, shoot hoops and pull tricks wearing in-line skates, blast Goooze at SpongeBob SquarePants, and more. During your battles, you can also find collectables, unlock minigames, and use power-ups.

locale.title: NCAA College Football 2K3
locale.synopsis: It's time to hit the turf and get ready for another round of NCAA football action. NCAA College Football 2K3 is here and it's full of updated rosters, teams and stadiums to fulfill all of your college football needs. Play as your favourite up-and-comers with a friend to see who's the best. NCAA College Football 2k3 is here for the Nintendo GameCube and it's go time. Hut, hut!

locale.title: NBA Courtside 2002
locale.synopsis: Developed exclusively for Nintendo GameCube by Nintendo and Left Field, NBA Courtside 2002 taps into the power of Nintendo GameCube to deliver authentic NBA action that makes those other games look like they're stuck in the era of the two-handed jump shot. Up to four players can hit the hardwood simultaneously and talk trash to their hearts' content as they bust sweet cross-overs, first-step jukes and monster dunks.

locale.title: NBA Courtside 2002
locale.synopsis: Developed exclusively for Nintendo GameCube by Nintendo and Left Field, NBA Courtside 2002 taps into the power of Nintendo GameCube to deliver authentic NBA action that makes those other games look like they're stuck in the era of the two-handed jump shot. locale.title: Nascar Thunder 2003
locale.synopsis: Get behind the wheel of the world's tightest, sleekest stock cars and get ready for an intense ride. NASCAR Thunder 2003 elevates the series to another level with deeper modes, new tracks, and a greater sense of speed. Experience life in the fast lane through 20 seasons of Career mode, in which you must compete for top sponsors, the best crewmembers, and the latest racing technology. All 23 Winston Cup tracks and the Daytona Beach road course can be raced with 14 tracks featuring both day and night racing. NASCAR Thunder 2003 brings the speed and precision of NASCAR to your fingertips.

locale.title: Need for Speed: Underground
locale.synopsis: Electronic Arts' Need for Speed series takes a note from the Fast and Furious handbook with its latest release entitled Need For Speed Underground. Purchase, race, and customize 20 different licensed cars from major manufacturers such as Honda, Mitsubishi, Toyota, Volkswagen, Nissan, and more. Race other customized cars through a detailed nighttime cityscape, dodging city traffic and navigating shortcuts all the while. Customize vehicle performance as well as your car's physical appearance, changing rims, stickers, paintjob, spoilers and more. Multiple racing modes range from drift competitions, street racing, and drag racing

locale.title: Need for Speed: Underground
locale.synopsis: Electronic Arts' Need for Speed series takes a note from the Fast and Furious handbook with its latest release entitled Need For Speed Underground. locale.title: Need for Speed: Underground
locale.synopsis: A série Need for Speed da Electronic Arts tira uma nota do manual Velozes e Furiosos com seu último lançamento intitulado Need For Speed Underground. Compre, corra e personalize 20 carros licenciados diferentes dos principais fabricantes, como Honda, Mitsubishi, Toyota, Volkswagen, Nissan e muito mais. Corra com outros carros personalizados por uma paisagem urbana noturna detalhada, evitando o tráfego da cidade e navegando por atalhos o tempo todo. Personalize o desempenho do veículo, bem como a aparência física do seu carro, alterando aros, adesivos, pintura, spoilers e muito mais. Vários modos de corrida variam de competições de drift, corrida de rua e corrida de arrancada.

locale.title: Finding Nemo
locale.synopsis: Finding Nemo, which has been in development for several months, are scheduled for worldwide release day and date with the Finding Nemo theatrical debut in summer 2003. THQ?s interactive adventures based on Finding Nemo are the first under the Company?s exclusive, multi-property publishing agreement with award-winning interactive entertainment publisher Disney Interactive and the Academy Award-winning Pixar Animation Studios.

locale.title: NFL Blitz 2002
locale.synopsis: Technology has finally caught up with "No Refs, No Rules, No Mercy" football. NFL Blitz 20-02 is all-new, from the gridiron up, and it's ready to sack the competition on the next-generation platforms. This year's title has been completely reinvented by the original creators of the NFL Blitz arcade game to take advantage of the powerful next-generation platforms. All of the 3D player models, NFL stadiums, over-the-top animations, and intense sound effects have been recreated from the gridiron up. Take control and you'll know in an instant that this isn't your Daddy's NFL videogame.

locale.title: NCAA Football 2003
locale.synopsis: NCAA Football 2003 still stands as the ultimate realization of the football technology that has powered EA and sports games in general to unprecedented mainstream popularity. The NFL series' popularity helped take NCAA Football from a modest debut in 2001 to the number two overall sports game in 2002 behind Madden NFL 2003, but the game is far more than simply Madden with college logos. With more than 100 real schools represented and the ability create your own college football program from scratch, NCAA Football 2003 captured the very essence of the college game with wide open offenses and plenty of school spirit.

locale.title: NHL Hitz 2002
locale.synopsis: NHL Hitz is adrenaline hockey featuring big hits, rocket goals and ferocious gameplay! With Midway's NHL Hitz 20-02 you'll feel the sting of a 120-mph slapshot between the eyes; your bones will rattle, your teeth will clatter, and the serenade of the manic-fans will send chills down your spine. The lightning game speed, stunning next-generation graphics, and unique Midway-style action will have you frenzied...or perhaps it will be the 265 lb. defenseman who just planted you face first into the cold-hard ice. So slip your mouthguard on and lock your helmet in place because you're about to get slammed against the boards by the most entertaining hockey game ever created. This game knows hits!

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus
locale.synopsis: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles return--this time featuring simultaneous play for up to four players. In both cooperative and head-to-head modes, you and your friends can play as your favorite green heroes: Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, and Raphael. Punch, kick, and duck your way through battles against The Shredder and his evil pack of Foot Ninjas. Each Turtle has distinct characteristics and abilities, and you can combine moves to perform more than 30 different types of attacks.

rom.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus (USA) (EN) (vdisc1).iso

locale.title: I-Ninja
locale.synopsis: I-Ninja is a combat action-adventure title set in a small, earth-like planet somewhere in the realms of legend. The story unfolds across four unique islands and offers multiple styles of gameplay, including the ability to fight inside a giant robot. Fight with an arsenal of classic ninja weaponry like shurikens, swords, and blowguns, as well as powerful modern day weapons, including rocket launchers and guided missiles. Perform numerous acrobatic feats such as wall-running, rail grinding, swinging from a chain hook and more. Use your weapons and skills to defeat the evil villain Master O-Dor and his menacing army in a quest that spans five extensive environments.

locale.title: NCAA College Basketball 2K3
locale.synopsis: From tip-off at Midnight Madness to the net cutting in New Orleans, NCAA College Basketball 2K3 delivers the college hoops experience. Every Division I school is here and represented in true college fashion, complete with energetic cheerleaders, rabid student sections, and spirited bands swaying in the stands, all adding to the madness of college hoops. Take the reigns of your favorite Division I program and build a modern-day dynasty in Legacy Mode, as you recruit the best crop of young talent throughout the nation. Train your squad to run team-oriented motion offenses, overpower your opponents with high post plays and antagonize teams with aggressive full court presses. You call all the shots, from who?s going to redshirt to what kind of zone press your squad runs. Guide your team through an entire season -- tune-up in tough pre-season match-ups in preparation for heated conference play where every game counts. Weekly Top 25 and Rating Percentage Index (R.P.I.) rankings track your progress over the

locale.title: NBA Live 2003
locale.synopsis: NBA Live 2003 was the 2003 installment of the NBA Live video games series. The cover features Jason Kidd of the New Jersey Nets. The game's included soundtrack is the first video game soundtrack in history to be Certified Platinum by the RIAA, selling over 1,300,000 copies worldwide.

locale.title: NBA Live 2003
locale.synopsis: NBA Live 2003 was the 2003 installment of the NBA Live video games series. The cover features Jason Kidd of the New Jersey Nets. The game's included soundtrack is the first video game soundtrack in history to be Certified Platinum by the RIAA, selling over 1,300,000 copies worldwide.

locale.title: Namco Museum
locale.synopsis: All your favorite Namco classics are now in one package. Namco Museum 1 includes Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, and Pole Position. But the fun doesn't stop there, since Namco has added all new arrangement modes plus other hidden games. Whether it's eating ghosts, shooting aliens, digging a hole, or racing toward the finish line, the addictive gameplay of Namco Museum has proven it can stand the test of time.

locale.title: NFL Street
locale.synopsis: Get ready for a new brand of football meant only for the streets. NFL Street delivers hard-hitting, fast-paced 7-on-7 arcade football. Don't be afraid to add extra style to your bone-crushing tackles, passes and runs as you will be rewarded with superpowered Gamebreakers. Choose from more than 300 current NFL stars and legends such as Barry Sanders, and play through a variety of fields including a beach, a park or a corner lot. Get ready to rule the streets and look good doing it.

locale.title: NFL Street
locale.synopsis: Get ready for a new brand of football meant only for the streets. NFL Street delivers hard-hitting, fast-paced 7-on-7 arcade football. Don't be afraid to add extra style to your bone-crushing tackles, passes and runs as you will be rewarded with superpowered Gamebreakers. Choose from more than 300 current NFL stars and legends such as Barry Sanders, and play through a variety of fields including a beach, a park or a corner lot. Get ready to rule the streets and look good doing it.

locale.title: Nicktoons Unite!
locale.synopsis:
Nicktoons Unite! brings together the most devious minds in the Nicktoons universe, and it's up to you to fight them! Professor Calamitous has pulled together Plankton, Vlad, and Crocker to form a group known as The Evil Syndicate. The wicked foursome have begun to wreak havoc throughout Retroville, Amity Park, Dimmsdale, and Bikini Bottom in an attempt to take over the world. Not to be outsmarted, Jimmy Neutron calls upon his own band of Nicktoons!
•1-4 player cooperative play featuring SpongeBob SquarePants, Timmy Turner, Jimmy Neutron or Danny Phantom •Jimmy, Timmy, Danny, and SpongeBob SquarePants combine their powers to take out The Evil Syndicate •Use their unique talents and abilities to face off against the evil geniuses, and shut off their Doomsday device •More than 15 explorable Nicktoons levels, including - Retroville, Dimmsdale, Amity Park and Bikini Bottom

locale.title: Spongebob Squarepants & Friends: Unite!
locale.synopsis: Nicktoons Unite! is an Adventure game, developed by Blue Tongue and published by THQ, which was released in 2005.

locale.title: Nickelodeon Party Blast
locale.synopsis: Choose your favorite Nicktoons star and let the multiplayer mayhem begin. Nickelodeon Party Blast lets up to four players duke it out as SpongeBob SquarePants, Otto and Reggie Rocket, Angelica and Tommy Pickles, Invader Zim, Eliza Thornberry, and Jimmy Neutron. In five different game types with multiple levels, you can lob food at Tommy, race Otto Rocket down rapids, shoot hoops and pull tricks wearing in-line skates, blast Goooze at SpongeBob SquarePants, and more. During your battles, you can also find collectables, unlock minigames, and use power-ups.

locale.title: Madden NFL 2005
locale.synopsis: Force the action on defense in Madden NFL 2005. New defensive tools allow you to make more plays and be in on all of the action. The all-new Hit Stick lets you lay the big hit to turn the momentum of the game in your favor. By giving players the ability to turn a game around with a crucial tackle, the Hit Stick delivers the power to take control of the game from the defensive side of the ball like never before. Along with all-new defensive pre-play controls and defensive AI enhancements, the defense now has a diverse arsenal of weapons available. With the new Storyline Central, you get the inside scoop around the league from radio host Tony Bruno, along with local and national newspapers, to help you make critical franchise decisions.

locale.title: Madden NFL 2005

locale.title: Naruto Clash of Ninja
locale.synopsis: Naruto: Clash of Ninja for GameCube is a cel-shaded fighting game where gamers may choose to play as one of eight different Naruto characters. Naruto takes place in a world where ninja hold the ultimate power. Infused with the spirit of a once fearsome Nine-Tailed Fox, Naruto Uzumaki is a ninja-in-training who is learning the art of Ninjutsu with his classmates Sakura and Sasuke. The trio studies under the instruction of their teacher, Kakashi, who helps the group face dangerous and daunting tests and challenges.

locale.title: Naruto: Gekitô Ninja Taisen!
locale.synopsis: Naruto: Clash of Ninja for GameCube is a cel-shaded fighting game where gamers may choose to play as one of eight different Naruto characters. Naruto takes place in a world where ninja hold the ultimate power. Infused with the spirit of a once fearsome Nine-Tailed Fox, Naruto Uzumaki is a ninja-in-training who is learning the art of Ninjutsu with his classmates Sakura and Sasuke. The trio studies under the instruction of their teacher, Kakashi, who helps the group face dangerous and daunting tests and challenges.

locale.title: NARUTO-ナルト-激闘忍者大戦！
locale.synopsis: 週刊少年ジャンプで大好評連載中、そしてTVアニメも高視聴率絶賛放送中の「NARUTO-ナルト-」がいよいよ対戦格闘ゲームとしてニンテンドーゲームキューブに参上！超美麗な３Dグラフィックと、アニメと同じ声優陣によるボイスによって「NARUTO-ナルト-」の世界を完全再現。「うずまきナルト連弾」「獅子連弾」「魔鏡氷晶」といった原作で人気の必殺技に加え、「NARUTO-ナルト-」の世界には欠かせない？あの「イチャイチャパラダイス」「おいろけの術」「千年殺し」も完全再現。主にA、Bボタンを使う簡単入力により、格闘ゲームが苦手な人でも、女性でも手軽に連弾（コンボ）や必殺技を繰り出して、爽快感を味わうことができます。

locale.title: NBA Street
locale.synopsis: The game that took the nation by storm last summer on the PlayStation 2 is back and better than ever, as EA SPORTS BIG brings NBA STREET and it's barrage of hot streetball action to the all-new Nintendo GameCube. Take basketball back to its roots on the street to face off against the biggest and baddest street legends in the land in the first and only streetball game for the Nintendo GameCube. Show off your mad hoops skills and make your opponents buckle with "ankle-breaking" moves and fierce dunks. Drain treys from deep beyond the arc or bang around down low and dominate the post with your inside game. With "off-the-backboard" no-look passes and dizzying crossover dribbles your opponent will be beggin' for mercy as you pump up your power meter. Stop...Pop...Drop -- Count it, baby! If your game's weak, you don't have to go home, but you've gotta get off the court. It's not basketball. It's streetball. You got game?

If your game's weak, you don't have to go home, but you've gotta get off the court. It's not basketball. It's streetball. You got game?

locale.title: ＮＢＡストリート
locale.synopsis: 現在までに発売されているバスケットボールゲームはバスケットボールファン向けのシミュレーション要素の強いバスケットボールゲーム。 ＮＢＡストリートはバスケットボールファンだけでなく一般ゲームユーザーも十分に楽しめる、アーケード＆ストリートスタイルのバスケットボールゲーム。 腕を磨いて対戦するのが楽しみなゲームです。

locale.title: Naruto Clash of Ninja 2
locale.synopsis: NARUTO: Clash of Ninja 2, developed exclusively for Nintendo GameCube, will offer non-stop ninja style combat action for 1-4 players where gamers choose to play as one of 23 total available characters. All-new multi-player modes will engage players in frantic simultaneous four player battles and single-player modes will offer more gameplay choices than before with survival and timed attack modes that allow players to showcase their taijutsu and special jutsu abilities.

locale.title: Naruto: Gekitou Ninja Taisen! 2
locale.synopsis: NARUTO: Clash of Ninja 2, developed exclusively for Nintendo GameCube, will offer non-stop ninja style combat action for 1-4 players where gamers choose to play as one of 23 total available characters. All-new multi-player modes will engage players in frantic simultaneous four player battles and single-player modes will offer more gameplay choices than before with survival and timed attack modes that allow players to showcase their taijutsu and special jutsu abilities.

locale.title: NARUTO－ナルト－ 激闘忍者大戦！2
locale.synopsis:
週刊少年ジャンプで大好評連載中、そしてTVアニメも高視聴率絶賛放送中の「NARUTO-ナルト-」の対戦格闘ゲーム第2弾が早くも登場！ 大ヒットした前作同様、今作でも超美麗な3Dグラフィックと、アニメと同じ声優陣によるボイスによって「NARUTO-ナルト-」の世界を完全再現。
主にA、Bボタンを使う簡単操作は前作と同じで、格闘ゲームが苦手な人でも、手軽に連弾（コンボ）や必殺技を繰り出して、爽快感を味わうことができる。
さらに第2弾の特徴として「4人対戦」が可能になった！2人対戦とほぼ同じ操作で、忍同士の激烈な乱戦を体験できる。しかも、4人対戦では、「2対2」、「1対3」といったチーム編成をして戦うこもできる！瞬き（まばたき）すらできない、激烈な大戦が今始まる！ 犬塚キバ、日向ネジ、日向ヒナタといった、新登場キャラクターも多数登場！ ナルトVSキバ、サスケVSネジなど、こだわりの組み合わせでバトルを楽しむことができる！

game.name: Naruto: Clash of Ninja - European Version (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT)

locale.title: Naruto: Clash of Ninja - European Version
locale.synopsis: NARUTO: Clash of Ninja 2, developed exclusively for Nintendo GameCube, will offer non-stop ninja style combat action for 1-4 players where gamers choose to play as one of 23 total available characters. All-new multi-player modes will engage players in frantic simultaneous four player battles and single-player modes will offer more gameplay choices than before with survival and timed attack modes that allow players to showcase their taijutsu and special jutsu abilities.

locale.title: Naruto: Clash of Ninja - European Version
locale.synopsis:
Naruto, l'ado ninja et ses coéquipiers du manga à succès et de la série télé se partagent l'affiche de Naruto: Clash of Ninja European Version en exclusivité sur Nintendo GameCube.
Avec ses superbes graphismes cel-shadés tout en 3D, ce beat-them-up est aussi beau et se comporte de manière aussi fluide que les personnages de la série, dont vous pourrez affronter un grand nombre à l'aide de mouvements spéciaux faciles à effectuer.
Naruto: Clash of Ninja European Version offre un mode scénario qui reprend l'intrigue de l'Exam Chunin, mettant ainsi en scène des personnages familiers, offrant des combats pouvant accueillir jusqu'à quatre opposants tout comme dans la série télé. Et les acteurs japonais de la série originale prêtent également leurs voix au jeu, un vrai must pour les fans.
. Disponible exclusivement sur Nintendo GameCube (et compatible avec la console Wii) . Plus de 20 personnages jouables en modes solo, multijoueurs, contre-la-montre et entraînement . Effectuez des mouvements spéciaux étonnants comme dans la série d'une simple pression sur un bouton. . Amassez suffisamment d'argent pour acheter divers objets dans la boutique, débloquer des options secrètes et de nouveaux personnages . Possibilité de combattre à 2, 3, ou 4 personnages en même temps . Doublage des voix par les acteurs de la série animée japonaise originale . Option d'affichage en écran large

locale.title: Naruto: Clash of Ninja - European Version
locale.synopsis:
In 'Naruto: Clash of Ninja European Version' geben Ninjaschüler Naruto und seine Co-Stars aus dem berühmten Manga und der Zeichentrickserie ihr exklusives Debüt auf dem Nintendo GameCube.
Die 3D-Grafik im Cel Shading-Stil macht dieses Actionspiel so cool und so flott wie die echten Charaktere aus der Zeichentrickserie. Vielen von ihnen begegnest du und kannst sie mit genialen Moves bearbeiten.
Naruto: Clash of Ninja European Version' enthält einen Story-Modus, der zeitlich nach dem Chunin-Examen angesetzt ist. Darin kannst du eine Vielzahl der bekannten Charaktere spielen und deine Ninjakünste in Kämpfen von bis zu vier Teilnehmern beweisen - genauso wie in der TV-Serie. Die echten Synchronsprecher der japanischen Serie leihen den Spielfiguren sogar ihre Stimmen - das lässt sich kein echter Fan entgehen!
• Exklusiv nur für den Nintendo GameCube erhältlich (kompatibel mit Wii) • Über 20 spielbare Charaktere; Zahlreiche Modi: Einzelspieler, Multiplayer, Time Attack und Training • Führe Original-Moves der Charaktere mit einem Tastendruck aus • Verdientes Geld kannst du im Shop ausgeben und geheime Funktionen und neue Charaktere freischalten • Trage Kämpfe zwischen 2, 3 oder 4 Charakteren gleichzeitig aus • Vollständig mit den Orignalsprechern der japanischen TV-Serie synchronisiert • Optionaler Widescreen-Modus

locale.title: 나루토: 격투 닌자 대전! 유럽 버전

rom.name: Naruto: Clash of Ninja - European Version (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: NHL 2004
locale.synopsis: It's been called the fastest sport on Earth--and the faster the players, the tougher the contact. NHL 2004 brings professional hockey to life like never before, with crisp passes, searing slap-shots, and a variety of new ways to check your opponent to regain control of the puck. NHL 2004 is the hockey fan's dream come true, with the addition of international leagues, Bruise Control fighting system, online play, and a Dynasty Mode that lets you build a powerhouse.'.

locale.title: Def Jam: Fight For NY
locale.synopsis: The ultimate hip-hop fueled fighting game, Def Jam Fight For NY challenges players to step into the shoes of a ruthless street fighter battling for control of New York's hip-hop underground. The game features an all-new fighting engine including weapons, interactive environments, and five unique fighting styles that can be combined to form dozens of customized hybrid styles for the ultimate edge on the streets. Def Jam Fight For NY features more than 40 of the most well-known artists and personalities in hip-hop today, including Busta Rhymes, Carmen Electra, Lil' Kim, Ludacris, Method Man, Redman, Sean Paul, Slick Rick, Snoop Dogg, and many more. Experience 22 interactive venues with destructible environmental objects and rowdy spectators who like to get involved.

locale.title: Def Jam: Fight For NY
locale.synopsis: O derradeiro jogo de luta movido a hip-hop, Def Jam Fight For NY desafia os jogadores a entrar na pele de um lutador de rua implacável que luta pelo controle do hip-hop underground de Nova York. O jogo apresenta um motor de luta totalmente novo, incluindo armas, ambientes interativos e cinco estilos de luta exclusivos que podem ser combinados para formar dezenas de estilos híbridos personalizados para o máximo nas ruas. Def Jam Fight For NY apresenta mais de 40 dos mais conhecidos artistas e personalidades do hip-hop hoje, incluindo Busta Rhymes, Carmen Electra, Lil 'Kim, Ludacris, Method Man, Redman, Sean Paul, Slick Rick, Snoop Dogg , e muitos mais. Experimente 22 locais interativos com objetos ambientais destrutíveis e espectadores barulhentos que gostam de se envolver.

locale.title: NCAA Football 2004
locale.synopsis: Electronic Arts, makers of the insanely popular Madden NFL series, delivers their take on college football in NCAA Football 2004 for the PlayStation 2, GameCube, and Xbox. Capturing all the excitement and tradition of a college football game, NCAA 2004 adds atmospheric details such as 20 new mascots, pre-tunnel presentations, and an official team entrance from the legendary Notre Dame. Expanded dynasty mode features added awards such as the Groza, and Maxwell player awards. New historic player models and visual styles range from the 1920s up to today. Choose from over 150 new teams and over 100 classic teams like 1930 Notre Dame.

locale.title: NBA Street Vol.2
locale.synopsis: Three-on-three action basketball game. Like the first NBA Street, Vol. 2's roster of players comprises both fictional Street Legends and real NBA players. In addition to teams of contemporary superstars, the licensed half of the roster also includes great NBA names of yesteryear -- Julius Erving, Clyde Drexler, Dominque Wilkins, Larry Bird, Magic Johnson, Pete Maravich, George Gervin, Wilt Chamberlain, Jerry West, Bill Walton, and more. The classic players add a nice bit of leavening to the game's style, with the short shorts and high socks of the NBA's old school contrasting with today's baggy jerseys and loosened-up attitude. In total, the roster includes 145 modern players, 6 fictional Street Legends, and 25 NBA Legends.

locale.title: NBA Street Vol.2
locale.synopsis: Three-on-three action basketball game. Like the first NBA Street, Vol. 2's roster of players comprises both fictional Street Legends and real NBA players. game.name: Blood Omen 2: The Legacy of Kain Series (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: Blood Omen 2: The Legacy of Kain Series
locale.synopsis: Blood Omen 2 puts you in the role of the vampire Kain as he searches for his slain brethren. You'll move through crowds while cloaked in stealth, feed on the peasant herds, and use mind control to overcome vampire-proof inventions. With each success, you gain dark powers that give you access to treacherous new areas and help you fight stronger enemies. As you develop your vampire skills, you'll unfold the continuing epic of Nosgoth and Kain's attempts to rule over the realm .

rom.name: Blood Omen 2: The Legacy of Kain Series (Europe) (DE) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: NFL Blitz 2003
locale.synopsis: NFL Blitz has evolved and its hitting harder, running faster and looking better than ever on the Nintendo GameCube with NFL Blitz 20-03. Midway is bringing NFL Blitz 20-03 to the GameCube with updated rosters, awesome animations, spectacular plays and, most of all, the biggest hits you will ever see in a game of football. It's crunch time!

locale.title: James Bond 007: NightFire
locale.synopsis: The ultimate secret agent is back in his most dangerous adventure yet in James Bond 007: NightFire. Explore new heights and depths like never before--infiltrate towering skyscrapers, take on treacherous underwater missions, and maneuver your sleek Aston Martin V12 Vanquish through the streets of Tokyo. New state-of-the-art upgradeable gadgets and weapons and original missions--including zero-gravity assignments--will leave you shaken and stirred.

locale.title: James Bond 007: NightFire
locale.synopsis:
Ein brandneues Bond-Abenteuer mit geladener Action!
Der Spieler taucht in die Abenteuer und Intrigen des vollständigsten James Bond-Spiel ein, das es je gab. Völlig neue Szenarien und das Gameplay ergänzen eine Original-Storyline, die für die typische Intensität im Bond-Stil sorgen. "James Bond 007: NightFire" für GameCube bietet Bond-Fans mit atemberaubenden Schauplätzen und intensivem Gameplay auf verschiedenen Plattformen ein noch tiefergehendes Erlebnis als irgendein anderer Bond-Titel zuvor. Als Bond operiert der Spieler ebenso in den Höhen der österreichischen Alpen und einer Raumstation als auch in den Tiefen des Südpazifiks, um die Machenschaften des führenden, kriminellen Kopfs Rafael Drake zu bekämpfen, dessen Ziel die Weltherrschaft ist.
"James Bond 007: NightFire" für GameCube bietet ein tiefgehendes und vielfältiges Gameplay, das dem Bond-Universum treu bleibt!
Dabei erlebt der Spieler das Geschehen vorrangig aus der Ich-Perspektive. Die Kamera schaltet zeitweise zu einer dynamischen Perspektive aus der dritten Person um, um bestimmte interaktive Spiel-Techniken zu ermöglichen oder Bonds heldenhafte Aktionen zu zeigen. NightFire bietet dem Bond-Fan eine Vielzahl an aufregenden und raffinierten Missionen, faszinierende Frauen, exotische Schauplätze und ausgeklügelte Spionage-Geräte. Die Konsolen-Versionen garantieren außerdem ein actiongeladenes Fahrerlebnis mit außergewöhnlichen Fahrzeugen. Jeder der mehr als 10 exotischen Schauplätze aus der ganzen Welt und dem Weltall konfrontiert den Spieler mit herausfordernden Missionen und Einsatzzielen. Er hat außerdem die Möglichkeit, viele der zahlreichen Geräte aus dem berühmten Q-Labor upzugraden. Bei "James Bond 007: NightFire" für GameCube kommen viele bekannte als auch neue Figuren des Bond-Universums vor, einschließlich Zoe Nightshade (aus EAs vorherigem Bond-Spiel "James Bond 007: Agent im Kreuzfeuer").
Features:
- Vor mehr als 10 exotischen Schauplätzen nimmst du es mit verführerischen Frauen und hinterhältigen Schurken auf
- 12 Action geladene Missionen, prall gefüllt mit Kämpfen, Tarnmanövern und aufrüstbaren Geräten
- Erlebe 5 Hochgeschwindigkeitslevel hinter dem Steuer des Aston Martin V12 Vanquisch und anderen Luxusschlitten
- 10 individuell gestaltbare Multiplayer-Modi, einschließlich bekannter Charaktere und Schauplätze klassischer James Bond-Filme
"James Bond 007: NightFire" für GameCube - Geschüttelt, nicht gerührt!

locale.title: 007: NightFire
locale.synopsis: The ultimate secret agent is back in his most dangerous adventure yet in James Bond 007: NightFire. Explore new heights and depths like never before--infiltrate towering skyscrapers, take on treacherous underwater missions, and maneuver your sleek Aston Martin V12 Vanquish through the streets of Tokyo. New state-of-the-art upgradeable gadgets and weapons and original missions--including zero-gravity assignments--will leave you shaken and stirred.

locale.title: 007: NightFire
locale.synopsis: O agente secreto definitivo está de volta em sua aventura mais perigosa em James Bond 007: NightFire. Explore novas alturas e profundidades como nunca antes - infiltre-se em arranha-céus, participe de missões subaquáticas traiçoeiras e manobre seu elegante Aston Martin V12 Vanquish pelas ruas de Tóquio. Novos gadgets e armas atualizáveis de última geração e missões originais - incluindo atribuições de gravidade zero - o deixarão abalado e agitado.
