locale.title: Cabela's Outdoor Adventures
locale.synopsis:
Cabela's Outdoor Adventures provides you with the hunting and fishing expedition of a lifetime with 22 outdoor adventures across North America and beyond. Fly, float, and trek from Utah to Mexico to New Zealand in search of trophy bucks or stop off and angle for the local species of fish. While on your adventure you'll also have the opportunity to hunt both big game and small game, compete in a shooting contest, and embark on varied missions. Your Cabela's Guide introduces each true-to-life outdoor adventure where stealth strategy and technique are of the utmost importance.
New enhancements for 2006 include: * Mini-Map that allows you to sense and see where the game is hiding * Lock-On, which secures your aim over a target for a sure kill in easy mode * Steady Aim, featuring a finer control over your aim--mimicking the calm a hunter must achieve before squeezing the trigger * Sprint mode to get into position to take your best shot * Angling for bass in pristine streams while territorial bears protect their fishing spots * Variety of species of deer, big and small game animals, and fish

locale.title: Bad Boys: Miami Takedown
locale.synopsis: Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett of the Tactical Narcotics Team are back and oh so bad. Featuring all the fast pace and all-out action of the movie, it's your job to ensure that these TNT cops are not DOA! Somewhere on the streets of Miami, something is going down which must be stopped. You can play as either Mike or Marcus in first or third-person viewpoints, making your way through 15 stages of fast paced, all-action gameplay, with gameplay featuring multiple mission objectives. In addition to a variety of weapons, destructible environments, and changing playstyles, the game features a Bad Boy rating system, where you are rewarded for your actions and achievements. Play the perfect cop or be a Bad Boy. What are YOU gonna do?

locale.title: Bad Boys: Miami Takedown
locale.synopsis: Mike Lowrey e Marcus Burnett da Equipe Tática de Narcóticos estão de volta e, oh, tão mal. Apresentando todo o ritmo acelerado e ação total do filme, é seu trabalho garantir que esses policiais da TNT não sejam DOA! Em algum lugar nas ruas de Miami, algo está acontecendo que deve ser interrompido. Você pode jogar como Mike ou Marcus em pontos de vista de primeira ou terceira pessoa, percorrendo 15 estágios de jogo rápido e cheio de ação, com jogabilidade apresentando vários objetivos de missão. Além de uma variedade de armas, ambientes destrutíveis e estilos de jogo em constante mudança, o jogo apresenta um sistema de classificação de Bad Boy, onde você é recompensado por suas ações e realizações. Seja o policial perfeito ou um Bad Boy. O que você vai fazer?

locale.title: Bad Boys II
locale.synopsis: Mike Lowrey e Marcus Burnett da Equipe Tática de Narcóticos estão de volta e, oh, tão mal. Apresentando todo o ritmo acelerado e ação total do filme, é seu trabalho garantir que esses policiais da TNT não sejam DOA! Em algum lugar nas ruas de Miami, algo está acontecendo que deve ser interrompido. Você pode jogar como Mike ou Marcus em pontos de vista de primeira ou terceira pessoa, percorrendo 15 estágios de jogo rápido e cheio de ação, com jogabilidade apresentando vários objetivos de missão. Além de uma variedade de armas, ambientes destrutíveis e estilos de jogo em constante mudança, o jogo apresenta um sistema de classificação de Bad Boy, onde você é recompensado por suas ações e realizações. Seja o policial perfeito ou um Bad Boy. O que você vai fazer?

locale.title: RoadKill
locale.synopsis: RoadKill presents an action-packed, mission-based combat driving experience. To survive, you must out-drive, outgun and outthink rival gangs, city guards, and anyone else gunning for you in the living, post-apocalyptic territory of Hell County. With the ability to build up a powerful gang following, you'll unleash havoc, chaos, and destruction on the environment and its inhabitants with a wide selection of vehicles, a potent armory of weapons, and special equipment in both single-player and various multiplayer game modes.

locale.title: RoadKill
locale.synopsis: RoadKill apresenta uma experiência de direção de combate baseada em missão e cheia de ação. Para sobreviver, você deve superar as gangues, as gangues rivais, os guardas da cidade e qualquer outra pessoa que esteja atirando por você no território pós-apocalíptico vivo de Hell County. Com a capacidade de formar uma poderosa gangue, você vai causar estragos, caos e destruição no meio ambiente e em seus habitantes com uma ampla seleção de veículos, um poderoso arsenal de armas e equipamentos especiais tanto para um jogador quanto para vários modos de jogo multijogador.

locale.title: 四国巡礼体験ゲーム お遍路さん 〜発心の道場（阿波国編）〜
시코쿠 순례 체험게임 순례자: 믿음의 도장 (아와국 편)
Outlaw Golf
locale.synopsis: Golf meets strippers, ex-cons, and wannabe rappers. In Outlaw Golf, you can step into the shoes of all kinds of criminals and compete in 30 tour events. With each event, you'll unlock new characters and better equipment and improve your character's skills. Challenge three of your friends in eight different games, including stroke, match, skins, best ball, casino, and more. Play like a pro and the game gets easier; play poorly and the game becomes tougher.

locale.title: Outlaw Golf
locale.synopsis: Golf meets strippers, ex-cons, and wannabe rappers. In Outlaw Golf, you can step into the shoes of all kinds of criminals and compete in 30 tour events. With each event, you'll unlock new characters and better equipment and improve your character's skills. Challenge three of your friends in eight different games, including stroke, match, skins, best ball, casino, and more. Play like a pro and the game gets easier; play poorly and the game becomes tougher.

locale.title: One Piece: Grand Battle! 3
locale.synopsis: The third battle game based on the Shonen Jump manga and "One Piece" anime show. Starring the majority of the cast from the television series, One Piece Grand Battle! 3 is a fast-paced action game in the vein of Power Stone. The game features a much wider variety of surfaces than its predecessors, including sand, water, and snow. The developers also created a new combo system that enables each character to pull off weak, medium, and high power combos that vary in speed and effectiveness depending on when they are used in battle. Featuring around 50 characters, plenty of special attacks, and 100 different battle events, Grand Battle lets players go it alone or team up with a friend.

locale.title: ONE PIECE グランドバトル！3
locale.synopsis: 「3Dステージ」を360度自由に動いても「2D感覚」で遊ぶことができるカメラシステム「アクティブチェイスビュー」を搭載！ 各キャラクターの個性あふれる技もボタンコンビネーションで完全再現。原作に登場したステージ固有の仕掛けやアイテムなども多数登場。おなじみの「必殺技」を超える「奥義」のド迫力な演出がさらにバトルを盛り上げる！ 「イベントバトル」には約50人のキャラクターが登場し、リアルタイムCGムービーやキャラ別描き起こしのエンディングアニメを楽しめる！ 自宅で最大16人の大会が開催できる「グランドツアーズモード」や「修行モード」「お宝モード」など、かつてないボリュームとクオリティでやりこみ要素も満載！

locale.title: Mario Power Tennis
locale.synopsis: The Mushroom Kingdom has hosted tennis tournaments before, but never one as explosive as this one. The wild multiplayer action of the smash Nintendo 64 hit, Mario Tennis, returns with even more powerful shots and new, character-specific power-ups guaranteed to make for the craziest matches ever! Instead of just striking a ball back and forth, opponents in Mario Tennis will launch flaming volleys and slam hits with oversized mallets. Gamers play amidst all-new courts and obstacles, as well as some new characters and game modes. For example, you now get to play in the courts of Luigi's Mansion and below the packed stadiums of Peach Dome. Each court brings its own set of challenges. Each character also boasts his/her own set of moves, and each of them fitting the personality of its respective character.

locale.title: Mario Tennis GC
locale.synopsis: The Mushroom Kingdom has hosted tennis tournaments before, but never one as explosive as this one. The wild multiplayer action of the smash Nintendo 64 hit, Mario Tennis, returns with even more powerful shots and new, character-specific power-ups guaranteed to make for the craziest matches ever! Each character also boasts his/her own set of moves, and each of them fitting the personality of its respective character.

locale.title: マリオテニスGC
locale.synopsis: 「簡単操作で、誰でもラリーが楽しめる！」という前作の特徴はそのままに、スペシャルショットやスペシャルゲームなどの新要素が加わり、おもしろさは断然スケールアップ！さらなる進化を遂げた白熱のテニスバトルが今ここに！

locale.title: Mario Power Tennis
locale.synopsis: The Mushroom Kingdom has hosted tennis tournaments before, but never one as explosive as this one. The wild multiplayer action of the smash Nintendo 64 hit, Mario Tennis, returns with even more powerful shots and new, character-specific power-ups guaranteed to make for the craziest matches ever! Instead of just striking a ball back and forth, opponents in Mario Tennis will launch flaming volleys and slam hits with oversized mallets. Gamers play amidst all-new courts and obstacles, as well as some new characters and game modes. For example, you now get to play in the courts of Luigi's Mansion and below the packed stadiums of Peach Dome. Each court brings its own set of challenges. Each character also boasts his/her own set of moves, and each of them fitting the personality of its respective character.

locale.title: Mario Power Tennis
locale.synopsis: Un court de tennis où on peut troquer sa raquette contre un maillet géant et où les joueurs doivent éviter les crocodiles qui veillent sur le court tout en renvoyant le service de leur adversaire, ne cherchez pas plus loin, ça ne peut être que Mario Power Tennis ! Même s'il n'a pas vraiment la silhouette sportive, les prouesses de Mario sur le court sont époustouflantes. Avec des adversaires comme Luigi, Wario et Donkey Kong, une longue série de coups pour chaque occasion et même des mouvements spéciaux spectaculaires pour les matchs décisifs, Mario Power Tennis est le jeu de tennis le plus prodigieux et le plus surréaliste de tous les temps.

locale.title: Mario Power Tennis
locale.synopsis: Ein Tennis-Court, auf dem die Schläger durch riesige Hämmer ausgetauscht werden können und die Spieler beim Return Krokodilen ausweichen müssen - das muss Mario Power Tennis sein! Obwohl Mario vielleicht nicht unbedingt sehr sportlich ist, macht er auf dem Tennisplatz eine gute Figur. Du kannst mit oder gegen Luigi, Wario und Donkey Kong spielen, außerdem stehen dir verschiedene Schläge für jede Gelegenheit und sogar einige spektakuläre Spezial-Tricks zur Verfügung. Mario Power Tennis ist das ungewöhnlichste und spektakulärste Tennisspiel aller Zeiten.

locale.title: Mario Power Tennis
locale.synopsis: ¿Una pista de tenis donde las raquetas se pueden sustituir por enormes martillos y los jugadores necesitan esquivar continuamente amenazadores cocodrilos? ¡Tiene que ser Mario Power Tennis! Y es que a pesar de que su figura no sea la de un deportista de élite, Mario se mueve en una pista de tenis como pez en el agua. Con adversarios como Luigi, Wario o Donkey Kong, toda una galería de diferentes golpes e incluso algunos movimientos especiales para esos momentos en los que hay que matar o morir, ¡seguro que nunca has jugado un partido de tenis tan estrambótico (y divertido...) como éste!

locale.title: Mario Power Tennis
locale.synopsis: Un campo da tennis nel quale le racchette possono essere sostituite da martelli giganti, e in cui i giocatori devono schivare i coccodrilli mentre cercano di rispedire al mittente la pallina… Non c'è dubbio, si tratta di Mario Power Tennis! Anche se il suo fisico non è propriamente da "sportivo", la bravura tennistica di Mario è a dir poco impareggiabile! Con avversari del calibro di Luigi, Donkey Kong, Wario e molti altri ancora, con il suo assurdo inventario di colpi speciali, con i suoi moltissimi minigiochi e le superfici di gioco più incredibili che si siano mai viste, Mario Power Tennis ti garantisce un divertimento senza fine!

locale.title: Medal of Honor: European Assault
locale.synopsis: Europe 1942. These are desperate hours for the Allied forces as the Nazi war machine rages across a devastated Europe 1942. These are desperate hours for the Allied forces as the Nazi war machine rages across a devastated European landscape. With the British on the brink, Lt. William Holt of the OSS is sent on a secret mission by order of the President of the United States. On his own, or with his squad, Holt is pivotal in helping to turn the tide in four of the most crucial battles leading to victory in Europe. Medal of Honor: European Assault returns the series to to Europe in a sequel that features advances in enemy and compatriot AI, plus a more open game design structure.

locale.title: Medal of Honor: European Assault
locale.synopsis:
Stillgestanden, Soldat! In EA's neuester Fortsetzung der Combat-Action-Reihe Medal of Honor übernimmst du den Part von Leutnant William Holt, dem ersten Agenten des neu gebildeten Office of Strategic Services. Du hast den Auftrag, den Feind daran zu hindern, den mächtigen Tiger-Panzer zu zerstören und sein ultimatives Ziel, die Nutzbarmachung nuklearer Energie, zu erreichen.
Du treibst dich an historischen Schauplätzen wie Stalingrad und Nordafrika herum und erlebst die Ardennenoffensive an der deutsch-belgischen Staatsgrenze. Die Entscheidungen, die du an verschiedenen Punkten im Spiel triffst, haben Auswirkungen auf spätere Ereignisse. Du kannst sogar die Bewegungen deiner Truppe steuern. Während du tiefer in feindliches Gebiet vordringst, stößt du unweigerlich auf gefährliche Heckenschützen und Elitesoldaten.
16 Multiplayer-Karten und mehr als 35 authentische Waffen stehen dir bei deinem Einsatz zur Verfügung. Das Skript stammt übrigens von keinem Geringeren als John Milius, dem Co-Autor von Apocalypse Now. Viel Glück bei deiner Mission...

locale.title: Medal of Honor: European Assault
locale.synopsis: Europe 1942. These are desperate hours for the Allied forces as the Nazi war machine rages across a devastated European landscape. With the British on the brink, Lt. William Holt of the OSS is sent on a secret mission by order of the President of the United States. On his own, or with his squad, Holt is pivotal in helping to turn the tide in four of the most crucial battles leading to victory in Europe. Medal of Honor: European Assault returns the series to to Europe in a sequel that features advances in enemy and compatriot AI, plus a more open game design structure.

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Les Faucons de Guerre
locale.synopsis: La toute dernière simulation de guerre vous donne le rôle du lieutenant américain William Holt, le premier agent de l'Office des Services Stratégiques. Chargé de contrer l'ennemi dans son projet de déployer le puissant Tank Tigre pour finalement exploiter l'énergie atomique, vous devrez arpenter divers lieux stratégiques recréés avec une grande fidélité comme Stalingrad ou des villes d'Afrique du Nord ou pourrez revivre la bataille des Ardennes en menant le combat à la frontière germano-belge. Les choix que vous faites à certains moments du jeu ont un impact direct sur la tournure des événements suivants et vous pouvez même diriger les mouvements de votre escadron. A mesure que vous vous enfoncerez en territoire ennemi, votre route croisera les snipers les plus redoutables et les soldats d'élite les plus aguerris. Avec 16 cartes multijoueurs et plus de 35 armes authentiques, sans oublier un scripte écrit par le talentueux John Milius, célèbre scénariste d'Hollywood et co-scénariste d'Apocalypse Now, Medal of Honor : Les Faucons de Guerre est un voyage au coeur de l'enfer de la guerre dont vous ne reviendrez peut-être pas...

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Europa Kyoushuu
locale.synopsis: Europe 1942. These are desperate hours for the Allied forces as the Nazi war machine rages across a devastated European landscape. With the British on the brink, Lt. William Holt of the OSS is sent on a secret mission by order of the President of the United States. On his own, or with his squad, Holt is pivotal in helping to turn the tide in four of the most crucial battles leading to victory in Europe. Medal of Honor: European Assault returns the series to to Europe in a sequel that features advances in enemy and compatriot AI, plus a more open game design structure.

locale.title: メダル オブ オナー ヨーロッパ強襲
locale.synopsis:
ドイツ軍と連合軍が熾烈な戦いを繰り広げた第二次世界大戦ヨーロッパ戦線。そのターニングポイントとなった４つの戦いを背景に、ヨーロッパ全土を股にかけた壮大な任務に身を投じていく……。 史実を徹底検証した本格ミリタリーＦＰＳ『メダル オブ オナー』シリーズ待望の最新作！！歴史を動かした戦場の真実がここにある。
メダル オブ オナーシーリーズ待望の最新作。圧倒的なグラフィックとフルオーケストラによるＢＧＭ、そして実際にサンプリングされた銃の発射音や爆発音が、戦場のリアリティを描き出します。

locale.title: Medal of Honor: European Assault
locale.synopsis: Europe 1942. These are desperate hours for the Allied forces as the Nazi war machine rages across a devastated Europe 1942. These are desperate hours for the Allied forces as the Nazi war machine rages across a devastated European landscape. With the British on the brink, Lt. William Holt of the OSS is sent on a secret mission by order of the President of the United States. On his own, or with his squad, Holt is pivotal in helping to turn the tide in four of the most crucial battles leading to victory in Europe. Medal of Honor: European Assault returns the series to to Europe in a sequel that features advances in enemy and compatriot AI, plus a more open game design structure.

locale.title: Odama
locale.synopsis: The legendary general Yamanouchi Kagetora, intent on avenging his father's death, has devised the most ingenious weapon ever to hit the medieval battlefield: the Odama, a gigantic ball powerful enough to destroy whatever it strikes – friend or foe. Players use the Nintendo GameCube Mic to direct soldiers out of the Odama's way and into the fray, and prove that they have the skills to back up the power of the Odama. Using giant flippers, players aim the giant Odama ball to bowl over enemies, shatter their defenses and wreak havoc on the battlefield. But the controller is not the only input device in Odama. With the Nintendo GameCube Mic, players command men to charge the enemy, defend positions, seize the enemy gates and much more.

locale.title: Odama

locale.title: Odama
locale.synopsis:
Dans le Japon ancien, le jeune général Yamanouchi Kagetora jure de venger la mort de son père en se servant d'une terrible arme de guerre : l'Odama, une immense sphère si puissante qu'elle peut tout détruire sur son passage. Lancée à vive allure sur un gigantesque champ de bataille, c'est à vous d'utiliser le Microphone (inclus avec le jeu) pour diriger les soldats vers l'ennemi et les tenir à bonne distance de la boule infernale ! Chaque champ de bataille fait office de niveau, il suffit de passer les portes du camp ennemi avec l'Odama puis d'envoyer ses troupes à l'assaut du camp adverse pour passer au niveau suivant. Odama est un mélange unique de jeu de guerre et de simulation de flipper, un mélange certes improbable mais qui fonctionne du tonnerre !
- Utilisez des flips surdimensionnés pour envoyer l'Odama à travers le champ de bataille et occire les forces ennemies - Donnez vos ordres dans le micro : sonnez la charge, ordonnez un changement de formation, organisez votre défense face à une attaque ou ordonnez l'assaut du camp ennemi - "Inclinez" le champ de bataille pour changer la direction de l'Odama - Evitez les dangers : rochers et attaques ennemies

locale.title: Odama
locale.synopsis:
Im antiken Japan gelobt der junge General Yamanouchi Kagetora den Tod seines Vaters mit einer ungewöhnlichen Waffe zu sühnen. Der Odama ist eine riesige Kugel, die alles zerstört, was sie trifft - ob Freund oder Feind. Der Odama wirbelt auf einem mittelalterlichen Spielbrett herum und du hast die Aufgabe, mit dem Mikrofon (das dem Spiel beiliegt) Soldaten in Richtung deines Feindes und aus der Gefahrenzone des Odama zu kommandieren. Jedes Schlachtfeld stellt ein eigenständiges Level da. Zertrümmere die feindlichen Tore mit dem Odama, kommandiere deine Truppen durch die Tore hindurch und weiter geht's mit dem nächsten Level. Yoot Saito's Odama ist eine einzigartige Kombination aus Kriegsspiel und Flipper-Sim. Das mag zwar verrückt klingen, aber Odama ist ein Hammerspiel!
- Benutze übergroße Flipper, um die Odama-Kugel über das Schlachtfeld zu schießen und die feindlichen Truppen zu treffen - Kommandiere per Mikro, befehle Angriffe und Formationswechsel, verteidige dich gegen Attacken oder nimm die Tore des Gegners ein - "Tilte" das Schlachtfeld, um die Richtung des Odama zu ändern - Weiche Gefahren wie Felsblöcken und feindlichen Attacken aus

locale.title: Odama
locale.synopsis:
En el antiguo Japón, el joven general Yamanouchi Kagetora promete vengar la muerte de su padre con el uso de un impresionante arma – el Odama – un bola gigante tan poderosa que destruye todo lo que encuentra a su paso, ya sea amigo o enemigo. Con el Odama girando encima de un campo de batalla medieval, tú decides si utilizar el micrófono (incluido con cada copia del juego) para dirigir a los soldados hacia el enemigo, y así alejarlos del poder demoledor del Odama. Cada campo de batalla corresponde a un nivel distinto; derriba las puertas del enemigo con el Odama y guía a tus tropas a través de las puertas hasta el siguiente nivel. Una fusión única de un juego de guerra y una simulación pinball; puede parecer una combinación arriesgada, pero disfrutarás al máximo.
· Utiliza los tacos (flippers) gigantes para hacer explosionar la bola Odama en el campo de batalla y bombardear a las fuerzas enemigas · Da órdenes a través del micrófono; dirige el ataque hacia el enemigo, ordena un cambio de formación, defiéndete contra los ataques o controla las puertas de los enemigos · "Inclina" el campo de batalla para modificar la dirección de la Odama · Evita peligros como los pedruscos y los ataques de los enemigos

game.name: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Battle (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Battle
locale.synopsis: The characters from the hit TV show make their US debut in this fighting game. Play as one of 16 weird and wonderful pirates from the show and pick up objects around you to use as weapons as you battle to become the King of the Pirates! The game features 6 game play modes, including 2-player versus mode and tournament mode.

rom.name: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Battle (USA) (EN) (v1.0).iso

locale.title: One Piece: Grand Battle! Rush
locale.synopsis: The characters from the hit TV show make their US debut in this fighting game. The game features 6 game play modes, including 2-player versus mode and tournament mode.

locale.title: ワンピース グラバト! ラッシュ
One Piece: Grand Adventure
locale.synopsis: One Piece, the popular comic and anime series featured in Shonen Jump, 4KidsTV and Cartoon Network, comes back to the console world with One Piece: Grand Adventure for the GameCube and PlayStation 2. The series features Monkey D. Luffy as an aspiring pirate searching for One Piece, the legendary treasure of King of the Pirates, Gold Roger. One Piece: Grand Adventure brings back the fun and excitement of the free-moving Vs. Battle action from past One Piece games with exciting new twists. The game also has been completely revamped with the inclusion of an engrossing Adventure Mode, sending players on mini-game filled quests for extended replayability. With the latest main and support characters, new moves and stages, this is the ultimate One Piece game!

game.name: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Adventure (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Adventure
locale.synopsis: One Piece, the popular comic and anime series featured in Shonen Jump, 4KidsTV and Cartoon Network, comes back to the console world with One Piece: Grand Adventure for the GameCube and PlayStation 2. locale.title: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Adventure
locale.synopsis: One Piece, a popular série de quadrinhos e anime apresentada em Shonen Jump, 4KidsTV e Cartoon Network, volta ao mundo do console com One Piece: Grand Adventure para GameCube e PlayStation 2. A série apresenta Monkey D. Luffy como um aspirante a pirata em busca de de One Piece, o lendário tesouro do Rei dos Piratas, Gold Roger. One Piece: Grand Adventure traz de volta a diversão e a emoção do Vs de movimento livre. Ação de batalha de jogos One Piece anteriores com novas reviravoltas emocionantes. O jogo também foi completamente remodelado com a inclusão de um cativante Modo de Aventura, enviando os jogadores em missões cheias de minijogos para maior capacidade de reprodução. Com os mais recentes personagens principais e de suporte, novos movimentos e fases, este é o jogo One Piece definitivo!

rom.name: Shonen Jump's One Piece: Grand Adventure (USA) (EN) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: Open Season
locale.synopsis: Open Season is a riotous romp in the great outdoors, where the rowdy brood of forest animals turns the tables on a bunch of unsuspecting hunters. When a domesticated grizzly named Boog gets lured into leaving the creature comforts of home by a fast-talking mule deer named Elliot, he finds himself lost in the woods just three days before hunting season. Forced to "rough it" in the great outdoors, Boog goes native, rallying all the forest animals to take back their home and send the hunters packing. The Open Season video game allows players to relive the movie experience by playing as Boog and Elliot. Throw skunk bombs, hurl rabbits, use acorn-firing squirrels and pull outrageous woodland pranks to scare the pants off the hunters in this action-adventure romp through the forest.

locale.title: From TV animation ONE PIECE トレジャーバトル!
Need for Speed: Most Wanted
locale.synopsis: The new speedster in EA's successful series combines the tuner customization of Need for Speed Underground with an expanded take on the police chases of the Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit series. The game will feature a Rap Sheet option that works hand in hand with a player's street reputation as they move up from the "Black List" to the A-List. Users will also be able to go head-to-head with their opponents while simultaneously trying to avoid more than six different police cars at once through a dynamically changing open-ended world. Get your car peaked for outrunning the cops by customizing your muscle cars, supercars, tuners, and sports cars.

locale.title: Need for Speed: Most Wanted

locale.title: GoldenEye: Rogue Agent
locale.synopsis: Why save the world when you can rule it? Going where no previous James Bond game has dared to tread, GoldenEye: Rogue Agent breaks all the rules by transporting players to the dark side of the Bond universe to experience life as a high-rolling, cold-hearted villain. As an aspiring 00 agent dismissed from MI6 for reckless brutality, you hired as an enforcer by Auric Goldfinger, the wealthy super-villain with a lust for all things gold. Cross paths with such legendary allies and enemies as Oddjob, Scaramanga, Xenia Onatopp, and, of course, Pussy Galore on globe-spanning missions of vengeance and demolition as you make your unrelenting rise through the ranks to the top of the villain world. Featured modes include story-driven campaign missions, deathmatch style simulator trials, and objective-based war games for single and multi-player play.

locale.title: GoldenEye : Rogue Agent
locale.synopsis: Dieser James Bond-Titel ist anders! Diesmal übernimmst du den Part eines in Ungnade gefallenen Doppel-Null-Agenten, der wegen "rücksichtslosem Verhalten" aus dem Geheimdienst ihrer Majestät entlassen wurde. In dem First-Person-Shooter triffst du auf diverse Charaktere aus dem Bond-Universum wie Odd Job, Goldfinger und Scaramanga. Die Missionen spielen an den Schauplätzen aus den Bond-Filmen, z. B. in den Straßen Hong Kongs und in Dr. No's unterirdischer Basis in der Karibik. Im Einzelspieler-Modus musst du die Verbrecher-Organisation leiten und im großartigen Mulitplayer kannst du auf dem geteilten Bildschirm gegen deine Freunde kämpfen.

locale.title: GoldenEye: Rogue Agent
locale.synopsis: Why save the world when you can rule it? Going where no previous James Bond game has dared to tread, GoldenEye: Rogue Agent breaks all the rules by transporting players to the dark side of the Bond universe to experience life as a high-rolling, cold-hearted villain. As an aspiring 00 agent dismissed from MI6 for reckless brutality, you hired as an enforcer by Auric Goldfinger, the wealthy super-villain with a lust for all things gold. Cross paths with such legendary allies and enemies as Oddjob, Scaramanga, Xenia Onatopp, and, of course, Pussy Galore on globe-spanning missions of vengeance and demolition as you make your unrelenting rise through the ranks to the top of the villain world. Featured modes include story-driven campaign missions, deathmatch style simulator trials, and objective-based war games for single and multi-player play.

locale.title: GoldenEye: Rogue Agent
locale.synopsis: Por que salvar o mundo quando você pode governá-lo? Indo onde nenhum jogo anterior de James Bond ousou pisar, GoldenEye: Rogue Agent quebra todas as regras ao transportar os jogadores para o lado negro do universo Bond para experimentar a vida como um vilão de coração frio e arrogante. Como aspirante a agente 00 demitido do MI6 por brutalidade imprudente, você foi contratado como executor por Auric Goldfinger, o supervilão rico com desejo por tudo que é ouro. Cruze caminhos com aliados e inimigos lendários como Oddjob, Scaramanga, Xenia Onatopp e, é claro, Pussy Galore em missões globais de vingança e demolição enquanto você faz seu implacável subir na hierarquia ao topo do mundo dos vilões. Os modos apresentados incluem missões de campanha baseadas na história, testes de simulador no estilo deathmatch e jogos de guerra baseados em objetivos para um ou vários jogadores.

locale.title: Pac-Man World 2
locale.synopsis: Pac-Man is on a brand new adventure and once again dealing with the pesky Ghost Gang. In Pac-Man World 2, the Ghost Gang has picked the magical fruit from an ancient tree, thereby releasing wicked evils upon Pac-Land. You must guide Pac-Man through six new lands with plenty of amusing surprises. New and improved, this Pac-Man can ice skate, rollerblade, submarine dive, and solve many exciting puzzles. With all-new moves and a zany cast of characters, your Pac-Man heroics will be pushed to its limits.

locale.title: Pac-Man World 2
locale.synopsis: Pac-Man is on a brand new adventure and once again dealing with the pesky Ghost Gang. In Pac-Man World 2, the Ghost Gang has picked the magical fruit from an ancient tree, thereby releasing wicked evils upon Pac-Land. You must guide Pac-Man through six new lands with plenty of amusing surprises. New and improved, this Pac-Man can ice skate, rollerblade, submarine dive, and solve many exciting puzzles. With all-new moves and a zany cast of characters, your Pac-Man heroics will be pushed to its limits.

locale.title: The Polar Express
locale.synopsis: In this adventure based on the Polar Express movie, you'll take a magical ride through eight chapters. A mysterious conductor shepherds you aboard a train to meet Santa Claus at the North Pole. Along the way, you'll meet all your favorite characters from the film, including the Girl Know-it-All, Lonely Boy, the Hobo, Smokey & Steamer, and the Elves. Experience minigames, solve puzzles, and search for lost presents as you explore expansive environments.

locale.title: O Expresso Polar
locale.synopsis: Nesta aventura baseada no filme Polar Express, você fará um passeio mágico por oito capítulos. Um misterioso condutor conduz você a bordo de um trem para encontrar o Papai Noel no Pólo Norte. Ao longo do caminho, você encontrará todos os seus personagens favoritos do filme, incluindo a Garota-Sabe-Tudo, o Garoto Solitário, o Hobo, o Smokey & Steamer e os Elfos. Experimente minijogos, resolva quebra-cabeças e procure presentes perdidos enquanto explora ambientes expansivos.

locale.title: The Polar Express
locale.synopsis: In this adventure based on the Polar Express movie, you'll take a magical ride through eight chapters. locale.title: Hudson Selection Vol. 3: Bonk's Adventure
locale.synopsis: PC Genjin completely remade with 3D graphics! A hilarious caveman rampage awaits!

locale.title: ハドソン セレクション Vol.3 PC原人
locale.synopsis: あの「PC原人」が、3Dグラフィックで完全リニューアル!原人君がコミカルアクションで大暴れ!

locale.title: Mario Party 5
locale.synopsis: Mario and his friends are trying to restore peace to Dream Depot by racing around a collection of all-new game boards on their quest to collect stars. The second GameCube installment in the multiplayer series that began on N64, Mario Party 5 now sports 3D boards, more than 70 new mini-games, more playable characters, and a new single-player story mode that cuts down on wait time. Players can also compete in mini-game tournaments against friends or the CPU, assemble machines and do battle in the Super Duel Mode and test their mettle in three bonus modes: Card Party, Beach Volleyball and Ice Hockey.

locale.title: Mario Party 5

locale.title: Mario Party 5

Players can also compete in mini-game tournaments against friends or the CPU, assemble machines and do battle in the Super Duel Mode and test their mettle in three bonus modes: Card Party, Beach Volleyball and Ice Hockey.

locale.title: Mario Party 5
locale.synopsis:
Patrylöwen aufgepasst! Gastgeber Mario schmeißt wieder eine Superfete. Diesmal aber mit einer noch größeren Gästeliste. Neben den bekannten Lieblingen Yoshi, Peach, Luigi und den All Stars aus Mushroom Kingdom feiern jetzt Überraschungsgäste wie Baby Bowser und Toad ihr Debüt in einem Mario Party-Spiel. Zusammen mit seinen Freunden erlebt der Kultklempner wieder irrsinnig witzige Minispiele. Große Multiplayer-Action ist also garantiert. Bis zu 4 Spieler können auf den neuen witzigen 3D-Spielbrettern richtig durchstarten. Die 60 neuen Minispiele treiben den Partyspaß wieder auf die Spitze: Die Mario-Fans müssen z.B. vom Himmel fallende Eiskugeln auffangen, schüchterne Anker finden oder einer Horde von wild gewordenen Pinguinen ausweichen. Mit dabei im Spiel sind brandneue Features:
Die 3D-Karte verschafft einen schnellen Einstieg zurück ins Spiel und mit dem Verändern von Ereignisfeldern kann man sich einen Vorteil beim Münzensammeln verschaffen.
Außerdem dürfen sich die Partyfans wieder auf das Mini-Giant-System freuen. Es lässt die Figuren schrumpfen oder wachsen, um andere Bereiche des Spielbretts erreichen zu können.
Im Ein-Spieler-Modus trifft man auf die Koopa Kid Brigade. Als wahrer Sieger kann man sich aber nur dann fühlen, wenn alle Minispiel-Wettbewerbe gewonnen und die meisten Münzen eingsammelt sind.
Mario Party 5 - der ultimative Partytipp für alle Nintendo Fans!
FEATURES:
- Ultimativer Partyspaß für die ganze Familie
- Virtuelles Brettspiel mit vielen Lieblings-Charakteren, aber auch mit zahlreichen neuen Partygästen
- Mehrspieler-Modus für bis zu 4 Spieler gleichzeitig
- Exclusiv für Nintendo GameCube

locale.title: Mario Party 6
locale.synopsis: Mario Party 6 builds upon the style and mechanics of its predecessors by offering furious four-player fun rooted in board game mechanics. The new additions in Mario Party 6 include day and night cycles, new characters and mini-games, and of course, the new microphone. Two of the new characters, named Brighton (a sun) and Twila (a crescent moon) get into a heated debate over who's better. The dispute creates a day/night dichotomy that comes into play whenever playing on any of the six game boards. When you're ready to play, a pop-up book springs open and highlights your options. Party Mode is where you'll find the different board games, which you can play solo or with friends. Instead of just collecting stars, though, each board features different objectives. Mario Party 6 features over 80 different mini-games.

locale.title: Mario Party 6
locale.synopsis:
5 Folgen lang verlangte die Mario Party-Serie mit ihren turbulenten Minigames zarten Spielerhänden alles ab. Nur blitzartige Reaktionen und irrwitziges Tempo beim Button-Drücken führten zum Erfolg. Die Lautstärke, die sich im Laufe dieser schweißtreibenden Spielrunden automatisch entwickelte, verpuffte ungenutzt. Doch das ist jetzt vorbei. Mit der neuen Sprachsteuerung ist Nintendo ein Spitzen-Coup gelungen, der im Bereich der Konsolenspiele bislang einzigartig ist. Mit der neuen, akustischen Steuerung macht es jetzt noch mehr Spaß, sich den wahnwitzigen Herausforderungen in den mehr als 80 neuen Minigames zu stellen. Durch die Einführung der beiden neuen Charaktere Brighton und Twilla gibt es in den liebevoll gestalteten Spielwelten von Mario Party 6 diesmal sogar einen Tag-und-Nacht-Wechsel. Je nachdem, ob die Sonne Brighton oder der Mond Twila erscheint, ändern sich dann sogar auch verschiedene Features auf den Spielbrettern. Ansonsten tauchen natürlich auch wieder die altbekannten Helden wie Mario höchstpersönlich, Luigi, Bowser, Prinzessin Peach, Yoshi und alle anderen auf, die bei keiner Mario Party fehlen dürfen. Bis zu 4 Mitspieler können wählen, mit wem sie den irren Party-Spaß bestreiten wollen.
Features:
* Mehr als 80 neue Minigames * Zahlreiche neue Charaktere aus dem Nintendo-Universum * Neues Mikrofon-Feature * Anstelle des Mikrofons kann auch der Controller verwendet werden * Spracherkennung funktioniert in Deutsch, Englisch, Französisch, Spanisch und Italienisch * Deutscher Bildschirmtext

locale.title: Mario Party 7
locale.synopsis: The entire Mario gang is back for the seventh installment of the incredibly popular Mario Party® franchise. Players everywhere will set their controllers to fun as they run, jump, swim and fly through more than 80 new mini-games. But this party's about to get a lot bigger...because EIGHT people will now be able to battle each other at one time. The microphone peripheral from Mario Party 6 also makes a grand return – and with the new Mic Grand Prix mode, there will be plenty of voice-over madness for everyone. The addition of two new playable characters, Dry Bones and Birdo, will ensure that even seasoned Mario Party vets can experience a new world of wackiness.

locale.title: Mario Party 7
locale.synopsis: The entire Mario gang is back for the seventh installment of the incredibly popular Mario Party® franchise. locale.synopsis: The entire Mario gang is back for the seventh installment of the incredibly popular Mario Party® franchise. locale.title: Mario Party 7
locale.synopsis:
Die Party kann beginnen! Auch Helden brauchen Erholung - das findet jedenfalls Toadsworth und lädt Mario, Luigi und Co. zu einer kleinen Spritztour auf seinen neuen Party-Luxusliner ein. Dabei hat er seine Rechnung leider ohne Bowser gemacht. Beleidigt, weil er auf dem Party-Cruiser unerwünscht ist, schmiedet er einen bösen Plan, um Mario und seinen Freunden die Reise zu verderben. Auf sechs Spielbrettern gilt es nun für Mario, Luigi, Peach, Yoshi & Co., Bowsers tückische Pläne zu vereiteln und wieder tapfer um Sterne und Münzen zu kämpfen. Ein genialer Spielspaß, denn jede der Umgebungen Grand Canal, Pagoda Peak, Pyramid Park, Neon Heights, Windmillville und Bowser's Enchanted Inferno begeistert nicht nur mit einer Vielzahl bunter Parcours, sondern stellt auch ganz neue Herausforderungen an den partyerprobten Spieler: Wer es im Solo-Cruise-Modus geschafft hat, Bowser zu besiegen, kann im Deluxe-Cruise-Modus gegen bis zu sieben Mitspieler immer noch sein blaues Wunder erleben! Mario Party 7 schöpft auch diesmal wieder die vollen Möglichkeiten seiner zahlreichen Mini-Games aus: Von Geschicklichkeitsübungen über Ausdauertests bis hin zu kuriosem Gedächtnistraining. Schließlich soll bei so viel Party-Life auch der Kopf nicht zu kurz kommen. Fest steht: Mit diesem Spiel gibt Nintendo Mario Party-Fans einmal mehr einen Grund zum Feiern!
FEATURES:
- Der beliebte Party-Spaß mit 88 neuen Mini-Spielen auf 6 neuen Spielbrettern - Neue Einzel- und Mehrspielermodi für grenzenloses Party-Vergnügen - Erstmalig Partymeilen sammeln und gegen Souvenirs tauschen - Freispielmöglichkeiten neuer Charaktere - Multiplayer-Spaß jetzt für bis zu 8 Mitspieler! - Einfache Spielsteuerung durch mitgeliefertes Mikrofon

locale.title: Pac-Man World 3
locale.synopsis: The classic gaming character Pac-Man is back for the third iteration of the Pac-Man World series. The game features the classic Pac-Man powers and adds a few new abilities--such as superstomp and electric shock--to assist the yellow-ball-like hero against his ghost foes. You will also be able to take control of two different ghost characters. The game takes place in both 2D and 3D and includes the original Pac-Man arcade game.

locale.title: Pac-Man World 3
locale.synopsis: The classic gaming character Pac-Man is back for the third iteration of the Pac-Man World series. The game features the classic Pac-Man powers and adds a few new abilities--such as superstomp and electric shock--to assist the yellow-ball-like hero against his ghost foes. locale.title: Rogue Ops
locale.synopsis: After receiving two years of grueling instruction in a covert government agency, ex-Green Beret Nikki Conners is unleashed upon Omega 19, a terrorist organization recognized as the most ominous in the world. As Conners, you must rely on undetected operations, in which you hide in the shadows, suspend from ceilings, seek refuge inside environmental objects like storage lockers, or slide around walls to peer around corners. With a host of engaging missions, cutting-edge spy tools, and an extensive arsenal, Rogue Ops tests your ability to survive in any situation.

locale.title: Rogue Ops
locale.synopsis: Depois de receber dois anos de instrução extenuante em uma agência governamental secreta, a ex-Boina Verde Nikki Conners é lançado contra a Omega 19, uma organização terrorista reconhecida como a mais ameaçadora do mundo. Como Conners, você deve confiar em operações não detectadas, nas quais você se esconde nas sombras, se suspende em tetos, se refugia em objetos ambientais como armários de armazenamento ou desliza pelas paredes para espiar pelos cantos. Com uma série de missões envolventes, ferramentas de espionagem de ponta e um extenso arsenal, Rogue Ops testa sua capacidade de sobreviver em qualquer situação.

locale.title: Pokémon Channel
locale.synopsis: Professor Oak needs your help! Pokemon Channel is a TV-broadcasting network that airs a variety of Pokemon programs, and he's selected YOU as the initial audience! With the help of Pikachu, and other Pokemon, you can make Pokemon Channel the highest rated channel on your TV!

locale.title: Pokémon Channel
locale.synopsis: Professor Oak needs your help! Pokemon Channel is a TV-broadcasting network that airs a variety of Pokemon programs, and he's selected YOU as the initial audience! With the help of Pikachu, and other Pokemon, you can make Pokemon Channel the highest rated channel on your TV!

locale.title: ポケモンチャンネル 〜ピカチュウといっしょ!〜
Pokémon Channel
locale.synopsis: Professor Oak needs your help! Pokemon Channel is a TV-broadcasting network that airs a variety of Pokemon programs, and he's selected YOU as the initial audience! With the help of Pikachu, and other Pokemon, you can make Pokemon Channel the highest rated channel on your TV!

locale.title: Pokémon Channel
locale.synopsis:
Prof. Eich braucht deine Hilfe! Pokémon Channel ist ein Fernsehkanal, der eine Vielzahl an Pokémon-Programmen ausstrahlt. Und DU bist auserkoren, der erste Testzuschauer zu sein! Mit Hilfe von Pikachu und anderen Pokémon, kannst du Pokémon Channel zum beliebtesten Kanal mit den höchsten Einschaltquoten in deinem Fernseher machen!
* Enton bringt dir die neuesten Nachrichten ins Haus und Mauzi zeigt dir Vor-Ort-Reportagen. Achte auf Hinweise darauf, wo du Pokémon finden kannst... * Freu dich auf einen besonderen Anime! Exklusiv im Pokémon Channel! * Male deine Lieblingsszenen aus dem Programm und schicke sie Farbeagle zur Bewertung! * Lauf nach draußen und spiele mit Pikachu. Triff dabei viele verschiedene Pokémon! * Eine Vielzahl virtueller Pokémon mini-Titel stehen dir zur freien Verfügung. Auf ins Spielvergnügen! * Übertrage Jirachi in deine Pokémon Rubin- und Saphir-Edition! Zum ersten Mal kannst du sehen, wie stark dieses Stahl- und Psycho-Pokémon ist!

locale.title: Pokémon Channel
locale.synopsis: Professor Oak needs your help! Pokemon Channel is a TV-broadcasting network that airs a variety of Pokemon programs, and he's selected YOU as the initial audience! With the help of Pikachu, and other Pokemon, you can make Pokemon Channel the highest rated channel on your TV!

locale.title: Dakar 2: The World's Ultimate Rally
locale.synopsis: The world?s most insane off-road rally race returns to the consoles bigger and badder than ever before with Dakar 2: Special Stages Racing. Choose from a vast assortment of fully licensed trucks, cars and motorcycles in which you?ll compete against the elements that mother-nature has placed in your path to victory. This is a no holds barred quest for world rally supremacy!

locale.title: Dakar 2: The World's Ultimate Rally
locale.synopsis: The world?s most insane off-road rally race returns to the consoles bigger and badder than ever before with Dakar 2: Special Stages Racing. Choose from a vast assortment of fully licensed trucks, cars and motorcycles in which you?ll compete against the elements that mother-nature has placed in your path to victory. This is a no holds barred quest for world rally supremacy!

locale.title: Pool Edge
locale.synopsis: The motion of the ball, the friction of the cloth, the bounce of the pocket cushions: Pool Edge's original engine offers the ultimate in authentic pocket billiards simulation.

locale.title: プールエッジ
locale.synopsis: ボールの挙動、複雑なポケット周辺やクッションの処理、ラシャの摩擦等、ポケットビリヤードのその全てを網羅したオリジナルのシミュレーションエンジンを制作し、プロのビリヤード選手のアドバイスによってさらなる進化を遂げた究極とも呼べるエンジンを搭載。

locale.title: Pitfall: The Lost Expedition
locale.synopsis: Delving deep in the Peruvian Jungle, you assume the role of Pitfall Harry--a fearless, rough-and-ready treasure seeker who battles evil using his athletic ability and a knapsack filled with adventure gear. Your mission: Race against a rival explorer to find hidden treasures, which could spell doom for you and your friends if they fall into the wrong hands. The game challenges you to explore an obstacle-filled world featuring over 50 perilous levels, including lush rainforests, creature-ridden caves and vast glacial mountains. You'll be swinging on vines, avoiding crocodiles and dodging rolling logs as you unearth artifacts and use your cunning to defeat dangerous foes.

locale.title: Pitfall: The Lost Expedition

locale.title: Pitfall: The Lost Expedition
locale.synopsis: Mergulhando nas profundezas da selva peruana, você assume o papel de Pitfall Harry - um caçador de tesouros destemido e rude que luta contra o mal usando sua habilidade atlética e uma mochila cheia de equipamentos de aventura. Sua missão: correr contra um explorador rival para encontrar tesouros escondidos, que podem significar a ruína para você e seus amigos se eles caírem nas mãos erradas. O jogo desafia você a explorar um mundo cheio de obstáculos com mais de 50 níveis perigosos, incluindo florestas tropicais exuberantes, cavernas repletas de criaturas e vastas montanhas glaciais. Você estará balançando em vinhas, evitando crocodilos e evitando troncos rolantes enquanto desenterra artefatos e usa sua astúcia para derrotar inimigos perigosos.

You'll be swinging on vines, avoiding crocodiles and dodging rolling logs as you unearth artifacts and use your cunning to defeat dangerous foes.

locale.title: Pitfall: The Lost Expedition
locale.synopsis: Delving deep in the Peruvian Jungle, you assume the role of Pitfall Harry--a fearless, rough-and-ready treasure seeker who battles evil using his athletic ability and a knapsack filled with adventure gear. Your mission: Race against a rival explorer to find hidden treasures, which could spell doom for you and your friends if they fall into the wrong hands. The game challenges you to explore an obstacle-filled world featuring over 50 perilous levels, including lush rainforests, creature-ridden caves and vast glacial mountains. You'll be swinging on vines, avoiding crocodiles and dodging rolling logs as you unearth artifacts and use your cunning to defeat dangerous foes.

locale.title: Pikmin
locale.synopsis: Pikmin may be small and plantlike, but they can be a space traveler's best friend. Stranded on an unknown planet, Captain Olimar must enlist the help of these native Pikmin to rebuild his spaceship before the life-support system runs out. In the meantime, you'll have to fend off attackers and solve various puzzles. To produce additional multicolored Pikmin you must defeat enemies and carry them back to the Pikmin nests called onions. But beware--watching giant predators gobble your Pikmin might make you angrier than you'd expect.

locale.title: Pikmin
locale.synopsis: Pikmin may be small and plantlike, but they can be a space traveler's best friend. locale.synopsis: Pikmin may be small and plantlike, but they can be a space traveler's best friend. locale.title: Pikmin
locale.synopsis:
Mit dem innovativen Pikmin, einem Spiel von Nintendos kreativem Genie Shigeru Miyamoto (dem Schöpfer von Mario, Zelda, Donkey Kong und vielen anderen), wird das erstaunliche Potenzial des Nintendo GameCube eindrucksvoll demonstriert.
Das als Action - Strategie angekündigte Pikmin ist ein Action-Strategiespiel mit unglaublich lebensechten Umgebungen, die durch Mr. Miyamotos eigenen Garten in Kyoto (Japan) angeregt wurden.Der Spieler übernimmt einen Raumfahrer namens Captain Olimar, der auf einem ungewöhnlichen Planeten notlanden musste.
Das Ziel des Spiels besteht darin, Olimar bei der Suche nach den Teilen seines Raumschiffs zu helfen, die über den ganzen Planeten verstreut sind. Zum Glück für Captain Olimar ist der Planet von seltsamen kleinen Wesen bewohnt, den Pikmin. Pikmin sind pflanzenartige Lebensformen, die in drei verschiedenen Farben vorkommen: Rot, gelb und blau. Jeder Pikmin-Typ hat ganz eigene Stärken, die Olimar zu seinem Vorteil nutzen muss. Rote Pikmin sind unempfindlich gegen Feuer, blaue Pikmin können im Wasser überleben, gelbe Pikmin dagegen können Hindernisse mit Bomben-Steinen zerstören. Der Spieler kann die Pikmin-Sprosse einzeln, in Gruppen oder als große Pikmin-Schar von 100 Wesen steuern.Anders als in vielen Strategiespielen ist die Steuerung in Pikmin sehr einfach.
Mr. Miyamoto hat das Spiel hervorragend auf den neuen Nintendo GameCube Controller abgestimmt. Mit dem Control Stick steuerst du Captain Olimar, mit dem C-Stick die Horde deiner Pikmin. Auch wenn sich Olimar in eine bestimmte Richtung bewegt, kannst du die Pikmin in jede beliebige Richtung steuern. Einfache Befehle per Knopf/Tastendruck lösen die gewünschten Aktionen deiner Pikmin aus.
Die Pikmin beginnen ihr Leben als Blätter, doch wenn du sie im Boden lässt, reifen sie zu Knospen und Blumen heran. Pikmin sind unglaublich vielseitig, sowohl in ihren Aktionen als auch in ihren Bewegungen. Du kannst sie dazu bringen, verschiedene Aufgaben zu erledigen, vom Brückenbau über das Einreißen von Wänden und den Transport von Bomben bis hin zum Kampf. Die Pikmin in den Kampf mit anderen Wesen zu schicken, gehört zu den unterhaltsamsten Aspekten des Spiels. CI7_GCN_Pikmin_01.png
Ihre natürlichen Feinde sind gewöhnlich viel größer als die Pikmin, deswegen müssen sie in großen Zahlen angreifen, um erfolgreich zu sein. Wir haben herausgefunden, dass es am besten ist, die meisten Gegner von hinten anzugreifen, sonst kann es passieren, dass du lediglich ein Pikmin-Büffet anrichtest. Bei dessen Vertilgung zuzusehen, ist allerdings schrecklich und komisch zugleich. Was Pikmin so faszinierend macht, ist vor allem der künstlerische Gesamteindruck.
Ein atmosphärischer Soundtrack sorgt für die richtige Stimmung, und die Pikmin sind auf surreale Weise in einer ansonsten realistischen Welt verankert. Solche Einzelheiten machen Pikmin auf Anhieb liebenswert, doch du solltest nicht den Fehler machen, das Spiel für simpel zu halten. Selbst die erfahrensten Spieler werden sich wohl gelegentlich verzweifelt am Kopf kratzen, wenn sie versuchen, ein Rätsel zu lösen oder einen der Endgegner zu besiegen.
Pikmin ist eine völlig neue Art von Spiel, die du selbst ausprobieren musst, um dir ein Urteil zu bilden. Der neuartige Ansatz und die fantasievolle Präsentation machen es zu einem der interessantesten Spiele, die wir seit langer Zeit erlebt haben.

locale.title: Pikmin
locale.synopsis: Olimar, un repartidor que colisionó con un inoportuno asteroide, debe recuperar en 30 días las piezas de su nave, repartidas a lo largo y ancho de un extraño planeta lleno de animales predadores de Pikmin que se vuelve más peligroso cada día. ¿Conseguirá encontrar las partes para reconstruirla?

locale.title: Piglet's Big Game
locale.synopsis: Piglet's friends are having nightmares and only you can stop them. With a magical telescope, you must peer into your friends' dreams and scare away evil Heffalumps and Woozles. Pooh, Roo, Owl, Eeyore, Rabbit, and Tigger are all in this dreamworld that spans seven different worlds. As Piglet, Pooh, and Tigger, you'll solve puzzles, make scary faces, and find Christopher Robin's balloons. Piglet's friends always tease him for being timid, but now it's his chance to prove his bravery.

locale.title: Pac Man Fever
locale.synopsis: Pac-Man takes break from eating dots and ghosts in the fun new party game Pac-Man Fever. In addition to our yellow hero, the game also features Ms. Pac-Man and many other Namco favorites from franchises such as Tekken, Ridge Racer, and Soul Calibur. Up to four players partake in more than 30 minigames and three differently themed game boards. Try to recover all of the minigames stolen by those pesky, party-crashing Ghosts and determine who the real party animal is.

locale.title: P.N.03
locale.synopsis: Third-person action shooter from Capcom, featuring robot hunter heroine Vanessa Z. Schneider. This beautiful mercenary for hire with a mysterious past is called in to take care of an off-world colony overrun by a Computer Arms Management System (or CAMS) gone completely haywire. Gameplay exists of run-and-stop shooting action with a rhythm twist, as Vanessa explores 11 linear levels. She can shoot single blasts from her hands or take on multiple enemies at once utilizing a number of combos, which are tied to the nine upgradable suits found in the game. Produced by Shinji Mikami.

game.name: Phantasy Star Online Episode I & II (USA) (EN,FR,DE,ES)

locale.title: Phantasy Star Online Episode I & II
locale.synopsis: GameCube version of Sonic Team's award-winning online RPG, featuring two games in one. Episode I gives you all the hit content and gameplay from the original PSO and PSO ver.2. Episode II brings an all-new full-length adventure in which you'll face real-time combat with enemies that are more powerful than ever before. New levels, like the breath-taking mountain and beach stages, give you expanded areas of gameplay and deep, lush worlds to explore. You'll also be given all-new quests to complete, additional weapons to master, and lots more rare items to find. Choose your character from the original three classes, each with a fourth new being. For intense offline gameplay, team up or compete with up to three of your fellow Hunters on the same console for a split-screen battle.

The Powerpuff Girls: Relish Rampage
locale.synopsis: Mojo Jojo is fed up with The Powerpuff Girls. He's invented a scheme to put all of Townsville under his mind-control--Radio Jojo. But Mojo doesn't know his sour signals are strong enough to summon aliens to invade Townsville. Now, The Powerpuff Girls must defeat Mojo and annihilate the aliens before the Townsville citizens become aliens forever. Join this treacherous trio and battle your way through challenging missions and intense clashes in Townsville. The survival of these three superheroes depends on your ability to deploy super powers, complete action-packed missions, and destroy a host of enemies and villains.

locale.title: As Meninas Super-Poderosas: Relish Rampage
locale.synopsis: Macaco Louco está farto das Meninas Superpoderosas. Ele inventou um esquema para colocar toda Townsville sob seu controle mental - Rádio Louco. Mas Macaco não sabe que seus sinais amargos são fortes o suficiente para convocar alienígenas para invadir Townsville. Agora, as Meninas Superpoderosas devem derrotar Macaco e aniquilar os alienígenas antes que os cidadãos de Townsville se tornem alienígenas para sempre. Junte-se a este trio traiçoeiro e batalhe seu caminho através de missões desafiadoras e confrontos intensos em Townsville. A sobrevivência desses três super-heróis depende da sua capacidade de implantar superpoderes, completar missões cheias de ação e destruir uma série de inimigos e vilões.

Pool Paradise
locale.synopsis: Penniless on an idyllic South Pacific desert island, you discover a variety of pool tables scattered around the beach and in various huts. On the beach, sheltered under the palm trees, is a practice table where you can enhance your skills and watch the waves rolling in. When you feel you are good enough, you can enter the Competition Hut and start climbing the championship ladder. There are 11 sets of pool rules and 30 different computer opponents for you to challenge. It's not all over if you lose everything; there's a loan shark to lend you more cash--or bite your head off.

locale.title: Pool Paradise

locale.title: Pool Paradise
locale.synopsis:
Die jubelnd gefeierte Pool-Simulation kehrt zurück, besser als jemals zuvor und dazu konzipiert, alle deine Gegner ein für alle Mal auszumerzen. "Pool Paradise" bringt das weltweit beliebte Pool Game in verschiedenen Variationen auf eine idyllische Insel im Südpazifik. Bei "Pool Paradise" handelt es sich wieder einmal um ein Game aus dem Stall von Archer Maclean, der hiermit das realistischste Pool Game, das jemals herausgegeben wurde, auf den Markt bringt. Spiele gegen alle möglichen Gegner mit unterschiedlichen Fähigkeiten, und steigere dein Ansehen auf der Insel, um das Prestige zu erhalten, das dir zusteht.
FEATURES:
- Hochentwickelte Physik und einzigartig erstklassige Kugel-Kinetik
- 30 realistische und zunehmend erfahrene und geschickte Gegner
- Die größte Pool Game Sammlung, die es je gegeben hat
- Single Player und Multiplayer Modus
- 3D Stereo und Surround Sound
- Mini Games: Darts, Dropzone, Kokosnuss, Schießen und Skeeball
- Trick Shot Tisch und Trick Shot Editor

game.name: Phantasy Star Online Episode III: C.A.R.D. Revolution (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Phantasy Star Online Episode III: C.A.R.D. Revolution
locale.synopsis: A strangely powerful Photon-like substance found on Planet Ragol has spurred a raging battle between the Hunters and a rebel team called the Arkz. The prized matter known as "The Germ" has unique replicating powers and can be sealed in small playing-card-sized packets. Warriors carrying a deck of the sought-after cards can then bring unprecedented amounts of destructive weapons and creatures into battle. Fight with the Hero Hunters or on the rebels' Dark Side and stack your decks accordingly. You'll compose several powerful decks from nearly 500 cards featuring fighting moves, weapons, and PSO creatures.

game.name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (USA) (EN,FR,ES)

locale.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
locale.synopsis: Embark on a journey of scorched sands and ancient legends. A young prince, drawn to the dark powers of a magic dagger, unleashes a deadly evil upon a beautiful kingdom. Guide the Prince on his quest to reverse the curse by using the Sands of Time, a power which allows you to erase the past, see into the future and slow down the present. Perform gravity-defying acrobatics and swashbuckling attacks in a staggering array of landscapes and kingdoms. Restore peace to the land and fulfill your destiny.

Du springst, wirbelst und schlägst Salti durch jeden Raum eines vom Krieg zerstörten persischen Palastes. Dabei drehst du dir die Zeit so hin wie du es möchtest. locale.title: Puyo Pop Fever
locale.synopsis: From the popular Japanese puzzle game Puyo Pop comes Puyo Pop Fever, designed for a new generation of console gamers. Simple yet challenging, the game features both single-player and multiplayer options. The additional fever mode adds a different twist to the gameplay, providing the opportunity to create a string of chain reactions that can annihilate your opponent. Puyo Pop Fever mixes both 2D and 3D elements, and as the action speeds up, you'll see more special effects combined with "anime" graphics.

locale.title: Puyo Pop Fever
locale.synopsis: From the popular Japanese puzzle game Puyo Pop comes Puyo Pop Fever, designed for a new generation of console gamers. locale.title: Puyo Pop Fever
locale.synopsis:
Der neue Kult-Hit aus Japan: "Puyo Pop Fever" vereint amüsante Knobel-Action mit anspruchsvollem Puzzle-Denksport. Egal, ob allein oder zu zweit, Sie werden den Controller nicht mehr aus der Hand legen! Das süchtig-machende Spielprinzip begeisterte bereits über 3 Millionen Videospieler in Fernost, denn trotz gewisser Schlichtheit wartet "Puyo Pop Fever" mit einem Füllhorn an Spaß und Möglichkeiten auf. In verschiedenen Spielmodi gilt es, die unterschiedlichen "Puyos" richtig anzuordnen, um die Partien für sich zu entscheiden. Dummerweise ist die Sache nicht immer leicht, vor allem, wenn Sie gegen einen Mitspieler antreten - rauchende Köpfe, augenzwinkernde Schadenfreude und viele amüsante Spielstunden sind garantiert!
FEATURES:
* Augenweide: Farbenfrohe Optik im Manga-Stil, die perfekt auf das Spielgesehen abgestimmt ist
* Suchtfaktor: egal, ob allein oder zu zweit, Sie werden den Controller nicht aus der Hand legen wollen
* Spielspaß: neben verschiedenen Ein- und Zweispieler-Modi wird Sie vor allem der actiongeladene "Fever-Modus" begeistern
* Vielfalt: etliche Charaktere mit unterschiedlichen Eigenschaften stehen zur Auswahl
* Absolut kultig: Die "Puyo Pop Fever"-Vorgänger begeisterten in Japan bereits über 3 Millionen Videospieler
* Qualität: das Spiel wurde vom "Sonic Team" entwickelt, Segas Erfolgsprogrammierern

locale.title: Pikmin 2
locale.synopsis: Captain Olimar has returned to the planet where the Pikmin live, and he's all business this time. The company he works for is going bankrupt, so to save it, Olimar must salvage the treasure buried all over the planet. Of course, he'll need the help of the Pikmin to do that--he can't do anything by himself. Control one of two main characters--Olimar or his assistant--as you command your Pikmin to defeat enemies, propagate more Pikmin, collect precious doodads, and solve puzzles. With unlimited time, new colors of Pikmin, and two-player cooperative play, Pikmin 2 improves on the original in many ways.

locale.title: Pikmin 2
locale.synopsis:
De vuelta al planeta
Olimar acaba de volver a casa, feliz de estar aún vivito y coleando. Tras realizar un aterrizaje forzoso en un planeta alienígena, no tardó en percatarse de que la única vía de escape consistía en aprovechar las aptitudes de los Pikmin: unas pequeñas criaturas de lo más mono que, a su mando, se afanaban en buscar los componentes de su querida nave espacial que se habían desperdigado por doquier. Con solo 30 días para completar la misión antes de agotarse el suministro de oxígeno de emergencia, Olimar nunca olvida a los Pikmin que le ayudaron cuando más lo necesitaba.
Pero el hogar no es a veces tan dulce como debería, y resulta que la compañía intergaláctica en la que trabaja Olimar, Hocotate, S. L., se ha endeudado hasta las cejas durante su ausencia. Cuando el presidente de la empresa obsequia a Olimar con esa triste historia, al agotado explorador se le cae sin querer una baratija obtenida en sus viajes. Al descubrir que esta chatarrilla está valorada en unos asombrosos 100 pokos, la solución a los problemas de Hocotate, S. L. se vuelve evidente al momento.
Lo único que deberá hacer Olimar es regresar a ese peligroso planeta y volver a dirigir a los Pikmin. Al fin y al cabo, si las cosas que hay tiradas por allí valen 100 pokos, reunir los fondos necesarios para devolver el préstamo sin los escasos 30 días de plazo debería ser simple. ¿Verdad?
Dos no son multitud Esta vez Olimar no viajará solo, ya que le acompaña su compañero Luis. Habida cuenta de los peligros afrontados en su última odisea, a buen seguro que Olimar se alegrará de contar con ayuda ajena para dirigir a los Pikmin y enfrentarse al curioso grupo de habitantes del planeta que le aguarda con los brazos cerrados.

locale.title: Spawn: Armageddon
locale.synopsis: Spawn: Armageddon, based on Todd McFarlane's creation, is a 3-D action adventure that gives players access to all of Spawn's distinctive abilities, superhuman strength, arsenal of weaponry, Hell Powers, and, of course, his living symbiotic costume. Caught between the battle of Good vs. Evil, he struggles to break free from the controlling influences of Heaven and Hell.

The countdown to Armageddon has begun! Spawn must save humanity from extinction.

locale.title: Pokémon Box: Ruby & Sapphire
locale.synopsis: Organizer software for the GBA Pokemon games that enables Pokemon Ruby/Sapphire and Leaf Green/Fire Red owners to transmit their collections from the Game Boy Advance to the GameCube via a GameCube GBA cable, and store them on a memory card. These Pokemon owners can then arrange their parties easily via the GameCube's clean interface...even view their creatures as 3D items. Pokemon Box also includes a Game Boy Advance emulator that gives Ruby/Sapphire owners the ability to play their GBA Pokemon game on the GameCube without the need of a Game Boy Player. The budget-priced disc includes the Pokemon Box GameCube disc, a GameCube GBA cable, and a Memory Card.

locale.title: Puyo Pop Fever
locale.synopsis: From the popular Japanese puzzle game Puyo Pop comes Puyo Pop Fever, designed for a new generation of console gamers. Simple yet challenging, the game features both single-player and multiplayer options. The additional fever mode adds a different twist to the gameplay, providing the opportunity to create a string of chain reactions that can annihilate your opponent. Puyo Pop Fever mixes both 2D and 3D elements, and as the action speeds up, you'll see more special effects combined with "anime" graphics.

game.name: Nintendo Puzzle Collection (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Nintendo Puzzle Collection
locale.synopsis: A compilation of three of Nintendo's classic puzzle games: Dr. Mario, Yoshi's Cookie and Panel de Pon. They might be easy to pick up, but these three masterpieces will be hard to put down!

locale.title: NINTENDO パズルコレクション
locale.synopsis: 収録ゲームは、『ドクターマリオ』『ヨッシーのクッキー』『パネルでポン』の3種類。 シンプルだけどハマってしまう名作ばかりで、どなたでも楽しむことができます。

locale.title: Madden NFL 08
locale.synopsis: Feel what it's like to be a field general making key personnel decisions on both sides of the ball during the game's biggest moments in Madden NFL 08. Quickly identify your strongest players on the field before every snap then move them into position to make game-changing, momentum-altering plays. Play to your team's strengths by immediately reading your opponent's schemes and reacting to the action as soon as the ball is snapped.

locale.title: NFL Quarterback Club 2002
locale.synopsis: NFL QB Club 2002 delivers a super-realistic football simulation, with state-of-the-art graphics, fluid gameplay, and intuitive controls. It features the exclusive QB Challenge mode, which includes four head-to-head events: speed and mobility, accuracy, long-distance throw, and read and recognition. The game also allows players to access current and retired members, such as John Elway, Dan Marino, Steve Young, Jim Kelly, and Phil Simms. It features all 31 NFL clubs, uniforms and stadiums, more than 1,500 NFL players, more than 300 different play combinations, play-by-play from Kevin Harlan and color commentary from Bill Maas, and more than 1,500 all-new, motion-captured animations for seamless action. NFL QB Club 2002 includes real-life player facial textures for more than 350 starting NFL players, realistic player models--featuring blinking eyes, jaw motions, and facial expressions--and five modes of play: practice, exhibition, season, playoffs, and Quarterback Challenge.

game.name: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One
locale.synopsis: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One offers cinematic intensity as never before on consoles. The hallmark cinematic intensity of Call of Duty returns with a more complete gameplay experience of World War II combat. Experience a wide variety of missions on land, sea, and in the air, with the aid of over three dozen authentic American, Italian, French, and German weapons. Charge into battle together as Allied and Axis planes duel overhead, artillery explosions shake the ground and choke the air, and bullets and shrapnel streak past you and your squadmates. Experience war-torn Europe and Africa, from the blistering desert expanses of Tunisia and Libya to the beautiful yet deadly countrysides of Italy, France, Belgium, and Germany.

locale.title: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One
locale.synopsis:
Erleben Sie den Adrenalinstoß und die grausame Wirklichkeit des Krieges wie nie zuvor. Lernen Sie Ihre Teamkameraden kennen und kämpfen Sie in einer epischen Geschichte während der eindrucksvollsten Momente des Zweiten Weltkriegs an ihrer Seite. Als Mitglied der heldenhaftesten Kampfeinheit Amerikas, der Big Red One, arbeiten Sie mit Ihrem Trupp zusammen und erfüllen verschiedene Kampfmissionen von Nordafrika und Italien bis in das besetzte Westeuropa.
FILMREIFE INTENSITÄT, DIE ES NOCH NIE AUF EINER KONSOLE GAB: In gewohnt cineastischer Manier der Call of Duty-Reihe wird hier ein bisher unerreicht komplexes Spielerlebnis geboten. Bestreiten Sie zahlreiche Missionen zu Land, zu Wasser und in der Luft mit über drei Dutzend authentischer Waffen der Amerikaner, Italiener, Franzosen und Deutschen. Stürmen Sie zusammen in die Schlacht, während sich über Ihren Köpfen die Kampfflugzeuge der Alliierten und Achsenmächte duellieren, Granaten den Boden erbeben lassen und Kugeln an Ihnen und Ihren Teamkameraden vorbeizischen. Erleben Sie das vom Krieg zerrissene Europa und Afrika, von den sengenden Weiten der tunesischen und libyschen Wüste zum pittoresken, aber tödlichen Hinterland in Italien, Frankreich, Belgien und Deutschland.
Features:
- DIE GESCHICHTE EINES SOLDATEN, DIE TIEFER GEHT ALS ALLES, WAS SIE JE ERLEBT HABEN: Übernehmen Sie die Rolle eines Mitglieds der Big Red One, der heldenhaftesten und am höchsten ausgezeichneten Infanteriedivision Amerikas. Spüren Sie die Kameradschaft einer geschlossenen Kampfeinheit, die das Chaos der Schlacht im Laufe des Spiels zusammenschweißt. Ja, Sie werden Verluste erleiden - doch verlieren dürfen Sie nicht.
- LERNEN SIE IHR TEAM BESSER KENNEN ALS JE ZUVOR: Dank der brandneuen KI und Animation sind Ihre Verbündeten (und Feinde!) um einiges klüger geworden. Ihr Trupp nutzt jetzt die in der Umgebung vorhandene Deckung geschickter aus und taktische Manöver wie Flankieren und den Feind in die Zange nehmen sitzen besser denn je. Hören Sie im kontextaktuellen Gefechtsfunk, wie Ihre Verbündeten auf die Ereignisse auf dem Schlachtfeld reagieren.

game.name: Dora the Explorer: Journey to the Purple Planet (USA) (EN)

locale.title: Dora the Explorer: Journey to the Purple Planet
locale.synopsis: Dora the Explorer: Journey to the Purple Planet is an interactive adventure for kids that closely models the TV show. Dora and Boots are about to embark on an adventure like never before. Join them as they blast off into outer space and travel far into the great unknown. They’ve met five new friends who just happen to be lost space creatures. Now Dora and Boots are going to take an intergalactic-journey to try and help these lost friends find their way back home to the Purple Planet. Play through six unique planetary locations, all offering a familiar Dora playground experience and hunt for lost items such as Turtles, the Ten Little Green Aliens and little robots. The game features meteors, tunnels, jet-packs and collectible space gems and a variety of locations including the Cosmic Canyons, the Dark Bubble Cavern, the Space Satellite and the Glitter Maze.

locale.title: Mortal Kombat: Deception
locale.synopsis: The sixth episode of the violent and visceral fighting series from Midway pounces on the success of MK: Deadly Alliance to tear even more pain and gameplay pleasure out of the Mortal Kombat beast. Destructible environments and break-through walls that lead to other arenas or fatality zones hearken back to the glory days of the series' surprise smash-through stages, while favorite characters from the series such as Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Mileena and the returning Baraka all vie for the chance to choose the fate of the world again.

game.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom (USA) (EN)

locale.title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom
locale.synopsis: In an effort to cause the kind of global mayhem he has always dreamed of, the evil Plankton has set in motion his most diabolical plot ever to take over the world and the fate of Bikini Bottom has been put in the hands (or small tentacles) of three unsuspecting heroes. Put your platform skills to the ultimate test as SpongeBob, Patrick or Sandy Cheeks with an array of insane new maneuvers and power-ups at your disposal! Explore a huge 3D world, comprised of five huge worlds, encounter familiar friends and finally put an end to Plankton's evil scheme!

locale.synopsis: The first multiplayer SpongeBob game, this collection of 30 party-style games allows players to compete for a role in a Bikini Bottom TV show, "The Adventures of Mermaidman & Barnacleboy." Up to four players will "audition" using both competitive and co-operative game play elements to earn roles in a 15-minute, full-fledged episode.

locale.title: Tales of Symphonia
locale.synopsis: In a dying village on Sylvarant, legend has it that a Chosen One will one day appear from among the people, and the land will be reborn. Now, you must enter a cel-shaded world in which you command real-time battles. Execute and combine hundreds of special attacks, magic spells, and combos. Each character grows to suit your fighting style, and the storyline changes based on the characters' relationships. The line between good and evil blurs in this immersive adventure where the fate of two interlocked worlds hangs in the balance.

locale.title: Tales of Symphonia
locale.synopsis:
Der epische Kampf ums Überleben
In einer sterbenden Welt geht die Legende, dass sich eines Tages die Auserwählte aus dem Volk erhebt und die Welt erneuern wird. Die Grenzen zwischen Gut und Böse verwischen in diesem epischen Abenteuer, in welchem das Schicksal zweier Welten auf dem Spiel steht.
Ein Epos wird erzählt: Diese emotionsgeladene Geschichte führt dich für über 80 Stunden auf eine Reise durch die Welt von Tales of Symphonia.
Echtzeitkämpfe in 3D: Ein actionreiches Kampfsystem bietet dir packende Kämpfe mit zahlreichen Magie- und Spezialattacken! Bis zu 4 Spieler können sich Seite an Seite den Gegnern stellen.
Ein Meisterstück in 3D: Betritt die Welt von Tales of Symphonia und genieße Anime-Sequenzen von höchster Qualität. Fühle mit den fantastisch in Szene gesetzten Charakteren, die von dem berühmten Künstler Kosuke Fujishima in Cel-Shade-Optik entworfen wurden.

locale.title: Tales of Symphonia
locale.synopsis: In a dying village on Sylvarant, legend has it that a Chosen One will one day appear from among the people, and the land will be reborn. Now, you must enter a cel-shaded world in which you command real-time battles. Execute and combine hundreds of special attacks, magic spells, and combos. Each character grows to suit your fighting style, and the storyline changes based on the characters' relationships. The line between good and evil blurs in this immersive adventure where the fate of two interlocked worlds hangs in the balance.

locale.title: Tales of Symphonia

locale.title: Tales of Symphonia
locale.synopsis: In a dying village on Sylvarant, legend has it that a Chosen One will one day appear from among the people, and the land will be reborn. Now, you must enter a cel-shaded world in which you command real-time battles. Execute and combine hundreds of special attacks, magic spells, and combos. locale.title: Meet the Robinsons
locale.synopsis: When it comes to licensed games based on popular movies, television shows, or toys, we - along with the rest of the sane gaming community - know pretty much what to expect. The game will borrow from its license, either following the main story directly or taking an "other world" approach to it, and offer the licensed characters in a tried and true gameplay design. So it should go without saying that while Meet the Robinsons is a solid overall attempt at the "movie game" sub-genre, there isn't anything that's really going to blow players away.

locale.title: Harry Potter: Quidditch World Cup
locale.synopsis: Adaptation of the airborne wizard soccer game featured in the Harry Potter books. Two teams comprised of seven players compete on broomsticks in the air. The quaffle, a floating sphere, acts as the equivalent to a soccer ball. Three "chasers" on each team offensively move the quaffle up and down the airborne stadium and attempt to hurl it through one of three existing goals. One "keeper," or goalie, on each end tries to block and return those attempts. Players must also watch out for "bludgers," or hard spheres with minds of their own that try to knock wizards off of their broomsticks, and the "snitch," a tiny golden sphere that pretty much guarantees a win.

locale.title: Harry Potter World Cup
locale.synopsis: Adaptation of the airborne wizard soccer game featured in the Harry Potter books. Two teams comprised of seven players compete on broomsticks in the air. The quaffle, a floating sphere, acts as the equivalent to a soccer ball. locale.title: ハリー・ポッター クイディッチ・ワールドカップ
locale.synopsis:
「ハリー・ポッター クィディッチ・ワールドカップ」では、魔法界きってのスポーツ、「クィディッチ」を本格的に楽しむことができます。雷のような素早いパス、アドレナリンが出るような攻撃、勇敢に立ち向かう防御、スリル満点のチェイス、戦略を考えたシーカーの操作、原作の中の「クィディッチ」をそのままに、チェイサー、ビーター、キーパー、シーカーになってプレイすることができます。
魔法界きっての人気スポーツで、マグル（非魔法族＝人間）界のサッカーやバスケットボールとの共通点はあるものの、ホウキに股がった選手が空中で競うという点でこれらとは大きく異なります。 四つの「生きた」球、１４人の選手(各チーム７人づつ)と、１５メートルもの高さがある金棒の上に付けられた輪が各チームに三個づつあり、これらがゴールポストとなっています。 「チェイサー」(各チーム３名)は「クァッフル」というボールをこの輪の中に投げ入れ、「キーパー」はそれを阻止します。 また、「ブラッジャー」というボールが二個あり、飛行中に出会った者に襲いかかり、ホウキから突き落とそうとしてきます。 「ビーター」は、ブラッジャーから味方を守り、敵に向かうようにバットでブラッジャーの軌道修正を行います。 全部で４つのポジションがありますが、試合を決定づけるのは、「シーカー」です。シーカーが「スニッチ」を捕まえた瞬間に試合は終了となり、１５０点が加算されます。
ゲームはチェイサーを中心に進められ、３人のチェイサーを使ってクァッフルをパスでつなぎ、相手のチェイサーとビーターの攻撃をかわして、ゴールを目指します。 クァッフルの得点は１０点となります。また、プレイヤーはビーターを操作して、相手にブラッジャーを打ち返すこともできます。
■ＧＢＡケーブルを使ってＧＣと接続することによって、ＧＣ版とカードのトレードをすることができます。 ■ＧＢＡケーブルを使ってＧＣと接続することによって、同時に試合を楽しむ（協力プレイ）ことができます。 ■どちらかでクィアディッチ湿原が解除されていれば、スタジアムとして使用することができます。

locale.title: Harry Potter: Coupe du Monde de Quidditch
Harry Potter: Quidditch Copa del Mundo
Harry Potter: La Coppa del Mundo di Quidditch
Madden NFL 2004
locale.synopsis: The 2004 edition of Madden NFL Football includes several changes from the previous year. The new Playmaker Control allows players to quickly change, defensive coverage, and routes before and during the play. Owner mode offers a deeper set of responsibilities such as relocating your team, setting stadium prices (for food, parking, etc.), and stadium building. In-game visuals have been enhanced with broadcast quality effects to create a smooth transition between on-field play and the play-calling interface. Featuring the series' most realistic player models to date, matching tattoos and hairstyles with real-life NFL players.
