locale.title: 伝説のクイズ王決定戦
Lost Kingdoms II
locale.synopsis: Sequel to 2002's lone GameCube card battle RPG, known as Rune in Japan.

locale.title: Rune II: Koruten no Kagi no Himitsu
locale.synopsis: Sequel to 2002's lone GameCube card battle RPG, known as Rune in Japan.

locale.title: ＲＵＮＥ２～コルテンの鍵の秘密～
locale.synopsis: ●ボタンひとつでモンスターが現われ、敵と戦う爽快感！ 召喚獣、ナイト、妖精などバリエーション豊かなモンスターを使いこなし、様々な戦い方が楽しめる『RUNE』シリーズ最新作。 敵の動きや攻撃など全てがリアルタイムに進行する緊張感、カードからモンスターを召喚する爽快感が、様々な新要素を加え前作よりも遥かにグレードアップして登場！

rom.name: Rune II: Koruten no Kagi no Himitsu (Japan) (EN,JA) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: Lost Kingdoms 2
locale.synopsis: Sequel to 2002's lone GameCube card battle RPG, known as Rune in Japan.

locale.title: Red Card 2003
locale.synopsis: With the huge glut of sports titles to choose from out there, it's getting harder and harder to find one that fits ones personal playing tastes. While FIFA reigns supreme as king of the football simulators year in and year out in terms of sales, and Konami's ISS remakes still claim the hardcore crown, less technical fans looking to try their gumption have been begging for a Blitz-style soccer piece for years. Who better to deliver the mustard than the creators of Blitz themselves? Hot of the presses at Midway comes RedCard 20-03.

locale.title: MC Groovz Dance Craze
locale.synopsis: This game lets you show off your dance moves on the included Mad Catz Beat Pad. Arrows passing across the screen indicate when and where you must step on the pad, but you'll need quick thinking and footwork to achieve success. Become a better dancer, exercise, or just show off your talent in both single-player and multiplayer modes. MC Groovz Dance Craze features songs by a variety of artists, including Jessica Simpson, DJ Jazzy Jeff & the Fresh Prince, and KC and the Sunshine Band.

locale.title: Robocop: Aratanaru Kiki
locale.synopsis: Step into the shoes of the half-man, half-human hybrid known as Robocop. Your mission is to uncover a sinister plot involving OCP, local gangsters dealing a deadly new synthetic drug and a powerful cyborg known only as MIND. As the police force's last hope, you must capture, destroy, or arrest hostile characters in a desperate search for clues and evidence. Protect the innocent using six different weapons, various power-ups, and Robocop's multitarget locking system.

locale.title: ロボコップ 新たなる危機
Bratz: Rock Angelz
locale.synopsis: Bratz Rock Angelz will empower fans of the wildly popular line of fashion dolls to explore their own "passion for fashion" in a unique interactive adventure game. Fans will be immersed in the Bratz World as they embark on a series of voyages in search of intriguing stories to inspire and create their very own fashion magazine. Bratz Rock Angelz lets you slip into the shes of any of the four Bratz Girls. You can customize all of the Bratz girls hair, make-up, and outfits as you shop for the latest fashions and travel to exotic International locations to investigate the hottest stories to create your own fashion magazine. Bratz Rock Angelz literally brings the toy franchise to life by letting players chat face-to-face with the Bratz characters in their own world.

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun
locale.synopsis: The epic saga of World War II continues with Medal of Honor Rising Sun. Play as Marine Corporal Joseph Griffin in a far-reaching tale of two brothers trying to prevent Japanese forces from dominating the Pacific. Rising Sun features real-life historical battles like Pearl Harbor and Guadalcanal, over 20 authentic WWII weapons, highly intelligent enemies, and a heroic cast of characters that fight on your side from level to level. Battle other soldiers in ten multiplayer levels and an all-new two-player co-op mode.

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun
locale.synopsis:
Pearl Harbor, 7. Dezember 1941. Um 7 Uhr 53 überfallen japanische Jagdbomber überraschend den U.S. Flottenstützpunkt. Der Krieg im Pazifik beginnt - und damit die erste Episode des Spiels aus der Perspektive des Marine Corporals Joseph Griffin. Kann er seinen Bruder Dale - Protagonist der zweiten Episode - aus japanischer Gefangenschaft befreien? Die Missionen führen zu Original-Kampfschauplätzen wie Henderson Field oder Guadalcanal. Klar, dass es hier zu gefährlichem Feindkontakt mit unerbittlich kämpfenden Japanern kommt! Die wirken dank neuer Grafikengine lebensecht und reagieren realistisch auf das Geschehen - die verbesserte KI lässt grüßen! Im Kampf wählt der Spieler aus 20 Waffen des 2. Weltkriegs - er fightet alleine oder im Deathmatch-, Team- oder Coop-Modus mit mehreren Mitstreitern.
FEATURES:
- 10 Level, die auf wahren Begebenheiten des 2. Weltkriegs beruhen und sich über 5 Hauptmissionen verteilen
- Die offenen Umgebungen erlauben dem Spieler viele verschiedene Wege und Annäherungsmöglichkeiten an den Feind
- 10 Multiplayer-Level für bis zu 4 Spieler in Deathmatch- und Teammodi sowie für 2 Spieler im Coop-Modus sorgen für aufregenden Spielspaß
- Realistische Umgebungswiedergabe, einschließlich Laub-, Wasser- und Wettereffekte
- Der Spieler kann aus mehr als 20 authentischen Waffen aus dem 2. Weltkrieg auswählen
- Der Spieler kann Feindangriffe alleine oder als Teil einer militärischen Einheit ausführen
- Soundeffekte vom preisgekrönten Medal of Honor-Sound-Design-Team von EALA
- Gewährleistete Authentizität durch den technischen Mitarbeiter Capt. Dale Dye

locale.title: Reign of Fire
locale.synopsis: Based on the movie, Reign of Fire lets you play as either a human or a dragon in an epic battle. As a human, you'll take the role of a resistance fighter who's trying to defend the last remaining humans from attack. You must make your way to the site of the sole male dragon using a variety of well-equipped vehicles and high-tech weaponry. As a dragon, you'll take the role of an infant, led by instinct to attack foes, and you'll attempt to eradicate the human race. With your natural fire-breathing and flying abilities, you can destroy everything on the ground or in the skies.

locale.title: Reino de Fogo
locale.synopsis: Baseado no filme, Reino de Fogo permite que você jogue como um humano ou um dragão em uma batalha épica. Como um humano, você assumirá o papel de um lutador da resistência que está tentando defender os últimos humanos restantes do ataque. Você deve fazer o seu caminho para o local do único dragão macho usando uma variedade de veículos bem equipados e armamentos de alta tecnologia. Como um dragão, você assumirá o papel de uma criança, guiada pelo instinto para atacar os inimigos, e tentará erradicar a raça humana. Com suas habilidades naturais de respirar fogo e voar, você pode destruir tudo no solo ou no céu.

locale.title: Reign of Fire

locale.title: Rally Championship
locale.synopsis:
The game is a sequel to the 2001 game Rally Championship Xtreme.
It features simulation rally racing with arcade elements, six different rallies and 33 stages across four different regions, 25 licensed cars and a four-player mode.

locale.title: Rally Championship
locale.synopsis:
The game is a sequel to the 2001 game Rally Championship Xtreme.
It features simulation rally racing with arcade elements, six different rallies and 33 stages across four different regions, 25 licensed cars and a four-player mode.

locale.title: Rally Championship
locale.synopsis:
Le chronomètre est votre ennemi, la vitesse est votre arme.
Principales caractéristiques: * 6 rallyes internationaux de prestige * Plus de 33 étages, dont des épreuves * 25 voitures de rallye licenciées parmi les plus rapides du circuit * 4 modes de jeu * Mode multijoueurs: 2-4 joueurs en écran splitté
caractériques additionnelles: * Simulations de crashs réalistes * Prise en compte des lois de la physique * Effets météo sophistiqués * Véritables techniques de rallye

locale.title: Rally Championship
locale.synopsis:
Straub, dreck und action pur.
Die wichtigsten Eigenschaften: * 6 hoch angesehene, weltweite Rallyes * über 33 Spielstufen, einschließlich äußerst anspruchsvoller Nachtfahrten * 25 der schnellsten lizensierten Rallyeautos * 4 Spielmodi * 2-4 multiplayer, 1 split-screen
Zusätzliche Eigenshaften: * realistische Fahrzeugschäden * realistische Fahrphysik * ausgetüftelte Wettereffekte * echte Rallyetechniken

locale.title: Robotech: Battlecry
locale.synopsis: The Veritech fighter--a mecha capable of fighting on land, in air, and in outer space--is the only weapon you have against the forces of the alien, Zentraedi. As the intrepid fighter pilot Jack Archer, you'll control this powerful robot through more than 40 missions. With each of the 40 Veritech fighters, you can switch from ground to hover and flight modes instantly. Battlecry's combination of fast-paced gameplay, freedom of movement, and dramatic storyline make for a unique combat experience.

locale.title: Robotech: Battlecry

locale.title: Mega Man Network Transmission
locale.synopsis: Mega Man and his Battle Network pal Lan are in trouble again. It's only been a month since the evil WWW terrorist's attempts to hijack an important military satellite was shut down; and yet, Cyberspace is about to be hit by an even more resilient, never-before-seen virus, codenamed "Zero." It's up to you, Lan, and Mega Man to terminate this seemingly impermeable and decidedly relentless new enemy. Collect battle chips, battle enemies, solve puzzles, and uncover secret characters from the Mega Man universe.

locale.title: ロックマンエグゼ トランスミッション
locale.synopsis:
人気シリーズ「ロックマンエグゼ」がゲームキューブに初登場！エグゼ１とエグゼ２との間の、隠されたエピソードを軸にストーリーが展開していく完全オリジナル。エグゼシリーズで好評のバトルチップシステムも当然採用されており、チップの組み合わせによる敵やマップの攻略が重要な鍵となる。戦略性も十分、従来のアクションゲームとは一線を画した面白さ。アクションゲームの決定版！
人気テレビアニメ「ロックマンエグゼ」の声優達がゲームに命を吹き込んだ。臨場感はアニメを超える！？

locale.title: Red Faction II
locale.synopsis: The sequel to Red Faction keeps the same exciting features from the original and introduces a new cast of characters and storyline. In Red Faction II's futuristic setting, humankind is under the rule of an evil dictatorship, and only a group of freedom fighters called Red Faction stands in its way. As a super-soldier alias, you join their cause with an arsenal of high-powered weapons and heavy vehicles. You can even use this firepower on your environment, which can be strategically altered and destroyed.

locale.title: Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc
locale.synopsis: Rayman's universe has fallen into a chaotic world of wicked powers, bizarre characters, and merciless combat. When Globox accidentally swallows the Lord of the Dark Lums, a fanatic army of trigger-happy Hoodlums wreaks total havoc to get their Lord back. Rayman's only chance is to purge the Dark Lum Lord from the manic Globox, scour the lands for new powers, and battle with hordes of Hoodlum soldiers. Even without arms or legs, Rayman can still unleash an arsenal of special powers and fighting moves.

Rayman's only chance is to purge the Dark Lum Lord from the manic Globox, scour the lands for new powers, and battle with hordes of Hoodlum soldiers. Even without arms or legs, Rayman can still unleash an arsenal of special powers and fighting moves.

locale.title: Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc
locale.synopsis:
Mit neuen High-Tech-Kräften und -Gegenständen wie z. B. Shock Rockets, LockJaw, Funky-Boards und anderen coolen Sachen ist Rayman in Bestform. Stürze dich in intensive strategische Kämpfe mit der verrückten Hoodlum-Armee und riesigen Bossen, die sich verwandeln können. Tauche mit John Leguizamo als Globox ein in riesige, atemberaubende Welten voller schräger Witze und ausgeflippter Charaktere und genieße ein skurriles, episches Abenteuer mit einzigartigem Humor.
Eine der aktuelleren Ausgaben der großartigen Rayman-Serie – herrlicher Humor und tolle Musik Ein 3D-Jump 'n' Run das dich bei jedem Schritt aufs Neue fordert Vielfältiger Spielspaß, von verschiedenen Elementen des Jump 'n' Run-Genres bis zu abgefahrenen Arcade-Rennen

locale.title: R: Racing Evolution
locale.synopsis: Not your ordinary racer, R: Racing Evolution features a story mode, in-game radio communications, and authentic licensed cars. R: Racing Evolution chronicles the intense competition and deep rivalries found only within the professional racing circuit. Upgrade and modify your vehicle to compete in five game modes, including Racing Life, Event Challenge, Time Attack, Arcade, and Versus. New features such as the Interactive Driver AI System and in-game radio communications bring players close to the racing action.

game.name: R: Racing Evolution: Life in the Fast Lane (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Rocky
locale.synopsis: Jump into the ring as Rocky Balboa and go head-to-head against 29 tough opponents, including Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, Ivan Drago, and Tommy Gunn. Mickey and company train you from the streets of Philadelphia to the world heavyweight championship bout. Master Rocky's powerful punch combos and fast flurries. Practices your skills in Sparring mode and then test them out in the Knockout Tournament against 15 other players. Based on the movie trilogy, Rocky tests your dedication, skill, and heart through various gameplay modes.

locale.title: Rocky
locale.synopsis: Salte para o ringue como Rocky Balboa e enfrente 29 adversários difíceis, incluindo Apollo Creed, Clubber Lang, Ivan Drago e Tommy Gunn. Mickey e companhia treinam você das ruas da Filadélfia para a luta pelo campeonato mundial de pesos pesados. Os poderosos combos de soco e rajadas rápidas do mestre Rocky. Pratica suas habilidades no modo Sparring e depois teste-as no Torneio Knockout contra 15 outros jogadores. Baseado na trilogia do filme, Rocky testa sua dedicação, habilidade e coração por meio de vários modos de jogo.

locale.title: Pro Rally
locale.synopsis: Pro Rally is a GT / Street Racing game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was released in 2002.

locale.title: Pro Rally
locale.synopsis: Pro Rally is a GT / Street Racing game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was released in 2002.

locale.title: Monopoly: Mezase!! Daifugou Jinsei!!
locale.synopsis: When MONOPOLY Party was first announced as a next-generation title many considered the game would be best suited for one system, GameCube, due to the demographics. But, as with the release of all titles based on large franchises, MONOPOLY Party was a multiplatform release. Coming from Runecraft and Infogrames, MONOPOLY Party Uses a new system that allows players to take turns without waiting and gameplay modes supporting up to four-players the digital version seems to be living up to its cardboard ancestor. MONOPOLY Party will also make use of 3D-themed environments and new properties and tokens not present in the original.

locale.title: モノポリー ～めざせっ！！大富豪人生！～
locale.synopsis:
お待たせいたしました！全世界で販売されている大人気ボードゲーム「モノポリー」がゲームキューブに登場！「モノポリー」だけでなく「トミーオリジナルモノポリー」を加えると、合計13種類！初心者から上級者まで、ファミリーみんなで楽しめるボードゲームです！ トミーアレンジモノポリーは「交渉」ではなく「ミニゲーム」による権利書の奪い合いを行う方式でルールも初心者に分かりやすくファミリーみんなで楽しめるようにしました。また、史上初の３Ｄ画面で楽しい演出や、トミーオリジナル玩具をモチーフにしたミニゲーム、キャラクターエデットなど機能も満載です！
本場モノポリーからトミーアレンジモノポリーまでマップは全部で１３種類が楽しめます！ おなじみ「モノポリー」「モノポリージャパン」から初心者向け「モノポリージュニア」、「トミーアレンジモノポリー」まで合計１３種類！アレンジマップには「東日本」「西日本」「全日本」、「アジア」「ヨーロッパ」「アメリカ」「全世界」、さらに歴史マップとして「江戸」「京都」「東海道53次」とバラティー豊かに楽しめます。
■自分の好きなキャラを作ろう！ 組み合わせパターンはなんと160万通り以上！「男の子」「女の子」から動物キャラクターまで自分の好きなキャラクターがつくれます。
■トミーのおもちゃがミニゲームで登場！ おなじみ「黒ひげ危機一発」「拳闘士」や昔懐かしい「ウォーターゲーム」、大人気の「マイクロペット」まで全５種類のミニゲームで権利書の奪い合いができます！
■1台のコントローラーでも４人で楽しめる！ コントローラが１台だけでも最大４人まで対戦することができます。もちろん別売の専用マルチタップを使用すれば複数のコントローラで対戦できます。
■珍しいトークンが40種以上！ファン必見！ 世界中のモノポリーの中から珍しいトークン(こま)を厳選！ゲーム中で40種類以上のトークンをゲットできます。コレクションすれば「マイトークン」としてゲーム中で使用できます。

locale.title: Lost Kingdoms
locale.synopsis: The first real-time action RPG for the Nintendo GameCube! Lost Kingdoms takes you on a mysterious journey to confront a malevolent force that threatens the future of the world. As the beautiful heroine Princess Katia, you'll go on a quest to rid the land of a deadly menace intent on engulfing the five Kingdoms of Argwyll. During the adventure, you must find and gather the cards that hold the power to unleash incredible creatures into battle, fighting off the endless hordes of monsters that stand in your way.

locale.title: Rune
locale.synopsis: The first real-time action RPG for the Nintendo GameCube! Lost Kingdoms takes you on a mysterious journey to confront a malevolent force that threatens the future of the world. As the beautiful heroine Princess Katia, you'll go on a quest to rid the land of a deadly menace intent on engulfing the five Kingdoms of Argwyll. During the adventure, you must find and gather the cards that hold the power to unleash incredible creatures into battle, fighting off the endless hordes of monsters that stand in your way.

locale.title: ルーン
locale.synopsis:
「異世界」を体感させる、リアルなクリーチャーたちが息づくファンタジー世界。黒い霧の侵略を受ける五王国を舞台に、プレイヤーは一束のカードとともに様々なシチュエーションのマップを探索しながら、破滅に向かう世界の謎を解いていきます。
アーガイル大陸の中央部に位置する王国オランジュ。 その王城は、今まさに危機に陥っていた。 地の底から突如現れた黒い霧が、瞬く間に城を覆い始めたのである。 王女カティア＝ジェルベールは、一人城の宝物庫へと向かっていた。 「王家に生まれし者、その命に代えても守り抜くべし」 父王に託されたその言葉を果たすためである。
遥か昔から宝物庫奥に納められていた小さな箱。 王女がその小さな箱を開いたとき、黒い霧は城の全てを覆い尽くした。
瞬間、王女の手の中には、漆黒の闇の中で光を放つ奇妙な宝石と、一束のカードがあった。運命とも呼べる、使命とともに・・・。
プレイヤーはフィールドを探索しながらエンカウントで戦闘に入ります。すると手持ちのカードから使用するカードがランダムに配られ、それらのカードを瞬時に判断し選んで召喚します。 配られたカードはコントローラーのＡＢＸＹボタンに対応しており、ボタンを押すだけでクリーチャーがカードから飛び出して敵を攻撃します。カードは主人公が向いている方向に放たれるので、プレイヤーはリアルタイムに進行する戦況を見つつ主人公を操作していきます。

locale.title: Lost Kingdoms
locale.synopsis: The first real-time action RPG for the Nintendo GameCube! Lost Kingdoms takes you on a mysterious journey to confront a malevolent force that threatens the future of the world. As the beautiful heroine Princess Katia, you'll go on a quest to rid the land of a deadly menace intent on engulfing the five Kingdoms of Argwyll. During the adventure, you must find and gather the cards that hold the power to unleash incredible creatures into battle, fighting off the endless hordes of monsters that stand in your way.

locale.title: Road Trip: The Arcade Edition
locale.synopsis: Road Trip: Arcade Edition is the GameCube edition in the Road Trip series of racing games. This game allows you to race tiny little toy cars around various oversized environments. Most of the cars resemble super-deformed versions of popular automobiles, but the actual model names are not used. There are dozens of tiny cars to collect. Some of the tracks in this game appear to be scaled to the size of your racer, others take place in oversized real-world environments, like a house or a garden. The usual racing game modes are present, single race, championship, and multi-player. Winning races allows you to purchase upgrades and other vehicles. You can also link this game with Road Trip: Shifting Gears.

locale.title: Road Trip: The Arcade Edition
locale.synopsis: Road Trip: Arcade Edition é a edição GameCube da série Road Trip de jogos de corrida. Este jogo permite que você corra em minúsculos carrinhos de brinquedo em vários ambientes de grandes dimensões. A maioria dos carros lembra versões superdeformadas de automóveis populares, mas os nomes dos modelos reais não são usados. Existem dezenas de carros minúsculos para coletar. Algumas das pistas neste jogo parecem ser dimensionadas para o tamanho do seu piloto, outras ocorrem em ambientes superdimensionados do mundo real, como uma casa ou um jardim. Os modos de jogo de corrida usuais são: corrida única, campeonato e multijogador. As corridas vencedoras permitem que você compre atualizações e outros veículos. Você também pode vincular este jogo a Road Trip: Shifting Gears.

locale.title: City Racer
locale.synopsis: Ignite the engine and power up your Dodge Viper. Strap into real cars like the Dodge Viper as you blaze your way through the competition on the most famous city streets in the world. It?s going to take more than mere speed to beat the competition, its going to take skill. Powerslide, Drift, and sideswipe the competition as you drive with style on your way to the winner's circle.

locale.title: Rugrats: Royal Ransom
locale.synopsis: Angelica has claimed herself Queen of the Play Palace 3000 and has taken the Rugrats' most prized possessions. Now, you'll join Tommy, Chuckie, and the rest of the Rugrats as they wander through magical worlds to reclaim what is rightfully theirs. You can travel to nine fantasy environments--ranging from the snow and the ocean to the jungle and the moon--to discover bonus levels and multiplayer games. The game's various modes will have you flying on a magic carpet, racing a snowman down a mountain on a sled, cruising on craters in a moon buggy, and more.

locale.title: Rugrats: Royal Ransom
locale.synopsis: Angelica has claimed herself Queen of the Play Palace 3000 and has taken the Rugrats' most prized possessions. locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis: The quest for the all-powerful sword known as Soul Edge continues in Soulcalibur II, as old favorites and exciting new characters compete for the right to wield its power. Featuring seven game modes including Arcade, Time Attack, Survival Mode, Versus Mode, and Team Battle. Unlock and use over 200 different weapons and items in the updated Weapon Master Mode. Exclusive console-specific characters are in different versions of Soulcalibur II. The GameCube version boasts Nintendo's Link, of The Legend of Zelda fame.

locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis: The quest for the all-powerful sword known as Soul Edge continues in Soulcalibur II, as old favorites and exciting new characters compete for the right to wield its power. Featuring seven game modes including Arcade, Time Attack, Survival Mode, Versus Mode, and Team Battle. Unlock and use over 200 different weapons and items in the updated Weapon Master Mode. Exclusive console-specific characters are in different versions of Soulcalibur II. The GameCube version boasts Nintendo's Link, of The Legend of Zelda fame.

locale.title: ソウルキャリバーII
locale.synopsis:
武器格闘ゲームの最高峰と謳われたソウルキャリバーから４年… その続編である「ソウルキャリバーII」が重厚な世界観、爽快感溢れる武器での攻防、奥深い戦術等を更に磨き上げ、堂々登場。前作よりグラフィック、サウンド等が格段にクオリティアップし、キャリバーならではの独特な世界観を盛り上げる。また、今作では「ゼルダの伝説」でお馴染みの「リンク」をゲストキャラクターとして迎え、キャリバーワールドに新たな風を吹き込む。その他、家庭用オリジナルキャラクター、２００種類以上の武器を収集する「ウェポンマスターモード」を始めとする、遊び応えのある多彩なモード、迫力のＯＰムービーも搭載し、圧倒的なスケールが楽しめる。
ゲーム業界ＮＯ．１人気キャラクターである「ゼルダの伝説」でお馴染みの「リンク」がゲストキャラクターで登場。人気者リンクが颯爽と華麗にキャリバーキャラクターと闘う姿に注目。

locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis: The quest for the all-powerful sword known as Soul Edge continues in Soulcalibur II, as old favorites and exciting new characters compete for the right to wield its power. Featuring seven game modes including Arcade, Time Attack, Survival Mode, Versus Mode, and Team Battle. Unlock and use over 200 different weapons and items in the updated Weapon Master Mode. Exclusive console-specific characters are in different versions of Soulcalibur II. The GameCube version boasts Nintendo's Link, of The Legend of Zelda fame.

locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis: Astaroth, qui fait tournoyer sa hache, Maxi au nunchaku, Mitsurugi tailladant avec son épée, Ivy qui manie son fouet... la liste des guerriers de Soul Calibur contient certains des personnages les plus coriaces parmi ceux qui honorent les écrans de jeux vidéos de leur présence. Et l'heure est maintenant venue de partir à la recherche de l'épée Soul Edge pour un personnage dont le visage nous est bien familier - le héros du Temps en personne, Link. Soul Calibur II - la suite de l'énorme succès d'arcade - arrive sur Nintendo GameCube dans une adaptation parfaite qui permet de jouer en exclusivité avec la star de The Legend of Zelda. L'histoire (et oui, il ne s'agit pas d'un simple jeu de baston) se déroule globalement de la manière suivante. Quatre années se sont écoulées depuis que les morceaux de l'épée Soul Edge ont été disséminés un peu partout à la surface de la terre. Sa néfaste influence est maintenant en train de retrouver toute sa force. Dans Soul Calibur II, on suit les aventures pleines de combats de ces guerriers qui cherchent l'épée - pour de bonnes ou de moins bonnes raisons. Avec Link, on retrouve 13 guerriers du Soul Calibur original dans l'arène. De plus, il y a de nombreux autres personnages secrets à débloquer, ainsi que de nouveaux venus comme Raphael, Talim et l'étrange Charade. Comme il sied à tout jeu de combat, Soul Calibur II est bourré de modes différents. Vous pouvez éprouver vos talents à l'épée dans le mode Arcade standard, essayer de battre l'ordinateur aussi vite que vous le pouvez dans le mode Time Attack, vaincre autant d'ennemis que possible sans perdre une vie en mode Survival, et associer vos forces à celles d'un copain dans le mode Team Battle. Et ça ne s'arrête pas là. Comme dans le Soul Calibur original, on trouve un mode histoire très long, appelé Weapons Master, dans lequel vous suivez le personnage que vous avez choisi à travers le monde, en gagnant de l'or pour vous acheter de nouveaux objets et de nouvelles armes en route. Link, par exemple, est capable de trouver de nombreux objets bien connus tirés de l'histoire de The Legend of Zelda, comme l'épée Master, le bouclier Hylian, le marteau Megaton et l'épée Biggoron ! Lorsqu'il s'agit de trouver tous les objets des personnages et d'apprendre leurs mouvements (et il y en a beaucoup) on peut dire que Soul Calibur II est une vraie réussite. De plus, avec le mode deux joueurs, vous pourrez vous amuser pendant des mois en affrontant un ami, grâce à tous les personnages aussi réussis que variés. Inutile que les puristes du jeu d'arcade s'inquiètent à l'idée de jouer à Soul Calibur II avec une manette, car Namco a fait du super boulot en transcrivant les mouvements du joystick sur la manette du GCN. En plus, il est possible de modifier toutes les options si vous n'en êtes pas satisfait. Ainsi, si vous rêvez de vivre des combats à l'épée sur votre Nintendo GameCube, ou si vous souhaitez simplement voir un Link adulte affronter Astaroth, alors Soul Calibur II est indispensable.

locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis: Der Axt schwingende Astaroth, der Nunchuk schleudernde Maxi, der Schwerthiebe verteilende Mitsurugi, die Peitschen knallende Ivy...die Liste der Soul Calibur-Kämpfer umfasst einige der härtesten Figuren, die man je auf einem Videospielbildschirm gesehen hat. Und nun ist es an der Zeit, dass ein vertrautes Gesicht die Herausforderung annimmt und nach dem Schwert Soul Edge sucht - der Held der Zeit persönlich, Link. Soul Calibur II - die zweite Folge des Arcade-Bestsellers - kommt auf dem Nintendo GameCube in einer rundum perfekten Konversion an, in der der Star aus The Legend of Zelda als eine exklusiv spielbare Figur erscheint. Die Story (jawohl, dies ist kein gewöhnliches Beat-em-Up) ist ungefähr folgende: Vier Jahre sind vergangen, seit die Bruchstücke des Schwertes Soul Edge über den Globus verstreut worden sind. Und jetzt beginnt das Böse wieder an Einfluss zu gewinnen. Soul Calibur II folgt den Kampfabenteuern der Krieger, die nach dem Schwert suchen - sei es aus den richtigen oder falschen Gründen. So wie Link kehren auch 13 Krieger des originalen Soul Calibur in die Arena zurück. Außerdem gibt es noch viel mehr geheime Figuren, die freigespielt werden können, sowie Neuzugänge wie Raphael, Talim und der mysteriöse Charade. Wie es sich für jedes Beat-em-Up gehört, ist Soul Calibur II voll von Modi. Du kannst im Standard-Arcade-Modus dein Können mit dem Schwert auf die Probe stellen, oder versuche, in Time Attack das Spiel zu so schnell wie möglich schlagen, im Survival-Modus so viele Gegner wie möglich zu besiegen, ohne dabei ein Leben zu verlieren, oder du kannst dich im Team Battle-Modus mit einem Freund verbünden. Und das ist noch lange nicht alles. Wie im originalen Soul Calibur gibt es einen längeren Story-Modus mit dem Titel Weapons Master, in dem du deiner gewählten Figur durch die Welt folgst, Gold verdienst und es dazu benutzt, unterwegs neue Gegenstände und Waffen zu kaufen. Link kann zum Beispiel zahlreiche vertraute Gegenstände aus der Geschichte von The Legend of Zelda finden, wie das Master-Schwert, den Hylian-Schild, den Megaton-Hammer und das Biggoron-Schwert! Es ist das Sammeln der Gegenstände aller Figuren und das Lernen all ihrer Bewegungen (und davon gibt es eine Menge), wodurch sich Soul Calibur II wirklich gegenüber anderen Games auszeichnet. Außerdem sorgt der Zweispieler-Modus dafür, dass du und ein Freund Monate lang spielen werden - aufgrund der unglaublichen Vielfalt ausgewogener Figuren. Arcade-Puristen müssen sich keine Sorgen um das Spielen von Soul Calibur II mit einem Steuerkreuz machen, da Namco perfekte Arbeit geleistet hat, was die Übertragung von Joystick-Bewegungen auf den GCN-Controller angeht. Außerdem kannst du alle Optionen ändern, wenn sie dir nicht passen. Also - wenn es dich nach Schwert klirrender Action auf deinem Nintendo GameCube gelüstet oder du schlicht sehen willst, wie ein erwachsener Link sich Astaroth stellt, dann ist Soul Calibur II ein Muss.

locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis:
Astaroth balanceando el hacha, Maxi luchando con el nunchaku, Mitsurugi cortando con la espada, Ivy azotando con el látigo...
La lista de guerreros de Soul Calibur incluye alguno de los personajes de videojuegos más fuertes que se hayan podido ver en la pantalla. Y ahora ha llegado el momento de que una cara familiar acepte el reto de encontrar la espada Soul Edge. Se trata del Héroe del Tiempo en persona, Link. Soul Calibur II es la continuación del éxito para recreativas, y llega a Nintendo GameCube en una conversión perfecta protagonizada en exclusiva por la estrella de The Legend of Zelda. La historia (sí, has leído bien, esto no es un simple juego de lucha) se resume más o menos así. Han pasado cuatro años desde que los trozos de la espada Soul Edge quedaran repartidos por todo el mundo, pero ahora su malvado influjo está volviendo a recuperar fuerza. En Soul Calibur II siguen las aventuras de los guerreros que intentaron buscar la espada... para bien o para mal. Aparte de Link, 13 guerreros del Soul Calibur original vuelven a empuñar las armas, a los que hay que sumar nuevos luchadores como Raphael, Talim y el misterioso Charade y otros más secretos que tendrás que desbloquear. Tal como corresponde a un juego de lucha, Soul Calibur II viene cargado de diferentes modos de juego. Puedes poner a prueba tu habilidad con la espada en el modo Arcade normal, intentar ser lo más rápido posible en el Time Attack, derrotar a todos los enemigos que puedas sin que te maten en el modo Survival o unir fuerzas con un amigo en la Team Battle. Y esto no es todo. Igual que en el primer Soul Calibur, hay un largo modo historia llamado Weapons Master en el que llevas a tu personaje por todo el planeta mientras va consiguiendo oro y comprando nuevas armas y objetos. Link, por ejemplo, se encontrará por el camino objetos que le serán conocidos de The Legend of Zelda, como la Espada Maestra, el Escudo Hylian, el Martillo Megaton o ¡hasta la Espada Biggoron! Pero el verdadero atractivo de Soul Calibur II está en recoger los objetos de cada personaje y en aprender sus distintos movimientos (que son muchos, la verdad). Además, si juegas con otro amigo en el modo multijugador, os vais a pasar meses enganchados a la pantalla gracias a la inmensa variedad de equilibrados personajes. En cuanto a los controles, los aficionados a los juegos para recreativas no tendrán ningún problema con el mando al jugar a Soul Calibur II, y es que Namco ha hecho un trabajo excepcional para adaptar los movimientos de un joystick al mando de GCN. Y si no te gusta la configuración predeterminada, la podrás cambiar también. En resumen. Si estás sediento de algo de acción con tu Nintendo GameCube y echas de menos luchar con una espada, o si lo único que quieres es ver a un Link adulto derrotar a Astaroth, no te puedes perder Soul Calibur II.

locale.title: SoulCalibur II
locale.synopsis: Oltre la storia del mondo, una leggenda di anime e spade che si tramanda dai tempi dei tempi Sono trascorsi quattro anni da quando Soul Calibur, la spada spirituale, distrusse la demoniaca Soul Edge. Al termine del fatidico scontro Soul Calibur si dissolse nel nulla, mentre i frammenti di Soul Edge si disseminarono per il mondo. Ora il male che continua ad annidarsi in quei frammenti minaccia di avvolgere il mondo nelle tenebre.

locale.title: Power Rangers Dino Thunder
locale.synopsis: The mad scientist Mesagog plans to send the world back into the age of dinosaurs, and only the Dino Thunder Power Rangers can stop him. As one of these heroes, you must stop Mesagog and his Tyrannodrones by using the Dino Zords--powerful creatures that are part dinosaur and part machine. You can switch between Zords in the middle of missions and enhance their abilities with special power-ups. Test your skills in more than 50 different missions and minigames in 10 free-roaming worlds.

locale.title: Power Rangers Dino Thunder
locale.synopsis: The mad scientist Mesagog plans to send the world back into the age of dinosaurs, and only the Dino Thunder Power Rangers can stop him. As one of these heroes, you must stop Mesagog and his Tyrannodrones by using the Dino Zords--powerful creatures that are part dinosaur and part machine. You can switch between Zords in the middle of missions and enhance their abilities with special power-ups. Test your skills in more than 50 different missions and minigames in 10 free-roaming worlds.

locale.title: Power Rangers Dino Thunder

As one of these heroes, you must stop Mesagog and his Tyrannodrones by using the Dino Zords--powerful creatures that are part dinosaur and part machine. You can switch between Zords in the middle of missions and enhance their abilities with special power-ups. Test your skills in more than 50 different missions and minigames in 10 free-roaming worlds.

locale.title: Rave Master
locale.synopsis: Now you can fight as your favorite character from Rave Master, the animated series. In Rave Master, you must defeat your enemies with your arsenal of weapons, attack combos, and special moves. The game features single-player challenges, a story edit mode, and a four-player versus mode. Immerse yourself in the visual and audio effects taken directly from the animated show.

locale.title: Groove Adventure Rave - Fighting Live
locale.synopsis: Now you can fight as your favorite character from Rave Master, the animated series. In Rave Master, you must defeat your enemies with your arsenal of weapons, attack combos, and special moves. The game features single-player challenges, a story edit mode, and a four-player versus mode. Immerse yourself in the visual and audio effects taken directly from the animated show.

locale.title: GROOVE ADVENTURE RAVE 〜ファイティングライブ〜
スーパーロボット大戦 ＧＣ
locale.synopsis:
宇宙世紀００７９。 『地球連邦政府』の指揮のもと、人類が宇宙へ生活の場を移し始めて早や幾月夜…。 複数同時に現れた“人類以外の敵”『機械獣軍団』『恐竜帝国』『ジャーク帝国』『ロボット帝国』、そして地球のみを守ろうとする地球連邦政府の姿勢に反感を持ち、独立戦争を挑んできた『ジオン公国』『統一帝国ギガノス』。 …戦争は緊張事態に入り、数ヶ月が過ぎようとしていた。 …今や、地球は安息の地では無くなった。
「スーパーロボット大戦」シリーズ最新作が遂にニンテンドーゲームキューブに登場！ 登場作品は「絶対無敵ライジンオー」「銀河烈風バクシンガー」「銀河疾風サスライガー」「最強ロボ ダイオージャ」「マジンカイザー（OVA）」がシリーズ初登場！！さらに「蒼き流星SPTレイズナー」や「重戦機エルガイム」などが久々の参戦！ 今、新たなる戦いが始まる。

locale.title: Rayman Arena
locale.synopsis: Rayman Arena puts you in a competitive crash course. As any member of the cast of Rayman 2, you must smoke the competition on challenging race courses or incite a firefight in the battle arena. Take risks, use tricks, and trip up opponents as you sprint, slide, climb, and helicopter through 12 courses in an all-out rush for the checkered flag. Each of the gladiator-style arenas features its own set of power-ups, traps, and special ammo. You can also compete with up to four players in multiplayer action.

locale.title: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun
locale.synopsis: The epic saga of World War II continues with Medal of Honor Rising Sun. Play as Marine Corporal Joseph Griffin in a far-reaching tale of two brothers trying to prevent Japanese forces from dominating the Pacific. Rising Sun features real-life historical battles like Pearl Harbor and Guadalcanal, over 20 authentic WWII weapons, highly intelligent enemies, and a heroic cast of characters that fight on your side from level to level. Battle other soldiers in ten multiplayer levels and an all-new two-player co-op mode.

locale.title: メダル オブ オナー ライジングサン
locale.synopsis:
全世界で600万本もの大ヒットを記録した『メダル オブ オナー～史上最大の作戦～』の続編『メダル オブ オナー ライジングサン』がこの秋、ゲームキューブに初登場！！ 『メダル オブ オナー』シリーズ最新作は、ドイツ軍と連合軍が激しく戦闘を続ける欧州から、日本帝国軍とアメリカ軍の激戦が繰り広げられた太平洋が戦場となります。 今作では、待望のマルチプレイヤーモードが登場。画面分割で最大４名による白熱の対戦が可能になりました。もちろん『メダル オブ オナー～史上最大の作戦～』で好評を博したゲームシステムであるＦＰＳ（ファーストパーソンシューター）はさらなる熟成を重ね、感動と興奮、そして恐怖と衝撃を描き出します。 最大のスケールで贈る本格ミリタリーＦＰＳ『メダル オブ オナー ライジングサン』をご期待ください。
■ 一兵士の目線で描かれる太平洋戦線 時は1941年12月8日。 米軍海兵隊に所属するJoseph Griffin二等兵は、ハワイ真珠湾に停泊する米太平洋艦隊で日本帝国軍の奇襲に遭遇し、大破する戦艦から辛くも脱出に成功する。その後、Griffin二等兵はＯＳＳ（戦略情報局）に所属を移し米南西太平洋方面軍の一員として日本帝国軍への反撃に参加することとなる。
■ 数々の任務を遂行せよ プレイヤーは部隊（米海兵隊、米レンジャー部隊や英ＳＡＳ）を率いて、ガダルカナル島への上陸作戦、フィリピン・ルソン島のアメリカ兵救出作戦等、史実に基づいた任務を遂行していきます。
■ ファーストパーソンシューティング 『メダル オブ オナー ～史上最大の作戦～』で確立されたファーストパーソンシューティングは今回も健在です。
■ 膨大な資料による時代考証 「メダル オブ オナー ライジングサン」の世界は、膨大な歴史的資料、現地取材、太平洋戦争専門の研究者の監修によって構築されます。あのノルマンディ上陸作戦を上回るクオリティで第二次世界大戦当時の戦場を衝撃的に映像化します。 更に、前作『メダル オブ オナー～史上最大の作戦～』のミリタリー・アドバイザーのDale Dye氏も、『メダル オブ オナー ライジングサン』の制作に参加し戦争の真実を突き付けるディティールを再現します。
■ 「メダル オブ オナー」を名乗ることを世界で唯一認められたゲーム作品 今作『メダル オブ オナー ライジングサン』も前作同様、アメリカ軍最高位の勲章である議会名誉勲章(Medal of Honor)の名誉ある作品として、「メダル オブ オナー」を名乗ることを米国名誉勲章協会（Congressional Medal of Honor Society）に認められた唯一のゲーム作品です。
■ ゲームボーイアドバンスとの連動 ゲームキューブ版に接続すると、ゲームボーイアドバンスの画面をレーダーとして使用可能になります。

locale.title: Summoner: A Goddess Reborn
locale.synopsis: As the Queen of Halassar, your fate is written in the Book of the Prophets as the savior of all creation. Millions adore you as the goddess reborn, yet enemies surround you. You must fulfill the prophecy and become the goddess Laharah. But the path you follow remains a mystery that takes the Queen and her companions to the far-flung corners of the world and beyond. To save your people, you must learn to summon godlike powers to let your destiny unfold.

locale.title: SX Superstar
locale.synopsis: In SX Superstar, you can become the star of Supercross racing. Take one of 24 riders from the poorhouse to the penthouse on 20 tracks around the world. On each track, you can grab big air and combo your way to glory against seven other riders. The cash you earn from each race can buy you better bikes, bigger houses, and other rewards. Showcase your new stuff and talent when you race your friends in multiplayer modes.

locale.title: SX Superstar
locale.synopsis: In SX Superstar, you can become the star of Supercross racing. Take one of 24 riders from the poorhouse to the penthouse on 20 tracks around the world. On each track, you can grab big air and combo your way to glory against seven other riders. The cash you earn from each race can buy you better bikes, bigger houses, and other rewards. Showcase your new stuff and talent when you race your friends in multiplayer modes.

locale.title: MLB SlugFest 2004
locale.synopsis: MLB SlugFest 20-04 is the first and only aggressive-style baseball videogame franchise, delivering a proprietary blend of hardcore, lightning-fast, adrenaline-style gameplay combined with key baseball features that will please even the most diehard sports fan. Game features include turbo running, fielding, batting and throwing; new Create-A-Team allows gamers to create their own own All-Star;new customizable instant replay; new Home Run Derby; new pitching 'On Fire'; new authentic batting stances and pitching motions; new expanded and updated rosters, schedules, uniforms and stadiums; and new fantasy stadiums, characters and music, featuring Hoobastank's hit song, "Crawling in the Dark".

locale.title: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly
locale.synopsis: Spyro is back to embark on a new magical journey through Dragon Realms. Gnasty Gnorc and Ripto are back with a plan to steal the Dragonflies of the Dragon Realm. With help from new and old friends, you must avoid obstacles, jump on platforms, ride vehicles, collect gems, and find a way to return the Dragonflies and restore order to the Dragon Realm. Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly features vibrant graphics, lively animations, and new multiple breath weapons. With new powers such as electric and bubble breath, new characters, vehicles including tanks, UFO's, rockets, and surfboards, and over 30 levels of unique environments, Spyro looks to create an unforgettable adventure.

locale.title: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly
locale.synopsis: Spyro is back to embark on a new magical journey through Dragon Realms. Gnasty Gnorc and Ripto are back with a plan to steal the Dragonflies of the Dragon Realm. With help from new and old friends, you must avoid obstacles, jump on platforms, ride vehicles, collect gems, and find a way to return the Dragonflies and restore order to the Dragon Realm. Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly features vibrant graphics, lively animations, and new multiple breath weapons. With new powers such as electric and bubble breath, new characters, vehicles including tanks, UFO's, rockets, and surfboards, and over 30 levels of unique environments, Spyro looks to create an unforgettable adventure.

locale.title: Shrek Extra Large
locale.synopsis: Shrek: Extra Large is packed with 10 levels, twisted fairy tale characters, cutscenes, and action-packed gameplay. Play as your favorite characters from the movie Shrek or as new fairy tale characters. In order to rescue Princess Fiona, you must explore 10 different fairy tale lands and compete in more than 50 missions. Your character can perform a variety of power moves such as punch, kick, grab, super-flatulance, and belch. When you're not in combat, you can watch 15 brand-new cutscenes.

locale.title: Shrek Extra Large
locale.synopsis: Shrek: Extra Large is packed with 10 levels, twisted fairy tale characters, cutscenes, and action-packed gameplay. Play as your favorite characters from the movie Shrek or as new fairy tale characters. In order to rescue Princess Fiona, you must explore 10 different fairy tale lands and compete in more than 50 missions. Your character can perform a variety of power moves such as punch, kick, grab, super-flatulance, and belch. When you're not in combat, you can watch 15 brand-new cutscenes.

locale.title: Star Fox: Adventures
locale.synopsis: Fox McCloud and his animal compatriots are together again in this journey through time. Unfortunately, none of the old crew is willing to hit the front lines with Fox this time around; Peppy has taken a role in mission support, Slippy has gotten into the world of research and development, while Falco has decided to launch a solo career. This means you'll have to go it alone as Fox, battling enemies, flying combative missions, making discoveries, and more. The story begins when McCloud finds a magical staff, compelling him to leave the land of Arwing to travel the world. Eventually, you'll meet up with a loopy new sidekick named Prince Tricky, learn how to ride on the backs of dinosaurs, fight enemies in hand-to-hand combat, and much more. A bold departure from earlier STAR FOX titles, Dinosaur Planet is a mixture of just about every gaming genre imaginable. Whether you're solving puzzles, mastering flight, getting into bare-knuckle brawls, or making allies, you'll have your hands full with this gargantuan title that's only available for the Nintendo Game Cube.

locale.title: Star Fox: Adventures
locale.synopsis: Fox McCloud and his animal compatriots are together again in this journey through time. Unfortunately, none of the old crew is willing to hit the front lines with Fox this time around; Peppy has taken a role in mission support, Slippy has gotten into the world of research and development, while Falco has decided to launch a solo career. locale.title: スターフォックスアドベンチャー
Star Fox: Adventures
locale.synopsis: Fox McCloud and his animal compatriots are together again in this journey through time. Unfortunately, none of the old crew is willing to hit the front lines with Fox this time around; Peppy has taken a role in mission support, Slippy has gotten into the world of research and development, while Falco has decided to launch a solo career. This means you'll have to go it alone as Fox, battling enemies, flying combative missions, making discoveries, and more. The story begins when McCloud finds a magical staff, compelling him to leave the land of Arwing to travel the world. Eventually, you'll meet up with a loopy new sidekick named Prince Tricky, learn how to ride on the backs of dinosaurs, fight enemies in hand-to-hand combat, and much more. A bold departure from earlier STAR FOX titles, Dinosaur Planet is a mixture of just about every gaming genre imaginable. Whether you're solving puzzles, mastering flight, getting into bare-knuckle brawls, or making allies, you'll have your hands full with this gargantuan title that's only available for the Nintendo Game Cube.

locale.title: Star Fox: Adventures
locale.synopsis:
Il saute de sont vaisseau... ... vers de nouvelles aventures!
A la périphérie du système solaire de Lylat, une armée de dinosaures maléfiques a engendré le chaos sur les terres paisibles de Dinosaur Planet. L'avenir s'annonçait bien sombre... jusqu'à la venu de Fox McCloud! C'est la première fois dans sa carrière qu'il quitte son Arwing pour combattre ses ennemis sur la terre ferme, aidé d'un bâton magique dont les pouvoirs se révèleront précieux.
C'est un défi difficile que va devoir relever l'équipe Star Fox. Notre héros affrontera des boss gigantesques, pilotera l'Arwing de mission en mission et explorera de vastes régions primitives. Il aura grand besoin de ses vieux coéquipiers, Slippy et Peppy, ainsi que de l'aide de nouveaux alliés comme le prince Tricky et la mystérieuse Krystal. Le maléfique général Scales est en passe de conquérir Dinosaur Planet et la chasse au renard est ouverte...

locale.title: Star Fox: Adventures
locale.synopsis:
In "Star Fox: Adventures" müssen Nintendo-Fans beweisen, ob sie so schlau wie Füchse sind. In riesigen Fuchsbauten und im endlosen Weltraum ist Fox McCloud unterwegs, um einen von sprechenden Dinosauriern bevölkerten Planeten vor den Schergen des fiesen General Scales zu beschützen. Doch aufgepasst! In Dschungelgebieten, Eislandschaften und verfallenen Tempelruinen begegnen die Spieler gefährlichen Gegnern, die nichts Gutes im Schilde führen. Zusätzlich erschweren einem zahlreiche knifflige Rätsel das Leben.
Fox McCloud kann jedoch auf tatkräftige Unterstützung seiner Freunde bauen: die erfahrenen Kamfpiloten Slippy, Peppy Hare und General Pepper sowie der niedlichen Krystal und der sprechende Triceraptos Prince Tricky begleiten ihn durch das Abenteuer. Ein weiteres Highlight des Spiels ist die bestechende Grafik mit Licht- und Explosionseffekten. Diese grafischen Elemente sind derart beeindruckend, dass man seinen Augen kaum traut. So schlägt und kämpft sich Fox durch gigantische 3D-Welten, die an Detailreichtum kaum zu übertreffen sind. Zudem lassen unzählige grafische Animationen wie das Herumschwirren von Flugsauriern und die Bewegungen des reich texturierten Fox McCloud grenzenlosen Videospielspaß aufkommen und jedes Spielerherz höher schlagen.
FEATURES
- Farbenprächtge Spielwelten wie Eishöhlen und Tempelruinen, aber auch Weltraum-Action à la Lylat Wars, die an Detailreichtum nicht zu überbieten sind
- Neue Charaktere wie Prince Tricky und Krystal
- Einzeln animierte Haare ergeben den faszinierenden Fell-Effekt
- Unzählige knifflige Rätsel

locale.title: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle
locale.synopsis: Sonic and company are back and better than ever in Sonic Adventure 2: Battle. Dr. Eggman is causing trouble once again, and it's up to Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles to stop him. Experience faster action, all-new two-player games, and a branching storyline that lets you choose to save the world as the Hero side, or conquer it as the Dark side. In the single-player mode, you'll go through more than 30 unique stages, which include a forgotten pyramid, an abandoned military base, and a giant space station. And then there's the expanded two-player mode, which features 12 playable characters competing in new head-to-head games.

locale.title: ソニックアドベンチャー２ バトル
locale.synopsis:
世界一有名な青いハリネズミ、ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ。次はどのゲームハードでそのスピードを見せつけてくれるかに全世界が注目する中、ソニックは待ちきれずに音速で走り出し始めた！ 圧倒的なスピードと流れるようなアクション、ダイナミックなカメラワークで全世界のファンを魅了した「ソニックアドベンチャー２」、ソニック生誕１０周年にして待望のニンテンドーゲームキューブ版登場です！ 今年６月２３日で満１０歳を迎えたソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ。１９９１年６月にメガドライブ（ジェネシス）用のソフトとして誕生以来、「ソニック」シリーズは全世界で２５００万本以上を販売する大人気シリーズです。
懲りない悪党・Dr．エッグマンが軍の最高機密兵器を求め、基地へと侵入。どうにか手に入れた兵器の正体は、究極の生命体・「シャドウ」だった…。その頃、ソニックは何故か軍からの逃亡者として逮捕の憂き目に。逃れたソニックの前に現れた「シャドウ」、そして起こる事件と宿敵エッグマンの世界征服宣言。遂に舞台は宇宙へ…。
ゲーム全編を通じてHEROサイドとDARKサイドの二面が存在します。HEROサイドのキャラクターはおなじみのソニック・テイルス・ナックルズ。DARKサイドではDr．エッグマンに加え、謎の黒いハリネズミ「シャドウ・ザ・ヘッジホッグ」、トレジャーハンターで謎のコウモリ女「ルージュ・ザ・バット」が登場。HERO・DARK合わせて６キャラクターがプレイヤーキャラとなり、ストーリーを全く対照的な二方向から進めます。
街や森や遺跡、そして宇宙とソニックと仲間たちの冒険の舞台はバラエティに富んだ３０以上のステージ。この多彩なステージ上に１５０以上のミッションが存在します。もちろん美麗なグラフィックの表現はゲームキューブならでは。
さらに今作ではHEROキャラとDARKキャラの２Ｐ対戦を実現。ソニックｖｓシャドウのハイスピードアクションレース、テイルスｖｓエッグマンのロックオンシューティングバトル、ナックルズｖｓルージュの宝捜し競争、そして各キャラクター対抗カーレースの４タイプの対戦モードで熱く盛り上がろう！ もちろん、ゲームキューブならではの新規要素も盛りだくさん！

locale.title: Jeremy McGrath SuperCross World
locale.synopsis: Jeremy McGrath Supercross World is a Motocross Racing game, developed and published by Acclaim, which was released in 2002.

locale.title: Jeremy McGrath SuperCross World
locale.synopsis: Jeremy McGrath Supercross World is a Motocross Racing game, developed and published by Acclaim, which was released in 2002.

locale.title: Smashing Drive
locale.synopsis: The shortest distance between two points isn't always a straight line... and in Smashing Drive, it's a way of life! Good driving isn't enough!!! When lookin' for a little extra green, a cabbie relies on his knowledge of every neighborhood, street, and alley shortcut. Navigating a serpentine course of oncoming traffic, cart vendors, newsstands, and pedestrians in order to beat the competing hack to the fare's final destination is the challenge. But we've got you covered. Get into the habit of collecting power-ups and finding shortcuts or your only tip will be advice to invest in driving lessons.

locale.title: Shaman King: Soul Fight
locale.synopsis:
A strategy/RPG game for the Gamecube that follows the story of the anime/manga series. Gameplay runs through an Adventure mode RPG with a number of minigames (where your Shaman battles others with the powers he's collected), plus Shaman Fight mode, Shaman King training mode, and Survival and Tutorial extra modes.
The game features colorful cel-shaded graphics and strategy/fighting style gameplay. During a battle, either a rock, paper, or scissors based attack can be chosen to fight with, and the final outcome in the attack sequence is determined based on the type of attacks chosen. During the fights, energy crystals will be saved up for each successful attack. These activate cinematic special attacks unique to the character, depending on the number of crystals gained.(Max.3) Full voice acting is also featured during Story Mode, directly from the Japanese version anime. Story Mode is played out asYoh Asakura through the anime's story line. Shaman Fight Mode is a free-play fight option, Shaman King Mode is a survival mode option where you choose three characters out of eight to fight through 4 random battles, and level them up for play in one of the Shaman Fight modes. The 4th battle is always Hao Asakura in this mode.

locale.title: シャーマンキング ソウルファイト
MLB SlugFest 2003
locale.synopsis: MLB SlugFest 20-03 uses advanced motion capture technology to clearly detail each player's facial expressions and reactions. The animations are so precise, gamers can view players on the field chewing gum, talking to one another and cheering for their teammates. While at the plate, gamers can dig in and unleash a mammoth blast clear out of the park. To add to the authentic baseball delivered in MLB SlugFest 20-03, five-time MLB All-Star Alex Rodriguez will appear on the package cover and other advertising materials for the game. Entering his seventh full Major League Baseball season, the Texas Rangers shortstop also consulted with the development team on the game. Also stepping up to the plate is Roadrunner Records' recording act Dry Kill Logic, which recorded a hard-rockin', new millenium version of 'Take Me Out to the Ball Game' to accompany the game's aggressive attitude and extreme-style play.

locale.title: SpyHunter
locale.synopsis: The evil NOSTRA Corporation prepares to unleash havoc on the world, and only the SpyHunter is equipped to stop them. Get behind the wheel of the powerful G-6155 Interceptor, a vehicle that can transform into a boat, Jet Ski, or motorcycle. With an arsenal of both offensive and defensive weapons, you must elude NOSTRA spies, henchmen, and assassins at any cost. Hordes of air, ground, and water enemies pursue you as you try to save the world from the mind of a madman.

locale.title: The Scorpion King: Rise of the Akkadian
locale.synopsis: In an original story inspired by the blockbuster film, The Scorpion King, the Akkadians were a tribe of warriors unparalleled in the deadly art of assassination. Their skill is put to the ultimate test when a dark lord named Magus is determined to harness the powers of the Underworld. Play as The Scorpion King using all of your wits, training, and weapons to defeat Magus before he unleashes an army of bloodthirsty creatures on mankind.

locale.title: Spider-Man
locale.synopsis: Spider bites can sometimes turn you into a superhero, as in the case of Peter Parker in Spider-Man: The Movie. Assume the role of Peter, a good-hearted teenager bitten by a genetically engineered spider, which gives him muscles, incredible strength, and spider-like abilities. You'll have to learn how to control your powers including Spider Sense, web-slinging, and wall crawling, and the all-new aerial combat moves. The world's toughest villains, including Shocker, Vulture, and the Green Goblin will all be after you. Are you up for the challenge?

locale.title: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle
locale.synopsis: Sonic and company are back and better than ever in Sonic Adventure 2: Battle. Dr. Eggman is causing trouble once again, and it's up to Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles to stop him. Experience faster action, all-new two-player games, and a branching storyline that lets you choose to save the world as the Hero side, or conquer it as the Dark side. In the single-player mode, you'll go through more than 30 unique stages, which include a forgotten pyramid, an abandoned military base, and a giant space station. And then there's the expanded two-player mode, which features 12 playable characters competing in new head-to-head games.

locale.title: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle
locale.synopsis: Sonic and company are back and better than ever in Sonic Adventure 2: Battle. Dr. Eggman is causing trouble once again, and it's up to Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles to stop him. Experience faster action, all-new two-player games, and a branching storyline that lets you choose to save the world as the Hero side, or conquer it as the Dark side. In the single-player mode, you'll go through more than 30 unique stages, which include a forgotten pyramid, an abandoned military base, and a giant space station. And then there's the expanded two-player mode, which features 12 playable characters competing in new head-to-head games.

locale.title: Sonic Adventure 2: Battle
locale.synopsis: Schon wieder gibt es eine Bedrohung für die Menschheit, noch viel mächtiger als der schändliche Dr. Eggman, ein Unsterblicher und fähig, Sonic endgültig zu schlagen. Sein Name... Shadow, the hedgehog! Mit Hilfe seiner finsteren Verbündeten richtet unser Sonic-Ebenbild eine unvorstellbare Zerstörung an - hat Sonic letztlich seinen Meister gefunden? Dieses spannendste aller Sonic-Abenteuer zeichnet sich durch eine Reihe von Spielverbesserungen aus, die speziell für die NINTENDO GAMECUBE-Konsole entwickelt wurden. Du allein entscheidest über das Ergebnis: Entweder du verbündest dich mit der DARK-Seite und eroberst die Welt oder du schließt dich mit Sonic zusammen, besiegst diese neue Herrschaft des Bösen und stellst den Frieden in der Galaxis wieder her... * 30 Action-Zonen mit über 50 Aufträgen. * Verbesserter Multiplayer-Modus mit neuen Kampfplätzen und klassischen Kart-Rennen. * 12 auswählbare Charaktere, einschließlich der Neulinge Metal Sonic, Amy, Chaos Zero und der ulkige Chao Walker. * Verbesserter Chao-Modus mit tollen neuen Mini-Spielen sowie ein exklusives Link-up Feature mit dem Game Boy Advance.

locale.title: Sonic Mega Collection
locale.synopsis:
7 Sonic HIts, Unlockable games & Secrets, Bonus material includes comic book covers, rare artwork, & more.
Games list: * Sonic The Hedgehog * Sonic The Hedgehog 2 * Sonic The Hedgehog 3 * Sonic & Knuckles * Blue Sphere (Unlockable) * Knuckles the Echina in Sonic The Hedgehog 2 (Unlockable) * Sonic 3: Sonic The Hedgehog & Knuckles (Unlockable) * Sonic 3D Blast * Sonic Spinball * Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine * Flicky (Unlockable) * Ristar (Unlockable)

locale.title: Sonic Mega Collection
locale.synopsis:
7 Sonic HIts, Unlockable games & Secrets, Bonus material includes comic book covers, rare artwork, & more.

locale.title: ソニック メガコレクション
locale.synopsis: ユーザーの皆様の熱い支持を頂いたゲームキューブ「ソニックアドベンチャー2バトル」は、おかげさまをもちまして全世界100万本の出荷を達成いたしました。 感謝の意を込めましてゲームキューブでお贈りする「ソニック メガコレクション」は、名作の誉れ高い過去のソニックタイトルの集大成。アドベンチャーシリーズでソニックを知った人も、これ一本でソニックシリーズが遊び尽くせるおトクなソフトとなっています。 日本未発売の作品も収録されているから、昔からのソニックファンも見逃せません。 さらに、ソニックに関するお宝映像も…！ 誕生から11年、常にアクションゲームのエッジを音速で駆け抜けてきたソニック。今再びそのスピードを感じてください！ 収録タイトルは次のとおりです。 「ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ」：メガドライブ アクション ９１年７月２６日発売 「ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ２」：メガドライブ アクション ９２年１１月２１日発売 「ソニックスピンボール」：メガドライブ ピンボール ９３年１２月１０日発売 「ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ３」：メガドライブ アクション ９４年５月２７日発売 「ソニック＆ナックルズ」：メガドライブ アクション ９４年１０月１８日発売 「ドクターエッグマンのミーンビーンマシーン」：ジェネシス ※日本未発売。 「ソニック３Ｄブラスト」：ジェネシス ※日本では「ソニック３Ｄフリッキ－アイランド」として９９年１０月１４日にセガサターンで発売されています。

locale.title: Sonic Mega Collection
locale.synopsis:
Sonic has appeared in many games in the last decade, and now you can relive seven of them from Sonic Mega Collection. This compilation includes the first three Sonic the Hedgehog titles, plus Sonic & Knuckles, Sonic 3D Flickies' Island, Sonic the Hedgehog Spinball, and Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine. With additional content such as character illustrations, movies, and comic-book covers, this game celebrates Sonic's long career and introduces his world to new generation of gamers.
Games list: * Sonic The Hedgehog * Sonic The Hedgehog 2 * Sonic The Hedgehog 3 * Sonic & Knuckles * Blue Sphere (Unlockable) * Knuckles the Echina in Sonic The Hedgehog 2 (Unlockable) * Sonic 3 & Knuckles (Unlockable) * Sonic 3D Blast * Sonic Spinball * Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine * Flicky (Unlockable) * Ristar (Unlockable)

locale.title: Sonic Mega Collection
locale.synopsis:
7 hits Sonic, Jeux & Secrets déblocable, les bonus matériel comprennent des couvertures de bandes dessinées, des Art Works rares, et plus encore.
Liste des jeux: * Sonic The Hedgehog * Sonic The Hedgehog 2 * Sonic The Hedgehog 3 * Sonic & Knuckles * Blue Sphere (déblocable) * Knuckles the Echina in Sonic The Hedgehog 2 (déblocable) * Sonic 3: Sonic The Hedgehog & Knuckles (déblocable) * Sonic 3D Blast * Sonic Spinball * Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine * Flicky (déblocable) * Ristar (déblocable)

locale.title: The Simpsons: Road Rage
locale.synopsis: Mr. Burns is up to his greedy ways in Simpsons Road Rage, purchasing Springfield's busses and jacking up the fares. Now, Springfield residents must turn their cars into cabs and work the streets. Hopefully, making enough money to buy back the busses before the clock runs out. Choose from over 30 of your favorite Simpsons characters and brave the jam-packed streets of six huge levels, performing big-air and powerslide stunts. Compete for passengers in two-player, split screen action. Go on a road rage, Simpsons-style.

locale.title: The Simpsons: Road Rage

locale.title: The Simpsons: Road Rage
locale.synopsis:
Mr. Burns benimmt sich wie immer und schikaniert ganz Springfield, indem er alle Busse aufkauft und horrende Fahrpreise einführt. Da müssen sich die Bewohner von Springfield schnell was einfallen lassen und ihre Autos zu Taxen umfunktionieren, um so viel Geld zu verdienen, dass sie die Busse schließlich zurückkaufen können. Keine Zeit für Donuts, Homer!
FEATURES:
- Über 30 coole Charaktere - 6 riesige Welten - Mit den Original-Stimmen aus der Serie - Spiel über geteilten Bildschirm für zwei Spieler

game.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman (USA) (EN)

locale.title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman
locale.synopsis:
Jumping Jellyfish! It's SpongeBob vs. The Flying Dutchman. While cruising through Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob discovers a series of treasure chests covered with WARNING signs. Ignoring the signs, SpongeBob opens the chests, only to discover he has released the imprisoned Flying Dutchman! The Dutchman is furious that he was disturbed, and now wants to make SpongeBob and his friends part of his ghostly crew, so he flies away to cause mischief throughout Bikini Bottom. SpongeBob must now seek advice from Squidward, who owns a book about ghostly lore. SpongeBob learns that the only way to stop the Dutchman's wicked plans is to find the lost treasures hidden throughout Bikini Bottom.
* Sea-slapping fun in 11 different levels and 5 ocean-sized story chapters * Interact with your favorite characters like Sandy Cheeks, Squidward and Patrick Starfish * Collect gold coins to unlock multiple mini-games

locale.title: Smuggler's Run: Warzones
locale.synopsis: Exotic Imports, an international delivery service, calls you back for another round of brutal courier action in Smuggler's Run: Warzones. This entry in the Smuggler's Run series lets you work for an elite band of smugglers. The game boasts a vehicle update--with the new hoverbike--plus new levels, new four-player multiplayer modes, and new countermeasures to thwart would-be pursuers and enemies. Now, make the drop, hit the nitro boost, and get across the border before all hell breaks loose.

locale.title: Smuggler's Run: Warzones
locale.synopsis: Exotic Imports, an international delivery service, calls you back for another round of brutal courier action in Smuggler's Run: Warzones. This entry in the Smuggler's Run series lets you work for an elite band of smugglers. The game boasts a vehicle update--with the new hoverbike--plus new levels, new four-player multiplayer modes, and new countermeasures to thwart would-be pursuers and enemies. Now, make the drop, hit the nitro boost, and get across the border before all hell breaks loose.

locale.title: Sega Soccer Slam
locale.synopsis: Hidden away in underground leagues and counter-culture clubs, Sega introduces a brutal new brand of soccer. Played by thugs who kick ass on and off the field, participants opt to watch their backs and let the crowds watch the game. Since nastiness supplants sportsmanship in this 3-on-3 hybrid of the world's most popular sport, the rulebook is only good as a splint for broken bones. Given its rule-bending recipe, Soccer Slam is an exciting and original game, in which individual achievement prevails over teamwork while gameplay focuses on speed, skill, and aggression. This means that players don't just take on the competition, they take 'em out!

locale.title: Sega Soccer Slam
locale.synopsis: Hidden away in underground leagues and counter-culture clubs, Sega introduces a brutal new brand of soccer. Played by thugs who kick ass on and off the field, participants opt to watch their backs and let the crowds watch the game. This means that players don't just take on the competition, they take 'em out!

locale.title: セガ サッカースラム
locale.synopsis:
従来のサッカーに食傷気味のアナタに贈る、それが「セガサッカースラム」だ！スライディング、チョップ、パンチなんでもＯＫ！このフィールド内ではイエローカードもレッドカードもナシ！とにかくボールを奪ってシュートを決めよう！所狭しとフィールドを駆け回るプレイヤーたちは、総勢18名。各チーム３名６チームの個性豊かな面々が待っているぞ。チームの属性によって、異なった特殊攻撃ができるぞ。また、試合の成績によっては新たなチーム・選手が登場するかも…？最大４人対戦ができるので、腕を磨いて自分だけの技を極めよう！
【スポットライトシュート】 試合中、ランダムに対戦中のチームのトレードマーク型のスポットライトが登場するぞ。自分のチームと同じ型のスポットが来たら、迷わずスポットライトの下に入りシュートだ。見ている方もビックリの必殺・スポットライトシュートが撃てるのだ。
【スポットライトシュート】 試合中、ランダムに対戦中のチームのトレードマーク型のスポットライトが登場するぞ。自分のチームと同じ型のスポットが来たら、迷わずスポットライトの下に入りシュートだ。見ている方もビックリの必殺・スポットライトシュートが撃てるのだ。
最大４人で楽しめるエキシビジョンモード、６チームで戦うトーナメントモードはじめ、クエストモード、プラクティスモードを搭載。クエストモードは進めていくに従い、アイテムの購入をしてチームをパワーアップさせることができます。また、ゲーム中の視点は好みに合わせて設定することができ、感覚的にも戦略的にも異なった雰囲気で楽しめます。その他、特徴豊かなスタジアム・自由な天候設定等も指定可能です。

locale.title: Sega Soccer Slam
locale.synopsis: Hidden away in underground leagues and counter-culture clubs, Sega introduces a brutal new brand of soccer. Played by thugs who kick ass on and off the field, participants opt to watch their backs and let the crowds watch the game. Since nastiness supplants sportsmanship in this 3-on-3 hybrid of the world's most popular sport, the rulebook is only good as a splint for broken bones. Given its rule-bending recipe, Soccer Slam is an exciting and original game, in which individual achievement prevails over teamwork while gameplay focuses on speed, skill, and aggression. This means that players don't just take on the competition, they take 'em out!

locale.title: Sega Soccer Slam
locale.synopsis:
Drei gegen Drei und keine Regeln. Denn wie steht es schon in der Bibel: Auge um Auge, Zahn um Zahn. Schlagen Sie mit Ihrem Team die Gegenspieler im wahrsten Sinne schon vor der Ballannahme, und schießen Sie in einem Spiel mehr Tore als sonst an einem ganzen Bundesliga-Spieltag fallen. Hier stört kein Schiedsrichter, hier gibt es kein Seitenaus. Finden Sie den Lichtkegel Gottes und holen Sie in ihm im Matrix-Stil zum Todesschuss aus... eine Mordsgaudi und ein Ausnahmetitel für besonders lange Zockerabende in geselliger Runde.
FEATURES:
- Acht verschiedene Teams mit drei individuellen, total abgedrehten Charakteren, die in ihren Fähigkeiten ausgebaut werden können
- Zahlreiche verschiedene Arenen, die teilweise erst freigespielt werden müssen
- Fünf verschiedene Game-Modi, vom Worldcup über Quick Game bis Deep Quest-Modus
- Special-Moves und Schlägereien auf dem Spielfeld, freispielbare Goodies und Extras
- Intuitive Steuerung, die auch von Anfängern schnell erlernt wird
- Genialer Multiplayer-Modus für bis zu vier Spieler gleichzeitig

locale.title: SSX Tricky
locale.synopsis: SSX Tricky launches you into a world of monster air, intense tracks, and death-defying tricks. Six all-new competitors plus six riders from the original SSX make up the circuit. Compete in the World Circuit, go head-to-head in the Showoff versions of nine courses on the World Circuit, or just practice in Free Ride. With all-new Garibaldi and Valdez courses, you'll have plenty of huge cliff drops to catch big air and pull off Uber tricks.

locale.title: SSX Tricky
locale.synopsis: SSX Tricky launches you into a world of monster air, intense tracks, and death-defying tricks. Six all-new competitors plus six riders from the original SSX make up the circuit. Compete in the World Circuit, go head-to-head in the Showoff versions of nine courses on the World Circuit, or just practice in Free Ride. With all-new Garibaldi and Valdez courses, you'll have plenty of huge cliff drops to catch big air and pull off Uber tricks.

locale.title: SSX トリッキー
locale.synopsis:
「SSX トリッキー」は、スノーボードゲームという形を取っていますが、実際にプレイした人からはアクションゲームとして賞賛されています。 操作性の良さ、プレイすればするほどに深みを感じさせる面白さなど、アクションゲームとして不可欠な要素を押さえた上で、このゲームならではの、強烈なスピード感、浮遊感、爽快感がプレイヤーの感覚を大いに刺激します。 プレイすればするほど、うまくなる。うまくなればなるほど、難しくなる。やみつきになること請け合いの「SSX トリッキー」、是非一度、プレイしてみてください。
『SSX トリッキー』ではプレイヤーは、スノボライダーとして全７コースのワールドサーキットに挑戦し、世界チャンピオンを目指します。各コースにはゴールへの到達順位を競う「レースモード」と技の点数を競う「ショーオフ」という、性格の異なる２つのモードがあります。コースを攻略するごとにキャラクターのレベルアップが可能となったり、より高性能のボードが使用可能になるなど、ＲＰＧ要素もたっぷり詰まっています。山全体がコース化されているこのゲームでは、雪壁や防護柵、破壊可能な看板などの向こう側に、無数の隠しコースやジャンプポイントなどが設定されており、ゲーム性満点です。
「SSX トリッキー」では、キャラクターが使用可能なトリックを、トリックブックの中に収録しています。レース中に実行したトリックは登録され、ボーナスとして新コスチュームが使用可能になります。ポイント振り分けによるキャラクターの育成、レース制覇による新ボードの獲得など、プレイヤーのやり込みに、思いっきり応えます。

locale.title: SSX Tricky
locale.synopsis: SSX Tricky launches you into a world of monster air, intense tracks, and death-defying tricks. Six all-new competitors plus six riders from the original SSX make up the circuit. Compete in the World Circuit, go head-to-head in the Showoff versions of nine courses on the World Circuit, or just practice in Free Ride. With all-new Garibaldi and Valdez courses, you'll have plenty of huge cliff drops to catch big air and pull off Uber tricks.

locale.title: Superman: Shadow of Apokolips
locale.synopsis: The man of steel faces his greatest challenge yet in Superman: Shadow of Apokolips. Darkseid, the most evil being in the galaxy, has enlisted the aid of Lex Luthor in his quest to destroy Superman and take over the world. As Superman, you must stop Luthor's army of Inter-Bot robots and the fearsome Metallo, who is fresh out of Strykers Island Prison. Use all of Superman's powers through 14 enormous levels, featuring epic battles with legendary villains, including Livewire and Parasite. The fate of the planet lies in your hands.

locale.title: Superman: Shadow of Apokolips
locale.synopsis: The man of steel faces his greatest challenge yet in Superman: Shadow of Apokolips. Darkseid, the most evil being in the galaxy, has enlisted the aid of Lex Luthor in his quest to destroy Superman and take over the world. As Superman, you must stop Luthor's army of Inter-Bot robots and the fearsome Metallo, who is fresh out of Strykers Island Prison. Use all of Superman's powers through 14 enormous levels, featuring epic battles with legendary villains, including Livewire and Parasite. The fate of the planet lies in your hands.

locale.title: MX Superfly featuring Ricky Carmichael
locale.synopsis: With professional riders to choose from and authentic courses modeled using actual satellite data players will be able to race, pull amazing tricks, and compete for fame in freestyle mode or open terrain.

locale.title: MX Superfly featuring Ricky Carmichael

game.name: Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader
locale.synopsis: In Star Wars Rogue Squadron II you get the chance to jump into the cockpit of an X-wing and join Luke Skywalker and the Star Wars galaxy's most daring pilots as they return to face off against the Empire. As in the original hit game for N64, you'll relive favorite Star Wars battles including the perilous Death Star trench run, a daring space attack on a Star Destroyer and the legendary battle on the ice planet Hoth. Rogue Leader features stunning, movie like visuals and immerses players in an intense action-arcade experience. Aerial conflict takes place in a variety of craft such as the legendary X-wing, A-wing, and B-wing. For the first time, the game also features on-foot ground combat in missions directly based on or inspired by the original movie trilogy.

locale.title: Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader
locale.synopsis:
Es war einmal vor langer Zeit in einer weit, weit entfernten Galaxis. Der epische Kampf zwischen dem galaktischen Imperium und der Rebellenallianz tobte in zahlreichen Schlachten. Bei Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader für den Nintendo GameCube kannst du neben Luke Skywalker und Wedge Antilles ins Cockpit steigen, um einige der glorreichsten Augenblicke der Rebellenallianz nachzuerleben.
Das Spiel wurde von Factor 5 in Zusammenarbeit mit LucasArts entwickelt und verfügt über elf Hauptmissionen mit prächtiger Grafik und erstklassigem Sound. Einige dieser Missionen wurden klassischen Star Wars-Szenen entnommen, etwa der Angriff auf den Todesstern und die Schlacht von Hoth. Andere Missionen, wie der überfall auf Bespin und der Vergeltungsschlag auf Kothlis, drehen sich um weniger berühmte Heldentaten der Rebellenallianz, von denen noch nicht in Kino und Fernsehen berichtet wurde.
Es gibt keine Bodenoperationen wie in Battle for Naboo auf dem N64, doch du wirst eine Vielzahl von Luft-Boden- und Luft-Luft-Kampfsequenzen entdecken. Die Missionen umfassen Überfälle auf Einrichtungen des Imperiums, waghalsige Rettungseinsätze, getarnte Operationen und mehr. Gelegentlich werden die Missionsziele mitten im Einsatz geändert, und dir wird geraten, schnellstens das Schiff zu wechseln. Zu Anfang stehen dir nur zwei Aufträge zur Wahl: Eine Trainingsmission auf Tatooine und die berühmte Angriffssequenz auf den Todesstern. Um neue Missionen freizuschalten, musst du die aktuelle Mission abschließen.
Wenn du dich bei den 11 Hauptmissionen gut schlägst, kannst du dir Orden und Punkte verdienen, welche Bonusmissionen freischalten. Im Verlauf des Spiels steuerst du X-Wings, A-Wings, B-Wings, Snow Speeder und andere bekannte Schiffe. Die Spielsteuerung ist exzellent, außerdem hat Factor 5 ein paar neue Spielmerkmale eingebaut, die das Spiel auf eine ganz neue Stufe heben. Dazu gehärt etwa die Möglichkeit, deinen Flügelleuten bestimmte Befehle zu geben, indem du in verschiedene Richtungen auf dem digitalen Steuerkreuz drückst. Benutze den C-Stick, um die Kamera um dein Schiff zu schwenken, oder drücke den Y-Knopf, um einen Zielcomputer zu aktivieren.
Dieser erleichtert es dir, gegnerische Kräfte aufzuspüren, denn wichtige Ziele werden gelb dargestellt, während gewöhnliche Gegner violett sind. Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader verfügt nicht nur über einen packenden Spielablauf, sondern auch über sensationelle Grafik und gigantischen Sound. Es ist schwer zu glauben, doch die 3D-Modelle der Raumschiffe im Spiel sind ebenso detailliert wie die von Industrial Light and Magic im Filmmaterial für die Special Edition von Star Wars. Auf dem Nintendo GameCube geschieht das Rendering jedoch in Echtzeit.
Wofür ILM Stunden gebraucht hat, das macht der Nintendo GameCube 60-mal in der Sekunde. Wenn ein Spiel der ersten Generation bereits so gut aussieht, sind wir äußerst gespannt, wie Nintendo GameCube-Spiele erst in ein oder zwei Jahren aussehen werden. Auch den Sound kann man sich kaum besser vorstellen. Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader verfügt dank der Pro Logic II-Soundtechnik der Dolby Laboratories über eine großartige Musik und fantastische Soundeffekte.
Es ist das erste interaktive Spiel, das Dolby Pro Logic II benutzt, daher kann der Spieler erstmals einen voll interaktiven, unkomprimierten, Fünfkanal-Echtzeit-Surroundsound aus einer Analogquelle genießen. Von den kleinen Details (wie dem Auf- und Untergang von Tatooines beiden Sonnen) bis zum Gesamtkonzept ist Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader ein klasse gemachtes Spiel, das du dir nicht entgehen lassen solltest.

locale.title: スター・ウォーズ ローグ スコードロン２
locale.synopsis: 『スター・ウォーズ ローグ スコードロン２』は、映画「スター・ウォーズ」、「スター・ウォーズ：帝国の逆襲」、「スター・ウォーズ：ジェダイの復讐」の３部作を驚異のグラフィックで余すところ無く再現したコンバットシューティングゲーム最新作です。 プレイヤーは、反乱同盟軍精鋭部隊“ローグ中隊”の若きリーダー、ルーク・スカイウォーカーとして、“ヤヴィン”、“ホス”、“エンドア”での歴史的な戦いを中心に、数々の困難なミッションに挑まなければなりません。そして、プレイヤーは反乱同盟軍をこの大戦で勝利させてください。 映画「スター・ウォーズ」の映像と見間違えるようなグラフィックで、手に汗握るドッグファイトシーンに参加ができる本作は、スター・ウォーズファンが夢に描いていたゲームだといえるでしょう。 「フォースと共にあらんことを」

locale.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
locale.synopsis: Star Wars: The Clone Wars begins where Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones ends. As Jedi Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu, or Obi-Wan Kenobi, you lead the Republic Army in the greatest battles of the epic Clone Wars. Your mission is to stop the Separatists from reassembling an ancient Sith weapon of mass annihilation. Then battle for survival in a variety of multiplayer games with up to four players, with Deathmatch, King-of-the-Hill, and even strategic Conquest games. And engage over 30 unique combat units as you wage war across six worlds in the galaxy's most unforgettable conflict.

locale.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
locale.synopsis: Dort wo Episode II endet, beginnt dein Kampf. Tauche ein in die Hitze der Schlacht und sei Teil des größten Konflikts, den die Galaxis je erlebt hat. Führe die Armee der Republik in die Schlachten der großen Klonkriege und schlüpfe in die Rolle von Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu und Obi-Wan Kenobi. Deine Mission: Verhindere den WIederaufbau einer anitken Sith-Waffe zur Massenvernichtung durch die Separatisten! * Sechzehn Einzelspieler-Missionen in sechs weitläufigen Welten des Star Wars-Universums. * Missionen beinhalten sowohl intensive Nahkampfszenen als auch Schlachten gigantischen Ausmaßes. * Steuere mehr als fünf einzigartige Fahrzeuge (Kanonenboot, Speederbike, Kampfpanzer, Assault-Walker und sogar einen Maru) gegen mehr als 30 verschiedene Kampfeinheiten. * Vier völlig verschiedene Multiplayer-Modi: teambasierte Strategie, Deathmatch, King-of-the-hill und Kooperation.

locale.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
locale.synopsis: Star Wars: The Clone Wars begins where Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones ends. As Jedi Anakin Skywalker, Mace Windu, or Obi-Wan Kenobi, you lead the Republic Army in the greatest battles of the epic Clone Wars. locale.title: スター・ウォーズ クローン戦争
locale.synopsis:
「スター・ウォーズ クローン戦争」は、“エピソード２”の世界を疑似体験できる、３Ｄシューティングゲームです。映画に出てきた兵器や重要人物のサイドストーリーだけではなく、映画の跡の展開がどうなったかという、スター・ウォーズファンなら興味をそそられずにはいられない展開を含んだ、“エピソード３“のプロローグとも呼ぶべき内容になっております。映画エピソード２のアリーナでの決戦シーンを皮切りに、その後の展開を、アナキン・スカイウォーカーやメイス・ウィンドゥ等のジェダイに扮してプレイしていきます。 ガンシップやタンクに乗ってのシューティングシーン、ジェダイに扮してのライトセーバーファイティング、またプレイヤー同士のデュエルと、バリエーション豊かな構成になっています。
● 映画級の映像表現 エピソード２の戦闘シーンを３Ｄゲームとして始めて再現。スター・ウォーズファンなら誰もが立ってみたいと思う戦場へ、映画の臨場感そのままに入り込むことが出来ます。 ● きちんと任務をこなす友軍 本作品では、クローン・トルーパーやジェダイ達の力量を反映し、友軍が極めて優秀な戦力となっています。任務の分担、メイス・ウィンドゥ（ジェダイのお偉方）からの的確な指示など、友軍がしっかり戦っているという実感が得られます。 ● エピソード３のプロローグ的な役割 スター・ウォーズの世界の詳細な設定を反映した上で、エピソード２のエピローグ、エピソード３のプロローグとして楽しめるように、アナキン・スカイウォーカーが、ヴェイダー卿にいかにして変貌して行くか、フォースの暗黒面にいかにして近づいていくかというエピソードの一端が盛り込まれています。 ● 映画で目にした兵器が登場 四足で歩く共和国のウォーカー、通商連合のコアシップを撃墜した光学兵器、そしてジェダイの魂、ライトセーバー。映画館で目にした、あの兵器たちが友軍、敵軍となって現れます。敵構造物を破壊するウォーカー、迫り来るドロイドの大群、それの攻撃を弾き返し、切り裂くライトセーバー。期待通りの兵器が、期待通りの活躍をします。 ● 作戦行動の妙が楽しめるシューティング 各面には、効率的に友軍が配置されており、その友軍をいかに上手く利用していくかが攻略のポイントになります。プレイヤーが扮するジェダイは軍の統率者であり、戦術次第で難易度が大幅に変化します。もちろん、シューティングゲームの腕に覚えのあるプレイヤーは、正面突破という手段に訴えることも出来ます。 ● 迫力のサウンドエフェクト 各武器の使用音は、ルーカスフィルムお抱えのスカイウォーカーサウンドが製作。映画に負けないクオリティの、「あの」音が使用されています。 ● プレイヤーの活躍によりボーナス映像／面が 各面には最低限クリアするべき目標とボーナス目標が設定されており、ボーナス目標をクリアすることにより、マルチプレイヤーの各ゲームモード、およびコンセプトアートやムービーといった追加要素が開放されていきます。スター・ウォーズの世界が、どう作られていくのかというファンの心理を満たす、魅力的なコンテンツになっております。 ● 日本語音声吹き替え メイス・ウィンドウ等の主要キャラクターは映画と同様の声優陣による日本語音声吹替えで最高のプレイアビリティと演出を実現します。

locale.title: Shrek: Super Party
locale.synopsis: Your favorite characters from the movie Shrek now star in an interactive board game. Shrek: Super Party lets you select characters from the movie--including Shrek, Princess Fiona, Lord Farquaad, Donkey, Monsieur Hood, and Thelonius--to battle three of your friends in 30 action-packed minigames. In each game you can earn bug juice, and the first player who earns 100 drops of bug juice wins. Swap bugs, form alliances, or play dirty--but just do whatever you can to gain the competitive edge.

locale.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
locale.synopsis: You may not be able to live like the legend, but now you can skate like him. Skate as the legendary Tony Hawk or choose from a dream team of 12 top pro skaters, including old favorites like Lasek, Thomas, Muska, and Steamer, as well as new talent like Gilfberg, Caballero, Koston, and Mullen. Or enjoy full customization abilities with the enhanced Create-a-Skater (now including female skaters) and the Skatepark Editor. Travel from L.A. to Tokyo, Suburbia to Skater's Island performing challenges and meeting goals. New moves include the Revert, which allows you to link vert tricks, and flatland tricks such as Caspers, the Primo, and Handstand Manual. If you're good, you can even unlock hidden pro footage.
