locale.title: Gun
locale.synopsis: Experience the brutality, lawlessness, greed, and lust, that was the West. When life robs Colton White of all that matters, the only thing left he can trust is his GUN. From award-winning developer, Neversoft, and accomplished screenwriter, Randall Jahnson (The Mask of Zorro, The Doors), GUN follows Colton on his quest for discovery as he seeks to exact vengeful justice on those who have wronged him. GUN is a realistic epic action/adventure that lets gamers experience the brutality of the lawless West.

locale.title: Gun
locale.synopsis:
Neversoft, die Schöpfer der Tony Hawk Reihe, präsentieren mit Gun einen waschechten Wild-West-Shooter. Du übernimmst die Rolle von Colton White und ziehst durch das nicht ungefährliche Amerika des Jahres 1870. Um mehr über Whites' Vergangenheit zu erfahren, reitest du von Montana nach Kansas - der Weg ist dabei von Schwierigkeiten gepflastert. Dem kann unser Cowboy glücklicherweise einiges entgegensetzen: Er springt vom reitenden Pferd auf eine Postkutsche um Ganoven in die Flucht zuschlagen oder liefert sich Duelle mit schießwütigen Banditen. Auch ein Saloon bietet nicht die erhoffte Sicherheit, denn dort warten schon streitsüchtige Halunken auf die nächste Schlägerei!
Verteidige dich mit Messern und Tomahawks oder bekämpfe die Gegner aus sicherer Entfernung mit Pfeil und Bogen. Der Titel des Spiels kommt jedoch nicht von ungefähr: Gewehre, Schrotflinten und Pistolen warten darauf, abgefeuert zu werden. Der treffsichere White kann damit seine Gegner sogar von weitem entwaffnen und dazu einzelne Körperteile anvisieren. Mit vielen Nebenaufgaben und der Möglichkeit, ein kleines Pokerspiel zwischen den Schießereien einzulegen, erzählt Gun eine authentische Wild-West-Geschichte. Lade schon mal deinen Revolver...

locale.title: Gun
locale.synopsis: Experience the brutality, lawlessness, greed, and lust, that was the West. When life robs Colton White of all that matters, the only thing left he can trust is his GUN. From award-winning developer, Neversoft, and accomplished screenwriter, Randall Jahnson (The Mask of Zorro, The Doors), GUN follows Colton on his quest for discovery as he seeks to exact vengeful justice on those who have wronged him. locale.title: Gun
locale.synopsis:
Signé Neversoft, le studio à l'origine des jeux Tony Hawk, Gun nous arrive sur GameCube ! Dans l'Amérique des années 1870, mettez-vous dans la peau de Colton White, un aventurier qui doit évoluer à travers les dangers du Far West. Cette aventure laisse libre cours à Colton White pour voyager à cheval du Montana au Kansas et découvrir la vérité sur son passé. Sur la route, attendez-vous à vous retrouver dans des situations pleines de dangers. Heureusement, Colton White n'a pas froid aux yeux. Il est capable de sauter de son cheval sur une diligence en proie aux attaques de brigands ou de tirer sur les montures de ses ennemis lancés au galop. Même les bars aux décors rassurants ne sont pas des endroits sûrs car vous n’êtes pas à l’abri d’une bagarre générale !
Vous disposez de couteaux et de haches de guerre pour vous défendre lors des combats mais vous pouvez également utiliser arcs et flèches pour atteindre vos ennemis à distance. Evidemment, diverses armes à feu (carabines, fusils et pistolets) peuvent également être utilisées et vous auriez tort de vous en priver car Colton White est un tireur exceptionnel ! Vous pouvez également viser une partie bien précise du corps de vos ennemis, très utile lorsque vous ne souhaitez pas achever votre ennemi trop rapidement. Avec de nombreuses missions parallèles et même la possibilité de taper le carton en se faisant un petit Poker entre deux bagarres générales, Gun donne une excellente idée de la vie au Far West.

locale.title: Gun
locale.synopsis:
In arrivo da Neversoft, il team creatore della serie Tony Hawk, l'entusiasmante Gun! Nell'America del 1870, impersonerai Colton White durante i suoi viaggi nel Selvaggio West. Durante le sue avventure White viaggierà a cavallo dal Montana al Kansas alla ricerca della verità nel suo passato. Durante il percorso, ti ritroverai in situazioni pericolose, ma per fortuna White è all'altezza della situazione: potrai saltare da cavallo su un calesse per difenderlo dagli assaltatori o sparare ai cavalli per far cadere i banditi che gli stanno in groppa. Persino la quiete relativa di un bar non ti garantisce sicurezza, perché c'è sempre la possibilità di ritrovarsi coinvolto in una rissa!
Usa coltelli o asce di guerra per difenderti in combattimenti in faccia a faccia, oppure arco e frecce per colpire i tuoi nemici da lontano. Naturalmente puoi anche usare armi da fuoco: puoi procurarti fucili, pistole e doppiette e White è un pistolero così dotato che riesce persino a colpire le armi del nemico a distanza! Puoi anche puntare parti specifiche del tuo nemico, il che risulta alquanto utile se non vuoi disfartene troppo velocemente. Con side mission e persino la possibilità di una partitella a poker fra una sparatoria e l'altra, Gun ti farà davvero vivere come nel vecchio West!

locale.title: Gauntlet: Dark Legacy
locale.synopsis: Gauntlet Dark Legacy is the all-new 3D iteration in the time-honored "hack'n'slash" classic Gauntlet franchise. The revolutionary Gauntlet game design allows you to work in a team and venture through eight dangerous worlds. One to four players can select one of eight different characters. Using force of arms and exotic magical powers, you vanquish creatures, search for treasure, evade traps, and embark on quests. Exclusive to this GameCube version are several brand new and exciting features, including an extended inventory system, stereo sound, higher resolution graphics, and brand-new power-ups!

locale.title: Shadow the Hedgehog
locale.synopsis: The world is in peril as forces, both good and evil, make a play for the powerful Chaos Emeralds. In Shadow the Hedgehog, you can control Shadow and choose which side to fight for. This 3D platformer lets you use weapons, vehicles, environmental objects, and time and space manipulation to combat your foes.

This 3D platformer lets you use weapons, vehicles, environmental objects, and time and space manipulation to combat your foes.

locale.title: シャドウ・ザ・ヘッジホッグ
locale.synopsis: 悲しき運命を背負ったダークヒーロー…その名は「シャドウ・ザ・ヘッジホッグ」 「悪」と「正義」ゲームプレイの内容が、シャドウの運命を変える。全てを「破壊」するのも「守る」のも、プレイヤーのマインド次第。 今作では、敵の持つ武器や乗り物を奪い取り、それらを使用することでパワーアップさせることが可能。ガンシューティングにカーアクション、ハイスピードのソニックシリーズに新たなアクション性が追加。 さらに、シリーズ初のマルチミッションシナリオを搭載。記憶をなくしたシャドウの行動を決めるのは全てプレイヤーの判断。選択した行動で登場するステージや難易度、物語の結末までもが多彩に変化。その数なんと３００通り以上！

locale.title: Shadow the Hedgehog

locale.title: Universal Studios Theme Park Adventure
locale.synopsis: Lights... Camera... PLAY! You're not just a visitor, you're the star in Kemco's Universal Studios™ Theme Park Adventure, a magical 3-D journey beyond the theme park rides and into an amazing realm of games based upon the most successful movies produced in Hollywood. You'll love this virtual gaming lark through the world's best movie theme park!

locale.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
locale.synopsis: Based on the comic book of the same name, Ultimate Spider-Man lets you play as either the hero Spider-Man or his arch-nemesis, Venom. Use the unique combat techniques of either Spider-Man or Venom to battle a host of Spider-Man characters. Artistic contributions by the creators of the series make for an authentic Spider-Man experience.

locale.title: アルティメット スパイダーマン
locale.synopsis: スパイダーマンとなってウェブ・スイングで市民のピンチを救え！ ヴェノムとなって破壊の限りをつくせ！ スパイダーマン・ワールドにさらなる新風を吹き込むゲームだ。 正義のヒーロー「スパイダーマン」と悪の怪人「ヴェノム」の両方でプレイ可能！ コミックアーティストのブライアン・マイケル・ベンディスとマーク・バグリーがオリジナルストーリーとイラストを書き下ろし！

locale.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
locale.synopsis: Based on the comic book of the same name, Ultimate Spider-Man lets you play as either the hero Spider-Man or his arch-nemesis, Venom. Use the unique combat techniques of either Spider-Man or Venom to battle a host of Spider-Man characters. Artistic contributions by the creators of the series make for an authentic Spider-Man experience.

locale.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
locale.synopsis: Based on the comic book of the same name, Ultimate Spider-Man lets you play as either the hero Spider-Man or his arch-nemesis, Venom. Use the unique combat techniques of either Spider-Man or Venom to battle a host of Spider-Man characters. Artistic contributions by the creators of the series make for an authentic Spider-Man experience.

locale.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
locale.synopsis: Basada en el cómic del mismo nombre, Ultimate Spider-Man le permite jugar ya sea como el héroe Spider-Man o su archienemigo, Venom. Utilice las técnicas de combate únicas de cualquiera de Spider-Man o Venom para luchar contra una serie de personajes de Spider-Man. Aportaciones artísticas de los creadores de la serie para una experiencia Spider-Man auténtico.

locale.title: Freestyle Street Soccer
locale.synopsis: Freestyle Street Soccer focuses on 10 individual gangs--all based on the different styles, fashions, and cultures found in the concrete jungle. These teams fiercely compete for each other's turf with the ultimate goal to gain control of the whole city. You'll join the battle as one of 40 players with individual catchphrases, plus trick, combo, and special moves. As you conquer the challenges in five game modes, remember--on the streets, it's just as important to look cool as it is to score goals.

locale.title: Urban Freestyle Soccer
locale.synopsis: Urban Freestyle Soccer focuses on 10 individual gangs--all based on the different styles, fashions, and cultures found in the concrete jungle. These teams fiercely compete for each other's turf with the ultimate goal to gain control of the whole city. You'll join the battle as one of 40 players with individual catchphrases, plus trick, combo, and special moves. As you conquer the challenges in five game modes, remember--on the streets, it's just as important to look cool as it is to score goals.

locale.title: Batman: Rise of Sin Tzu
locale.synopsis: Sin Tzu, cunning master of strategy and martial arts, makes history as the first Batman character to debut in a video game. To commemorate this event, DC Comics and Warner Bros. have showcased the talents of veteran scriptwriter Flint Dille and reknown comic book artist, Jim Lee as Sin Tzu's co-creators and character designers. The third-person action game lets up to two players join forces as Batman and Robin or Nightwing and Batgirl and take on the scum of Gotham City. Utilizing 35 different attacks and plenty of Bat-gadgets, players fight their way through 12 levels, from the Gotham City Docks to the infamous Arkham Asylum.

locale.title: Batman Rise of Sin Tzu

locale.title: V-Rally 3
locale.synopsis: V-Rally evolves in its third installment with more detailed cars, customizable rally cars, and scurrying spectators. The world's top rally cars--including Subaru Impreza, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution 7, Citroen Xsara, and Ford Focus--are included in V-Rally 3. Choose one, and then overcome spectators, deformed car parts, and extreme driving conditions as you race in six real-world locations and various gameplay modes. The life of a professional rally driver is rough--it's up to you to strategize your career and race your way to the top.

locale.title: V-Rally 3
locale.synopsis:
●全世界で７００万本を売り上げた超強力タイトルがＧＣで登場！ ラリーゲーム史上もっともユーザーの支持を受けている人気タイトルの最新作がついにGCに登場！
●進化を極めたゲームシステム 今までのレーシングゲームとは一線を画す、シネマチックシュミレーションモードを採用した「V-RALLYモード」の搭載。
●坪を抑えたコースデザイン 写実的な風景で作り込まれた６ヶ国４８コースは、その１本１本には高速コーナー・ヘアピンカーブ・ジャンプ台・川などが絶妙に配置されコース攻略に深みを与えています。
●熟成されたドライビングプログラム シリーズ８作目（GBA等含む）で、完成された挙動プログラムは、クルマの持つ走る・止まる・曲がる・滑る・飛ぶ・壊れる等の様々な動作を、絶妙なバランスで表現しています。
６ヶ国４８コースを舞台に、土煙を上げ、豪雨を切り裂き、白銀を駆け抜ける、自然との壮絶ドラマが君を待つ!!!
このゲームには、レースゲームに良くある周回コースは存在しません。あるのは、約６Kmの一本道コースです。このコースを作るには、非常に大きなポリゴンマップが必要とされますが、「V-RALLY３」ではそれを手に入れたのです。
Finland France England Sweden Germany Africa

locale.title: MVP Baseball 2005
locale.synopsis: Featuring the EA Sports Hitter's Eye, MVP Baseball 2005 gives players more control of their at-bat including the power to read the pitch and the ability to move in the batter's box. A visual indicator allows hitters to pick up the pitch the moment it leaves the pitcher's hand. In addition, players can use the Pitch/Swing Analysis to review the timing and location of their swings and adjust accordingly. An all-new Owner Mode enables players to control all aspects of an organization including concession stand prices, promotional days, hiring and firing coaches as well as building their field of dreams. In Create Ballpark, players can customize their stadium by selecting a ballpark name, location, field dimensions and much more. The game features 30 Single-A minor league teams (90 minor leagues teams overall), three new mini-games, an improved Dynasty Mode and all-new unlockable legends, stadiums and uniforms.

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe: Red Hot Rumble
locale.synopsis: Captain Blue is casting for the lead in his new action movie and the competition is RED HOT! Fight head-to-head against your friends - whoever is the most kick-butt lands the starring role!

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe: Battle Carnival
locale.synopsis: Captain Blue is casting for the lead in his new action movie and the competition is RED HOT! Fight head-to-head against your friends - whoever is the most kick-butt lands the starring role!

locale.title: ビューティフルジョー バトルカーニバル
locale.synopsis:
『ビューティフル ジョー』シリーズやTVアニメーションから様々なキャラクター達が新しい必殺技を引っさげて続々参戦！最大4人のキャラクター達が画面狭しと暴れまわる、シリーズ初の対戦アクションゲームだ。 プレイヤーを自由自在に操って、ライバルたちに敵や物をぶつけたり新必殺技をお見舞いしてポイントを競い合え！ミッションで勝利してボーナスポイントをつかめ！より多くのポイントを集めた人が優勝だ！ バトル中のミニゲーム「VFXバトル」は勝利すれば大量ポイントを貰える大逆転のチャンス。 もちろんVFXパワーもパワーアップ！バトルを更に盛り上げる。 ヒーロー達の驚異の力で誰よりもビューティフルに戦え！バトルの主役は君だ！！
簡単操作でド派手な新技が炸裂！ボタン一つでVFXパワーを使いこなせ！ バラエティーあふれるステージでのミッション、いろいろなアイテムがバトルをさらに盛り上げる！最大4人対戦でみんなが一緒に楽しめる「パーティーバトル」だ。

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe: Red Hot Rumble
locale.synopsis: Captain Blue is casting for the lead in his new action movie and the competition is RED HOT! Fight head-to-head against your friends - whoever is the most kick-butt lands the starring role!

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe: Red Hot Rumble
locale.synopsis:
In Viewtiful Joes neuestem Abenteuer kämpft er gegen seine Freunde, um in dem neuen Captain Blue-Film mitspielen zu dürfen! Als großer Captain Blue-Fan würde Joe gern die Hauptrolle übernehmen, doch der Captain kann sich einfach nicht entscheiden, wen er als Hauptdarsteller besetzen soll. Jetzt ist es deine Aufgabe, ihn zu überzeugen, indem du vor verschiedenen Filmkulissen gegen andere Möchtegern-Stars kämpfst. "Viewtiful Joe: Red Hot Rumble" ist ein brandheißes Beat-'em-up-Spektakel nicht nur für Cineasten!
Das hatten sich Fans der quadratischen Konsole doch schon lange gedacht: Im Nintendo GameCube stecken Superkräfte! Und Viewtiful Joe zeigt ihnen auch, wie man sie entfesselt. Mit der Weiterentwicklung des innovativen Comic-Abenteuers beweist Nintendo mal wieder seinen sagenhaften Ideenreichtum. Denn "Viewtiful Joe: Red Hot Rumble" startet ein echtes Kampf-Feuerwerk auf dem Power-Würfel: Während er sich in "Viewtiful Joe 2" noch seitwärts durch die bunte Comic-Welt geschlagen hat, bevorzugt der ausgeflippte Comic-Held inzwischen einen etwas anderen Kampfstil. Wer die Welt retten will, muss sich schließlich frei bewegen können und so nimmt er seine Gegner jetzt in 3D ins Visier.
Ganz klar, das heißt: Knallharte Kampfaction ohne Kompromisse mit neuem Fokus auf Multiplayer-Caming. In 25 optisch gelungenen Kampfkulissen überrascht Viewtiful Joe in den einzelnen Level mit spannenden neuen Features. In jeder Umgebung müssen mehrfach kurze Missionen erfüllt werden, die im Laufe des Spiels an Tempo zulegen. Natürlich kommen Spieler dabei wieder in den Genuss geballter VFX-Power. Der Special Move verlangsamt die Zeit und verwandelt die Schläge damit in effektive Attacken. Wem das nicht reicht, der kann sich diesmal auch mit spektakulären Schall-Attacken oder gezielter Mach-Power zur Wehr setzen. Ohne Frage ein progressives Spiele-Erlebnis!
FEATURES:
- Knallharte Kampf-Action in 3D für bis zu 4 Spieler
- 25 neue Kampfplätze im Einzelspieler-Modus
- Geballte VFX-Power für brillante Zeitlupen und effektive Schläge
- Auswahlmöglichkeit aus 12 der beliebten "Viewtiful Joe"-Charaktere
- Unverwechselbarer Comic-Look in exzellentem Cell-Shading
- Nutze deine VFX-Power, um deine Gegner zu verhauen und jede Menge Punkte zu scheffeln
- Das Versus-Gameplay sorgt für noch intensivere Action
- Interaktive Umgebungen - nutze die Kulissen, um deine Gegner zu attackieren
- Kämpfe gegen bis zu drei Freunde gleichzeitig im Multiplayer-Modus
- Viele spielbare Charaktere - halte Ausschau nach Sylvia, Sprocket, Captain Blue Junior u.v.a.

locale.title: Bratz Forever Diamondz
locale.synopsis: Yasmin, Cloe, Sasha, and Jade are back for a brand new adventure sending them across the country in search of the hottest fashion designer. Players will experience unique adventures through the eyes of the four playable characters, in detailed open world environments, as they compete for a spot in "America Rocks Fashion" TV show. Fans will discover new features that include a figure skating competition and the ability to adopt a pet to train, dress, accessorize and showcase in competitions.

locale.title: Bratz Forever Diamondz

locale.title: ビューティフルジョー リバイバル
Bionicle Heroes
locale.synopsis: Bionicle Heroes brings to life the most powerful and exciting LEGO characters ever seen in one game, in an action-packed world of adventure and discovery. Take control of a young hero as he steps out of the real world and into the strange and dangerous universe of Bionicle. Only by mastering the powers and special abilities of the greatest Bionicle heroes will he be able to overcome the many challenges ahead.

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe
locale.synopsis: Fighting action game from Capcom Studio 4's Atsushi Inaba. Joe was just your average, well, Joe until he was transported into his favorite action movie. In his new environment, Joe discovers he has all the abilities of Hollywood action-hero. Using new cel-shading techniques, VJ boasts a unique visual style that blends colorful 3D environments with a twisted take on traditional 2D gameplay. Joe's power stems from skillful martial arts attacks, high-flying acrobatics, and time-bending special effects. Players can slow down or speed up time when attacking/ dodging enemies, as well as zoom in on the action to execute different attacks.

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe

locale.title: Viewtiful Joe
locale.synopsis: Wenn du mit einem Freund ins Kino gehst, würdest du sicherlich nie und nimmer auf die Idee kommen, dass die Bösewichte aus dem Film plötzlich durch die Leinwand krachen und deinen Freund vor deinen Augen entführen könnten, oder? Aber genau das ist unserem Joe passiert... Joe entwickelt sich innerhalb von ein paar Minuten von einem ganz gewöhnlichen Filmfreak zu einem Menschen rettenden Superhelden. Und er wird in eine Filmwelt hinein katapultiert, in der die physikalischen Gesetze völlig verdreht, bzw. gar nicht vorhanden sind. Im Grunde ist Viewtiful Joe ein Side-scrolling-Beat'em-up der alten Schule. Ihm wurde aber der Spirit des 21. Jahrhunderts eingehaucht, indem Spezialeffekte eingebaut wurden, die sogar die Traumfabrik Hollywood neidisch machen würden. Joes Aufgabe ist ganz einfach: Er muss sich mit Boxen und Treten durch die Level kämpfen und sich gegen comichafte Bösewichte sowie ein paar sehr schräge Bosse durchsetzen. Aber in kritischen Situationen kann sich Joe auf die Magie der Filme, auch VFX-Power genannt, verlassen. Wenn auf Joe geschossen wird, kannst du mit einem schnellen Druck auf die L-Taste die Zeit verlangsamen, so dass Joe dem Geschoss ausweichen oder es dorthin zurück schicken kann, wo es her kam. Wenn Joe die Zeit zu beschleunigen lernt, kann er einen Wirbel aus stürmischen, schnellen Schlägen ausführen. Und du kannst sogar mit dem C-Stick in die Action hinein bzw. aus der Action heraus zoomen, um unaufhaltbare Spezial-Bewegungen einzusetzen. Die VFX-Energie ist aber nicht nur was für die Show: Je spektakulärer deine Attacken sind, desto mehr Punkte bekommst du. Aber pass auf, die VFX-Energie hält nicht ewig an. Wenn du sie zu oft benutzt, entwickelt sich Joe wieder in sein eigentliches, schwaches Selbst zurück. Mit seiner Kombination aus smarter Cell-Shading-Grafik und ironisch übersteigerten Action-Sequenzen, ist Viewtiful Joe vergleichbar mit einem von dir gesteuerten Zeichentrickfilm. Aber lass dich von dem netten Design nicht einlullen. Wie seine Old School-Vorfahren ist Viewtiful Joe nämlich ziemlich hart. Wenn du zum Beispiel am Ende eines Levels besiegt wirst, musst du wieder ganz von vorne anfangen. Aber Capcom hat aufmerksamerweise zwei Schwierigkeitsgrade eingebaut - "kids" (Kinder) und "adults" (Erwachsene) - damit auch weniger erfahrene Spieler zurechtkommen. Alles in allem ist Viewtiful Joe sehr schön anzusehen und es macht einen Riesenspaß. Außerdem ist es exklusiv für den Nintendo GameCube, das heißt du kannst alle Freunde, die Konsolen von der Konkurrenz besitzen, schön neidisch machen!

locale.title: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2
locale.synopsis: Activision's popular CABELA series is great for hunters in the off-season, and the 2006 entry in the series, CABELAS DANGEROUS HUNTS 2 for the Game Cube, offers yet another great adventure in the outdoors. As usual, players will be traveling the world looking for the biggest and most dangerous game, which includes wolves, cougars, bears, and even polar bears. This time, the game takes players through Australia, Africa, Alaska, and even to the frozen tundra of Siberia as they stalk the most wanted game. Players will have several options when it comes to choosing guns, bullets, and other accessories. Animal calls, traps, decoys, and bait are all available for sell and use in the wild. As players move through the single player missions, however, they will be given tasks other than just hunting down specific game. Some levels require players to keep wild animals away from a camp, save lost hikers from grizzly bears, or help an injured forest ranger get back to town. One of the most interesting additions to the game is the inclusion of slow motion time. Players can slow down time to line up that perfect shot. Slow motion time only lasts for a few seconds, however, so players still have to be quick on aiming and firing. CABELAS hunting games are always great, and CABELAS DANGEROUS HUNTS 2 is no exception. Gamers looking for the next big challenge in virtual hunting won't be disappointed.

game.name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
locale.synopsis: Created by Electronic Arts in association with Marvel's brand-new game production division, this fighting franchise will pit well-known Marvel heroes against a brand-new band of characters developed by EA. Marvel's Greg Pak, Mark Paniccia and are on-board in collaboration with EA's creative designers. In Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects , an alien genius is experimenting in creating a class of diverse, perfect super-warriors. His creations are masterful and powerful, but he and his creations must contend with the Mavel superheroes when the mad scientist begins his experiments with earthlings.

locale.title: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects
locale.synopsis:
In diesem aufregenden EA-Beat-'em-up treten einige der legendären Marvel-Superhelden gegen eine Riege brandneuer Gegner an. Über ein Dutzend Kämpfer – darunter die bekannten Spider-Man, Wolverine und Iron Man – bleiben einander in den völlig zerstörbaren Arenen nichts schuldig. Fans der Comics kommen voll auf ihre Kosten: Es gilt, die Superkräfte der einzelnen Figuren auszunutzen und in Rage-gepowerten Angriffen, Ausweich- und Abwehrmanövern sowie mit spektakulären Spezialbewegungen die Oberhand zu gewinnen. Kampf-Action, wie es sie noch nie gab! Doch nicht nur die Marvel-Figuren, sondern auch die brandneuen Imperfect-Charaktere sind nicht gerade Schlaffis, wenn es um Spezialbewegungen und Superkräfte geht. Die besonders erfreuliche Nachricht für Liebhaber von willkürlich-sinnlosen Massakern: Venom, die heimtückische, rachsüchtige Figur aus Spider-Man, ist mit von der Partie!
Der Hintergrund setzt sich zu einem Gutteil aus bekannten Marvel-Motiven zusammen, wie z.B. den Büros des Daily Bugle oder dem Rächer-Hauptquartier mit seinem luxuriösen Ambiente. Die Helden selbst sind so detailreich ausgeführt und wundervoll animiert, wie es bei Videogame-Charkteren selten ist – bleibt nur abzuwarten, ob du bei der aberwitzigen Action genug Zeit haben wirst, dich um solche Äußerlichkeiten zu kümmern... Neben den verheerenden Duellen erwartet dich im Story-Modus eine eigene Teilgeschichte zu jeder Figur. In gewaltigen Konfrontationen stehst du dann einer Vielzahl von Widersachern gegenüber. Die riesigen Kampfschauplätze und die Möglichkeit, alles zum Kampfgerät umzufunktionieren, was dir unterkommt, machen Marvel Nemesis zu einer echten Meisterübung in Sachen Chaos und Vernichtung. Imperfect? Nicht so sicher...

locale.title: Marvel Nemesis: L'Avenement des Imparfaits
locale.synopsis:
Les plus célèbres super héros de Marvel affrontent une bande de tout nouveaux adversaires dans ce sensationnel beat-'em-up signé EA. Avec une bonne dizaine de combattants (dont Spider-Man, Wolverine, Iron Man...) s'affrontant dans des décors intégralement destructibles, les inconditionnels de comics vont l'adorer. La puissance des attaques dépend de la colère des personnages qui ripostent et contre-attaquent en fonction de leurs super pouvoirs. Les mouvements spéciaux sont spectaculaires et les combats d'une originalité inouïe. En plus des héros Marvel, vous aurez également l'occasion d'incarner les tout nouveaux personnages d'Imperfect qui sont loin d'être empotés lorsqu'il s'agit d'exhiber mouvements spéciaux et super pouvoirs. Et pour les amateurs de carnage, la bonne nouvelle c'est que l'ennemi juré de Spider-Man en personne, le fameux Venom, est également de la partie.
Bon nombre des décors sont issus de l'univers des comics Marvel comme les bureaux du Daily Bugle ou les somptueux alentours du Manoir des Vengeurs. Quant aux héros eux-mêmes, ils font sans aucun doute partie des personnages les plus détaillés et les mieux animés même si l'action frénétique du jeu ne laisse pas vraiment le temps pour les admirer. En plus de proposer des face à face dévastateurs le jeu offre également une histoire propre à chaque personnage que l'on peut découvrir en progressant dans le mode scénario. A la suite des face à face principaux, vous devrez également affronter plusieurs ennemis à la fois. Et avec de vastes aires de combats et la possibilité de transformer n'importe quel objet en arme, Marvel Nemesis est un jeu de combat au sens primaire du terme...

locale.title: Marvel Némesis: La Rebelión de los Imperfectos
locale.synopsis:
Los héroes más conocidos del universo Marvel se enfrentan a un batallón de nuevos enemigos en este espectacular beat-'em-up de EA. Más de una docena de personajes dándose leña en entornos completamente destructibles, incluyendo a Spider-Man, Wolverine e Iron Man, harán las delicias de los fans del mejor cómic. Cada superhéroe cuenta además con sus propios movimientos de ataque y defensa que sacan el máximo partido a sus particulares poderes, junto con espectaculares movimientos especiales que te dejarán con la boca abierta. Además de los personajes Marvel podrás controlar a los nuevos "antihéroes", que no son precisamente mancos en lo que a movimientos especiales y superpoderes se refiere. Y una buena noticia para los amantes de la violencia gratuita: Veneno, el archienemigo del hombre araña, también participa en esta fiesta.
Muchos de los entornos del juego están sacados directamente de los cómic Marvel, como las oficinas de The Daily Bugle o los suntuosos alrededores de la Avengers Mansion. El modelado de los personajes y su animación es excelente, aunque el frenético ritmo al que se suceden los sopapos no deja mucho tiempo libre para admirarlos. Además de los devastadores combates frente a frente, cada personaje tiene su propia línea argumental que se va desenvolviendo a medida que progresas en el modo Historia. Para traer un poco de variedad en estos combates individuales, también te las tendrás que ver con múltiples enemigos a la vez, algo extremadamente emocionante si tenemos en cuenta que puedes usar los objetos que encuentras en el juego como armas contra tus rivales. ¿Preparado para la mejor acción made in Marvel? ¡Adelante!

locale.title: Marvel Nemesis: L'Ascesa degli Esseri Imperfetti
locale.synopsis:
più celebri supereroi della Marvel affrontano una banda di nuovissimi avversari in questo sensazionale picchiaduro firmato EA. Con oltre dieci eroi (quali Spider-Man, Wolverine, Iron Man...) che si affrontano in ambientazioni completamente distruttibili, i fan dei fumetti adoreranno questo gioco! La potenza degli attacchi dipende dalla rabbia dei personaggi, che contrattaccano in funzione dei loro superpoteri. Le mosse speciali sono spettacolari e i combattimenti originalissimi. Oltre agli eroi della Marvel, potrai anche incarnare tutti i nuovi personaggi di Imperfect, anch'essi sempre pronti a esibire mosse speciali e superpoteri. E ai fan delle carneficine farà piacere sapere che anche il nemico numero uno di Spider-Man, il fantomatico Venom, fa parte della partita.
Gran parte delle ambientazioni richiama il mondo dei fumetti Marvel, come gli uffici del Daily Bugle o il sontuoso Avengers Mansion. Per quanto riguarda gli eroi, si tratta senza dubbio dei personaggi più dettagliati e meglio animati che tu abbia mai visto in un videogame, anche se l'azione è talmente frenetica che riuscirai appena a notarlo. Oltre che proporre dei faccia a faccia devastanti, il gioco offre una storia propria a ogni personaggio che si può scoprire avanzando nella modalità Story. Dopo aver affrontato i faccia a faccia principali, dovrai affrontare diversi nemici contemporaneamente. Con aree di combattimento molto ampie e la possibilità di trasformare qualsiasi oggetto in arma, Marvel Nemesis è un gioco che non ha nulla di... imperfetto!

rom.name: Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects (Europe) (EN) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: Super Bust-A-Move All Stars
locale.synopsis: Everybody's favorite bubble-bustin' puzzle game is in the house for the Nintendo GameCube! Launch your bubbles and pop as many as you can before they reach the deadline. Score high by matching 3 bubbles or more to trigger a chain reaction.

locale.title: Super Bust-A-Move All Stars
locale.synopsis:
Das legendäre Super Bust-A-Move erscheint jetzt endlich für deinen Nintendo GameCube!
5 aufregende Spielmodi, inklusive des brandneuen 4-Spieler-Modus, fordern dein Geschick.
FEATURES:
- Klassische Bust-A-Move-Action! Fordere deine Freunde heraus: Sei schneller als sie!
- Schieß dich bis ganz nach oben! Beweise dein Können im neuen und exklusiven Bubble-Shot-Modus.
- Brandneue Freunde und Grafik! Neue Animationen, Spezialeffekte und zauberhafte Charaktere machen sich bereit auf deinem Nintendo GameCube zu rocken!

locale.title: Bionicle
locale.synopsis: There's turmoil in the island of Mata Nui. The dark spirit Makuta has infected the Rahi throughout the island -- using his control of the Bohrok, Bohrok-Kal, and Rahkshi to kidnap the Matoran villagers throughout the various Wahi. It's up to the guardians of each Wahi, the Toa warriors Tahi, Lewa, Kopaka, Gali, Pohatu, and Onua, to rescue the Matorans and find the Toa of Light, who is the only one strong enough to stop Makuta. Players control the six Toa heroes in this blend of platform action, combat and racing. Use elemental powers to defeat enemies, then snowboard down mountains, surf through lava fields, ride mine carts and grind along tree limbs.

locale.title: Bionicle

locale.title: MVP Baseball 2004
locale.synopsis: Step up to the plate and master the true art of hitting with MVP Baseball 2004. An all-new hitting model allows for complete user control over all swing types as well as signature cuts from the game's best sluggers. Players can take full control of their franchise on all the levels -- from the minors to the pros -- and play, sim, or manage each game all the way to the World Series. Featuring rich new presentation, realistic player models, and enhanced animations. Other new features include an improved fielding model, added front office options, full EA Sports Bio compatibility, and competitive multiplayer.

locale.title: Grooverider Slot Car Thunder
locale.synopsis: Slot car racing isn't just for kids anymore. Set in a fantasy penthouse, Grooverider: Slot Car Thunder lets you experience quick lane changes, 360-degree loops, and crazy twists and turns on 20 slot car tracks. If you're a smart racer, you'll be sure to grab extra power-ups for a boost or blasting power. If you're not, then the tracks' spikes, mines, and other booby traps will surely be your downfall. In single- or multiplayer modes, you can get behind the wheel of any racecar, ranging from 1920s British cars to American stock cars.

locale.title: Virtua Striker 4
locale.synopsis: Export Version of the Triforce Arcade Game Virtua Striker 4. (Modified to have an independent game ID.)

locale.title: Virtua Striker 2002
locale.synopsis: The Virtua Striker series returns with 64 national football teams from around the world. Whether you play as France, Brazil, or Argentina, you can take your team to the final of the International Cup for a chance to win the trophy. On the road to the International Cup, you'll encounter more than 1,400 different players with their own stats and play in 13 stadiums. Virtua Striker 2002 also includes player edit and replay functions.

locale.title: VIRTUA STRIKER 3 ver.2002
locale.synopsis: The Virtua Striker series returns with 64 national football teams from around the world. Whether you play as France, Brazil, or Argentina, you can take your team to the final of the International Cup for a chance to win the trophy. On the road to the International Cup, you'll encounter more than 1,400 different players with their own stats and play in 13 stadiums. Virtua Striker 2002 also includes player edit and replay functions.

locale.title: バーチャストライカー3 Ver.2002
locale.synopsis: ３D CGスポーツゲームの先駆者であり、且つ、アーケードサッカーゲームとして圧倒的な人気と実績を誇る、VIRTUA STRIKERシリーズ。そのシリーズ最高峰である「VIRTUA STRIKER 3」を基に、ゲームシステムを飛躍的に進化させ、ニンテンドーゲームキューブ用ソフト「VIRTUA STRIKER 3 ver.2002」として、2002年早春に登場いたします。 家庭用だからこそ実現できた新要素を数多く盛り込み、更に、シリーズを通して確立されているシンプルかつ自由度の高いゲーム性とアーケードで培われたハイエンドの技術、最新ハードを組み合わせたことにより、今までにない新しいアクションスポーツゲームが誕生しました。 サッカー選手のひとつひとつのプレイや、ボールに対するリアクションを細部にわたって表現、また、サッカー日本代表チームのライセンスを受けて本物の日本代表のユニフォームを採用、サッカーボールやスパイクなどもアディダスジャパン 株式会社様のご協力をいただき本物と同じデザインを使用し、すべてにおいてリアリティを追求しております。 ゲーム全体であたかも本物のサッカー中継を見ているような臨場感を表現しており、まさに究極のサッカーゲームと言えるでしょう。

locale.title: Virtua Striker 3 Ver. 2002
locale.synopsis: The Virtua Striker series returns with 64 national football teams from around the world. Whether you play as France, Brazil, or Argentina, you can take your team to the final of the International Cup for a chance to win the trophy. On the road to the International Cup, you'll encounter more than 1,400 different players with their own stats and play in 13 stadiums. Virtua Striker 2002 also includes player edit and replay functions.

locale.title: 学園都市 ヴァラノワールローゼス
WWE Day of Reckoning 2
locale.synopsis: Publishing giant THQ readily admits that Nintendo fans have proven to be a dedicated bunch, snapping up its various wrestling games over the years. Back on Nintendo 64, the Aki-developed WCW and WrestleMania titles hooked a legion of followers and many of these same players continue to enjoy the company's wrestling titles on GameCube today, despite a few notable missteps. Some fans, for instance, were shocked and disappointed several years ago when Aki left the Nintendo side to develop for other platforms and others felt cheated when the WrestleMania franchise eventually followed suit.

locale.title: WWE Day of Reckoning 2

Some fans, for instance, were shocked and disappointed several years ago when Aki left the Nintendo side to develop for other platforms and others felt cheated when the WrestleMania franchise eventually followed suit.

locale.title: WWE WrestleMania X8
locale.synopsis: Legendary battles and intense drama are packed into one event--WrestleMania, where the baddest men on the planet meet to become champions of wrestling. An updated 2002 roster features superstars and newcomers Rob Van Dam, Booker T, The Hurricane, and nWo members Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, and Hulk Hogan. Master each superstar's unique wrestling style and turn the tide of the match through a combination of counters, reversals, and brutal finishing moves. Now you can start from the beginning and take your rookie wrestler up through the ranks in quest for the Heavyweight Championship Belt.

locale.title: WWE WrestleMania X8
locale.synopsis: Legendary battles and intense drama are packed into one event--WrestleMania, where the baddest men on the planet meet to become champions of wrestling. locale.title: レッスルマニアX8
locale.synopsis:
“エキサイティングプロレス”シリーズ等をリリースし“高い技術力”と“こだわりの作りこみ”で定評のユークスが、今世界で最も人気のあるアメリカのスポーツエンターテインメント、“World Wrestling Entertainment”（通称ＷＷＥ）をモチーフにした、ニンテンドーゲームキューブ用ソフト「レッスルマニア Ｘ８」を発売致します。もちろんＷＷＥの公認タイトルです。
このゲームは、ニンテンドーゲームキューブ初の本格プロレスゲームとなります。 プロレスゲームとは言っても、従来の小難しいだけのマニアックなゲームシステムではなく、ゲーム初心者から上級格闘ゲーマーまで幅広く楽しんでいただける操作システムを実現。 さらに、実際のＷＷＥシーンで起こりうるシチュエーションを完全再現し、最近急激に増えつつあるＷＷＥファンも納得のデキとなっております。もちろん登場するスーパースターも現在の最新データのもと、実名で登場します。

locale.title: WWE Wrestlemania X8
locale.synopsis: Legendary battles and intense drama are packed into one event--WrestleMania, where the baddest men on the planet meet to become champions of wrestling. An updated 2002 roster features superstars and newcomers Rob Van Dam, Booker T, The Hurricane, and nWo members Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, and Hulk Hogan. Master each superstar's unique wrestling style and turn the tide of the match through a combination of counters, reversals, and brutal finishing moves. Now you can start from the beginning and take your rookie wrestler up through the ranks in quest for the Heavyweight Championship Belt.

locale.title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004
locale.synopsis: While professional golfer Tiger Woods has no equal on the PGA Tour, you now have the chance to build a golfer that's even better. Take your custom golfer through the trials and tribulations of all the courses in Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004, earning cash to spend on new digs and advanced equipment. Use the analog stick to shape any shot type such as the flop or punch. Go head-to-head against the computer, a friend, or an online player with PS2's network adapter. With all the top competition on some of the most famous fairways and greens ever, this is the one of the most complete golf experiences yet.

locale.title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004

locale.title: Need for Speed: Carbon
locale.synopsis: Need for Speed: Carbon delivers the next generation of adrenaline-filled street racing as players face the ultimate test of driving skill on treacherous canyon roads. What starts in the city is settled in the canyons as Need for Speed Carbon immerses you into the world's most dangerous and adrenaline-filled form of street racing. You and your crew must race in an all-out war for the city, risking everything to take over your rivals' neighborhoods one block at a time. As the police turn up the heat, the battle ultimately shifts to Carbon Canyon, where territories and reputations can be lost on every perilous curve. Need for Speed Carbon delivers the next generation of customization giving you the power to design and tweak your crew's cars in every way using the ground-breaking new Autosculpt technology. Represent your car class, your crew, and your turf in Need for Speed Carbon, the next revolution in racing games.

locale.title: Winning Eleven 6 Final Evolution
locale.synopsis: Pro Evolution Soccer 2 (known as Winning Eleven 6 in Japan and World Soccer: Winning Eleven 6 in North America) is the second installment of Konami's Pro Evolution Soccer football video game series.

locale.title: ワールドサッカー ウイニングイレブン6 ファイナルエヴォリューション

game.name: James Bond 007 in Agent Under Fire (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: James Bond 007 in Agent Under Fire
locale.synopsis: Driven by a completely new and original storyline, James Bond 007: Agent Under Fire is a first-person action game that balances furious action and stealth tactics. An evil world organization has been replacing world leaders with their more docile clones and it's up to you to put a stop to it. As Bond, you'll encounter villains and allies, both new and familiar, detailed 3D environments, and spy-packed, fast-action gameplay. And don't worry, Q will provide you with all the innovative weapons, sophisticated spy-craft, and state-of-the-art gadgets that Bond fans expect.

rom.name: James Bond 007 in Agent Under Fire (Europe) (DE) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: 007: Agent Under Fire
locale.synopsis: Impulsionado por um enredo completamente novo e original, James Bond 007: Agent Under Fire é um jogo de ação em primeira pessoa que equilibra ação furiosa e táticas furtivas. Uma organização mundial maligna está substituindo líderes mundiais por seus clones mais dóceis e cabe a você dar um basta nisso. Como Bond, você encontrará vilões e aliados, novos e familiares, ambientes 3D detalhados e jogabilidade de ação rápida repleta de espiões. E não se preocupe, o Q fornecerá a você todas as armas inovadoras, sofisticadas bugigangas de espionagem e dispositivos de última geração que os fãs de Bond esperam.

locale.title: World Series of Poker
locale.synopsis: World Series of Poker features the likenesses of poker professionals participating in the 2005 WSOP Tournament. The game offers players a truly unique experience unlike any other poker video game on the market today. For the first time ever, the 2005 WSOP Tournament will be held at Harrah's Rio Suites in Las Vegas, the same location simulated in the video game and the location of the 2005 Lifestyle Show. All the sanctioned poker various of the World Series of Poker are available, including Texas Hold 'Em, 7 Card Stud, Omaha, and 5 Card Draw. With the flexible character creator, the player can create his or her own poker face, wear Vegas-style threads and upgrade looks/clothes as he or she gains money.

locale.title: WWE WrestleMania XIX
locale.synopsis: The legacy continues with WrestleMania XIX, which features deeper move sets and a more strategic reversal system. Choose among an updated list of top WWE superstars, each with realistic abilities, including strength, speed, and stamina. You can become a legend by battling your way through five stages and more than 25 missions in an effort to destroy Vince's empire. Team up with Stephanie McMahon along the way as you win back your status in the WWE.

locale.title: Spartan Total Warrior
locale.synopsis: This action epic lets players fight within massive cinematic battles as a fighter known only as The Spartan. Spartan: Total Warrior runs on proprietary software technology that makes it possible to present more than 170 detailed warriors simultaneously engaged in pitched combat.

locale.title: Worms Blast
locale.synopsis: Get ready for intense firefights in Worms Blast, a new puzzle game featuring wacky weaponry and power-ups. Your mission is to launch your worm into hostile waters and then attack your opponent with shotguns, bazookas, mines, laser beams, and sea monsters, while collecting various power-ups. Brave the high seas by facing rain, wind, solar eclipses, and even cosmic showers. Worms Blast includes eight head-to-head modes that challenge you to crush your opponents before they crush you.

locale.title: Worms Blast
locale.synopsis: Prepare-se para tiroteios intensos em Worms Blast, um novo jogo de quebra-cabeça com armas malucas e power-ups. Sua missão é lançar seu verme em águas hostis e, em seguida, atacar seu oponente com espingardas, bazucas, minas, raios laser e monstros marinhos, enquanto coleta vários power-ups. Enfrente o alto mar enfrentando chuva, vento, eclipses solares e até chuvas cósmicas. Worms Blast inclui oito modos frente a frente que desafiam você a esmagar seus oponentes antes que eles o esmaguem.

locale.title: Worms Blast

Your mission is to launch your worm into hostile waters and then attack your opponent with shotguns, bazookas, mines, laser beams, and sea monsters, while collecting various power-ups. Brave the high seas by facing rain, wind, solar eclipses, and even cosmic showers. Worms Blast includes eight head-to-head modes that challenge you to crush your opponents before they crush you.

locale.title: Worms Blast
locale.synopsis:
Die Worms sind wieder da, stets bereit für einen Kampf zur See. Teste in diesem Action-Puzzlespiel dein strategisches Können und deine Reflexe in einer großen Auswahl von spannenden Spielmodi und Optionen. Wähle deine Waffe, ziele und sprenge deine Gegner in die Luft und lausche seinem Geschrei! Mit diesem schnellen und fesselnden töte-ihn-bevor-er-dich-tötet Spiel wirst du Glücksgefühle wie nie zuvor erleben, wenn du deinen Gegner versenkst und dann absaufen siehst!
Spiele eine Vielzahl von Einzel- und Mehrspielermissionen!
Steuere eine Mannschaft von neuen Wormsfiguren, die mit ihren Booten die Wellen unsicher machen!
Wähle eine Waffe aus einem beeindruckenden Arsenal, einschließlich verrückter Meeresbewohner, Piranhas, Seemonster und Fischfutter!
Jede Menge actiongeladene Schauplätze mit cartoon-ähnlichen Hintergründen. Genieße die pure wurmige Erfahrung!
Komplett in Deutsch.

locale.title: World Racing
locale.synopsis: World Racing gives you total control over your race. Stay on track, search for shortcuts, or simply free roam--you're in control as you take your Mercedes-Benz on a romp around the world. In one of 110 original cars, you'll take on 120 different tracks in seven expansive landscapes, ranging from Nevada and Japan to the Alps and Mercedes' own Test Center. Defeat your rivals with powerslides, burnouts, and wild stunt driving en route to becoming the world's number one driver.

locale.title: 18 Wheeler: American Pro Trucker
locale.synopsis: Join the convoy! AM2's off the wall arcade smash, 18-Wheeler American Pro Trucker is rambling to the PlayStation2 computer entertainment system for one heck'uva pit stop! Get behind the wheel of a 60 foot long, 20 ton, 18-wheeled beast and buckle up as you haul tail from New York to California and everywhere in between in the most intense joyride of your life! 10-4 good buddy - Over and out!

locale.title: 18 Wheeler: American Pro Trucker
locale.synopsis: Junte-se ao comboio! AM2 é um grande sucesso de fliperama, 18-Wheeler American Pro Trucker está indo para o GameCube pra fazer um pit stop dos diabos! Sente-se ao volante de uma besta de 18 rodas com 18 metros de comprimento e 20 toneladas e aperte o cinto enquanto transporta carga de Nova York para a Califórnia e em todos os lugares intermediários no passeio mais intenso de sua vida! 10-4 bom amigo - Câmbio e desligo!

locale.title: Swingerz Golf
locale.synopsis: Grab your clubs and hit the links in Swingerz Golf. You'll tee up on six courses featuring diverse terrains, from a cactus-filled desert to a classic English course. Play as or against 14 offbeat golfers, each with distinct personalities and golfing abilities. You can battle three of your friends in various gameplay modes, including Tournament, Stroke, Match, and Short Course. With challenging weather conditions, minigames, and intense tournaments, Swingerz Golf gives you a realistic and fun golfing experience.

locale.title: Swingerz Golf
locale.synopsis: Pegue seus tacos e acerte os links no Swingerz Golf. Você vai jogar golfe em seis campos com diversos terrenos, desde um deserto repleto de cactos até um clássico curso de inglês. Jogue como ou contra 14 jogadores de golfe incomuns, cada um com personalidades e habilidades de golfe distintas. Você pode lutar contra três de seus amigos em vários modos de jogo, incluindo Torneio, Golpe, Partida e Percurso Curto. Com condições climáticas desafiadoras, minijogos e torneios intensos, o Swingerz Golf oferece uma experiência de golfe realista e divertida.

game.name: Winnie The Pooh Rumbly Tumbly Adventures (USA) (EN,FR,ES)

locale.title: Winnie The Pooh Rumbly Tumbly Adventures
locale.synopsis: Join Winnie the Pooh and his friends on five birthday-themed adventures. In Winnie the Pooh Rumbly Tumbly Adventures, you can play as Tigger, Piglet, Eeyore, and Winnie the Pooh. Find as many honey pots as you can, but beware of the mischievous Heffalumps and Woozles, who steal honey. Whether you're finding a new house for Eeyore or helping Tigger out of a sticky situation, you'll experience all the adventures of Pooh and his friends in the Hundred Acre Wood.

locale.title: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland
locale.synopsis: Now you can cruise through LA without loading levels or stopping gameplay in Tony Hawk's American Wasteland. You can skate or BMX through a new story mode that takes you through all-new skate areas using tricks that have never appeared in previous Tony Hawk games. The cash that you earn can be used to customize your equipment and your skater by going to tattoo parlors and skate shops. Tony Hawk's American Wasteland also includes a classic mode that features classic Tony Hawk Pro Skater maps and objectives.

game.name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie (USA) (EN,FR,ES)

locale.title: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie
locale.synopsis: Play as man or beast in Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie. You can be King Kong or Jack Driscoll as you follow a story based on the movie. Peter Jackson, the director of the 2005 movie, also took an active role in developing the game, which expands upon the movie's storyline, adding new creatures and locations. The game employs a cinematic style that makes the game more immersive and less like a traditional video game.

locale.title: Peter Jackson's King Kong: O Jogo Oficial do Filme
locale.synopsis: Jogue como homem ou fera em King Kong: O Jogo Oficial do Filme, de Peter Jackson. Você pode ser King Kong ou Jack Driscoll enquanto segue uma história baseada no filme. Peter Jackson, o diretor do filme de 2005, também teve um papel ativo no desenvolvimento do jogo, que expande o enredo do filme, adicionando novas criaturas e locais. O jogo emprega um estilo cinematográfico que o torna mais envolvente e menos parecido com um videogame tradicional.

locale.title: Wallace & Gromit in Project Zoo
locale.synopsis: The diabolical penguin, Feathers, has imprisoned all the baby animals in a zoo, and it's up to Wallace and Gromit to rescue them. Charge through the gates as the resourceful and adventurous Gromit, and receive helpful hints from Wallace. This indomitable duo has an array of new inventions such as the Porridge Gun and the Banana Launcher, plus interesting contraptions built by Wallace himself. Gromit's break dancing, backflips, and sneaking moves will also prove valuable in your adventure.

Worms 3D
locale.synopsis: Join the party as worm battles ensue across 3D worlds. Worms 3D pits four players--each with a customizable team of worms--against one another in fully deformable landscapes. All the bizarre weapons from the Worms series--including Banana Bomb, flying Super Sheep, Earthquakes, Air Strikes, and Holy Hand Grenade--appear for your destructive pleasure. Wreak havoc in turn-based multiplayer action or unlock landscapes, sound sets, challenges, and secret missions in the immersive single-player mode.

locale.title: Worms 3D
locale.synopsis: Join the party as worm battles ensue across 3D worlds. Worms 3D pits four players--each with a customizable team of worms--against one another in fully deformable landscapes. All the bizarre weapons from the Worms series--including Banana Bomb, flying Super Sheep, Earthquakes, Air Strikes, and Holy Hand Grenade--appear for your destructive pleasure. Wreak havoc in turn-based multiplayer action or unlock landscapes, sound sets, challenges, and secret missions in the immersive single-player mode.

locale.title: Worms 3D
locale.synopsis: Sei dabei, wenn der Kampf sich über die ganze Länge der bizarren und fasziniernden Welten ausdehnt! Schnapp dir deine Bananenbombe, das fliegende Superschaf oder die Heilige Handgranate und nutze sie, um Verwüstung auf der dynamischen, explosiven 3D-Welt auszurichten. - So etwas hast du noch nie zuvor gesehen! * Packende Einzelspieler-Kämpfe, Herausforderungen und Schlachten * Fantastische Multiplayer-Kampfoptionen * Großartiges Aufgebot an Waffen, Utensilien und anderen Hilfsmitteln * Mit zufällig generierten 3D Welten wirst du kein Spiel zweimal spielen müssen! *Mehr Spiele-Einstellungen und Möglichkeiten, als es Würmer in der Erde gibt.

locale.title: Blowout
locale.synopsis: Budget-priced shooter ported by Terminal Reality. The title, which features 2D-style play mechanics and 3D graphics, is also available for PlayStation 2 and Xbox. In BlowOut, players assume the role of John "Dutch" Cane, a TransFed Marshall assigned to suppress a clone uprising before it gains momentum. Unbeknownst to Cane, though, the clones have been infected by a Xeno genome virus, turning them into grotesque and highly dangerous aliens. It's up to gamers to eliminate the threat using whatever means necessary. Cane's arsenal includes 20mm Pump-Action Shotgun, 8-meter Flamethrower, Plasma Rifle, Machine Gun, 8'' NailGun as well as a variety of gadgets, like Jetpacks, bounce-shields, and sonic-impulse cannons.

locale.title: WWE Day of Reckoning
locale.synopsis: Hit the ropes against WWE's top superstars in WWE Day of Reckoning, which features an all-new story mode filled with deception and betrayal. As your own created wrestler, you can rise up the ranks from the "minor leagues" of sports entertainment all the way to prime-time WWE programming. You can choose your favorite WWE Divas and go head-to-head in a Bra & Panties match. Each wrestling star, including Legends, can target specific body parts to wear down opponents.

Erleben Sie die ganze Action, Spannung und Geschwindigkeit dieses mitreißenden Sports und werden Sie zum Superstar der WWE! * Neuer Superstar-Überraschungsangriff: Gewinnen Sie den Kampf, wenn es Ihr Gegner am wenigsten erwartet! * WWE-Legenden * Bra & Panties

locale.title: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions
locale.synopsis: Welcome to Hong Kong, where mystery and intrigue, money and power, and East and West intermingle. As the Yakuza terrorizes citizens, you arrive on the scene to answer the call of the city. You'll command an elite police unit called the Dragons, or you can play as a couple of spies hired to defeat Tiger Takagi--the head of the Hong Kong Yakuza. In 40 wild missions, you'll fire at moving targets with car-mounted rocket launchers, maneuver through the destructive environments, and experience real-time crashes and vehicle deformation.

locale.title: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions
locale.synopsis: Welcome to Hong Kong, where mystery and intrigue, money and power, and East and West intermingle. As the Yakuza terrorizes citizens, you arrive on the scene to answer the call of the city. You'll command an elite police unit called the Dragons, or you can play as a couple of spies hired to defeat Tiger Takagi--the head of the Hong Kong Yakuza. In 40 wild missions, you'll fire at moving targets with car-mounted rocket launchers, maneuver through the destructive environments, and experience real-time crashes and vehicle deformation.

locale.title: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions
locale.synopsis: Vous vous êtes déjà retrouvé bloqué dans les embouteillages avec la folle envie de balancer un missile dans la voiture qui se trouvait juste devant vous ? Avez-vous fait la queue dans un parking en rêvant de pouvoir défoncer toutes les voitures autour de vous pour vous garer où vous vouliez ? Alors venez évacuer vos frustrations automobiles avec Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions. Avec encore plus de modes de jeu et de missions que dans sa célèbre version Xbox, Wreckless sur Nintendo GameCube vous place aux commandes de deux équipes d'agents anti-terroristes qui doivent 'nettoyer' Hong Kong - en causant autant de dégâts qu'ils le peuvent. En fonction de l'équipe utilisée, on peut faire le jeu de deux manières, que ce soit du point de vue d'une paire d'espions ou en contrôlant un groupe de policiers d'élite connu sous le nom de Dragons. Mais ils ressemblent plus à l'inspecteur Clouseau qu'à Robocop. Dès l'instant où vous vous retrouvez au volant d'un taxi lance-roquettes, ou que vous passez toute une mission à renverser les stands de Dim Sum, vous comprenez que Wreckless est tout sauf une simulation de conduite sérieuse. Les missions peuvent consister à simplement réduire en pièces une voiture de Yakuza en centre ville, à sauver un capitaine de la police d'une explosion dans des installations souterraines, ou à ouvrir la route à un bus piégé. Comme le nom du jeu le laisse penser ('Wreck' signifie 'Démolir'), la destruction joue un rôle important dans le jeu. On peut détruire à peu près tout ce qu'on veut (dont les piétons - une des nouveautés) et la tôle des voitures se froisse d'une manière très réaliste. Voici un moment très caractéristique de Wreckless. Des bandits ont volé un fourgon blindé plein d'argent, et vous devez l'arrêter à tout prix. Testez vos missiles et votre pare-choc et contraignez-les à se rendre avant qu'ils n'arrivent en ville. Puis filez à l'aéroport pour y prendre votre avion - le tout sans jamais quitter votre voiture ! Le mode de jeu principal n'a pas changé mais sa version GCN le fait bénéficier d'un véritable turbo avec ses fonctions inédites. Une fois une mission terminée, vous débloquez un niveau bonus dans lequel vous devez relever un défi difficile, comme détruire un nombre de voitures défini avec une limite de temps ou explorer la ville à la recherche d'objets cachés. Réussir les missions bonus permettra de débloquer des secrets, qui offrent des petites améliorations au jeu, comme la basse gravité ou la super direction. Mais la nouveauté probablement la plus efficace qu'apporte cette version Nintendo GameCube est l'ajout de missiles. Maintenant, chaque voiture a la possibilité de tirer un certain nombre de roquettes qui augmentent de manière considérable vos chances de ralentir vos proies Yakuza. Les possesseurs de GCN bénéficient aussi d'un nouveau mode deux joueurs, dans lequel un ami et vous pouvez vous affronter en face à face dans les rues de Hong Kong. Avec des accidents style BD, des cascades spectaculaires, des sensations et des fracas plus cinglés qu'un clown dans un stock-car, Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions va combler vos envies de destruction.

locale.title: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions
locale.synopsis: Wolltest du im Stau schon mal den Autos vor dir eine Rakete in den Auspuff jagen? Oder hast du dir bei der Parkplatzsuche gewünscht, du könntest dir deinen Weg einfach freirammen? Dann kannst du deinem Verkehrsfrust jetzt mit Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions Luft verschaffen. Bei Wreckless für den Nintendo GameCube, das über viel mehr Spielmodi und Missionen verfügt als die erfolgreiche Xbox-Version, übernimmst du zwei Teams von Anti-Terror-Spezialisten, die in Hongkong aufräumen sollen - indem sie so viel Zerstörung anrichten wie möglich. Jedes Team steht für einen anderen Weg durch das Spiel. Du übernimmst entweder zwei Spione oder eine Elite-Polizeieinheit namens Dragons. Die hat allerdings mehr mit Inspektor Clouseau gemein als mit Robocop. Sobald du am Steuer eines mit Raketen ausgerüsteten Taxis sitzt oder eine ganze Mission lang Dim Sum-Stände platt fährst, weißt du, dass Wreckless das genaue Gegenteil einer ernsthaften Rennsimulation ist. Bei den sehr unterschiedlichen Missionen musst du mal ein Yakuza-Auto mitten im Berufsverkehr in Stücke schießen, mal einen Polizeibeamten aus einer explodierenden Tunnelanlage retten und mal einen Weg für einen mit Bomben beladenen Bus freiräumen. Wie sich am Spielnamen ablesen lässt, spielt Zerstörung eine wichtige Rolle. Man kann in so ziemlich alles hineinfahren (auch Fußgänger - ein weiteres neues Merkmal), und alle Autos gehen realistisch kaputt. Eine typische Wreckless-Szene: Verbrecher haben einen gepanzerten Geldtransporter gestohlen, und du musst ihn um jeden Preis aufhalten. Beschieße ihn mit Raketen und ramme ihn, damit er die Stadtgrenze nicht erreicht. Anschließend rast du zum Flughafen, um dein Flugzeug noch zu erwischen - ohne dass du zwischendurch dein Auto verlässt! Die Grundzüge des Haupt-Spielmodus sind unverändert geblieben, doch die GCN-Version hat einen Turbo-Schub ganz neuer Merkmale verpasst bekommen. Wenn du eine Mission abschließt, wird ein Bonus-Level freigeschaltet, in dem du eine schwierige Aufgabe erledigen musst, z.B. eine bestimmte Anzahl von Autos innerhalb eines knappen Zeitlimits zu zerstören oder in der Stadt verborgene Gegenstände aufzuspüren. Erfolgreich abgeschlossene Bonus-Missionen schalten Cheats frei, die das Spiel um ganz neue Facetten bereichern, etwa hohe und niedrige Schwerkraft oder eine Super-Lenkung. Die wahrscheinlich effektivste Neuerung dieser Nintendo GameCube-Version sind jedoch die Raketen. Jetzt kann jedes Auto eine begrenzte Zahl davon abfeuern, was deine Chancen, die Yakuza aufzuhalten, deutlich erhöht. Für GCN-Besitzer gibt's außerdem einen neuen Zweispieler-Modus, mit dem du in den Straßen von Hongkong gegen einen Freund antreten kannst. Mit Zusammenstößen im Zeichentrickstil, spektakulären Stunts und jeder Menge witzig gemachtem Nervenkitzel bietet Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions reichlich Gelegenheit zum Abreagieren.

locale.title: Wave Race: Blue Storm
locale.synopsis:
Storm Warning!
Prepare for the wettest, wildest racing ever as Wave Race splashes onto the Nintendo GameCube!

locale.title: ウェーブレース ブルーストーム
Wave Race: Blue Storm
locale.synopsis:
Storm Warning!
Prepare for the wettest, wildest racing ever as Wave Race splashes onto the Nintendo GameCube!

locale.title: Wave Race: Blue Storm
locale.synopsis: Elle est le constituant principal de toute matière vivante. Elle recouvre la grande majorité de la surface du globe. Elle est incolore, inodore, et appelée à devenir une grande vedette. Après avoir assisté aux impressionnants effets de vague de Wave Race®: Blue Storm, de Nintendo, vous regarderez d'un autre oeil votre verre d'eau... Wave Race®: Blue Storm maintiendra à coup sûr votre niveau d'adrénaline, que vous soyez fan des jeux de course en général ou des compétitions nautiques en particulier. Mieux : vous succomberez même si vous dêtestez les jeux de course... Avec son mode Championnat ultra-attirant, son mode Cascade brillant et ses possibilités de jeu à quatre, Wave Race®: Blue Storm propose tout ce que peut offrir la course. Blue Storm comporte huit parcours, huit pilotes et trois degrés de difficulté. Les parcours sont géniaux parce qu'ils changent totalement de profil en fonction de la nature des vagues. La trajectoire idéale par grand beau temps n'est pas nécessairement la plus adaptée lorsque les vagues se mettent à ressembler à des tsunami. Et ces conditions sont susceptibles de changer en cours d'êpreuve ; autant dire qu'il n'est pas question de rêvasser. Les commandes de jeu offrent un bon équilibre entre réalisme et fun. Votre scooter rebondira de vague en vague avec un réalisme impressionnant grâce à la remarquable modélisation physique. Le jeu prèsente une prise en main facile, mais vous devrez sentir et maîtriser de mieux en mieux les commandes au fil de votre progression en mode Championnat. Le bouton L et le bouton R, par exemple, vous permettront de vous pencher en virage. Au lieu d'amasser un grand nombre de pilotes au comportement identique, les développeurs de Nintendo Software Technology ont préféré limiter le nombre de riders à huit, mais doter chacun de points forts et de faiblesses qui influent réellement sur le gameplay. Vous pourrez d'ailleurs personnaliser les caractéristiques de chaque pilote selon vos propres spécifications. Le résultat final est un contrôle d'une finesse incroyable pour des courses vraiment serrées. Le mode Cascade a été aussi bien conçu. Il existe deux types de cascades : les sauts et les figures, les premiers étant effectués en vol alors que les seconds se font à la surface de l'eau. Et il est vraiment très fun d'exécuter des cascades lors d'une course multi-joueurs afin d'ajouter l'humiliation à la défaite... Wave Race®: Blue Storm constitue l'exemple parfait des jeux auxquels vous pouvez espérer jouer sur le Nintendo GameCube.

locale.title: Wave Race: Blue Storm
locale.synopsis: Es ist der Hauptbestandteil aller lebenden Materie. Es bedeckt den größten Teil der Erdoberfläche. Es ist farblos, es ist geruchlos, und demnächst ist es auch ein gefeierter Star. Wenn du die überwältigenden Welleneffekte in Nintendos Wave Race: Blue Storm gesehen hast, wirst du sicher eine ganz neue Art der Bewunderung für H2O empfinden. Wave Race: Blue Storm sorgt garantiert für Adrenalinschübe, ob du nun ein Fan von Rennspielen allgemein oder speziell von Rennen auf dem Wasser bist. Hey, selbst wenn du Rennspiele hasst, könnte dich dieses überzeugen. Mit seinem super-ausgefeilten Meisterschafts-Modus, einem eindrucksvollen Stunt-Modus und heißer Action für vier Spieler bietet Wave Race: Blue Storm Rennspaß pur. Blue Storm verfügt über acht Strecken, acht Fahrer und drei Schwierigkeitsstufen. Das Schöne an den Strecken ist, dass sie je nach Wellensituation ein ganz anderes Rennerlebnis ermöglichen. Der Streckenverlauf an einem sonnigen Tag kann sich beträchtlich von der Route unterscheiden, die du einschlagen solltest, wenn die Wellen Tsunamistärke erreicht haben. Da sich die Bedingungen auch mitten im Rennen ändern können, musst du immer auf der Hut sein. Bei der Spielsteuerung ist ein guter Kompromiss zwischen Realismus und Spaß erreicht worden. Dein Boot rast dank des exakten physikalischen Modells äußerst realistisch von Welle zu Welle. Die Spielsteuerung ist leicht zu erlernen und zu benutzen, doch wenn du dich durch den Meisterschafts-Modus vorarbeitest, solltest du dich auch mit ihren Feinheiten vertraut machen. Mit der L-Taste und R-Taste kannst du dich zum Beispiel in die Kurven legen. Statt das Spiel mit überflässigen Fahrern zu überfrachten, die sich im Spiel in nichts unterscheiden, haben die Entwickler bei Nintendo Software Technology acht einzigartige Fahrer mit deutlichen Stärken und Schwächen zur Verfügung gestellt, welche sich auch auf das Spiel auswirken. Darüber hinaus können die persönlichen Attributwerte jedes Fahrers nach deinen eigenen Vorlieben angepasst werden. Dies ermöglicht eine erstklassige Spielsteuerung und wirklich spannende Rennen. Der Stunt-Modus ist ähnlich gut gelungen. Es gibt zwei Arten von Stunts: Sprünge und Tricks. Sprung-Stunts werden in der Luft ausgeführt, Trick-Stunts auf dem Wasser. Es macht besonders viel Spaß, Stunts bei Mehrspieler-Rennen einzusetzen, um seine Freunde noch ein bisschen zu demütigen, wenn man vorne liegt. Wave Race: Blue Storm ist ein hervorragendes Beispiel für die grandiosen Spiele, die du auf dem Nintendo GameCube erwarten darfst.

locale.title: Wave Race: Blue Storm
locale.synopsis: Es el principal elemento de todos los seres vivos. Cubre un porcentaje aplastante de la superficie de la Tierra. Es incolora, insípida y va a ser la estrella del juego. Tras asistir a los impresionantes efectos de las olas en Nintendo's Wave Race®: Blue Storm, vas a empezar a sentir algo nuevo por el H2O. Wave Race®: Blue Storm te garantiza un verdadero subidón de adrenalina, tanto si te gustan los juegos de carreras en general, como si prefieres los de carreras en el agua en particular. ¡Incluso si odias los juegos de carreras, caerás rendido! Con un modo Campeonato ultra desafiante, el increíble modo Maniobras y Acción para cuatro jugadores, Wave Race®: Blue Storm es un completísimo juego de carreras. Blue Storm incluye ocho circuitos, ocho corredores y tres niveles de dificultad. Lo mejor de los circuitos es que ofrecen una experiencia totalmente nueva basada en las olas. Las condiciones pueden cambiar en medio de la carrera, luego debes estar siempre atento. El control del juego ofrece un buen equilibrio entre realismo y diversión. La nave bota de ola a ola con un realismo sorprendente, gracias a la física realista. Es fácil cogerle el truco al juego, pero a medida que avances por el modo Campeonato tendrás que dominar otros detalles más sutiles. Por ejemplo, con el Botón R y el Botón L puedes inclinarte en las curvas. En lugar de llenar el juego de tropecientos personajes que hacen lo mismo, los desarrolladores de Nintendo Software Technology ofrecen ocho personajes exclusivos con unos puntos fuertes y débiles fácilmente detectables, que realmente afectan al estilo de juego. Además, las características individuales de cada corredor se pueden personalizar a tu gusto. Al final se consigue un control de primera sobre el juego y unas carreras realmente competitivas. El modo Maniobras también está muy bien diseñado. Las maniobras son de dos tipos: saltos y trucos. Las que son saltos se hacen en el aire y las de los trucos en el agua. Es bastante divertido hacer piruetas durante las carreras en multijugador para humillar todavía más al contrincante derrotado. Wave Race®: Blue Storm es un ejemplo magnífico de los juegos de primera a los que podremos jugar en Nintendo GameCube.

locale.title: Wave Race: Blue Storm
locale.synopsis: È il componente principale di tutta la materia vivente. Copre un'enorme percentuale della superficie terrestre. È incolore, inodore, e diventerà una famosa star. Dopo aver visto gli stupefacenti effetti di onde in Nintendo's Wave Race: Blue Storm, valuterai diversamente l'H2O. Sei un appassionato di gare in generale o di gare acquatiche in particolare? In entrambi i casi, Wave Race: Blue Storm ti garantirà alti livelli di adrenalina. Anzi, potrebbe conquistarti anche se non ti piacciono le gare! Con una stupefacente modalità Campionato, una sgargiante modalità Acrobazie e una grandiosa azione a quattro giocatori, Wave Race: Blue Storm fornisce un'atmosfera competitiva di livello superiore. Wave Race: Blue Storm presenta otto percorsi, otto piloti e tre livelli di difficoltà. L'aspetto fantastico dei percorsi è che offrono esperienze di gara assolutamente nuove, basate sulla condizione del tempo e delle onde. Anche se è una giornata assolata, la linea retta non è necessariamente un percorso seguibile se le onde raggiungono altezze da tsunami! Le condizioni posso mutare nel bel mezzo della gara, quindi è importantissimo restare all'erta! Il controllo di gioco inoltre rappresenta un ottimo equilibrio fra realismo e divertimento. La tua imbarcazione rimbalza di onda in onda con un impressionante realismo, seguendo le reali leggi della fisica. Il percorso nella modalità Campionato, facile all'inizio, ti obbliga a imparare a utilizzare i comandi in modo sempre più preciso; il pulsante L e il pulsante R, per esempio, ti permetteranno di inclinare la tua imbarcazione per curvare. Gli sviluppatori di Nintendo Software Technology hanno creato otto diversi piloti, con comportamenti e reazioni caratteristiche, punti di forza e debolezze che dovrai scoprire man a mano e che influenzeranno la tua prestazione; le caratteristiche individuali di ogni pilota, inoltre, possono essere personalizzate come preferisci. Il risultato finale è un controllo di gioco di prim'ordine e una serie di gare davvero competitive ed esaltanti. La modalità Acrobazie è altrettanto ben progettata. Le acrobazie sono di due tipi: i salti e i trick. I salti vengono effettuati quando si è sospesi in aria, e i trick sull'acqua. È particolarmente divertente esibirsi in un'acrobazia durante una gara multigiocatore, soprattutto per aggiungere un po' di umiliazione alla sconfitta dei tuoi amici. Wave Race: Blue Storm è uno stupefacente esempio dei magnifici giochi da fuoriclasse che puoi aspettarti di giocare sul Nintendo GameCube.

locale.title: ESPN International Winter Sports 2002
locale.synopsis: ESPN International Winter Sports 2002 is basically a winter sports version of Konami's very popular Track and Field games with ten fast paced events and vivid graphics. Feel the spray of snow in the alpine slalom or the shimmer of the ice in the treacherous Bobsled run as it brings winter sports to life.

locale.synopsis: ESPN International Winter Sports 2002 is basically a winter sports version of Konami's very popular Track and Field games with ten fast paced events and vivid graphics. Feel the spray of snow in the alpine slalom or the shimmer of the ice in the treacherous Bobsled run as it brings winter sports to life.

locale.title: ハイパースポーツ2002WINTER
locale.synopsis:
夏季スポーツを題材にした物とは違い、冬季スポーツならではのスピード感溢れ、迫力のある競技を採用（全10競技）。また各種競技を出来るだけ簡単、かつ、雰囲気の伝わる操作性でリアルに再現！ 1. ダウンヒル 2. スラローム 3. スキージャンプK90 4. スキージャンプK120 5. モーグル 6. スピードスケート 7. フィギュアスケート 8. ハーフパイプ 9. ボブスレー 10. カーリング
COMPETITION MODE（対戦モード）を設け、画面分割等を用いることで本来ではありえない２人同時対戦プレイの対戦を可能にしました。

locale.title: WTA Tour Tennis
locale.synopsis: Take to the court and experience the realism and authenticity of WTA Tour Tennis. First, choose one of 20 professional tennis players such as Serena Williams, Martina Hingis, and Jelina Dokic--each with lifelike facial expressions and movements. Then, engage in fast-paced competition on grass, clay, and hard surfaces. With simple controls, multiple levels of difficulty, and AI based on actual player attributes, WTA Tour Tennis challenges both newcomers and seasoned pros alike.

locale.title: WTA Tour Tennis
locale.synopsis: Take to the court and experience the realism and authenticity of WTA Tour Tennis. First, choose one of 20 professional tennis players such as Serena Williams, Martina Hingis, and Jelina Dokic--each with lifelike facial expressions and movements. Then, engage in fast-paced competition on grass, clay, and hard surfaces. With simple controls, multiple levels of difficulty, and AI based on actual player attributes, WTA Tour Tennis challenges both newcomers and seasoned pros alike.

locale.title: WTAツアーテニス プロエボリューション
locale.synopsis:
カプリアティ、ヒンギス、ウィリアムス、ドキッチ、杉山と言った、WTA Tourで活躍する人気・実力を兼ね備えた選手が総勢20名、実名で登場。 モーションキャプチャーには世界ランキング８位のエレナ・ドキッチ選手を採用！ リアルに作られた選手とスタジアム、臨場感抜群の演出により、テニス界の主役になった気分を味わえる。 また、大会の成績によって観客の数が変化するシステム、試合中に精神状態が変化し、行動・能力が変化するシステムにより、今までのテニスゲームとは一味違った、臨場感のあるゲームが楽しめる。
圧倒的な臨場感！スタジアムのざわめき、観客の声援、まるで自分がその場にいるような感覚に！

locale.title: Pro Tennis WTA Tour
locale.synopsis: Take to the court and experience the realism and authenticity of WTA Tour Tennis. First, choose one of 20 professional tennis players such as Serena Williams, Martina Hingis, and Jelina Dokic--each with lifelike facial expressions and movements. Then, engage in fast-paced competition on grass, clay, and hard surfaces. With simple controls, multiple levels of difficulty, and AI based on actual player attributes, WTA Tour Tennis challenges both newcomers and seasoned pros alike.

locale.title: Whirl Tour
locale.synopsis: 'Flipside' is giving a stunning performance at Castle Coliseum. Suddenly in the middle of the band's finale an audible power surge occurs, and lightning strikes each of the 6 band members. One after another they are vacuumed into the sky. The band's roadie shakes his head in disbelief. "I have to find them!!!" He jumps through a color-shifting portal, grabs his scooter and rides off to search for his idols.

locale.title: Whirl Tour
locale.synopsis: 'Flipside' está tendo um desempenho impressionante no Castle Coliseum. De repente, no meio do final da banda, uma onda de energia audível ocorre e um raio atinge cada um dos 6 membros da banda. Um após o outro, eles são aspirados para o céu. O roadie da banda balança a cabeça em descrença. "Eu tenho que encontrá-los !!!" Ele pula por um portal que muda de cor, pega sua scooter e sai em busca de seus ídolos.

locale.title: Whirl Tour

locale.title: X2: Wolverine's Revenge
locale.synopsis: X-Men's most dangerous weapon is out for vengeance. In X2 Wolverine's Revenge, you play as Wolverine as he rushes to find the antidote to a virus that was implanted into his body. Unsheathe your razor-sharp claws, unleash lethal combo attacks, and use accelerated healing powers as you tear into intense action and stealth scenarios. Face off with Sabretooth, Wendigo, Juggernaut, and Magneto, while Professor X and Beast help you search for a cure. As Wolverine, you can become the ultimate fighting machine.

locale.title: X-Men 2: Wolverine's Revenge

Face off with Sabretooth, Wendigo, Juggernaut, and Magneto, while Professor X and Beast help you search for a cure. As Wolverine, you can become the ultimate fighting machine.

locale.title: Wario World
locale.synopsis: He's the good, the bad and the ugly all rolled into one, and now he's 3D. Wario, Mario's jealous rival, plays the hero -- well, kind of -- in his first console adventure. In the depths of Wario's castle lies the plunder of his many adventures on the Game Boy, Game Boy Advance and elsewhere. While Wario kicks back in his crib, enjoying the videogame equivalent of bling-bling, a mysterious black jewel in his trove transforms gems into monsters. His wealth, which was once a source of pride, becomes his greatest foe. Now, Wario must scramble to recover his riches. Developed by Treasure, the game takes the form of a fixed-perspective 3D brawler/platform game, with combo-based attacks and lots of creatures to beat up.

locale.title: Wario World
