locale.title: Wario World
locale.synopsis:
In Wario World müssen sich die Spieler von ihrer fiesesten Seite zeigen. Vor langer Zeit existierte ein mächtiger Edelstein, der die Wünsche der Menschen in teuflische Absichten verwandeln konnte. Er wollte sogar die Welt zerstören. Zum Glück konnten ihn die Elfen daran hindern. Aber Wario, gierig wie er ist, findet das Teufelsjuwel auf seinen Beutezügen und legt es in seine Schatzkammer. Ein großer Fehler! Der Edelstein verwandelt Warios Schätze in grauenvolle Monster. Jetzt liegt es an Wario, seine Schätze wieder zu finden und die Elfen aus ihrem Gefängnis zu befreien.
In einer Eiswelt, einer Wüstenwelt, im Wald und in einer Zirkuswelt geht es richtig zur Sache. Die Spieler müssen versteckte Falltüren aufspüren und jede Menge Items wie z.B. Goldstatuen, Kristalle oder Edelsteine sammeln. Nur so öffnen sich weitere Spielwelten. Dort muss Wario knifflige Puzzles lösen, sich an Kombinationen blinkender Steine erinnern oder auch bewegten Steinblöcken ausweichen. Die Angriffe seiner Gegner wehrt er mit grandiosen Moves ab: Er kann Steinsäulen werfen, auf Bällen balancieren und mit Wirbelstürmen den Himmel erobern. Sind alle Schätze in einem Level gefunden, haben sich die Spieler eines von 8 Wario Ware-Minispielen freigespielt. Mit Hilfe des Nintendo GameCube Game Boy Advance Kabels können die Spiele übertragen und dann auf dem Game Boy Advance gespielt werden. Für alle Nintendo Fans gibts jetzt nur noch eins: Du musst gemein sein in dieser Wario World.
FEATURES:
- Mit 4 genialen Spielewelten: Eis-, Wüsten-, Wald- und Zirkuswelt
- Jede Menge hartnäckige, unterschiedliche Gegner und gemeine Fallen sind zu überwinden
- Mit unglaublich großen und detaillierten Endgegnern
- Viele Schätze wie Goldstatuen, Kristalle und Edelsteine zum Einsammeln, die jeweilige Schlusssequenz ist von der Anzahl der gesammelten Schätze abhängig
- Wario hat viele neue Moves drauf: Er kann Steinsäulen auf seine Gegner werfen, auf Bällen balancieren und mit Wirbelstürmen den Himmel erobern
- Knifflige Rätsel wie das Rekonstruieren bestimmter Kombinationen und das Manövrieren Warios über bewegte Steinblöcke sind zu meistern
- 8 Wario Ware-Minispiele mit Hilfe des Nintendo GameCube Game Boy Advance Kabels auf dem Game Boy Advance übertragbar und spielbar

game.name: Star Wars Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Star Wars Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike
locale.synopsis: Factor 5's follow-up to the successful Star Wars launch title recreates battles from the first three movies both in the air and on the ground. Pilot your favorite vehicles from the movies such as AT-Sts, B-wings, A-wings, and speederbikes, and navigate them through various places in the Star Wars universe. Participate in multiplayer modes including co-op mode, capture-the-base, endurance mode, and dogfighting. Star Wars Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike takes full advantage of the technical capabilities of the Nintendo GameCube supporting HDTV Progressive Scan, and vivid 5-channel Dolby Pro Logic 2 surround sound.

locale.title: スター・ウォーズ ローグ スコードロン III
스타워즈 로그 스쿼드론 III: 반란군 스트라이크

game.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent (USA) (EN,FR,ES)

locale.title: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent
locale.synopsis: Veteran agent Sam Fisher is back. But he's never faced an enemy like this before. To stop a devastating terrorist attack, he must infiltrate a vicious terrorist group and destroy it from within. For the first time ever, experience the relentless tension and gut-wrenching dilemmas of life as a double agent. As you infiltrate a terrorist organization in its American headquarters, you must carefully weigh the consequences of your actions. Kill too many criminals and you'll blow your cover. Hesitate too long and millions will die. Do whatever it takes to complete your mission, but get out alive.

locale.title: Dance Dance Revolution: Mario Mix
locale.synopsis: Boogie down with Mario, DDR-style. Players shake their things to more than 25 dance-flavored songs, from classic Nintendo themes to familiar favorites. With five difficulty levels, dancers of all abilities will be able to get into the groove. Have fun getting in shape! The special "Workout" feature tracks the calories burned while playing. Someone has stolen the Music Keys and released the music they held. Without the Music Keys, the unstable power of the music is wreaking havoc on the land. Mario must recover them before the chaos destroys the entire Mushroom Kingdom! The path to the keys is simple: Left, Right, Up, Down, Right, Down... In Dance Dance Revolution: Mario Mix, players clear levels by performing the correct steps. Once they clear all the levels in a particular world, they'll collect a Music Key. Collect all the Music Keys to win.

locale.title: ダンスダンスレボリューション ウィズ マリオ
locale.synopsis:
ソフトについてくるマットコントローラを床に置いて、はだしになって、画面の下から流れてくる矢印に合わせて、リズムよくマットのボタンを踏んでいきます。タイミングよく踏んだ場合は、「ダンスゲージ」の☆が増えていき、タイミングがずれたり間違ったボタンを踏んだ場合は、「ダンスゲージ」の☆が減っていきます。「ダンスゲージ」が全て無くなる前に曲が終了するとステージクリア！
Music Liste: * ヒア・ウィ・ゴー / スーパーマリオブラザーズより * 土管の中のモーツァルト / アイネ・クライネ・ナハトムジークより * パラパラカルメン / カルメンより * 月夜にぶちこわせ / レッキングクルーより * ジャンプ！ジャンプ！ジャンプ！ / スーパーマリオブラザーズ３より * スーパーマシーン / マリオカート ダブルダッシュ!!より * オレ様がスターだ！ / ワリオワールドより * ハッピーハッピーダンス / Ｄｒ．ＭＡＲＩＯより * みんなでパーティタイム / クシコスの郵便馬車より * 風のかなたに / 威風堂々より * 泳げ四分音符 / スーパーマリオブラザーズより * クエ・テ・バヤ・マリオ / スーパーマリオブラザーズ３より * ほっぴンちょっぴン / スーパーマリオＵＳＡより * 気分はハイ・ホー / 故郷の人々より * マリオのカーニバル / マリオパーティ５より * 氷の上でランデブー / スケーターズ・ワルツより * きっと笑顔がイチバンさ / トリッチ・トラッチ・ポルカより * ワガハイはボスである！ / マリオカート ダブルダッシュ!!より

game.name: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse (Europe) (DE)

locale.title: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse
locale.synopsis: In X-Men Legends II, the X-Men must join their enemy the Brotherhood to fight a greater menace--Apocalypse. The sequel to the team-based role-playing game X-Men Legends lets you play as one of many X-Men, and use and combine his or her unique abilities to defeat enemies. Rise of Apocalypse includes new mutant powers, playable characters, and environments. Also new to X-Men Legends II is online play, which lets you work cooperatively against other teams of mutants.

locale.title: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse
locale.synopsis:
In dieser Fortsetzung des prächtigen RPGs aus dem letzten Jahr führt der Bösewicht Apocalypse Krieg gegen alle seine Gegner, Menschen wie Mutanten. Im Angesicht der drohenden Zerstörung verbünden sich X-Men mit der nicht ganz so heldenhaften Bruderschaft der Mutanten, um Apocalypses finsteres Vorhaben zu stoppen. Du kannst in die Rollen fieser Mutanten wie Magneto und Juggernaut schlüpfen, aber auch auf der guten Seite als Wolverine, Cyclops oder Nightcrawler spielen. Sechzehn (!) spielbare Charaktere stehen dir von Anfang an zur Auswahl und zusätzlich kannst du im Laufe des Abenteuers noch weitere freischalten.
Außerdem treten zahlreiche andere Charaktere aus dem X-Men-Universum in nicht spielbaren Rollen in Erscheinung, zum Beispiel Professor X und die coole Telepathin Emma Frost. Du kämpfst jedoch nicht nur gegen den Schurken Apocalypse, sondern auch gegen diabolische Gegner wie Mr. Sinister, Holocaust oder Sugarman (der ist allerdings nicht so süß wie sein Name klingt). Mit einer astreinen Comic-Grafik, einer fesselnden Geschichte und kooperativer Action für vier Spieler, ist X-Men Legends 2 für Fans der Serie unerlässlich. Auch RPG-Liebhaber sollten sich das nicht entgehen lassen. Rise of the Apocalypse ist schärfer als die Klauen von Wolvie und heißer als Cykes optischer Laserstrahl. Dieser Titel hat definitiv Klassiker-Potenzial!

rom.name: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse (Europe) (DE) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse
locale.synopsis: In X-Men Legends II, the X-Men must join their enemy the Brotherhood to fight a greater menace--Apocalypse. Rise of Apocalypse includes new mutant powers, playable characters, and environments. Also new to X-Men Legends II is online play, which lets you work cooperatively against other teams of mutants.

locale.title: X-Men Legends II : L'Avenement d'Apocalypse
locale.synopsis:
Dans ce nouvel opus qui fait suite au sublime RPG de l'année dernière, Apocalypse a déclenché une véritable guerre ouverte à tous ceux qui oseraient se mettre en travers de son chemin, humains comme mutants. Face à une catastrophe imminente, les X-men joignent leurs forces à celles de la Confrérie des Mutants pour ruiner les projets d'Apocalypse. Cette fois-ci, vous allez pouvoir choisir votre camp, celui des héros gentils ou celui des sombres méchants tels que Magneto ou le Fléau, en plus des Wolverine, Cyclope ou Diablo. Seize personnages jouables sont disponibles au total dès le départ et d'autres sont débloquables en progressant à travers le jeu.
D'autres personnages remarquables issus de l'univers des X-Men font également leur apparition dans des rôles secondaires comme le Professeur X et Emma Frost, la puissante télépathe. Et en plus du terrible Apocalypse, vous devrez également vous battre contre divers ennemis diaboliques comme Sinistre, Holocaust et Sugarman. Arborant un style graphique rappelant l'univers des comic-books, une histoire captivante et de l'action pour quatre joueurs, X-Men Legends 2 est un incontournable de plus pour les X-maniaques ou pour les fans de RPG. Plus aiguisé que les griffes de Wolverine, plus brûlant que le rayon optique de Cyclope, faîtes de la place pour un autre classique de la BD.

locale.title: XIII
locale.synopsis: The president of the United States of America has been assassinated and you are the prime suspect. In XIII, you must unravel a conspiracy that left your memory erased, the President dead, and a bullet wound in your head. Evade assailants eager to end your life or use them as human shields. Select from a deadly arsenal of weapons including silent crossbows, furious automatic weapons, and ashtrays. Face off against other players in multiplayer modes such as Barfight or go co-op in Cover Me mode. Uncover both your shadowy past and America's darkest corridors of power.

locale.title: XIII
locale.synopsis: Schwer verletzt wachst Du an einem Strand an der US-Ostküste auf. Du hast Dein Gedächnis verloren. Es gibt nur zwei Hinweise auf Deine Identität: Du hast ein Tattoo mit der römischen Zahl XIII auf Deiner rechten Schulter und einen Schlüssel zu einem Schließfach bei der Nationalbank, NYC! Auf der Suche nach Deiner wahren Identität wirst Du in eine Verschwörung verwickelt, bei der es um die Ermordung des Amerikanischen Präsidenten geht. In einer spannenden, absolut fesselnden Geschichte wird das Netz aus Intrigen und Geheimdienstaktivitäten immer enger gestrickt.

locale.title: XGRA Extreme G Racing Association
locale.synopsis: Pull a few more Gs in the next installment of the Extreme-G series, XGRA: Extreme-G Racing Association. This futuristic racing game features all-new gameplay modes, features, weapons, bikes, controls, and unlockable content. Choose from unique characters on eight different teams and build your career through variable missions and storylines. Unlock new game modes, tracks, faster bikes, and character-enhancing cybernetic implants. Race in a variety of race tracks with destructible objects including bridges and spectators. Experience the future of racing.

locale.title: XGRA Extreme G Racing Association
locale.synopsis: Pull a few more Gs in the next installment of the Extreme-G series, XGRA: Extreme-G Racing Association. This futuristic racing game features all-new gameplay modes, features, weapons, bikes, controls, and unlockable content. Unlock new game modes, tracks, faster bikes, and character-enhancing cybernetic implants. Race in a variety of race tracks with destructible objects including bridges and spectators. Experience the future of racing.

locale.title: SSX 3
locale.synopsis: Drop in and conquer the massive, living mountain rife with ego-crushing challenges and gravity-bending thrills. SSX 3 returns with more slopes and all-new hazards to overcome including lightning storms, vertical drops, serpentine slopestyle courses and avalanches. Customize your rider's clothes, abilities, and moves. Pull off three levels of awesome "Uber tricks." Dominate the mountain, and then test your skills online. It's a long way down, so make sure you're ready for the challenge.

locale.title: SSX 3
locale.synopsis: Drop in and conquer the massive, living mountain rife with ego-crushing challenges and gravity-bending thrills. It's a long way down, so make sure you're ready for the challenge.

locale.title: Custom Robo
locale.synopsis: GameCube sequel to the Japan-only N64 mech battle titles. Players customize and build up their own mech soldiers by choosing from 200 different parts and weapons, then send them into battle in one of 30 different arenas. Arenas range from the canyon and warehouse stages found in the original game to all-new VR arenas. Each battle starts off with a casting of the dice -- only that these dice are the Robos in their undeployed state. They will then literally unfold Origami-style into the full-blown fighting machines. That's when the weaponry comes in. Using lasers, homing missiles, bombs, special attacks, tackles, and the all-important sentry drones, players blow each other sky-high in the battle for the cup.

locale.title: Custom Robo: Battle Revolution
locale.synopsis: GameCube sequel to the Japan-only N64 mech battle titles. locale.title: カスタムロボ バトルレボリューション
Sonic Riders
locale.synopsis: In Sonic Riders, Dr. Eggman challenges Sonic and his friends to a Worldwide Grand Prix, and the prize for coming out on top is an ultra-rare Chaos Emerald! Gliding on air boards – which are performance-oriented for each playable character – gamers will experience a heightened sense of sports-style racing tension as Sonic and his pals perform tricks and stunts over treacherous wide-open terrain. Sonic and friends speed through tracks on air boards, using individual special moves to strike down opponents. Air is a big element of Sonic Riders. Your board's "fuel" source is air. You can fill up your air at various points on the course, but to race well you'll have to use another means of replenishment: performing tricks with your board. You'll also want to make use of turbulence from racers who are in front of you.

locale.title: Sonic Riders
locale.synopsis: Em Sonic Riders, o Dr. Eggman desafia Sonic e seus amigos para um Grande Prêmio Mundial, e o prêmio por chegar ao topo é uma Esmeralda do Caos ultra-rara! Placas planas - que são voltadas para o desempenho de cada personagem jogável - os jogadores experimentarão uma sensação intensificada de tensão de corrida no estilo esportivo enquanto Sonic e seus amigos executam manobras e acrobacias em terreno aberto e traiçoeiro. Sonic e seus amigos aceleram pelas trilhas em placas aéreas, usando movimentos especiais individuais para derrubar os oponentes. O ar é um grande elemento do Sonic Riders. A fonte de "combustível" da sua placa é o ar. Você pode encher o ar em vários pontos do percurso, mas para correr bem, você terá que usar outro meio de reabastecimento: fazer truques com sua prancha. Você também vai querer aproveitar a turbulência dos pilotos que estão na sua frente.

locale.title: FIFA Football 2004
locale.synopsis: FIFA 2004 its game up a few notches with new installment, FIFA Soccer 2004. This year's action features more advanced levels of player detail and responsiveness. Play as one of the best players from 16 leagues and 350 teams, from Europe's super leagues to the Americas. Plus, a new Career Mode gives you the chance to take a team from the lower divisions, battle through ranks, sign new players, and turn them into champions. With immersive atmospheres, total realism with the world's premier clubs, and improved gameplay, FIFA Soccer 2004 looks to reach the goals of soccer fans.

locale.title: FIFA Football 2004
locale.synopsis: FIFA 2004 seu jogo sobe alguns degraus com a nova parcela, FIFA Soccer 2004. A ação deste ano apresenta níveis mais avançados de detalhes do jogador e capacidade de resposta. Jogue como um dos melhores jogadores de 16 ligas e 350 times, das super ligas da Europa às Américas. Além disso, um novo modo de carreira dá a você a chance de levar uma equipe das divisões inferiores, batalhar através de classificações, contratar novos jogadores e transformá-los em campeões. Com ambientes envolventes, total realismo com os principais clubes do mundo e jogabilidade aprimorada, o FIFA Soccer 2004 busca atingir os objetivos dos fãs de futebol.

locale.title: Mega Man X Collection
locale.synopsis: Capcom's MEGA MAN has been one of the most beloved heroes ever since his debut on the original Nintendo. Now Game Cube gamers can relive all of the action and adventure of six of the greatest MEGA MAN titles in the MEGA MAN X COLLECTION. The first game in the collection is MEGA MAN X, which debuted on the Super Nintendo. This game introduces gamers to Mega Man X, a new version of Mega Man, and the world he lives in, which is significantly different from the world of the original Mega Man. Dr. Light and Mega Man must protect their world from Sigma, an evil organization that is bend on corrupting the robot Reploids and using them to take over the world. In addition to the first six MEGA MAN X games, the collection also includes the US premiere of MEGA MAN BATTLE & CHASE, an exciting racing game that pits Mega Man against a number of his enemies in a racing game. Of course, no one's going to play fair in their fight to the finish line, which means players will have to be on guard against attacks. Finally, the collection also includes a number of original and sketch art and remixed cuts from the original soundtracks from each game. Mega Man fans can't pass up the MEGA MAN X COLLECTION, and new gamers will find the anthology a bargain. Six MEGA MAN X games, a racing game, and tons of extras make the collection irresistible.

locale.title: Mega Man X Collection
locale.synopsis: O MEGA MAN da Capcom tem sido um dos heróis mais amados desde sua estreia no Nintendo original. Agora os jogadores do Game Cube podem reviver toda a ação e aventura de seis dos maiores títulos MEGA MAN da COLEÇÃO MEGA MAN X. O primeiro jogo da coleção é MEGA MAN X, que estreou no Super Nintendo. Este jogo apresenta aos jogadores Mega Man X, uma nova versão do Mega Man, e o mundo em que ele vive, que é significativamente diferente do mundo do Mega Man original. Dr. Light e Mega Man devem proteger seu mundo da Sigma, uma organização maligna que está empenhada em corromper os Reploids robóticos e usá-los para dominar o mundo. Além dos seis primeiros jogos MEGA MAN X, a coleção também inclui a estreia nos Estados Unidos de MEGA MAN BATTLE & CHASE, um emocionante jogo de corrida que coloca Mega Man contra vários de seus inimigos em um jogo de corrida. Claro, ninguém vai jogar limpo em sua luta até a linha de chegada, o que significa que os jogadores terão que estar em guarda contra ataques. Finalmente, a coleção também inclui uma série de arte original e esboço e cortes remixados das trilhas sonoras originais de cada jogo. Os fãs de Mega Man não podem deixar passar a COLEÇÃO MEGA MAN X, e os novos jogadores vão achar a antologia uma pechincha. Seis jogos MEGA MAN X, um jogo de corrida e muitos extras tornam a coleção irresistível.

locale.title: X-Men Legends
locale.synopsis: X-Men enter the realm of role-playing games with an intense story, superhero action, and multiplayer modes. The story in X-Men Legends begins when the X-Men learn that Magneto has devised a plan to give mutants the power to reign supreme over humans. To save the human race from imprisonment, you compose a four-person team from a roster of X-Men characters, including Storm, Gambit, and Wolverine. Complete each mission to strengthen your team, and unlock more characters, costumes, and treasures.

locale.title: X-Men Legends
locale.synopsis: Os X-Men entram no reino dos jogos de RPG com uma história intensa, ação de super-heróis e modos multijogador. A história em X-Men Legends começa quando os X-Men descobrem que Magneto elaborou um plano para dar aos mutantes o poder de reinar supremo sobre os humanos. Para salvar a raça humana da prisão, você compõe uma equipe de quatro pessoas de uma lista de personagens X-Men, incluindo Storm, Gambit e Wolverine. Complete cada missão para fortalecer sua equipe e desbloquear mais personagens, fantasias e tesouros.

locale.title: X-Men Legends

Complete each mission to strengthen your team, and unlock more characters, costumes, and treasures.

locale.title: X-Men Legends
locale.synopsis: Os X-Men entram no reino dos jogos de RPG com uma história intensa, ação de super-heróis e modos multijogador. A história em X-Men Legends começa quando os X-Men descobrem que Magneto elaborou um plano para dar aos mutantes o poder de reinar supremo sobre os humanos. Para salvar a raça humana da prisão, você compõe uma equipe de quatro pessoas de uma lista de personagens X-Men, incluindo Storm, Gambit e Wolverine. Complete cada missão para fortalecer sua equipe e desbloquear mais personagens, fantasias e tesouros.

locale.title: X-Men Legends
locale.synopsis: X-Men enter the realm of role-playing games with an intense story, superhero action, and multiplayer modes. The story in X-Men Legends begins when the X-Men learn that Magneto has devised a plan to give mutants the power to reign supreme over humans. To save the human race from imprisonment, you compose a four-person team from a roster of X-Men characters, including Storm, Gambit, and Wolverine. Complete each mission to strengthen your team, and unlock more characters, costumes, and treasures.

locale.title: X-Men Legends
locale.synopsis: Os X-Men entram no reino dos jogos de RPG com uma história intensa, ação de super-heróis e modos multijogador. A história em X-Men Legends começa quando os X-Men descobrem que Magneto elaborou um plano para dar aos mutantes o poder de reinar supremo sobre os humanos. Para salvar a raça humana da prisão, você compõe uma equipe de quatro pessoas de uma lista de personagens X-Men, incluindo Storm, Gambit e Wolverine. Complete cada missão para fortalecer sua equipe e desbloquear mais personagens, fantasias e tesouros.

locale.title: X-Men: Next Dimension
locale.synopsis: Fight in epic superhero showdowns against 24 of your favorite X-Men characters. In X-Men: The Next Dimension, a powerful enemy plots to rid the world of mutants, and only the X-Men can stop him. Choose from traditional or new X-Men--each with his or her own special fighting abilities and objects to interact with--and battle through destructible environments. Your mission to save the future will uncover secrets about your own past.

locale.title: X-Men: Next Dimension
locale.synopsis: Lute em confrontos épicos de super-heróis contra 24 de seus personagens favoritos de X-Men. Em X-Men: The Next Dimension, um poderoso inimigo planeja livrar o mundo dos mutantes, e apenas os X-Men podem detê-lo. Escolha entre os X-Men tradicionais ou novos - cada um com suas próprias habilidades de luta e objetos especiais para interagir - e lute em ambientes destrutíveis. Sua missão de salvar o futuro irá revelar segredos sobre seu próprio passado.

locale.title: X-Men: Next Dimension

locale.title: Rampage Total Destruction
locale.synopsis: Rampage: Total Destruction offers a fresh take on an arcade classic complete with everyone's favorite monsters: George, Lizzie, and Ralph, along with a variety of new monsters to collect and play. Virtually everything in the environment can be damaged, broken, and utterly destroyed with plenty of hilarious results. Aided by power-ups, the Rampage: Total Destruction monsters are capable of acquiring a number of upgrades throughout the course of a single campaign. Players can annihilate cities all over the world in either one or two player mode in this reinvention of the Midway classic.

locale.title: Rampage Total Destruction
locale.synopsis: Rampage: Total Destruction oferece uma nova versão de um clássico arcade completo com os monstros favoritos de todos: George, Lizzie e Ralph, junto com uma variedade de novos monstros para coletar e jogar. Praticamente tudo no ambiente pode ser danificado, quebrado e totalmente destruído com muitos resultados hilários. Auxiliados por power-ups, os monstros Rampage: Total Destruction são capazes de adquirir uma série de atualizações ao longo de uma única campanha. Os jogadores podem aniquilar cidades em todo o mundo no modo de um ou dois jogadores nesta reinvenção do clássico Midway.

locale.title: SSX on Tour
locale.synopsis: Reach breakneck speeds, catch huge air, and become an icon with SSX On Tour. Create a rider or skier and build a career as you progress from a slope-side wannabe to a black-diamond dominating rockstar. Compete for medals or just tear up the massive new mountain, but make sure you look good doing it because your reputation is always on the line. Pull off jaw-dropping monster tricks to out-style your competitors while hurtling down the slopes at supersonic speeds. You create the hype - the hype creates a legend in SSX On Tour.

locale.title: SSX on Tour
locale.synopsis: Alcance velocidades vertiginosas, pegue um ar incrível e torne-se um ícone com o SSX On Tour. Crie um cavaleiro ou esquiador e construa uma carreira à medida que avança de um aspirante a uma encosta para um astro do rock dominador do diamante negro. Competir por medalhas ou apenas rasgar a nova montanha enorme, mas certifique-se de estar bem fazendo isso porque sua reputação está sempre em jogo. Faça truques monstruosos de cair o queixo para ultrapassar o estilo de seus concorrentes enquanto desce as encostas a velocidades supersônicas. Você cria o hype - o hype cria uma lenda em SSX On Tour.

locale.title: SSX On Tour with Mario
locale.synopsis: Reach breakneck speeds, catch huge air, and become an icon with SSX On Tour. Create a rider or skier and build a career as you progress from a slope-side wannabe to a black-diamond dominating rockstar. Compete for medals or just tear up the massive new mountain, but make sure you look good doing it because your reputation is always on the line. Pull off jaw-dropping monster tricks to out-style your competitors while hurtling down the slopes at supersonic speeds. You create the hype - the hype creates a legend in SSX On Tour.

Você cria o hype - o hype cria uma lenda em SSX On Tour.

locale.title: SSX On Tour with マリオ
locale.synopsis:
どこまでも広がる雄大な雪山、その大自然の中に作られた奇抜で広大なコースを、ハイスピードで疾走するスノーボードアクションゲーム「SSX」。リアルな滑走感覚と現実離れしたエアトリックで多くのファンを虜にした待望のシリーズ最新作が、マリオやルイージ、ピーチ姫を味方につけてついに登場！ ゲレンデを滑るライバルやスキーヤーたちを圧倒的な速さで抜き去り、とてつもない高さのジャンプから目を疑うようなカッコいいエアトリックを決めれば、アドレナリンはもう全開！ 時には規定のコースを外れ木々の間をすり抜けて、たまにはガケから飛び降りて……想像を絶する大自然の雪山を、何でもアリの自由なスタイルで満喫しよう！
ＧＣ版だけのスペシャル特典として、マリオ、ルイージ、ピーチ姫が登場し、華麗なエアトリックの数々を披露する。マリオシリーズから飛び出した、彼らの滑走を堪能できる場所は他にはない！

locale.title: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy
locale.synopsis: Eurocom Entertainment, developers of the popular Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets and James Bond: 007 Nightfire take gamers on a mythological adventure through Egypt in Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy for Xbox, GameCube and PlayStation 2. Switch between two different characters, Sphinx and the Mummy, for a mix of exciting action, as well as stealth and puzzle solving elements. The worlds the character explores are huge and rich with detail and color; they overflow with fluid character model animation, advanced lighting and particle effects, massive geometry and crisp texture work.

locale.title: Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy
locale.synopsis: Eurocom Entertainment, developers of the popular Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets and James Bond: 007 Nightfire take gamers on a mythological adventure through Egypt in Sphinx and the Cursed Mummy for Xbox, GameCube and PlayStation 2. locale.title: Sphinx et la Malédiction de la Momie
Taxi 3: Le Jeu
locale.synopsis: Taxi 3 is a mission-based driving game, developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 2003.

locale.title: Mega Man X: Command Mission
locale.synopsis: Mega Man must infiltrate Giga City Island to thwart the evil plans of the Liberion Army who have initiated a riot in this RPG. By choosing from a selection of seven different playable characters, gamers construct a three-member attack force using Mega Man, Zero, Axl, and more, to help bring peace to the region once and for all. The game includes a revolutionary "Cross Order System" that allows flawless execution of special and finishing attack moves on enemies, such as Party Hookup, Action Trigger, Hyper Mode, or the linked main and sub-weapon Final Strike finishing move. Additionally, by using a super energy metal called Force Metal, players can upgrade weapons, abilities, and attack moves, greatly improving their character's capabilities. The GameCube version has Game Boy Advance connectivity in the form of a device that aids in treasure-hunting.

locale.title: Rockman X: Command Mission
locale.synopsis: Mega Man must infiltrate Giga City Island to thwart the evil plans of the Liberion Army who have initiated a riot in this RPG. By choosing from a selection of seven different playable characters, gamers construct a three-member attack force using Mega Man, Zero, Axl, and more, to help bring peace to the region once and for all. The game includes a revolutionary "Cross Order System" that allows flawless execution of special and finishing attack moves on enemies, such as Party Hookup, Action Trigger, Hyper Mode, or the linked main and sub-weapon Final Strike finishing move. Additionally, by using a super energy metal called Force Metal, players can upgrade weapons, abilities, and attack moves, greatly improving their character's capabilities. The GameCube version has Game Boy Advance connectivity in the form of a device that aids in treasure-hunting.

locale.title: ロックマンＸ コマンドミッション
locale.synopsis:
突如として、反乱を起こした“ リベリオン軍”の野望を阻むためギガンティスに潜入する、エックスたち・・・ 強大な力を持つリベリオン軍総帥「イプシロン」のもと、謎につつまれたレプリロイド達が、エックスたちの前に立ちはだかる。ギガンティスで出会う新たな仲間達と共に、広大な冒険のフィールドを駆け抜けてゆく・・・
主人公のエックスにゼロ、「ロックマンX７」から登場のアクセルに加え、新たに４人のヒーロー（ヒロイン）が登場！どのキャラクターも個性豊かで、それぞれに特徴ある攻撃スタイルを持っているぞ！ この７人中より３人を選び、ロックマンエックスシリーズ初のパーティバトルに挑め！ エックスたちを待ち受けるリベリオン軍のボスたちも、今後ドンドン紹介していくので、続報を待て！！
誰もが体感できる、アクションゲームの爽快感と臨場感を盛り込んだ新RPGバトルシステムを搭載。 「Ｘ ( クロス ) オーダーシステム」は、画面右下に各キャラクターの順序とライフゲージが表示されていて、戦況により行動順序が変化するぞ！これを素早く見極め行動することで、戦況を有利に進めることが出来る！WE(武器エネルギー)が溜まると発動可能になる必殺技「アクショントリガー」は、コントローラーの操作によって、攻撃力が劇的に変化する強力な必殺技！ロックマンＸシリーズではおなじみの「チャージショット」もアクショントリガーで再現！一撃必殺の痛快操作が楽しめる！！ 例えば・・・ エックスのチャージショットであれば、【Ａ】ボタン溜め後、離して発射！ ゼロのコマンドアーツは、格闘ゲームのようなコマンド入力で 強力な乱舞技が発動できる！ そして・・・ 攻撃には、メインウエポンとサブウエポンが存在し、連携攻撃が可能。 一定以上のダメージを与えると超強力な必殺攻撃「ファイナルストライク」を発動することが出来る。 これは、バトルメンバー全員による総攻撃だ！

locale.title: Mega Man X: Command Mission
locale.synopsis: Mega Man must infiltrate Giga City Island to thwart the evil plans of the Liberion Army who have initiated a riot in this RPG. By choosing from a selection of seven different playable characters, gamers construct a three-member attack force using Mega Man, Zero, Axl, and more, to help bring peace to the region once and for all. The game includes a revolutionary "Cross Order System" that allows flawless execution of special and finishing attack moves on enemies, such as Party Hookup, Action Trigger, Hyper Mode, or the linked main and sub-weapon Final Strike finishing move. Additionally, by using a super energy metal called Force Metal, players can upgrade weapons, abilities, and attack moves, greatly improving their character's capabilities. The GameCube version has Game Boy Advance connectivity in the form of a device that aids in treasure-hunting.

locale.title: Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut
locale.synopsis: Dr. Eggman is up to his old tricks again, but in this special Director's Cut version, there are a whole lot more of them to trip up Sonic and his pals. Get ready to go on 50 new adventures in the all-new Mission Mode as you strive to dismantle the evil genius' plans to rule the world. There are 12 exciting Bonus Games to unlock in the form of classic Sonic Game Gear titles. Whether you play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy Rose, Big the Cat, or E102 Gamma, you'll get a unique adventure every time as each character has their own deep storyline and unique type of gameplay. Don't forget to visit your favorite Chao in the Chao Garden where you can take a break from saving the world and pit your Chao against others in a variety of tournaments.

locale.title: Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut

locale.title: Surf's Up
locale.synopsis: Surf's Up is a surfing game set at the annual "Reggie Belafonte Big Z Memorial Surf Off." Players choose from one of 10 characters from the film "Surf's Up" to play as, including Cody, the young challenger from Shiverpool; Tank, the merciless champion; or Big Z, the surfing legend from the past. Only by mastering and understanding the waves can the player become not only the new champion, but a true surf legend.

locale.title: Pokémon XD: Gale of Darkness
locale.synopsis: Pokémon XD is a sequel to the role-playing game Pokémon Coliseum. You'll play as Michael, a Pokémon trainer who is trying to thwart the evil Cipher. Cipher plans to control the world by using the powerful, but unpredictable, shadow Pokémon. Now you must fight back by collecting your own shadow Pokémon and beating Cipher's goons in battle. Pokémon XD also lets you import Pokémon from Game Boy Advance Pokémon games and participate in head-to-head battles with other players.

locale.title: 포켓몬 XD: 어둠의 선풍 다크 루기아

locale.title: Pokémon XD: Gale of Darkness
locale.synopsis: Pokémon XD is a sequel to the role-playing game Pokémon Coliseum. You'll play as Michael, a Pokémon trainer who is trying to thwart the evil Cipher. locale.title: Pokémon XD : Le Souffle Des Ténèbres
Pokémon XD: Der Dunkle Sturm
locale.synopsis:
Schon war Orre in Sicherheit geglaubt - da ziehen unheilvolle Schatten auf und ergreifen Besitz von den Herzen der Crypto-Pokémon. Das Land droht, aus dem Gleichgewicht zu geraten!
Eine abenteuerliche Odyssee beginnt, auf der sich die Spieler in atemberaubenden Kämpfen gegen die Trainer der verzauberten Pokémon beweisen müssen. Von Anfang an steht ihnen dabei Evoli zur Seite, der zu einem der geschicktesten und stärksten Pokémon aller Zeiten heranwächst. Mit ihm und den anderen Pokémon gilt es nun, das Böse in den Herzen der Crypto-Pokémon zu verbannen. Dabei ist immer wieder Wachsamkeit gefordert, um den tückischen Angriffen der verdunkelten Crypto-Pokémon zu entgehen. Zum Glück steht den Trainern ein hilfreiches Werkzeug zur Verfügung: Der Aura-Sucher bringt das typische Leuchten der Crypto-Pokémon ans Tageslicht und kann die verdunkelten Kämpfer so enttarnen. Im finalen Showdown muss sich der Spieler dem Kampf mit Dark Lugia stellen - einem Pokémon aus den Tiefen des Meeres. In einem packenden Einzelspieler- oder im actionreichen 2- oder 4-Spieler-Modus kann der Spieler dem Geheimnis von Dark Lugia auf den Grund gehen und so die Crypto-Pokémon heilen und erlösen.
FEATURES:
- Die Welt der Pokémon in einer neuen Dimension
- Unzählige Pokémon, von denen einige zum ersten Mal zu sehen sind
- Sensationelle 3D-Grafik
- Multiplayer-Funktion für 2 oder 4 Spieler
- Kompatibel mit den Spielen Pokémon Feuerrot/Blattgrün & Rubin/Saphir für den Gameboy Advance

locale.title: 포켓몬 XD: 어둠의 선풍 다크 루기아
Donkey Konga 2
locale.synopsis: Featuring a fresh choice of new music tracks, this is the second edition of Nintendo's rhythm and beat game starring characters from the Donkey Kong series of videogames. The game is controlled via the included conga controller and has up to four players hitting the two drums and clapping their hands to the rhythm of the beat.

locale.title: Donkey Konga 2
locale.synopsis: Featuring a fresh choice of new music tracks, this is the second edition of Nintendo's rhythm and beat game starring characters from the Donkey Kong series of videogames. The game is controlled via the included conga controller and has up to four players hitting the two drums and clapping their hands to the rhythm of the beat.

locale.title: ドンキーコンガ2 ヒットソングパレード
locale.synopsis:
このゲームの遊び方は、とってもカンタン。曲にあわせてタルコンガ（別売）のたたき面をたたいたり、手びょうしを打つだけ。 演奏だけではなく、ゲーム中すべての操作もタルコンガでできます。
「ドンキーコンガ２」では“手びょうし”のポイントにこだわりました。 つまり、“たたく”と“手びょうし”の心地よいアクションがさらにパワーアップ！ みんなでリズムに合わせて、キモチイイ“手びょうし”を体験してみませんか。
ストリートライブには１人で遊ぶ「ソロ」に加え、２人でクリアを目指す「デュエット」が登場。「イージー」「ハード」「エキスパート」の３つの難易度で幅広く楽しめます。
コンサートの「シェア」では、１つのタルコンガを使って２人で「たたき」と「手びょうし」を分担できます。１人でプレイするときより曲に手びょうしが多くなっているから、「手びょうし」担当の人も大満足！

locale.title: Donkey Konga 2
locale.synopsis: Featuring a fresh choice of new music tracks, this is the second edition of Nintendo's rhythm and beat game starring characters from the Donkey Kong series of videogames. The game is controlled via the included conga controller and has up to four players hitting the two drums and clapping their hands to the rhythm of the beat.

locale.title: Donkey Konga 3
locale.synopsis:
onkey Konga 3: All You Can Eat! Spring 50 Song Mix) is a music video game in the Donkey Kong series by Nintendo and Namco. Before the second installment was released in North America, Nintendo and Namco had already started plans for the third game in the series, which was eventually released in Japan in early 2005. It features all new songs and mini-games.
Donkey Konga 3 features a total of 57 songs, over 20 songs more than the first two games. 35 of these tunes are the usual classical, pop, and game selections, but an extra 21 tunes from Nintendo Famicom games are included. Unlike the previous Donkey Konga games, Donkey Konga 3 was only released in Japan.

locale.title: ドンキーコンガ3 食べ放題!春もぎたて50曲
Barnyard
locale.synopsis: Bring the Barnyard movie to life! Battle the coyote invaders, tee up for a game of golf, target the bulls eye with your flying chicken and race downhill on your speedy bike. Explore a fully interactive, 3D world and prove they have what it takes to be the biggest party animal of them all.

locale.title: Donkey Kong: Jungle Beat
locale.synopsis: The big ape is drumming up a new beat for platformers with this unique action game played entirely with the DK Bongo controller. Grab a set of DK Bongo controllers and use them to guide Donkey Kong through wild jungle environments brimming with ravenous enemies and challenging obstacles. Tap the bongos, do a drum roll or clap to control Donkey Kong on the screen! Right conga makes DK go right, left conga makes him go left -- hit them both to jump or clap (or hit the rim) to trigger a wave that knocks over enemies or attracts bananas. As you "drum" your way through diverse stages ranging from lush jungles to floating jelly in the sky, you will battle enormous beasts, collect bananas, get in boxing matches with rivals and even ride animals and vehicles in a jungle gone wild!

locale.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Falsebound Kingdom
locale.synopsis: Yugi and his friends are trapped in a virtual reality world gone crazy. As Yugi or Kaiba, you must form a team of three monsters to occupy towns across two different scenarios and take part in strategic team battles. Delegate commands to your team to conquer each mission. During battle, your team can perform devastating group attacks and combos. Over 175 monsters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! animated TV series appear in the game--and all of them will fight to the finish for control of each map.

locale.title: 遊戯王 フォルスバウンドキングダム 虚構に閉ざされた王国
locale.synopsis: バトルシティでの戦いを終え、平穏な暮らしを送る遊戯たちのもとに、新興のゲーム企業からの招待状が届く。「デュエルモンスターズ」をベースにした最新ゲームの体験テストに参加してほしい、というのだ。早速訪れ、ゲームを起動する遊戯と仲間達。しかし、突然ゲーム画面が乱れ、暴走しはじめ、遊戯たちはモンスターと人間が共存するファンタジーの中の世界に閉じ込められてしまう！ 遊戯たちは、悪の帝国に反抗するレジスタンスの将軍となり、モンスター軍団を率いてゲームの物語をクリアし、現実世界への脱出を目指す。モンスターと人間が入り乱れての長い戦いが、今はじまる…

locale.title: Jikkyou Powerful Major League
locale.synopsis: A variation of the Power Pro series with Major League Baseball teams.

locale.title: 実況パワフルメジャーリーグ
Mario Superstar Baseball
locale.synopsis: Continuing the tradition started by such games as Mario Power Tennis and Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, Mario Superstar Baseball brings a new brand of fun to the world of baseball. The game combines an intuitive hitting system with easy-to-learn fielding and pitching controls – making it an arcade-like experience that will appeal to baseball novices and hard-core fans alike. Players can try their hands at Challenge Mode, where they must wander the land clearing baseball-related trials. Or they can sit down for a game in the Toy Field, where they hit balls at circles in the outfield to earn coins and other prizes. With multiplayer options for up to four players, wild, character-specific power moves, crazy mini-games and more than 50 characters from the Mario universe, Mario Superstar Baseball is sure to be the new favorite pastime.

locale.title: Mario Superstar Baseball
locale.synopsis:
Aufgepasst, denn hier kommt ein fantastischer Baseballspaß für alle Mario Fans. Von Donkey Kong bis Bowser haben alle ihre Baseballschläger ausgepackt und liefern sich packende Baseballmatches in verschiedenen Stadien rund um den Globus. Der Spieler wählt auf einer Weltkarte den Spielort seiner Wahl, um die Keule mit oder gegen insgesamt 50 beliebte Nintendo Charaktere zu schwingen. Hier ist jede Menge Sportgeist gefragt, denn neben fiesen Tricks der Gegner fordern Sandstürme und andere Gefahren jede Menge Geschicklichkeit. Das leicht zu handhabende Steuerungssystem macht das Pitchen, also das Werfen der Basebälle zu einem Kinderspiel. Aber das ist nur der halbe Sieg: jede der Figuren hat noch einige individuelle Spezialtricks in petto, die für böse Überraschungen sorgen können. Die flüssige 3D-Grafik und packende Animationen machen das Sportspektakel auch zu einem optischen Abenteuer: Verschiedene Kameraeinstellungen garantieren volle Übersicht bei der Jagd nach dem Home Run - und im Multiplayer Modus können sogar bis zu vier Spieler ihre Kräfte messen.
FEATURES:
- Witzige Baseballmatches in 3D-Optik
- Ein Wiedersehen mit Donkey Kong, Luigi und den anderen Nintendo Allstars
- Multiplayer Option für bis zu vier Spieler
- Baseballtour mit Spielorten auf dem gesamten Globus und 50 verschiedenen Nintendo Charakteren
- Unterhaltsame Baseball-Minigames

locale.title: TMNT
locale.synopsis: The new NT video game uses the same dark and dangerous environments and adventurous themes featured in the new NT CGI film being developed by Imagi Animation Studios and Mirage Licensing. The NT movie takes place in a New York City plagued by secretive villains and strange, otherworldly creatures. Faced with these perils, the Turtles will experience their most trying time as heroes and as a family, as Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo lose their focus and struggle to maintain their unity and ninja discipline.

locale.title: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue
locale.synopsis: The tiger returns to take back the Outback in Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2. The evil Boss Cass has broken out of Currawong Jail and has hatched a plan to take over the world with an army of Uber Reptiles. Now it's up to Ty, the boomerang-wielding hero, and his newly formed team of Burramudgee Bush Rescue mates to stop him. As Ty, you can explore an expansive open environment on foot or in a vehicle. You'll also have access to more boomerangs and mech units, each with special powers and abilities.

locale.title: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life
locale.synopsis: The latest in the Harvest Moon series, a Wonderful Life pits gamers in a real-life simulation that spans the equivalent of 30 years. As you blossom from a young man into a mature adult you will be able to date, get married, and have a child that will eventually become a huge part of your life. For instance, you might have a boy who will grow to work side-by-side with you helping to farm your crops. So, having a child will have a huge affect on your life. The third-person roleplaying simulation features more than 40 characters to interact with as well as Game Boy Advance link-up.

locale.title: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life
locale.synopsis: Das Farm-RPG Harvest Moon feiert mit A Wonderful Life sein langersehntes Debüt auf dem Nintendo GameCube. Dein Abenteuer beschränkt sich nicht nur darauf, Mais zu ernten und Hühner zu füttern. Es handelt sich vielmehr um eine sehr authentische Lebenssimulation. In Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life übernimmst du die Rolle eines jungen Farmers, der nicht nur eine gedeihende Farm leiten, sondern auch eine Familie gründen soll. In den 30 Spieljahren (etwa 40 Stunden Gameplay) musst du eine Frau finden, ein Kind in die Welt setzen und hart arbeiten, um ein anerkanntes Mitglied der Gesellschaft zu werden. Neben einer charmanten Grafik und einem niedlichen Sound gibt es noch wesentlich mehr neue Features, wie z. B. diverse Möglichkeiten, dein Heim auszubauen, zusätzliches Werkzeug, das du auf deiner Farm benutzen kannst, und eine größere Vielfalt an Früchten und Gemüse zum Anbauen. Das Spiel hat auch verschiedene Endsequenzen im Angebot, so dass es sich durchaus lohnt, es erneut zu spielen, sowie einen "Free Play"-Modus, in dem du so lange auf der Farm arbeiten kannst wie du möchtest, ohne dass dein Charakter älter wird! Außerdem kannst du Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life mit Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town für den Game Boy Advance verbinden und so in beiden Versionen des Spiels neue Ereignisse und Objekte freischalten

locale.title: 牧場牧場 ワンダフルライフ
locale.synopsis:
「牧場物語シリーズ」は、畑を耕し、野菜を育て、動物たちとふれあいながら牧場生活を疑似体験していくゲーム。子供から大人まで幅広いファン層に支持されている人気シリーズです。その最新作が、家族で遊べるゲーム機、ニンテンドーゲームキューブ用に、ついに“初”登場いたします。 今回の舞台は『わすれ谷』という名の小さな集落。この自然に恵まれた集落の中で４０人以上の住人たちと共に生活していきます。プレイヤーは主人公の若者となり、父が残した牧場を受け継ぎます。最初は小さな牧場ですが、畑で収穫した作物や、牛の乳、ニワトリの卵などを売って得たお金を使って、牧場の再建を、あくまでも“のんびり”目指します。
特に不満はなかった。だからといって、これといってやりたい事があるわけでもなく、僕はただ、なんとなく毎日を過ごしていた。そんなある日、僕は出会ったんだ、タカクラという男に。 死んだ親父の知り合いらしいその男は、何故か強く僕を惹きつけるものを持っていた。 気が付くと、僕は彼に言われるまま、あるところへ連れてこられていたんだ。それがこの古びた牧場だったってわけ。最初はなんとなくね。とりあえずここで何か始めてみるか、ぐらいの軽い気持ちで牧場に住むことを決めた。とにかくそれまでとは違う何かを求めて、ってことなのかもね。
ところが、牧場での生活はとんでもないものだった。それはもう忙しくて、大変きわまりない。 別に何にもやらずに毎日を過ごすことも出来たわけだけど、ここでは自分が何かをしないと何も起こらない。寂しくなんかないさ、だっていろいろなことが僕にとってはどうでもよかったんだもの。でもさ、その代わりといっちゃ何だけど、ここでは、僕が何かをやるたびに何かの答えが返ってくる。なんて言うかな、そこに生きる手応えみたいなものを感じたんだ。だからかな、今はずいぶん変わった。何がって？それは・・・君自身がこのゲームをプレイして確かめておくれよ。

locale.title: Harvest Moon: A Wonderful Life
locale.synopsis: The latest in the Harvest Moon series, a Wonderful Life pits gamers in a real-life simulation that spans the equivalent of 30 years. As you blossom from a young man into a mature adult you will be able to date, get married, and have a child that will eventually become a huge part of your life. For instance, you might have a boy who will grow to work side-by-side with you helping to farm your crops. So, having a child will have a huge affect on your life. The third-person roleplaying simulation features more than 40 characters to interact with as well as Game Boy Advance link-up. *NOTE- This game requires 47 blocks on a memory card to save, a standard memory card has only 59 blocks*

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
locale.synopsis: Link, a young man raised as a wrangler in a small, rural village, is ordered by the mayor to attend the Hyrule Summit. He sets off, oblivious to the dark fate that has descended upon the kingdom. When he enters the Twilight Realm that has covered Hyrule, he transforms into a wolf and is captured. A mysterious figure named Midna helps him break free, and with the aid of her magic, they set off to free the land from the shadows. Link must explore the vast land of Hyrule and uncover the mystery behind its plunge into darkness. As he does, he'll have to enlist the aid of friendly folk, solve puzzles and battle his way through dangerous dungeons. In the Twilight Realm, he’ll have to use his wolf abilities and Midna’s magic to bring light to the land. Besides his trusty sword and shield, Link will use his bow and arrows, fight while on horseback and use a wealth of other items, both new and old.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
locale.synopsis: El caos y la destrucción amenazan la paz de Hyrule y Link viaja a un nuevo mundo en el que puede adoptar la forma de lobo. Este es parte del argumento de esta nueva entrega de la famosa saga de Nintendo, que aunque originalmente fue creada para Gamecube, y que también llega a Wii aprovechando las novedosas opciones de control de esta consola. Hyrule ha sucumbido al poder de las sombras. Su luz es débil, y no tardará en apagarse. Adéntrate con Link en su aventura más oscura y compleja, en su perfecta adaptación para acompañar la llegada de la nueva máquina de Nintendo. Eres nuestra única esperanza.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
locale.synopsis: Werde ein Teil der Legende! Das gewaltigste Zelda aller Zeiten! Bekämpfe dunkle Kreaturen, die deine Heimat bedrohen, und erforsche eine riesige Welt voller Gefahren. Tritt mit Schwert und Schild gegen zahllose Feinde an! Erlerne okkulte Künste wie den Helmspalter und das Blankziehen. Verwende dein Gespür, um in Wolfsgestalt Fährten zu suchen, wenn widernatürliche Schatten das Land bedecken.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
locale.synopsis:
In The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess maakt Link zijn terugkeer. Link is opgegroeid in een klein landelijk dorpje en wordt door de burgemeester opgeroepen om deel te nemen aan de Hyrule Summit. Het trekt erop uit zich bewust van het donkere lot dat is neergedaald over het koninkrijk. Wanneer hij in de Twilight Realm terecht komt dat Hyrule bedekt, verandert hij in een wolf en wordt gevangen genomen. Een mysterieus figuur genaamd Midna helpt hem te ontsnappen. Met behulp van haar magie gaan ze op weg om het land te bevrijden van de schaduwen.
Naast Link, Zelda en Midna zijn er een hoop karakters in The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess waaronder nieuwe, maar ook oude bekende. Link moet de donkere schaduw over Hyrule verdrijven door puzzels op te lossen en zich een weg te vechten door gevaarlijke kerkers. In de Twilight Realm zal hij gebruik moeten maken van zijn vaardigheden als wolf en de magie van Midna. Naast zijn vertrouwde schild en zwaard kan Link als mens gebruik maken van pijl en boog, vechten op de rug van zijn paard en gebruik maken van een hoop nieuwe en bekende voorwerpen.

rom.name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT,NL) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2
locale.synopsis: Go to the next level in the Dragon Ball Z saga. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2 improves upon the first installment by adding an all-new single player mode, new characters and explosive attacks. Experience the new match-ups, character cameos and challenging missions in "Dragon World." Pick your favorite DBZ hero or enemy and take on a friend in "Vs." and "Tournament" modes. If you're really good, you will soon come face-to-face with Buu, the most lethal DBZ villain.

locale.title: ZooCube
locale.synopsis: ZooCube tests your reflexes with fast-paced puzzle action. Simple to learn, but tough to master, ZooCube features a variety of 3D puzzles that you can solve by yourself or cooperatively with a friend. You can even challenge your friend in head-to-head multiplayer mode or try out 11 other different modes. In this intense puzzle experience, you must rotate the puzzles and collect special power-ups and bonuses to keep the action going.

locale.title: ズーキューブ
locale.synopsis:
ズーキューブは、誰にでも楽しめる全く新しいコンセプトの３Ｄアクションパズルゲームです。同じ柄と形のカプセルのペアをつくるだけの簡単ルールですが、プレイヤーには素早い判断力と、それを実行する反射神経が要求され、ステージが進むごとに増す難易度で、経験豊富なプレイヤーでも十分に楽しめます。４人までのお友達と対戦プレイも楽しめます。2002年のＥ３でゲームキューブのベストパズルゲームの称号を受けた自信作です。（PlanetGameCube主催）
惑星カオス。天才科学者Dr.ズーが最初に世界の注目をあびたのは、もう何年も前の話。動物を変異させておかしな形にしてしまうという研究は、度が過ぎてしまったのでした。幸いにも、その恐ろしい研究は世界に知られることとなり、Dr.ズーは捕らえらました。しかし、それから間もなく13年が過ぎようとしていたある日、またあのおかしな形の動物たちが発見されました。これはつまり、Dr.ズーが逃亡し、あの恐ろしい研究をまた始めてしまったということなのです！「ズーキューブ」は、この動物たちを救うマシンです。一刻の猶予もありません。あなたはベストパイロットのひとりとして、新しい飛行艇に「ズーキューブ」を搭載し、動物たちを救いに行かねばなりません。トレーニングを重ね、「ズーキューブ」を使いこなせるようになり、できるだけ多くの動物を救うのです。発見されたおかしな形の動物たちを「ズーキューブ」に回収し、同じ形の動物をペアにすることで、元の形に戻すことができます。「ズーキューブ」をうまく操作して、できるだけ多くの動物を救出してあげてください。ひとつの面に５匹以上の動物を積み重ねると「ズーキューブ」は壊れてしまいます。救出された動物たちは、リハビリテーションのために、飛行艇の格納庫に収容されることになっています。さあ、かわいそうな動物たちを救う旅へ、グッドラック！

locale.title: Zoocube
locale.synopsis: ZooCube tests your reflexes with fast-paced puzzle action. Simple to learn, but tough to master, ZooCube features a variety of 3D puzzles that you can solve by yourself or cooperatively with a friend. You can even challenge your friend in head-to-head multiplayer mode or try out 11 other different modes. In this intense puzzle experience, you must rotate the puzzles and collect special power-ups and bonuses to keep the action going.

locale.title: Godzilla: Destroy all Monsters Melee
locale.synopsis: Legendary monsters battle among Earth's cities to determine the planet's fate. In Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee, you can play as Godzilla or any of his longtime rivals as they fight hand-to-hand, at close range, and with special moves. Each massive beast has different physical attributes and special projectile weapons. You'll fight in cities such as Tokyo and San Francisco--all featuring real building destruction and physics. For multiplayer fighting mayhem, you can bring three of your friends into the battle.

locale.title: Godzilla: Kaijuu Dairantou
locale.synopsis: Legendary monsters battle among Earth's cities to determine the planet's fate. In Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee, you can play as Godzilla or any of his longtime rivals as they fight hand-to-hand, at close range, and with special moves. Each massive beast has different physical attributes and special projectile weapons. You'll fight in cities such as Tokyo and San Francisco--all featuring real building destruction and physics. For multiplayer fighting mayhem, you can bring three of your friends into the battle.

locale.title: ゴジラ 怪獣大乱闘
locale.synopsis:
「ゴジラ 怪獣大乱闘」には総勢１１体のモンスターが登場します。人気の高いラドンやアンギラスは当然のこと、敵役として絶大な人気を誇るキングギドラや、マニアックな人気を誇るガイガンやメガロ。また、平成ゴジラシリーズの中からはデストロイアなども登場。さらに主役であるゴジラは「９０'s」と「２０００」の２種類が登場。 微妙な違いまで細かくモデリングされた姿は、マニアでも納得してもらえるものです。それらの怪獣が映画そのまま、いや、映画を超えた迫力でゲームの中で暴れまわります。また上記の怪獣のほかに、数種類の怪獣たちが隠されています。
「ゴジラ 怪獣大乱闘」は細かいコマンド入力などが必要ないので、全てのプレイヤーは自分の選んだ怪獣を自由自在に操ることが出来ます。しかも、怪獣ごとに設定されているオリジナルの技の数々はゲームに奥の深さを与えており、ステージごとの特性を把握することとあわせれば無限の広がりをもつプレイを楽しむことが出来ます。 小さなお子様でも、普段はゲームで遊ばないお父さんでも、またヘビーなゲームユーザーでも楽しめるのが特徴です。最大４人までの同時プレイが楽しめるので、みんなでわいわいと遊んでいただけます。

locale.title: Godzilla: Destroy all Monsters Melee
locale.synopsis: Legendary monsters battle among Earth's cities to determine the planet's fate. In Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee, you can play as Godzilla or any of his longtime rivals as they fight hand-to-hand, at close range, and with special moves. Each massive beast has different physical attributes and special projectile weapons. You'll fight in cities such as Tokyo and San Francisco--all featuring real building destruction and physics. For multiplayer fighting mayhem, you can bring three of your friends into the battle.

locale.title: Dragon Ball Z: Sagas
locale.synopsis: For the first time in Atari's Dragon Ball Z series, console gamers get to explore DBZ as they wish in this action-adventure title with RPG elements that spans the storylines from the Saiyan Saga through the Cell Games Saga. Players will journey from Earth to Namek and beyond in a 3-D action-adventure featuring melee, ranged attacks and destructible environments. Play as many of the greatest Z-Warriors, including Goku, Piccolo or even Gohan, complete with Super Saiyan forms. Battle through six different story arcs that pit you against infamous enemies, such as Nappa, Captain Ginyu, Raditz, Frieza, and Cell. Explore never-before-seen elements of the Dragon Ball Z series.

locale.title: Gekituisenki - Zero Fighter
locale.synopsis: Zero Fighter is a flight shooting game similar to Namco's Ace Combat series. The game features 33 playable aircraft models and 3 play modes: Mission, Training and Versus.

locale.title: 零ファイター撃墜戦記
Zoids Full Metal Crash
locale.synopsis: Zoids Full Metal Crash was the first Zoids game to be released on the Gamecube. The game includes a story mode which loosely followes the television series. Zoids in this game is also customizable allowing the player to upgrade parts by earning points in other areas of the game.

locale.title: ゾイドフルメタルクラッシュ
locale.synopsis:
大人気放送中の「ゾイドジェネシス」よりムラサメライガーやデッドリーコングも参戦する！スゴイ格闘ゲームが登場！その名も「ゾイド フルメタルクラッシュ」！ 多種多様なサイズとデザインが存在するゾイドが、人間型対戦では味わえないバトルでを体験させてくれる！参戦ゾイドは約30体、カスタムパーツも50種以上あり、君だけのカスタムゾイドを作ることが可能！メモリカードにデータをセーブすれば、友達のカスタムゾイド同士で対戦も可能だ！
ド派手な必殺技を簡単操作で繰り出せるのが魅力、それでいて奥が深い対戦が楽しめる！カスタマイズ機能でオリジナルゾイドを作って対戦するのも楽しい。

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
locale.synopsis: Nintendo's thematic action-adventure sequel to Ocarina of Time takes the series back to its more cartoonish roots. Utilizing a completely new look with cel-shaded graphics, the game casts players in the role of a familiar young boy, who sets out to save his kidnapped sister. Gameplay is vintage Zelda, only that the game's overworld is covered by water. Players have to control the direction of the wind to sail across the ocean and find dungeons, towns, and plenty of secrets. A special Game Boy Advance link-up option lets another player join the quest and give hints and assistance via the handheld.

rom.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (USA) (EN) (v1.0).iso
The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (USA) (EN) (v1.48).iso

game.name: Zelda no Densetsu: Kaze no Takuto (Japan) (JA)

locale.title: Zelda no Densetsu: Kaze no Takuto
locale.synopsis: Nintendo's thematic action-adventure sequel to Ocarina of Time takes the series back to its more cartoonish roots. Utilizing a completely new look with cel-shaded graphics, the game casts players in the role of a familiar young boy, who sets out to save his kidnapped sister. Gameplay is vintage Zelda, only that the game's overworld is covered by water. Players have to control the direction of the wind to sail across the ocean and find dungeons, towns, and plenty of secrets. A special Game Boy Advance link-up option lets another player join the quest and give hints and assistance via the handheld.

locale.title: ゼルダの伝説 風のタクト
locale.synopsis: 主人公・リンクは謎の大怪鳥にさらわれた妹を助け出すため、相棒でもある帆船に乗って大海原と島々を旅します。行く手をはばむ敵と戦ったり、ダンジョンを探索して謎を解いたり。不思議なタクトで風を操って島を巡り、海に眠る宝を探したり、ユニークな人々との出会いがあったり。 そして、壮大な冒険物語の先に待ち受けるものはいったい…。

rom.name: Zelda no Densetsu: Kaze no Takuto (Japan) (JA) (v1.00).iso

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
locale.synopsis: Nintendo's thematic action-adventure sequel to Ocarina of Time takes the series back to its more cartoonish roots. Utilizing a completely new look with cel-shaded graphics, the game casts players in the role of a familiar young boy, who sets out to save his kidnapped sister. Gameplay is vintage Zelda, only that the game's overworld is covered by water. Players have to control the direction of the wind to sail across the ocean and find dungeons, towns, and plenty of secrets. A special Game Boy Advance link-up option lets another player join the quest and give hints and assistance via the handheld.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
locale.synopsis:
Endlich hat das Warten ein Ende! Mit "The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker" wird die Erfolgsserie auf dem Nintendo GameCube fortgesetzt. In seinem ersten eigenen GameCube Abenteuer wird Link in die idyllische Inselwelt eines Ozeans versetzt. Doch das friedliche Leben auf dem Eiland wird zerstört, als ein Raubvogel Links geliebte Schwester entführt. Natürlich zögert unser Held keine Sekunde und macht sich auf die Reise, um sie aus den Fängen des Monsters zu befreien.
Auf seiner waghalsigen Reise muss Link alles einsetzen, was er hat: Bekannte Items wie Pfeil & Bogen, Bomben, Enterhaken und Bumerang, aber auch neue Tools wie den Wind Waker, mit dem er Melodien spielen und so Macht über den Wind gewinnen kann. Außerdem kann Link nun die Tageszeit ändern oder die Kontrolle über andere Figuren übernehmen.
Gemeinsam mit dem kleinen großen Helden taucht der Spieler in ein fantastisches, kinoreifes Zeichentrickuniversum ein: atemberaubende Effekte wie Feuer, Schatten oder Rauch und die beeindruckende Soundkulisse machen die Atmosphäre perfekt.

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
locale.synopsis: Il vento del Male agita gli oceani La leggenda vuole che ogni qualvolta il Male insorge, appaia un eroe chiamato Link, deciso a combatterlo. Questa leggenda si rinnova quando Link, pronto per la sua più emozionante avventura, solca l'increspata superficie di un vasto oceano. Alla ricerca della sorellina rapita, con l'aiuto della Bacchetta del Vento dovrà fronteggiare pericolosi mostri, esplorare cupi labirinti, e incontrare personaggi indimenticabili.

rom.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (Europe) (EN,FR,DE,ES,IT) (v1.00).iso

locale.title: Butt-Ugly Martians Zoom or Doom
locale.synopsis: •Race the fastest; most futuristic vehicles in the universe; race across 9 intergalactic alien landscapes; fight off enemy attacks at every turn; fastest racers win the Martian Conqueror's Cup; a heart-pounding, interstellar racing championship

locale.title: 버트 어글리 마틴즈: 줌 오어 둠
Zapper - One Wicked Cricket!
locale.synopsis: n Zapper, you play a small creature that embarks on a great quest. Zapper is a cricket in search of brother Zipper, who was kidnapped by the evil Maggie the Magpie. Through 18 twisted levels, you'll evade bizarre enemies and deadly hazards using your electrified antennae and springy reflexes. Zap your foes, explore your surroundings, and find and destroy eggs before they hatch. Zapper's intense action continues as you unlock hidden areas, bonus levels, and play multiplayer games.

locale.title: Zapper: One Wicked Cricket!
locale.synopsis: In Zapper, you play a small creature that embarks on a great quest. Zapper is a cricket in search of brother Zipper, who was kidnapped by the evil Maggie the Magpie. Through 18 twisted levels, you'll evade bizarre enemies and deadly hazards using your electrified antennae and springy reflexes. Zap your foes, explore your surroundings, and find and destroy eggs before they hatch. Zapper's intense action continues as you unlock hidden areas, bonus levels, and play multiplayer games.

locale.title: Robots
locale.synopsis: Based on the animated feature film of the same name, Robots brings you to a world where human-like machines walk the earth. You play as Rodney Copperbottom--a genius inventor robot who uncovers a villain's plot to take over the city. With the help of your friends, you must overcome challenging obstacles to realize your dreams. The game lets you ride fast robot vehicles, upgrade your arsenal of gadgets, battle evil robots, solve puzzles, and more.

locale.title: Robôs
locale.synopsis: Baseado no longa-metragem de animação de mesmo nome, Robôs leva você a um mundo onde máquinas semelhantes a humanos andam pela terra. Você joga como Rodney Copperbottom - um robô genial inventor que descobre a trama de um vilão para dominar a cidade. Com a ajuda de seus amigos, você deve superar obstáculos desafiadores para realizar seus sonhos. O jogo permite que você conduza veículos de robôs velozes, atualize seu arsenal de dispositivos, lute contra robôs malvados, resolva quebra-cabeças e muito mais.

locale.title: Robots
locale.synopsis: Based on the animated feature film of the same name, Robots brings you to a world where human-like machines walk the earth. You play as Rodney Copperbottom--a genius inventor robot who uncovers a villain's plot to take over the city. With the help of your friends, you must overcome challenging obstacles to realize your dreams. The game lets you ride fast robot vehicles, upgrade your arsenal of gadgets, battle evil robots, solve puzzles, and more.

locale.title: ロボッツ
locale.synopsis:
貧しい皿洗い機ロボット、コッパーボトム夫妻の間に生まれた男の子ロドニーは、両親思いで発明大好きの夢見るロボット。 「外見が何で作られていようと誰でもが輝ける」というビッグウェルド博士とある日、運命的な出会いを果たし、大都会ロボット・シティへとやってきた。 そこで彼は、明るく一生懸命に生きている中古部品ロボットたちや、知性と教養を持つ心やさしい女性キャピィーと出会う。そんな時、この世の中で必要なのは、最新鋭の部品でできたロボットだけで、中古部品でできたロボットは必要ないので解体するというラチェットらの悪巧みをロドニーは知る。 そして彼は仲間たちと共に、勇気を持って立ち上がるのだった。しかし…。
映画「ロボッツ」の随所にちりばめられたアクションシーンを、ゲームプレイ、冒険、パズル、戦闘など、バラエティ豊かな全12ステージを体感できる 広大な３Ｄフリーローミング環境で、鮮やかな美麗グラフィックエフェクトを表現

locale.title: Robots
locale.synopsis: Based on the animated feature film of the same name, Robots brings you to a world where human-like machines walk the earth. You play as Rodney Copperbottom--a genius inventor robot who uncovers a villain's plot to take over the city. With the help of your friends, you must overcome challenging obstacles to realize your dreams. The game lets you ride fast robot vehicles, upgrade your arsenal of gadgets, battle evil robots, solve puzzles, and more.

locale.title: Zoids Battle Legends
locale.synopsis: Zoids: Battle Legends is a Beat-'Em-Up game, developed by Tomy Corporation and published by Atari, which was released in 2004.

locale.title: Zoids VS. II
locale.synopsis: Based on the Zoids anime cartoons Tomy brings a sequel of Zoids Versus to the Nintendo GameCube in Japan. Zoids Versus, released in Japan a year ago, is a simulation of actually piloting a Zoid. You can face off against various computer opponents advancing in rank or face your friend in the two player battle mode.

locale.title: ゾイドバーサスII
locale.synopsis:
ファン待望の大型ゾイドが操作可能！ ＶＳモードで遂に、要望の高かった「ウルトラザウルス」や「マッドサンダー」が操作できるぞ！ ゾイド史上最長の「セイスモサウルス」も、プレイヤーゾイドとして登場し、夢の「大型ゾイドバトル」が実現！
接近戦が熱い「フィストモード」登場！ リングアウトルールがあるバトルステージによる、１対１のゾイドバトルが楽しめるモードが登場。 ステージの広さが、通常のＶＳモードに比べ狭いため、接近戦に特化したカスタマイズが必要になるぞ！ また、相手の攻撃によりステージ外に弾かれてしまう可能性もあるため、通常使用しにくい重量級ゾイドが活躍できる！？
新登場ゾイドがぞくぞく紹介 ファンからの要望が高かったシールドライガーを含め新規ゾイド１５機種以上追加！ ＢＬＯＸも多数登場し、ＺＯＩＤＳ ＳＡＧＡファン待望のトリニティライガーやジェノハイドラや、サイバードライブゾイドで活躍したライガーエアロ、プロトセイバーも参戦！ カスタマイズバリエーションを含めて１００体以上登場！
* マトリクスドラゴン * キメラドラゴン * ダブルアームリザード * グリフォン * ロードゲイル * エレファンダー * シンカー * グスタフ * シールドライガー * ライガーエアロ * プロトセイバー * トリニティライガー * ジェノハイドラ * ウルトラザウルス * マッドサンダー * セイスモサウルス
新キャラクターも登場 バン編からはムンベイや、ビット編からはジェミーが参戦。 ミッションモードでは３人の新キャラクター、ＳＡＧＡ２の主人公、ゼルとユーノも登場。

locale.title: ゾイド バーサス III
locale.synopsis:
「リアルなゾイドを操縦する興奮！！多数の機体の所有、自由なカスタマイズ・・・ファンがゾイドでやりたかったことのすべてがかなう」ゾイドTVゲーム史上もっとも高い人気を誇るシリーズ、「ZOIDS VS.（ゾイドバーサス）」が、飛躍的なスケールアップをしてみたび登場！！！
今年、玩具で新登場となるゾイド「レイズタイガー」をはじめ、さまざまな機体が登場します！ また、新要素「空中戦」により登場ゾイドの幅が広がりました。また、ファンに人気のゾイドもセレクト！！

locale.title: WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Party Game$!
locale.synopsis: Wario is back in the video game biz, and this time the tightfisted microgame master is servin' up some insane party games on Nintendo GameCube. The 200+ hysterical microgames from Wario Ware, Inc.: Mega Microgame$ are making a triumphant return on the big screen, supported by wildly creative multiplayer matches starring Wario's crazy crew of video game developers.

locale.title: 와리오 웨어 Inc.: 메가 파티 게임$!
Atsumare!! Made in Wario
locale.synopsis: Wario is back in the video game biz, and this time the tightfisted microgame master is servin' up some insane party games on Nintendo GameCube. The 200+ hysterical microgames from Wario Ware, Inc.: Mega Microgame$ are making a triumphant return on the big screen, supported by wildly creative multiplayer matches starring Wario's crazy crew of video game developers.

locale.title: あつまれ!! メイドインワリオ
WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Party Game$!
locale.synopsis: Wario is back in the video game biz, and this time the tightfisted microgame master is servin' up some insane party games on Nintendo GameCube. The 200+ hysterical microgames from Wario Ware, Inc.: Mega Microgame$ are making a triumphant return on the big screen, supported by wildly creative multiplayer matches starring Wario's crazy crew of video game developers.

locale.title: WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Party Game$!
locale.synopsis: Le Nintendo GameCube est à son tour atteint par la démence sans fin de Wario Ware ! Ce feu roulant de jeux plus farfelus les uns que les autres en a sidéré plus d'un lorsque le jeu est sorti sur Game Boy Advance en remportant un succès... dingue. Aujourd'hui, c'est plus de 200 mini-jeux surréalistes qui font leur apparition dans Wario Ware, Inc: Mega Party Game$. Ses graphismes brillants et audacieux et son gameplay diablement captivant donnent une expérience multi-joueurs démentielle : la plupart des modes multi-joueurs supportent jusqu'à quatre joueurs mais, en jouant à tour de rôle, certains modes peuvent accueillir jusqu'à 16 joueurs ! Vous pouvez également jouer au mode 'un joueur', lui aussi bien allumé, pour débloquer des bonus à gogo.

locale.title: WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Party Game$!
locale.synopsis: Der unaufhaltsame Wario Ware-Wahnsinn kommt auf den Nintendo GameCube! Die Nintendo Game Boy Advance-Version dieses skurrilen Spielbombardements ist bereits international gefeiert worden. Jetzt erscheinen die über 200 seltsamen Minispiele in Form des total verrückten Wario Ware, Inc: Mega Party Game$. Die freche, knallbunte Grafik und ein simples aber erschreckend fesselndes Spielprinzip versprechen eine umwerfend komische Mehrspielererfahrung. Die meisten Mehrspielermodi können mit bis zu vier Spielern gespielt werden, an einigen Modi dürfen sich aber bis zu 16 Leute abwechselnd versuchen! Du kannst dich jedoch auch ganz alleine durch den abgefahrenen Einzelspielermodus kämpfen und dabei jede Menge irrer Extras freischalten.

locale.title: WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Party Game$!
locale.synopsis: ¡La locura sin límites de Wario Ware llega a Nintendo GameCube! Como bien sabes, esta genial excentricidad de diversión sin límites ya ha conquistado al público de Game Boy Advance, y ahora más de 200 minijuegos absolutamente surrealistas se preparan para hacer su aparición en el inaudito Wario Ware, Inc: Mega Party Game$. Sus brillantes gráficos se funden con una sencilla pero terriblemente cautivadora jugabilidad para proporcionar una experiencia multijugador absolutamente frenética. Hasta cuatro jugadores pueden jugar simultáneamente, ¡pero si deciden jugar por turnos hasta 16 jugadores pueden participar en algunos juegos! Simplemente sensacional.

locale.title: 와리오 웨어 Inc.: 메가 파티 게임$!
Metroid Prime 2: Echoes (Bonus Disc)
locale.synopsis:
Capitalizing off of the blockbuster GameCube title and its ensuing sequel, this bonus disc released as part of the Metroid Prime Bonus Bundle of the GameCube system, and also made available through Nintendo Power (either by purchasing a one-year subscription/renewal, or by registering a GameCube system and five eligible games through "My Nintendo" membership.)
The bonus disc features an exclusive playable demo of Metroid Prime 2 Echoes, plus features Metroid Prime 2 Echoes trailers, a Metroid Prime art gallery, and "Metroid Chronicle", an interactive history tour of the Metroid series.

locale.title: Pokémon Colosseum Bonus Disc
locale.synopsis: Pokemon Colosseum (Bonus Disc) Pokémon fans can now battle their favorite Pokémon on the grand stage. Starring a brand new leading character, Pokémon, Colosseum offers a story mode that pits you against tough trainers who routinely catch damaged Pokémon. In Battle mode, you can use the Game Boy Advance cable to send your team from your Pokémon Ruby or Pokémon Sapphire Game Pak to your Gamecube, then witness the true potential of your team. Rescue Pokémon and watch them come to life in spectacular Colosseum battles.

locale.title: SD Gundam Trial
locale.synopsis:
Continuing the SD Gundam line of strategy games originally began on NES, this GameCube update works in a mix of action and simulation elements. During the simulation parts, you move units around on a gridded map in an attempt to increase your territory. When your unit ends up on in the same spot as an enemy, you enter into battle with full control over your Battle Suit in fast-paced action in one of two viewpoints (2D overhead or 3D direct view).
The single player story mode has you follow a series of scenarios as you work through battles. Multiplayer mode has support for up to four players, although you can go up directly against three computer opponents if you like. In multiplayer mode, you and your opponents set up an original team prior to battle.

locale.title: The Tower of Druaga
locale.synopsis: GameCube port of the arcade classic, offered as a preorder bonus for Namco's Japanese release of Baten Kaitos. The Tower of Druaga is a maze action game from the days when Namco was still known as Namcot. Played from a top-down overhead view, players take control of Prince Gilgamesh on his quest to rescue his love, Ki, from the vicious Druaga. Using his sword and shield to attack and defend, Gilgamesh faces off with plenty of monsters, including everyone's favorite slimes, and tracks down hidden chests for items and keys. As he climbs the tower floor by floor, players have to employ the use of special items to solve puzzles and overcome Druaga's minions, such as potions, jet boots, and a pick ax.

VIDEO: 1080 Avalanche, Kirby Air Ride, Pokemon Colosseum, Final Fantasy: Crystal Chronicles, Harry Potter: Quiddich World Cup, NBA Live 2004, and Spongebob Squarepants: The Search for Bikini Bottom.

locale.title: Pac-Man vs.
locale.synopsis: In Pac-Man vs., Pac-Man must navigate mazes, eating pac-dots, fruit, and power pellets as he dodges hungry ghosts, just like the original--but this time, human players control the ghosts. The lead player, viewing the entire maze on the Game Boy Advance, must avoid the other three players controlling the ghosts on the television screen. To raise the tension factor, the three ghost players can only see part of the maze around their characters. Pac-Man must clear all the pac-dots in each maze to progress to the next level.

game.name: The Legend of Zelda: Collector's Edition (USA) (EN)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Collector's Edition
locale.synopsis: Bonus Legend of Zelda Disc that includes complete, emulated versions of The Legend of Zelda, Zelda II: The Adventure of Link, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (standard version), and The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask. Also featured: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker 20-minute demo, as well as Wind Waker and Zelda series retrospective video clips. All games are playable in progressive scan display. Both Nintendo 64 titles run emulated at a resolution of 640x480p (verus the original 320x240i). This disc was part of a 2003 holiday GameCube bundle and available by registration of two Nintendo titles. Also available in Japan as part of the Club Nintendo membership program for 500 points (or 150 when purchased with the Gamecube version of Legend of Zelda: Four Swords.)

locale.title: The Legend of Zelda: Collector's Edition
locale.synopsis:
Die größte Legende aller Zeiten! Die ultimative Zelda-Kollektion!
Eine Bonus-Disc von Legend of Zelda von Nintendo UK, die nie separat im Laden zu kaufen war.
Die Disc enthält 4 klassische Spiele:
1. The Legend of Zelda 2. Zelda II: The Adventure of Link 3. The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 4. The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
Zudem befinden sich eine Demo von The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker und Videoclips mit Rückblicken auf alle Zelda-Titel auf der Disc.
Alle Spiele sind im Progressive Scan-Modus spielbar. Beide Nintendo 64-Titel laufen emuliert mit einer Auflösung von 640x480p (statt der ursprünglichen 320x240i).
